1a1(dkon brtsegs): (ga) @#/ ! /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa bzhugs so/ /
1a2(dkon brtsegs): (黃) 大寶積經第三部
1b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po bzhi pa/
1b2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de
1b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /the
1b4(dkon brtsegs): tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed cing ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'di
1b5(dkon brtsegs): la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs te/ de rab tu rtogs pas de bzhin
1b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mngon par gshegs nas lam me/ lhan ne/
1b7(dkon brtsegs): lhang nger mdzad do/ /de 'di lta ste dper na sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la nyi ma mngon par shar
1b8(dkon brtsegs): nas lam me lhan ne/ lhang nge ba de bzhin du shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
2a1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mngon par gshegs nas lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger mdzad do/ /shA ri'i bu srin bu me khyer gyi 'od de bas ni gang 'bru
2a2(dkon brtsegs): mar gyi mar me'i 'od 'di shin tu 'phags/ shin du mchog /shin du kha dog dang ldan/ shin du 'od gsal/ shin du rgya che'o/ /'bru mar gyi mar me'i 'od de bas ni brtsig pa chen po'i 'od shin du 'phags/
2a3(dkon brtsegs): shin du mchog pa nas shin du rgya che ba'i bar du'o/ /gang brtsig pa chen po'i 'od de bas ni me'i phung po chen po'i 'od gang yin pa dang / sman dang skar ma'i 'od gang yin pa'i bar du rgyas par bya ste/ zla ba'i 'od dang / nyi
2a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i 'od dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams dang / de bzhin du sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang / 'thab bral ba rnams dang / dga'
2a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' ba rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams dang / gang tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs ris pa rnams dang /
2a6(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang / tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus kyi rgyan rnams kyi 'od 'di shin du 'phags/ shin du
2a7(dkon brtsegs): bzang / shin du mchog / shin du kha dog dang ldan/ shin du 'od gsal/ shin du rgya che'o/ /gang tshangs pa rnams dang / tshangs ris pa rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams
2a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / tshangs 'khor ba rnams dang / tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi 'od kyang rgyas par bya ste/ 'od chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal nas/ dge rgyas kyi bar dang / 'bras bu che dang /
2b1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes can dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang dang / shin du mthong gi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang dang / lus
2b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od dang / gang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang rnams dang / lus kyi 'od 'di shin du 'phags/ shin du bzang / shin du mchog /shin du kha
2b3(dkon brtsegs): dog dang ldan shin du 'od gsal/ shin du rgya che'o/ /gang 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi ra ba dang / gzhal med khang rnams dang / lus kyi 'od bas ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa
2b4(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od 'di shin du 'phags/ shin du bzang / shin du mchog /shin du kha dog dang ldan/ shin du 'od gsal/ shin
2b5(dkon brtsegs): du rgya che'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa dang / shes rab dpag tu med pa
2b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par grol ba dpag tu med pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu ji tsam stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
2b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams na 'od tu gtags pa gdags pas gtags pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi brgya yi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ /rgyu'i
2b8(dkon brtsegs): bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de 'di lta ste dper na/ shA ri'i bu 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi nang du gser tha mal pa gzhag na snag tsha'i gar bu bzhin du 'gyur
3a1(dkon brtsegs): te lam mer mi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'od tu
3a2(dkon brtsegs): gdags pas btags pa ji snyed yod pa de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdun na lam mer mi 'gyur/ lhan ner mi 'gyur/ lhang nger mi 'gyur ro/ /'od
3a3(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ni de dag gi nang na mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ bla na med pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs
3a4(dkon brtsegs): p a'i nyi tshe ba'i las kyis rnam par smin pa las mngon par grub pa'i 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas shin du khyab par 'gyur
3a5(dkon brtsegs): te/ shA ri'i bu zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od kyis snang ba yang mi 'byung / nyin mor yang mi shes/ mtshan mor yang mi shes/ zla ba phyed dang / zla ba gcig par yang mi shes/
3a6(dkon brtsegs): dus dang lor yang mi shes mod kyi/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir 'od 'dom gang tsam du byin gyis rlob ste/ shA
3a7(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhed na 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do/ /de ci'i
3a8(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu don de nyid rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir khyod
3b1(dkon brtsegs): la dpe bstan to/ /shA ri'i bu skyes bu la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul ji snyed pa thams cad rdul phra rab tu byas nas rdul de
3b2(dkon brtsegs): dag thu bar blugs te/ shar phyogs su song nas rdul phra mo de ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ rdul phra rab gnyis pa bor zhing shar phyogs su song na/ shA
3b3(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu rdul phra rab de thams cad ni zad par 'gyur gyis/ shA ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ni zad pa med do/ /de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang nas
3b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du'o/ /shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi mtha' dang / mu gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
3b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de mi nus so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de mi nus so/ /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
3b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhed na 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad 'od kyis khyab par mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na ji tsam 'od tu btags pa gdags pas btags
3b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyi mdun na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/ rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod de/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin
3b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i dam pa'i pho rol du phyin pa'o/ /yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin
4a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i 'od la ni brtsig pa 'am/ shing ngam/ ljon pa 'am/ khor yug gi ri 'am/ khor yug chen po 'am/ ri spos kyi ngad ldang ngam/ ri btang bzung ngam/ ri
4a2(dkon brtsegs): btang bzung chen po 'am/ gangs ri 'am/ ri gnya' shing 'dzin tam/ de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag po 'am/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / gang gis kyang sgrib par mi nus te/ de dag thams
4a3(dkon brtsegs): cad las thal nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par byas kyang dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams mos par mi 'gyur te/ de la sems can la las ni de bzhin
4a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i 'od 'dom gang tsam du mthong ngo / /gang de bas rgya che ba de dag gis ni 'od 'dom do tsam du mthong ngo / /gang de bas shin du rgya che ba de dag gis ni 'od rgyang grags tsam du mthong ba nas
4a5(dkon brtsegs): gang de bas kyang shin du rgya chen pos ni 'od stong gsum gyi stong chen po tsam gyi bar du mthong ste/ de ltar na shA ri'i bu stong phrag brgya pa'i tshangs pas ni 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag brgya'i bar du 'od
4a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis khyab par mthong ste rgyas par bya'o/ /sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa'i bar du khyab par mthong ngo / /de ltar shA ri'i
4a7(dkon brtsegs): bu nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir de tsam du 'od kyis khyab par mdzad do/ /de byang chub sems
4a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' thos nas the tshom mang / som nyi mi za/ mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang rmad tu 'du shes skyed do/ /'di
4b1(dkon brtsegs): la chos nyid ni 'di yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /nyi ma zla ba'i 'od gang dang / /brgya byin tshangs 'od gang yod dang / /'og min bar gyi 'od rnams kyis/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /'og min gyi ni 'od
4b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / /gang rnams stong gsum khyab gyur pas/ /sangs rgyas spu'i 'od zer gyi/ /bcu drug char yang mi phod do/ /nam mkha' dag ni ji tsam bar/ /de tsam 'od kyis khyab byed pa/ /blo gros rgya chen
4b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi/ /de 'dra bar ni 'od mthong ngo / /sangs rgyas 'od ni mtha' yas te/ /nam mkha' dag ni mtshungs mnyam pa/ /ji ltar 'dul bar 'gyur rnams kyis/ /de 'dra bar ni 'od mthong ngo / /
4b4(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar skyes bu dmus long gis/ /nyi ma'i 'od ni de 'dra bar/ /ma mthong bas nas 'od de la/ /'od ni yod pa min zhes smra/ /de bzhin sems can dman pa gang / /rgyal ba'i 'od ni mi mthong ste/ /ma
4b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong bas na rgyal ba yi/ /'od ni yod pa min zhes zer/ /la las 'dom do tsam du mthong / /la las rgyang grags dpag tshad dang / la las stong gsum thams cad du/ /'od kyis khyab par gyur
4b6(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong / /sa brgyad pa dang dgu pa dang / /bcu pa la ni gang gnas pa/ /byang chub sems dpa' shes rab che/ /sa chen la ni gang gnas pa/ /de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od/ /mtha' yas
4b7(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor 'jug byed cing / /bsam yas sangs rgyas zhing rnams su/ /sangs rgyas dag gi bya ba byed/ /de ltar sangs rgyas bsam yas te/ /sangs rgyas 'od zer bsam mi khyab/ /bsam mi
4b8(dkon brtsegs): khyab la dad byas na/ /bsod nams phung po bsam mi khyab/ /yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/
5a1(dkon brtsegs): yid ches rab tu rtog /the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes skyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting
5a2(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar yang dag par smra bas smra ba tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i
5a3(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'jig rten du byung ste/ lus kyi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi las yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa 'jig rten du byung zhing skyes nas 'jig rten gyi
5a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyis ma gos pa/ bram ze sdig pa spangs pa/ dge sbyong zhi ba/ bsam gtan pa'i mchog /ting nge 'dzin dam pa'i pha rol du son pa'i sems can 'jig rten du byung ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin par
5a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par smra bas smra'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong du bcas pa dang / bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /
5a6(dkon brtsegs): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ltar tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa/ tshad med
5a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu ngas ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i
5a8(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i dpe tsam nyan par 'dod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dge slong dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin
5b1(dkon brtsegs): pa la brtsams te/ dpe tsam bshad na bcom ldan 'das las ji ltar thos pa de bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus ni 'di lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de'i dus ni 'di lags
5b2(dkon brtsegs): so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ sems can gyi khams dang sa'i khams gang mang / gsol pa/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don
5b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ni rab tu mang gi sa'i khams ni ma lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu sems can gyi khams rab tu mang gi sa'i khams ni ma
5b4(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal nas skyes pa 'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa 'am/ rdzus te skyes pa 'am/
5b5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs can nam/ gzugs med pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi sems can rnams ji tsam du sems can du gdags pas btags pa
5b6(dkon brtsegs): de thams cad yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ skad cig thang cig yid tsam cig gis snga phyi med par mi yi lus thob par gyur la/ shA ri'i bu mir gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad skad cig
5b7(dkon brtsegs): thang cig yud tsam cig gis snga phyi med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur cing yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang
5b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang dbu stong stong du gyur/ dbu re re la yang zhal stong stong
6a1(dkon brtsegs): du gyur/ zhal re re la yang ljags stong stong du gyur la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad stobs bcu dang ldan par gyur/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
6a2(dkon brtsegs): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / /chags pa med pa sgrib pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan par gyur la/ /shA ri'i bu de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa gcig
6a3(dkon brtsegs): gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtsams te/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du bsngags pa brjod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po ni de 'dra ste/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin
6a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yang mi zad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi shes rab dang / /spobs pa bla na med pa yang mi zad de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad de'i bar du yongs su
6a5(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /'di lta ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi shes rab dang / /spobs pa bla na med pa
6a6(dkon brtsegs): dang de gnyis ni tshad med grangs med/ /bsam gyis mi khyab/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs so/ /shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lta zhog la/ /shA
6a7(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed pa dang / /de bzhin du lho dang / /nub dang / byang dang / /'og dang / /steng gi phyogs dang / /de bzhin du
6a8(dkon brtsegs): phyogs mtshams dang / /phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can de dag thams cad skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis mi'i lus thob par gyur pa
6b1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa'i bar du gong ma bzhin du rgyas par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims
6b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po dang / /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi shes rab dang / /spobs pa bla na med pa dang / /de gnyis tshad med grangs med/ /bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs te/
6b3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol du son pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i dpe
6b4(dkon brtsegs): tsam du bya ba nyan par 'dod dam/ /gsol pa/ /'di ltar dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das las thos nas de bzhin du 'dzin par 'gyur te/ /bcom ldan 'das de'i dus 'di lags so/ /bde bar gshegs
6b5(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i tshod 'di lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /shA ri'i bu de'i dus de'i tshod 'byung ste/ /nyi ma bdun 'jig rten du byung bar gyur nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
6b6(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams 'di 'bar/ /kun du 'bar/ /kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ /'bar ba gcig tu gyur par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa de'i sa phyogs
6b7(dkon brtsegs): gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ /bzhengs sam/ /bzhugs sam/ /mnal ba'i sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ /sa phyogs de lag
6b8(dkon brtsegs): mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur te/ /sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos dang po 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ /kun du 'bar/ /kun du rab tu mched
7a1(dkon brtsegs): cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs de gseg ma dang / gyo mo med cing mtho bar gyur
7a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gzugs su 'gyur te/ sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun du 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/
7a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs de de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i
7a4(dkon brtsegs): phyir yangs shing mnyam par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos gsum po 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun du 'bar/ kun du
7a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der rtswa sngo ba/ 'khyil
7a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jam pa/ g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ dri rab tu zhim pa skye bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bzhi pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /
7a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun du 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/
7a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu grang ba/ yang pa/ 'jam pa/ dang ba/ rnyog pa med pa/ rab tu dang ba/ 'thung 'dod pa/ mang du
7b1(dkon brtsegs): 'thungs kyang nad du mi 'gyur ba yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos lnga pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams
7b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bar/ kun du 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal
7b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sa phyogs der/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas rab tu bsil ba'i rlung ldang ba de 'di lta ste dper na/ shA ri'i bu sos ka'i tha ma'i zla ba tsha bas gdungs pa'i dus na/
7b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu la la zhig gang gA'i klung du zhugs nas/ lus bsil bar byas te/ rim dang snyom pa thams cad zhi bar byas nas gang gA'i klung byung zhing slar byung nas 'chag cing 'gro ba las ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig
7b5(dkon brtsegs): na nags stug po yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma grib ma stug po dang ldan pa zhig mthong nas de nags stug po gang na yod pa der song ste phyin pa dang / nags stug po'i dbus na khri'i steng du phyar bu bting ba/
7b6(dkon brtsegs): be'u ras kyis g.yogs pa/ ka tsa lin di ka'i gding ba bting ba/ de'i steng du dar gyis g.yogs pa/ ya tog ma tog tu sngas dmar po bshams pa zhig mthongs nas de de la 'dug go/ /de de la
7b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dug ste/ 'greng zhing phyogs bzhi kun nas bsil ba'i rlung ldang bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs der bsil ba'i rlung ldang bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos
7b8(dkon brtsegs): drug pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun du 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na
8a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der chu las skye ba'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po
8a2(dkon brtsegs): skye bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos bdun pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'bar/ kun du 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar
8a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs der thang las skye ba'i me tog 'di lta ste/
8a4(dkon brtsegs): a ti mug ta ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / sna ma'i me tog dang / pa ri sha ka dang / mya ngan 'tshang dang / skya snar dang / dong ka'i me tog dang / ta ra ni dang / go ta ra ni la sogs pa thang las skye ba'i me tog
8a5(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kha dog dang ldan pa/ dri dang ldan pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos brgyad pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams
8a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bar/ kun du 'bar/ kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas 'tshig pa der sa phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/
8a7(dkon brtsegs): mnal ba'i sa phyogs de sra zhing mi shigs pa/ sa gzhi rdo rjer 'gyur te/ shA ri'-i bu sa phyogs de ni ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi chos dgu pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu stong gsum
8a8(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lam me/ rab tu lam me/ kun tu rab tu lam me/ kun du 'bar kun du rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas/ 'tshig pa der sa phyogs
8b1(dkon brtsegs): gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal ba'i sa phyogs de lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud tu bcas pa dang /
8b2(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bcu pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur
8b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ shA ri'i bu sa phyogs de ni ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi chos bcu po de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings shin du rtogs te/ de rtogs pas de bzhin
8b4(dkon brtsegs): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems la gcig tu bde bar so sor yang dag par myong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
8b5(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed tu bzhugs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su 'bri ba med par ngas bshad do/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms gcig gis bskal
8b6(dkon brtsegs): bar gnas sam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa stong phrag brgya 'am/ bskal pa bye ba 'am/ bskal pa bye ba brgya 'am/ bskal pa bye ba stong ngam/ bskal pa
8b7(dkon brtsegs): bye ba stong phrag brgya 'am/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang bzhugs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
8b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ni pha rol du phyin pa'i mchog gi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che/ de ltar mthu che/ de ltar dbang che bar grags pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bu
9a1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi lha'i nang du lha'i bu skyes pa de dmigs pa gcig la gnas pa'i rnam par shes pas bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dug ste/ bsam gtan gyis tshe'i mtha'
9a2(dkon brtsegs): 'chi ba'i dus ma byas kyi bar du rnam par shes pa de las rnam par shes pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du shA ri'i bu gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
9a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas pa dang / gang gi nub mo phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin las nyams pa med/ sems 'gyur ba med/
9a4(dkon brtsegs): sems rgyu ba med/ sems rnam par rgyu ba med/ sems rab tu rgyu ba med/ sems rgyas pa med/ sems kyi 'dren pa med/ sems g.yeng ba med/ sems mtho ba med/ sems kun du srung ba med/ sems
9a5(dkon brtsegs): sbed pa med/ sems tshim pa med/ sems mi 'thun pa med/ sems 'dud pa med/ sems g.yo ba med/ sems rab tu dga' bar byed pa med/ sems zhum pa med/ sems rtog pa med/
9a6(dkon brtsegs): sems rnam par rtog pa med/ sems yongs su rtog pa med/ sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med/ sems mig la gnas pa med/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas
9a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ sems gzugs la gnas pa med/ sems sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya dang / chos la gnas pa med/ sems chos la 'jug pa med/ sems rnam par shes pa la 'jug pa med/
9a8(dkon brtsegs): sems 'das pa la yang mi lta/ sems ma 'ongs pa la yang mi lta/ sems da ltar byung ba la yang mi lta ste/ de ltar na shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting
9b1(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin la gnas nas/ sems la chos gang yang bsal ba med mod kyi/ lhun gyi grub pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go/ /'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
9b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa dang bral mod kyi gnas kyang mi 'dor te/ lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad mdzad do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
9b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo / /bskal pa brgya stong dpag tu med cing gzhal yas par/ /sngon gyi srid pa'i 'gro bar byang chub spyod spyad tshe/ /
9b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ni thos dang ting 'dzin bag yod dang / /bzod pa dag kyang byang chub mchog phyir 'dren pas bsgoms/ /rgyal ba'i rtogs dang 'bras bu dge ba'i 'dra bas/ tshul khrims shin du yongs dag 'jig rten kun
9b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi mchog / /ji ltar nam mkha' dri med rnam par spros med ltar/ /stobs bcu'i tshul khrims dri ma med pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /gang gi nub mo rgyal bas dang po byang chub rtogs/ gang gi nub mo tha mar mya ngan 'das
9b6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs tshe/ /stobs bcu rnams la sems rgyu rab tu rgyu ba med/ /de bzhin bsam gtan ting 'dzin nyams pa nam yang med/ /stobs bcu rnams kyi tshul khrims phung po nyams med do/ /rdzu 'phrul stobs dang rnam par
9b7(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa'i char 'gyur med/ /bskal pa brgya phrag stong du sems ni gcig gis gnas/ /'dren pa la ni rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med/ /'dren pa rnams kyi rnam rtog spyod yul nam mkha' 'dra/ /dus gsum dag la sangs
9b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas ye shes thog med 'jug / /stobs bcu rnams la sems yid rnam par rgyu ba dang / /rtog dang stong pa med par sangs rgyas sras rnams dang / /de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin
10a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu
10a2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes skyed do/ /shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab
10a3(dkon brtsegs): tu rtog / som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
10a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni nga'i nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i nang na mchog go zhes gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul de la 'jal zhing yongs su dpyod/ byang chub sems
10a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la yang 'jal zhing yongs su dpyod do/ /gzhal te yongs su dpyad nas byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par ma mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la 'jal
10a6(dkon brtsegs): la gzhal cing yongs su dpyad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul la 'jal zhing yongs su dpyod do/ /gal te yongs su dpyad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par ma mthong nas de 'di
10a7(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul ni bsam gyi mi khyab po snyam nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul yongs su grub par bya ba'i phyir rgya cher brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /shA ri'i bu de
10a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul la brtsams te dpe tsam du bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa las khyod nyan par 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das de'i dus 'di lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod
10b1(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /'di ltar bcom 'das kyis dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul las brtsams te dpe bshad na/ dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das las de thos nas de bzhin du 'dzin
10b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir shA ri'i bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang
10b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po rdzu 'phrul che ba yin
10b4(dkon brtsegs): nam gsol pa/ dge slong nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba'i nang na 'di ltar gnas brtan maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di ni mchog go zhes bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du thos te mngon sum du bzung
10b5(dkon brtsegs): ngo / /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po maud gal gyi bu lta bus 'di lta ste dper na/ bu ram shing stug po 'am/
10b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dam bu stug po 'am/ 'od ma stug po 'am/ til gyi zhing ngam/ 'bras kyi zhing bzhin du gang bar gyur la/ de ltar gcig tu 'dus pa'i nyan thos kyi tshogs de lta bus mthu dang brtson 'grus thams cad dang /
10b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho 'phrul gyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang / brgya stong gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bye ba brgya'i
10b8(dkon brtsegs): char yang / bye ba stong gi char yang / bye ba brgya stong gi char yang / grangs su yang / char yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
11a1(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas sa 'di la yung dkar
11a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'bru gcig bzhag na/ de bzhin gshegs pas yungs dkar gyi 'bru bzhag pa de yang de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi tshogs kyi mthu dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / drags shul thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul
11a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / cho 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad bstan kyang de bzhin gshegs pas bzhag pa'i yungs dkar gyi 'bru skra'i rtse mo gcig tsam yang bskyod par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin
11a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol du son pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lta zhog
11a5(dkon brtsegs): la/ shA ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji snyed yod pa dang / de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs
11a6(dkon brtsegs): b cu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can ji tsam sgo nga las skyes pa 'am mngal nas skyes pa nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi bar gyi sems can de dag thams cad
11a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po 'di lta ste dper na/ maud gal gyi bu chen po lta bur gyur la/ shA ri'i bu de lta bu'i nyan thos kyi tshogs thams cad kyis stobs dang /
11a8(dkon brtsegs): mthu dang / drag shul thams cad dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gyi stobs thams cad bstan kyang yungs 'bru yang gdeg par mi nus te/ tha na skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam yang bskyod par mi nus so//
11b1(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i dam pa'i pha rol du son pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni de ltar rdzu 'phrul che/ de ltar mthu che/ de ltar
11b2(dkon brtsegs): dbang che bar grags pa'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis nam 'jig pa'i bskal pa'i dus kyi tsher gyur pa de na kun du 'jom pa
11b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'i rlung ldang ste/ rlung de langs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yi ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / khor yug gi ri dang / khor yug gi ri chen po dang / gling chen po bzhi dang /
11b4(dkon brtsegs): gling brgyad khri dang / ri chen po dang / rgya mtsho chen po yang dpag tshad srid du mngon par 'phen cing rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur ba khyod kyis thos sam/ gsol pa/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das las mngon sum du thos
11b5(dkon brtsegs): te mngon sum du bzung ngo / /bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu nam 'jig pa'i rlung 'byung ba de ni kun du 'jom pa chen po zhes bya'i rlung ldang ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ri rab dang
11b6(dkon brtsegs): bcas/ khor yug dang bcas/ ri dang bcas/ rgya mtsho dang bcas/ dpag tshad brgyar mngon par 'phen cing rab tu mthong / dpag tshad nyis brgya dang / dpag tshad sum brgya dang / dpag tshad bzhi brgya
11b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dpag tshad lnga brgya dang / dpag tshad stong dang / dpag tshad nyis stong dang / sum stong dang / bzhi stong dang / lnga stong du mngon par 'phen cing rab tu 'thor/ dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dang /
11b8(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad brgya stong phrag mang por mngon par 'phen cing rab tu 'thor te/ de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na ri dang rdo rnams lta ci smos/ 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang rnams kyang dkrugs bcom/
12a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gtor te/ de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na gzhal med khang nas lta ci smos/ dga' ldan pa rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdud kyi ris
12a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / tshangs pa rnams dang / 'od gsal ba rnams dang / dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal me khang gi bar du de bzhin du rgyas par bya'o/ /ji ltar 'thab bral gyi dkrugs bcom rab tu gtor
12a3(dkon brtsegs): te/ dkrugs bcom rab tu gtor ba de dag gi rdul yang mi snang na gzhal med khang dang ra ba rnams lta ci smos/ shA ri'i bu gal te de lta bu'i rlung langs kyang des de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos kyi mtha'
12a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i rtse mo tsam yang g.yos par mi nus na/ chos gos sam/ chos gos kyi grwa lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni
12a5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod lam dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lam dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i snying rje chen po dang ldan no/ /shA ri'i bu gal te 'di lta bu'i
12a6(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi dkyil 'khor shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / 'og dang / steng dang / phyogs 'tshams dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
12a7(dkon brtsegs): rlung mngon par ldang yang / shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par byed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sor mo'-i rtse mos zlog kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / cho
12a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul gyi stobs bri ba yang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de la byang chub
12b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' mngon par dang / yid ches/ som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad tu 'du shes skyed do/ /de nas bcom
12b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs ngo / /khams gsum sems can ji snyed pa/ /gnas brtan maud gal bu bzhin du/ /
12b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul pha rol phyin pa yi/ /nyan thos mkhas par kun gyur pas/ /rdzu 'phrul thams cad rab brtan kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pas sa 'di la/ /yungs dkar gyi ni 'bru bzhag pa/ /g.yo
12b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya bar mi nus so/ /gang rnams phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams/ /gang gA yi ni bye ma snyed/ /rnam 'thor rlung dang kun 'jom pa/ /rlung rnams phyogs bcur langs par gyur/ /de lta
12b5(dkon brtsegs): bu yi rlung chen des/ /thams cad gzigs pa'i chos gos kyi/ /mtha' ma skra'i rtse tsam yang / /g.yo bar bya bar mi nus so/ /thub pa chen po'i spu gcig gis/ /rlung de rab tu zlog par
12b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad/ sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra ba/ /mtha' yas pa ni nam mkha' bzhin/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
12b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches pa nas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do/ /yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa
12b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas
13a1(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar dang rmad tu 'du shes skyed ce na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs ni bcu po 'di dag ste/ stobs de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin
13a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su dam 'cha' zhing dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs
13a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor to/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las dang rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa du ma dang / mos pa
13a4(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / khams du ma dang / khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / thams cad tu 'gro ba'i
13a5(dkon brtsegs): lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs
13a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs
13a7(dkon brtsegs): so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag ste/ stobs de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du yang dag par seng ge'i sgra sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyi mche
13a8(dkon brtsegs): ba nas/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i bar du 'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/
13b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis gnas kyang gnas su/ gnas ma yin pa'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen
13b2(dkon brtsegs): to/ /de la gnas gang / gnas ma yin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gang lus kyis nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de
13b3(dkon brtsegs): ni gnas ma yin te/ skabs med do/ /gang lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang / yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / yid
13b4(dkon brtsegs): tu mi 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang / ngag gis legs par spyad pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa mi
13b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / yid du mi 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin te/ skabs med do/ /gang lus kyis legs par spyad pa dang / ngag gis legs par
13b6(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa/ 'dod pa dang / sdug pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid du 'ong ba mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas yin te/ skabs yod do/ /shA
13b7(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang ser snas longs spyod chen po mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang ser snas dbul por 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs
13b8(dkon brtsegs): yod do/ /'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang sbyin pas dbul por 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang sbyin pas longs spyod chen po mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas yin te
14a1(dkon brtsegs): skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyis lha dang mir skye ba rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang 'chal pa'i
14a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba de ni gnas yin te/ skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing
14a3(dkon brtsegs): skabs med de/ gang tshul khrims kyis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang tshul khrims kyis lha
14a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mir skye ba thob pa na de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang gnod sems kyis gzugs mdzes par mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin no/ /
14a5(dkon brtsegs): gang gnod sems kyis gzugs mi sdug pa mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang bzod pas gzugs mi sdug pa mngon
14a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'grub pa de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang bzod pas gzugs mdzes pa mngon par 'grub pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang le los 'thob pa dang /
14a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang le los 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs
14a8(dkon brtsegs): med de/ gang brtson 'grus kyis 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang brtson 'grus kyis 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas
14b1(dkon brtsegs): yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang sems g.yengs pas nges par gyur pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang sems g.yengs pas nges
14b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams la mi 'jug pa de ni gnas ma yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang sems rtse gcig pa nges par gyur pa la 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang
14b3(dkon brtsegs): sems rtse gcig nges par gyur pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang 'chal ba'i shes rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams
14b4(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'jom pa de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang 'chal pa'i shes rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'jom par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs
14b5(dkon brtsegs): yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang shes rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'jom par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang shes
14b6(dkon brtsegs): rab kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par 'jom pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang srog gcod pa'i skyes bu gang
14b7(dkon brtsegs): zag srog gcod pa'i rgyur tshe ring por 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /yang shA ri'i bu de srog gcod pa'i skyes bu gang zag tshe thung bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas
14b8(dkon brtsegs): ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang srog gcod pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag tshe thung bar 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /yang shA ri'i bu gang srog gcod pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag
15a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe ring por 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang ma byin par len pa'i skyes bu gang zag longs spyod chen po rnyed pa
15a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni gnas ma yin no/ /yang shA ri'i bu ma byin par len pa'i skyes bu gang zag dbul por 'gyur ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /yang shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang ma
15a3(dkon brtsegs): byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag dbul por 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang ma byin par len pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag longs spyod chen por 'gyur ba de ni gnas
15a4(dkon brtsegs): yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa'i skyes bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla med pa rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin no/ /
15a5(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu gang 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa'i skyes bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla yod pa rnyed pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang
15a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i skyes bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla dang bcas pa rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin no/ /yang shA ri'i bu 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa'i skyes
15a7(dkon brtsegs): bu gang zag chung ma 'gran zla med pa rnyed pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kyi lam gsum po de dag bstan pa de bzhin du mi dge ba
15a8(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i las kyi lam thams cad la'ang bya'o/ /gang brdzun du smra ba des skur pa thob par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang thob par 'gyur ba de ni gnas so/ /gang
15b1(dkon brtsegs): brdzun du smra ba spangs pas skur pa thob par 'gyur pa de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang thob par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas so/ /gang phra ma zer bas mi phyed pa'i g.yog rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin
15b2(dkon brtsegs): no/ /gang rnyed par mi 'gyur ba de ni gnas so/ /gang phra ma spangs pa'i g.yog phyed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang g.yog mi phyed pa rnyed pa de ni gnas so/ /gang tshig
15b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsub po smra bas rtag par yid du 'ong ba thos par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang yid du mi 'ong ba thos par 'gyur ba de ni gnas so/ /gang tshig rtsub po spangs pas yid du mi 'ong ba thos par
15b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang yid du 'ong ba thos par 'gyur ba de ni gnas so/ /gang tshig kyal ba smra bas shin du gdon mi za ba'i spobs par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang mi
15b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de ni gnas so/ /gang kyal par smra ba spangs pas shin du gdon mi za ba'i spobs par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang shin du gdon mi za ba'i spobs par 'gyur ba ni gnas so/ /
15b6(dkon brtsegs): gang brnab sems can longs spyod rab tu nyams par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang 'gyur ba ni gnas so/ /gang brnab sems spangs pa longs spyod rab tu nyams par 'gyur ba ni gnas
15b7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ /gang mi 'gyur ba ni gnas so/ /gang gnod sems can sems can dmyal bar mi 'gro ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang 'gro ba ni gnas so/ /gang gnod sems spangs pa
15b8(dkon brtsegs): bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du mi 'gro ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang 'gro ba ni gnas so/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang log par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag
16a1(dkon brtsegs): log par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyur lam rnyed par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /yang shA ri'i bu gang log par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag log par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyus lam mi rnyed pa
16a2(dkon brtsegs): ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gang yang dag par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag yang dag par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyus 'phags pa'i lam mi rnyed pa de ni gnas ma yin te skabs med do/ /yang
16a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu yang dag par lta ba'i skyes bu gang zag yang dag par lta ba bzung ba'i rgyus 'phags pa'i lam rnyed pa de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /gang mtshams med pa byed pa'i sems gnas par
16a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang mi 'gyur ba ni gnas so/ /gang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'i sems gnas par mi 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang 'gyur ba ni gnas so/ /gang
16a5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs par lta ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'thob pa de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang 'thob par 'gyur ba ni gnas so/ /gang stong pa nyid la mos pas rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa mi
16a6(dkon brtsegs): 'thob pa ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang thob par 'gyur ba ni gnas so/ /gang 'gyod pa la gnas pa'i sems shin du byang ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang mi 'thob
16a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ni gnas so/ /gang kun du dkris te 'dug pa'i sems las sems shin du byang bar 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang 'gyur ba ni gnas so/ /gang bud med 'khor los
16a8(dkon brtsegs): sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang skyes bu 'gyur ba ni gnas so/ /gang bud med lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang skyes bu 'gyur ba ni
16b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ /gang bud med tshangs pa dbang byed du 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang skyes bu 'gyur ba ni gnas so/ /gang bud med sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang bud
16b2(dkon brtsegs): med kyi lus bsgyur nas sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni gnas so/ /gang skyes bu gang zag brgyad pa 'bras bu ma thob par ldang ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang 'bras bu thob nas ldang ba ni
16b3(dkon brtsegs): gnas so/ /gang rgyun du zhugs pa srid pa brgyad pa mngon par sgrub pa ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang phung po de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni gnas so/ /gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba srid
16b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum pa mngon par sgrub pa ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang phung po de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni gnas so/ /gang phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir 'ong ba ni gnas
16b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ /gang de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ni gnas so/ /gang dgra bcom pa 'tshams sbyor ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang mi 'gyur ba ni gnas so/ /gang 'phags
16b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gang zag ston pa gzhan tshol ba 'am/ rgyal mtshan gzhan gzung nas spyod pa ni gnas ma yin no/ /lha gzhan med par 'gyur ba ni gnas so/ /gang mi skye ba la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems
16b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' phyir ldog pa ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang byang chub rjes su thob par 'gyur ba ni gnas so/ /gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs
16b8(dkon brtsegs): par sangs ma rgyas par ldang ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
17a1(dkon brtsegs): nas ldang ba de ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba snang ba de ni gnas
17a2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no/ /gang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag par bcom pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs
17a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes thogs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin te skabs med do/ /gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes thogs pa med pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma
17a4(dkon brtsegs): yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor la las bltar mthong ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gtsug tor bltar mi mthong ba ni
17a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems dang spyod pa snang ba ni gnas ma yin no/ /yang shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa mi snang ba ni gnas
17a6(dkon brtsegs): yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /yang shA ri'i
17a7(dkon brtsegs): bu gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyam par bzhag pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la mi bden pa'i tshig 'byung ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /
17a8(dkon brtsegs): gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams log par mi gsung zhing gzhan ma yin par gsung ba ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
17b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das rnams la 'khrul pa dmigs par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'khrul pa med de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshig mi 'khrul pa ni gnas yin te skabs yod do/ /de bzhin du mi
17b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad rnams rgyas par bya ste shA ri'i bu gnas ma yin zhing skabs med de/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar byung ba'i dus la chags pa dang / sgrib par bcas pa'i ye shes
17b3(dkon brtsegs): gzigs pa 'jug pa'i bar du de ni gnas ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams da ltar gyi dus la chags pa med cing sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa ni gnas yin te skabs
17b4(dkon brtsegs): yod do/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas mu med do/ /'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa
17b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas mu med de/ shA ri'i bu gang nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas dang / gnas ma yin pa mkhyen
17b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs kyi mtha' 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu
17b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog / som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad du 'du shes skyed do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar
17b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo / /ji ltar phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' tshad med mtha' yas pa/ /de bzhin rgyal ba'i gnas dang gnas min mkhyen mtha' yas/ /
18a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i gnas dang gnas min de bzhin rab mkhyen nas/ /ston pa chos mchog rgya chen yang dag rab tu 'chad/ /mi gang thar pa dag gi lam gyi snod gyur pa/ /ston pas de dag spyod pa mkhyen
18a2(dkon brtsegs): nas chos kyang 'chad/ /sems can gang dag snod du gyur pa ma yin pa/ /gnas dang gnas min rig nas de dag btang snyoms 'jog /nam mkha' 'di g.yos sa la 'bras bu 'byung yang ni/ /bde bar
18a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas min gzhan mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten pa las 'jig rten 'das pa stobs bcu ldan/ /yon tan mchog 'chad rnams kyi ye shes bsam mi khyab/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin
18a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang po ste/ /stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang
18a5(dkon brtsegs): dag par sgrog ste/ khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che zhing tshangs pa 'am/ /brgya byin nas/ /sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par ma bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i bar du'o/ /
18a6(dkon brtsegs): de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'das pa dang /
18a7(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las len pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa gnas dang / rgyu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin
18a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gang 'das pa'i las len pa dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba/ mi dge ba dang bral ba/ gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge ba'i rgyu 'byin pa
18b1(dkon brtsegs): de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang mi dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba/ dge ba dang bral ba gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi dge ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen
18b2(dkon brtsegs): to/ /las len pa gang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dman pa la sten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na khyad par la sten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin
18b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na khyad par du sten la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dman pa la sten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang
18b4(dkon brtsegs): da ltar gyi dus na dman pa la sten la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyad par du sten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na yang dman pa la sten la ma 'ongs
18b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus na yang dman pa la sten par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar gyi dus na yang khyad par du sten la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang khyad par du sten par 'gyur
18b6(dkon brtsegs): ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang 'das pa'i dus na sbyor ba dman la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sbyor ba rgya chen por 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /
18b7(dkon brtsegs): las len pa gang rtsom pa chung la khyad par chen por 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang rtsom pa che la khyad par chung ngur 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs
18b8(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang nyan thos su 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang rang sangs rgyas kyi rgyu 'byin
19a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'byin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las
19a2(dkon brtsegs): len pa gang da ltar sdug bsngal la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na rnam par smin pa bde ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar bde la ma 'ongs pa na rnam par smin pa
19a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar yang sdug bsngal la ma 'ongs pa na yang rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba de yang de bzhin gshegs
19a4(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /las len pa gang da ltar yang bde la/ ma 'ongs pa na yang rnam par smin pa bde ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /'di ltar shA ri'i bu
19a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus na sems can thams cad kyi las gang dang / rgyu gang dang / rnam par smin pa gang de bzhin dang / de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan
19a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa dang / gzhan ma yin par sten pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston to/ /de ltar na
19a7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi las len pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang / gnas gang
19a8(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas mu med do/ /'di lta ste dper na shA ri'i bu nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du shA ri'i bu de bzhin
19b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de yang mtha' yas mu med do/ /shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi las kyi rnam par
19b2(dkon brtsegs): smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gyi mtha' 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs bsam gyis mi khyab
19b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de thos nas/ mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis
19b4(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad du 'du shes skyed do/ /'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu dang smin la mkhas/ /spyan ldan
19b5(dkon brtsegs): las rnams kun gyi sgrub pa mkhyen/ /dus gsum la ni rgyal ba chags pa med/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab tu mkhyen/ /'gro ba lnga yi sems can thams cad kyi/ /
19b6(dkon brtsegs): bde dang sdug bsngal rgyur ni gang 'gyur dang / /'jug pa gang dag sdug bsngal rgyur 'gyur ba/ /de dag de bzhin bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen/ /dkar nag las rnams kyi ni rnam
19b7(dkon brtsegs): smin dang / /rgyu dang rnam smin ji ltar 'gyur ba yang / /de dag de bzhin bde gshegs rab mkhyen te/ /phyag gi mthil na yid bzhin nor bu bzhin/ /las gang rnam smin chung ngu'i rgyu dag
19b8(dkon brtsegs): las/ 'bras bu dag ni tshad med 'byin pa dang / /tshad med gang dag chung ngu'i rgyur 'gyur ba/ /de dag de bzhin bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen/ /nyan thos nyid du 'bras bu smin 'gyur dang / rang rgyal byang
20a1(dkon brtsegs): chub rgyur ni gang 'gyur dang / /bla med ye shes stobs ni sbyin 'gyur ba/ /de dag ma lus bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen/ /las kyi rgyu gang sdug bsngal smin byed pa/ /de yang bde ba'i 'bras
20a2(dkon brtsegs): bu smin byed dang / /las kyi rgyu gang bde ba smin byed pa/ /sdug bsngal 'bras bu bya ba thams cad mkhyen/ /sdug bsngal rgyus ni sdug bsngal nyid gnas dang / /bde ba'i rgyus kyang bde ba nyid
20a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas dang / /las kyi rang bzhin rang bzhin ma yin pa/ /rgyu ldan bde bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen/ /'gro ba lnga yi sems can thams cad kyi/ /dus gsum sdug bsngal bgrod pa gang
20a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa/ /nyams med de nyid de bzhin gzhan min par/ /sangs rgyas mkhyen pas rgyal ba rab tu mkhyen/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
20a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis pa ste/ /stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing / /dge sbyong ngam/ /bram ze 'am/ /lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa gang
20a6(dkon brtsegs): gis kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor to/ / // bam po lnga pa/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas mos pa du ma dang /
20a7(dkon brtsegs): mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis sems can gzhan rnams dang / /gang zag gzhan dag gis mos pa du ma dang / /mos pa sna tshogs rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu
20a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ /skyes bu gang zag gang 'dod chags la gnas shing zhe sdang la mos pa 'ang rgyas par bya ste/ /gti mug la gnas shing zhe sdang la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas
20b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to/ /gang zag gang mi dge ba la gnas shing mi dge ba la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /gang zag gang dge ba la gnas shing dge ba la mos pa de dag kyang
20b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /gang zag gang sbyor ba dman zhing rgya chen po la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen
20b3(dkon brtsegs): to/ /gang zag gang sbyor ba rgya che zhing dman pa la mos pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /gang zag gang sbyor ba dman zhing khyad par la gnas par
20b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis khyad par la spyor ba dman pa la gnas par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag
20b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ji lta bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis log pa nyid du nges pa'i khams thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa
20b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i khams thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis yang dag pa nyid tu nges pa'i
20b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis 'dod pa'i khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de
20b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis gzugs kyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
21a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis gzugs med pa'i khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis
21a2(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis dman pa la sten cing dman pa nyid gnon pa dang / khyad par la sten
21a3(dkon brtsegs): cing khyad par la gnon pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis khyad par du song nas dman pa la gnas par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin
21a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis skye ba tha dad pa dang / /kha dog tha dad pa dang / /yongs su longs spyod pa tha dad pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag kyang
21a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /mos pa gang gis rtse mo las nyams par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /
21a6(dkon brtsegs): mos pa gang gis rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/ /de ltar na shA ri'i bu
21a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs gang yin pa de ni mtha' yas mu med de/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i
21a8(dkon brtsegs): mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs de thos nas mngon par dad/ /yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ /the tshom mi za/ /rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam
21b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad tu 'du shes skyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'jig rten 'di mos sna
21b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang / /de bzhin blo gros tshad med pa/ /de dag gi ni mos pa'i sems/ /thams cad 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen/ /gang dag 'dod chags mos pa la/ /zhe sdang la ni gnas 'gyur dang / /zhe sdang gnas shing
21b3(dkon brtsegs): gti mug la/ /gang dag mos pa rab tu mkhyen/ /gti mug gnas shing 'dod chags kyi/ /sems rgyud bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /bar bar du ni 'jug pa dag /de dag 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen/ /gang
21b4(dkon brtsegs): dag sbyor ba dman 'gyur la/ /rgya chen la ni mos pa dang / sbyor ba dam pa de dag gi/ /dman par 'gyur ba 'dren pas mkhyen/ /log pa'i rjes su song ba dang / /'gro ba med par byung ba dang / /khams
21b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum las ni rnam grol ba'i/ /mos pa dag kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /skye dang kha dog tha dad dang / /nye bar spyod pa'i khyad par dang / /gang dag spyi bo las nyams pa/ /rkang gnyis gtso bos rab tu mkhyen/ /
21b6(dkon brtsegs): mos pa sna tshogs rab mkhyen nas/ /'dren pa chos rnams ston pa mdzad/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni stobs gsum la/ /rgyal ba'i thugs sras rab tu mos/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa
21b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gsum pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi gnas su
21b8(dkon brtsegs): zhal gyis 'che zhing 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ /dge sbyong ngam/ /bram ze 'am/ /lha 'am/ /bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ /sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par
22a1(dkon brtsegs): ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor to/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas khams du ma dang / /khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs kyis 'jig rten rnams yang dag pa ji
22a2(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams gang gis 'jig rten bsod nams kyi 'du byed sogs pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams gang gis bsod nams
22a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i 'du byed sogs pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams gang gis mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed sogs pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji
22a4(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams gang gis 'byung ba'i khams su 'jog par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi khams
22a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / /phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu
22a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ /yid kyi khams dang / /chos kyi khams dang / /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ nang stong pa nyid dang / /phyi stong pa
22a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang / /phyi nang stong pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sa'i khams dang / /chu'i khams dang / /me'i khams dang / /rlung gi khams rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ /nam mkha'i
22a8(dkon brtsegs): khams ji lta ba de bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /'dod pa'i khams dang / /gzugs kyi khams dang / /gzugs med pa'i khams rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ /kun tu rtog pa la
22b1(dkon brtsegs): byung bar rab tu mkhyen to/ /'dus byas kyi khams mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu mkhyen to/ /'dus ma byas kyi khams ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /kun
22b2(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs pa'i khams ni phyis 'byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rnam par byang ba'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'du byed
22b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi khams ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings ni tshul bzhin rig pa'i mtshan nyid du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'di ltar 'jig rten gnas pa'i
22b4(dkon brtsegs): khams gang yin pa dang / /'jig rten gnas pa khams gang la gnas pa dang / /khams gang la rjes su chags pa dang / khams gang la gnas pa dang / /khams gang la sbyor ba dang / /khams
22b5(dkon brtsegs): gang gi bsam pa dang / /khams gang la nges par sems pa dang / /khams gang la rten pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas kyang chos ston to/ /de
22b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i khams du ma dang / /khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs mtha' yas mu med de nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs
22b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams du ma dang / /khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs la mngon par dad/ /yid ches/ /rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ /the tshom mi za/ /rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ /rangs pa rnyed nas
22b8(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / /rmad tu 'du shes skyed do/ /'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ /de la 'di skad ces bya'o 'jig rten kun na sems can gang /
23a1(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs khams la gnas pa dag /khams gang 'jug pa ci 'dra ba/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni rab tu mkhyen/ /bsod nams bsod nams min mi g.yo/ /'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang
23a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin te/ /khams rnams gang la gnas nas su/ /mya ngan 'das pa zhi la reg /mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi khams/ /mig gi rnam par shes nyid dang / /rna ba sna dang lce dang lus/ /
23a3(dkon brtsegs): yid kyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /chos kyi khams dang yid kyi ni/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang mkhyen/ /nang gi khams ni stong pa dang / /phyi rol dag kyang stong par mkhyen/ /sa dang chu dang me
23a4(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / /rlung gi khams kyang de bzhin te/ /khams rnams bzhi po de dag ni/ /nam mkha' mtshungs par rab tu mkhyen/ /'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams/ /gzugs med
23a5(dkon brtsegs): pa yi khams nyid kyang / /kun du rtog las byung bar ni/ /de ltar sangs rgyas rab tu mkhyen/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas pa/ /de bzhin khams rnams mu med de/ /thams cad
23a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rab mkhyen kyang / /mkhyen to snyam du rlom sems med/ /khams ni skye ba ma yin zhing / /rnam pa kun du 'gag med de/ /khams 'di mya ngan 'das par ni/ /skyes bu dam
23a7(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu mkhyen/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas pa/ /sangs rgyas ye shes de 'dra ste/ /mos pa sna tshogs rab sprul pa/ /ye shes des ni rab tu mkhyen/ /mos pa sna tshogs
23a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas su/ /sems can bye ba rnam par 'dul/ /sangs rgyas stobs ni bzhi pa la/ /rgyal ba'i thugs sras dad par byed/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
23b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs bzhi pa ste/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par bya'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa mkhyen pa'i
23b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan rnams kyi dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi rim pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ dbang po rtul ba 'ang rab tu mkhyen
23b3(dkon brtsegs): to/ /dbang po bar ma 'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po rno ba 'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po khyad par du 'phags pa yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po dman ba 'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta
23b4(dkon brtsegs): bus mthar phyin pa'i 'dod chags skye ba dang / mthar phyin pa'i zhe sdang skye ba dang / mthar phyin pa'i gti mug skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /
23b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po ji lta bus 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug brtan pa skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su rtog pa'i
23b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po ji lta bus 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug yang skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su rtog pa'i dbang po
23b7(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bus snrel zhi'i 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su rtog pa'i
23b8(dkon brtsegs): dbang po ji lta bus tshar bcad cing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug skye ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po
24a1(dkon brtsegs): gang dag mi dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / /dbang po gang dag dge ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / dbang po gang dag mi g.yo ba'i rgyu las byung ba dang / /dbang po gang dag 'byung ba'i
24a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu las byung ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas mig gi dbang po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu
24a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nas/ gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid kyi dbang po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /pho'i dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang /
24a4(dkon brtsegs): srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta ba
24a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
24a6(dkon brtsegs): bar tu mkhyen to/ /mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po
24a7(dkon brtsegs): gang mig gi dbang po'i rgyu las byung la rna ba'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur te/ sna la ma yin/ lce la ma yin/ lus kyi dbang po la ma yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta
24a8(dkon brtsegs): ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /gang rna ba'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la sna'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / /gang sna'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la lce'i dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /
24b1(dkon brtsegs): gang lce'i dbang po'i rgyu las byung la lus kyi dbang po la gnas par 'gyur ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gang sbyin pa'i dbang po can yin la
24b2(dkon brtsegs): de yang tshul khrims la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po'i mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas de la sbyin pa'i gtam ston to/ /gang zag gang tshul khrims kyi dbang po can
24b3(dkon brtsegs): yin la de yang sbyin pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas tshul khrims kyi gtam ston to/ /sems can gang bzod pa'i dbang po can yin
24b4(dkon brtsegs): la de yang brtson 'grus la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas bzod pa'i gtam ston to/ /sems can gang brtson 'grus kyi dbang po can yin la de
24b5(dkon brtsegs): yang bzod pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas brtson 'grus kyi gtam ston to/ /sems can gang bsam gtan gyi dbang po can yin la de yang
24b6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas bsam gtan gyi gtam ston to/ /sems can gang shes rab kyi dbang po can yin la de yang shes
24b7(dkon brtsegs): rab la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas shes rab kyi gtam ston to/ /gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad
24b8(dkon brtsegs): la yang bya'o/ /sems can gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i dbang po can yin la/ de yang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa
25a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pas nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam ston to/ /sems can gang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i dbang po can yin la de yang nyan thos kyi theg pa la sbyor pa de la de bzhin gshegs pas
25a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po mchog dang / /mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam ston to/ /sems can gang theg pa chen po'i dbang po can yin la/ /de yang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
25a3(dkon brtsegs): pa la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang / /mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas theg pa chen po'i gtam ston to/ /sems can gang tha ma'i dbang po can yin la/ /de yang theg
25a4(dkon brtsegs): pa chen po la sbyor ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas dbang po mchog dang / /mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pas dbang po tha ma pa'i gtam ston to/ /sems can skal pa med pa'i dbang po can skal pa
25a5(dkon brtsegs): med par snang ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas skal pa med cing snod ma yin par rig nas btang snyoms su 'jog go/ /sems can skal pa yod pa'i dbang po can skal pa yod par snang ba dag la de
25a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas skal pa yod cing snod tu rig nas ri mor byas shing chos ston te/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smin pa rnams kyang rab
25a7(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen/ /dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /'byung ba'i dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen/ /'byung ba ma yin pa'i dbang po rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems
25a8(dkon brtsegs): can gyi dbang po'i rnam pa gang yin pa dang / /sbyor ba gang yin pa dang / /bsam pa gang yin pa dang / /gang gi rgyu las byung ba dang / /rkyen gang yin pa dang / /dmigs pa gang yin pa dang /
