25b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu 'thun pa gang yin pa dang / /sems can gyi dbang po'i mtha' gang yin pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
25b2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo / /'gro ba'i dbang po de ni dbang po'i pha rol song / /sems can rnams kyi spyod dang bsam pa'i cho ga mkhyen/ /'gro
25b3(dkon brtsegs): ba gang dag gi ni dbang po ci 'dra ba/ /de 'drar mi yi seng ge de la chos 'chad do/ /dbang po dag ni rab 'bring tha mar gyur pa rnams/ /de la bde gshegs ye shes rmad tu byung ba 'jug /sems
25b4(dkon brtsegs): can bsam pa thar ba'i snod tu gyur mkhyen nas/ /spyod pa mkhyen cing mkhas pa mchog gi chos ston to/ /gang dag mthar phyin skye zhing nyon mongs brtan pa dang / /mi gang rnams kyi dbang po yang
25b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pa dang / /skyes bu gang gi dbang po snel zhir gyur pa yi/ /spyod pa mkhyen nas de ltar 'thun pa'i chos ston to/ /skyes bu gang gi dge ba'i dbang po gyur pa dang / /mi dge'i dbang po gyur
25b6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyang de bzhin mkhyen/ /mig nas bzung ste yid kyi bar gyi dbang po dang / /yid mi bde dang sdug bsngal dbang mkhyen chos kyang ston/ /dad brtson dran dang ting 'dzin de bzhin shes rab dag /
25b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu gang la dbang po 'di dag yod pa ni/ /de la dad pa'i gtam ston de bzhin brtson 'grus dang / /bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang dam pa'i don du ston/ /mi yi dbang po'i rnam pa spyod
25b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bye brag gang / /mi gang bsam pa ci 'jug de yi dbang po yang / /chos mchog rtogs pas de dag gi ni spyod mkhyen nas/ /sdug bsngal kun las thar par byed pa'i chos 'chad do/ /
26a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi dbang po sangs rgyas byang chub phyir des la/ /nyan thos shes pa'i rjes 'jug cho ga mi shes pa/ /de la byang chub reg 'gyur rgya chen gtam rab ston/ /bde gshegs stobs ni mtha'
26a2(dkon brtsegs): yas thul dka' lnga pa'o/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs lnga pa ste/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de la
26a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu
26a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ yang dag par nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/ yang dag par ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/
26a5(dkon brtsegs): log par nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rab tu mkhyen/ ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang de bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rgyu'i stobs can sngon gyi sbyor ba phun sum tshogs
26a6(dkon brtsegs): pa zur tsam gyis go ba dbang po rno ba'i sems can de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan kyang rung / /ma bstan kyang rung / /de rnam par grol ba'i skal ba'i yod pa de dag
26a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi rgyu'i stobs mkhyen nas de bzhin du 'thun par chos ston to/ /ma nges pa'i sems can gyi khams rkyen gyi stobs can yongs su smin par bya ba'i
26a8(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid can/ gal te 'thun par 'doms shing rjes su ston pa dang phrad na rnam par grol bar 'gyur gyi/ rjes su ston pa dang ma phrad na rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur ba de dag la yang
26b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar rgyu dang rkyen dang ldan pa'i gtam yang dag par gsungs te/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa las chos de thos nas tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor pas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur te/
26b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi don du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo / /log par nges pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su sbyang bar ma byas pa/ kho re chung ba blun pa snod du ma gyur pa'i
26b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan kyang rung / /ma bstan kyang rung ste/ /rnam par grol ba'i skal pa med pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas snod ma yin par rig
26b4(dkon brtsegs): nas btang snyoms su 'jog ste/ /de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams go gyon to/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod chags kyi lam rnam pa gsum rab tu
26b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen te/ /'dod chags kyi lam sdug pa'i rnam pa las skye ba yang yod/ /'dod chags kyi lam rjes su chags pa'i rnam pa las skye ba yang yod/ /'dod chags kyi lam sngon gyi rgyu las skye
26b6(dkon brtsegs): ba yang yod do/ /zhe sdang gi lam rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen te/ /zhe sdang gi lam khong khro ba'i mtshan ma las skye ba yang yod/ /bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa las skye ba yang yod/ /sngon
26b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi bag la nyal las skye ba yang yod do/ /gti mug gi lam rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen te/ /gti mug gi lam ma rig pa'i rgyu las skye ba yang yod/ /gti mug gi lam 'jig tshogs
26b8(dkon brtsegs): la lta ba'i rgyu las skye ba yang yod/ /gti mug gi lam the tshom gyi rgyu las skye ba yang yod de/ /de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /gzhan yang
27a1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu dbang po rno ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la sla ba'i lam yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po rtul ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la dka' ba'i
27a2(dkon brtsegs): lam yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po rno ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la sla ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po rtul ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la sla ba'i lam yang rab tu
27a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ /dmigs pa bor ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la bul ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /lam gyi rgyun ma bcad pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la bul ba'i lam yang rab
27a4(dkon brtsegs): tu mkhyen to/ /yongs su thug pa med par dbugs 'byin pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa bul la myur ba'i lam yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de la ma chags pa'i phyir mngon par shes pa myur la bul
27a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam yang rab mkhyen to/ /so sor rtog pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed la sgom pa'i stobs la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ /sgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed
27a6(dkon brtsegs): la/ /so sor rtog pa'i stobs la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ /sgom pa'i stobs dang / /so sor rtog pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i lam yang yod/ /so sor rtog pa'i stobs
27a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / /sgom pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par mi byed pa'i lam yang yod de de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /bsam pa phun sum tshogs
27a8(dkon brtsegs): la sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ /sbyor ba phun sum tshogs la bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ /bsam pa yang phun sum tshogs pa ma
27b1(dkon brtsegs): yin la sbyor ba'ang phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ /bsam pa yang phun sum tshogs la sbyor ba'ang phun sum tshogs pa'i lam yang yod de/ /de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang
27b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /lus sbyong la ngag la ma yin/ /sems la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ ngag sbyong la lus la ma yin/ /sems la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ /sems
27b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyong la lus la ma yin/ /ngag la ma yin pa'i lam yang yod/ /lus la ma yin/ /ngag la ma yin la sems kyang mi spyong ba'i lam yang yod/ /lus dang / /ngag dang / /sems spyong ba'i
27b4(dkon brtsegs): lam yang yod de/ /de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu sems can thams cad kyi 'jug pa'i rgyu dang / ldog pa'i rgyu'i lam ji snyed pa
27b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes thogs pa med pa 'jug go/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i kun du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni mtha' yas mu med de nam mkha' dang
27b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs shing mnyam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de thos nas mngon par dad/ /yid ches/ /rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ /the tshom mi za/ /rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ /rangs pa rnyed cing nam mkha'
27b7(dkon brtsegs): lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad tu 'du shes skyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /thams cad
27b8(dkon brtsegs): lam ni bde gshegs rab tu mkhyen/ /sems can khams ni des rgyu bcas pa mkhyen/ yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid ma nges dang / /de bzhin dbang po rgyu dang ldan pa mkhyen/ /'dod chags lam
28a1(dkon brtsegs): ni rnam pa gsum ldan dang / /zhe sdang lam gsum de bzhin gti mug ldan/ /rnam gsum rgya chen mtha' yas nyon mongs ldan/ /lam la rkyen dang rgyu ni ston pas mkhyen/ /
28a2(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba'i lam la rno bar 'gyur ba dang / /de bzhin dbang po rtul zhing bul ba dang / /sla ba'i lam la rno bar 'gyur ba dang / /de bzhin bul ba'ang 'jig rten mgon pos mkhyen/ /bul ba'i lam
28a3(dkon brtsegs): la spyong ba bul ba yod/ /de bzhin bul ba yin la sbyong ba rno/ /myur ba'i lam la bul bar 'gyur ba dang / /de bzhin de la ma chags myur ba'ang yod/ /lam ni so sor rtog pa skyed byed la/ /yang dag sgom pa skyed
28a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin dang / /sgom pa dag ni skye bar byed pa dang / /gnyis ga khyad par sbyor ldan skyed pa yod/ /lam ni bsam pa yongs su sbyong byed la/ /sbyor ba dag ni sbyong bar mi byed yod/ /res 'ga' gnyis ga
28a5(dkon brtsegs): sbyong bar byed pa'ang yod/ /de dag sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pas mkhyen/ /lus la rnam par sbyong la ngag mi sbyong / /sems kyang rnam par sbyong ba ma yin dang / /ngag rnams dang ni lus kyang rab sbyong la/ /
28a6(dkon brtsegs): sems ni res 'ga' mi sbyong ba yang yod/ /sems ni rab sbyong dag la ma yin te/ /lus kyang rnam par sbyong ba ma yin dang / /ngag dang de bzhin sems kyang rab sbyong la/ /res 'ga' lus ni sbyong bar mi
28a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur yod/ /lus dang de bzhin ngag sems sbyong lam dang / /ji ltar ldog dang 'jug par 'gyur ba rnams/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gzigs pas rab mkhyen te/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
28a8(dkon brtsegs): stobs drug pa/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs drug pa ste/ /stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gis gnas su zhal gyi 'che ba nas sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang
28b1(dkon brtsegs): 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam
28b2(dkon brtsegs): par byang ba dang / ldang ba mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bdag dang pha rol gyi bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par
28b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / ldang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /ji ltar rab tu mkhyen ce na/ sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu gang
28b4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa dang / rkyen gang yin pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag pa'i rgyu gang yin pa dang / rkyen gang yin pa de yang de bzhin
28b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /de la rgyu gang / rkyen gang zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'o/ /sems
28b6(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rkyen ni ma rig pa'o/ /ma rig pa ni rgyu'o/ /'du byed ni rkyen to/ /'du byed ni rgyu'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni rkyen to/ /rnam par shes pa ni rgyu'o/ /ming dang
28b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs ni rkyen to/ /ming dang gzugs ni rgyu'o/ /skye mched drug ni rkyen to/ /skye mched drug ni rgyu'o/ /reg pa ni rkyen to/ /reg pa ni rgyu'o/ /tshor ba ni rkyen to/ /tshor ba ni rgyu'o/ /sred pa ni rkyen to/ /
28b8(dkon brtsegs): sred pa ni rgyu'o/ /len pa ni rkyen to/ /len pa ni rgyu'o/ /srid pa ni rkyen to/ /srid pa ni rgyu'o/ /skye ba ni rkyen to/ /skye ba ni rgyu'o/ /rga shi ni rkyen to/ /nyon mongs pa ni rgyu'o/ /las ni rkyen to/ /
29a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba ni rgyu'o/ /sred pa ni rkyen to/ /bag la nyal ni rgyu'o/ /kun nas ldang ba ni rkyen to/ /sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu ni 'di rkyen 'di yin te de dag kyang de
29a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /de la sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang / /rkyen gang zhe na/ /sems can rnams kyi rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu
29a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis rkyen gnyis te/ /gzhan las rjes su 'thun pa'i sgra dang / /so so bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o/ /'di lta ste/ /zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa dang / /lhag mthong la mkhas pa'o/ /gzhan
29a4(dkon brtsegs): yang rgyu gnyis dang / /rkyen gnyis te/ /'gro ba med par shes pa dang / 'ong ba med par shes pa'o/ /gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang / /rkyen gnyis te/ /skye ba med par rab tu rtogs pa dang / /nges
29a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa la mi reg pa'o/ /gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang / /rkyen gnyis te/ /rkang par ldan pa dang / /rig pas rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byed pa'o/ /gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang / /rkyen gnyis te/ /
29a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sgom pa dang / /rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol bar shes pa'o/ /gzhan yang rgyu gnyis dang / /rkyen gnyis te/ /zad pa shes pa dang / /mi skye ba shes pa'o/ /gzhan yang rgyu gnyis
29a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / /rkyen gnyis te/ /bden pa rjes su rtogs pa dang / /bden pa rjes su thob ba'o/ /rgyu de dang rkyen de dag ni sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba ste de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas
29a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu sems can rnams kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa yang tshad med/ /rnam par dag par dmigs pa yang tshad med de/ /yang
29b1(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pas kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa/ /rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa la 'jog pa yang yod do/ /yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog pas rnam par dag pa la
29b2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa yang kun nas nyon mongs par dmigs pa la 'jog pa yang yod mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'dzin pas kun nas nyon mongs par dmigs pa la 'jog pa dang / /rnam par dag pa'i dmigs pa la 'jog
29b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang yod de/ /de la snrel zhi'i rnam grangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug go/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes 'di lta bu dang ldan pas 'dod pa dag las dben pa/ /sdig pa mi
29b4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/ /rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ /dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / /bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /bsam gtan
29b5(dkon brtsegs): dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas nas 'gog pa las ldang ba dang / /'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs nas bsam gtan dang po las ldang ba'i bar du'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad la rjes su 'thun par snyoms par
29b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jug go/ /mi 'thun par yang snyoms par 'jug go/ /rjes su 'thun pa dang mi 'thun par snyoms par 'jug ste/ /brgyad gang zhe na/ /'di lta ste/ /gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam
29b7(dkon brtsegs): par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa sdug pa nyid du mos par 'gyur ba de ni rnam
29b8(dkon brtsegs): par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa lnga
30a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /
30a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa de ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad po 'di dag la rjes su 'thun pa dang / /mi mthun par yang snyoms par 'jug pa snrel zhir yang snyoms par 'jug
30a3(dkon brtsegs): go/ /ting nge 'dzin la yang ting nge 'dzin ston la snyoms par 'jug pas rtogs par ston kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la tha dad par 'gyur pa gang yang med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin
30a4(dkon brtsegs): la dmigs pa las ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag par bya ba med/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin gcig gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'grub po/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni ting nge 'dzin las ma
30a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhengs par ting nge 'dzin thams cad la snyoms par 'jug kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems gcig nas gcig tu 'jug pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi dmigs so/ /
30a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sus kyang blta mi nus te/ /nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis zil gyis non to/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting
30a7(dkon brtsegs): nge 'dzin gyis zil gyis non to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis zil gyis non to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni zil gyis ma non pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs
30a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes ni zil gyis ma non par 'jug go/ /gdams pa gang dang rjes su bstan pa gang gis nyan thos rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin skyed pa de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /de
30b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi dang / /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du 'doms shing de bzhin du rjes su ston to/ /de
30b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan dang / /rnam par thar pa dang / /ting nge 'dzin dang / /snyoms par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / /rnam par byang ba dang / /ldang
30b3(dkon brtsegs): ba mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni mtha' yas mu med de nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de thos nas mngon par dad/ /yid ches/ /rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ /the
30b4(dkon brtsegs): tshom mi za/ /rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ /rangs pa rnyed cing nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / /rmad tu 'du shes skyed do/ /'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin de/ /de
30b5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /gang gis sems can nyon mongs shing / /gang gis sems can rnam dag 'gyur/ /de yang dpa' bo chen pos mkhyen/ /mkhyen nas gtam rnams ston par mdzad/ /gang
30b6(dkon brtsegs): du ma rig skye 'gyur ba/ /nyon mongs rgyu ni tshul bzhin min/ /de yi rkyen ni 'du byed de/ /sdug bsngal rab tu skye bar 'gyur/ /srid pa'i yan lag skyed pa yi/ /thams cad rtsa ba tshul bzhin min/ /
30b7(dkon brtsegs): de nyid sangs rgyas rab mkhyen nas/ /de bzhin du yang ston par mdzad/ /las kyi rtsa ba nyon mongs pa/ /mi mkhas mngon par 'du byed de/ /sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bar/ /de yi rkyen ni
30b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes/ /gang gis sems can dag 'gyur pa/ /rgyu gnyis dang ni rkyen gnyis te/ /gzhan las rjes su 'thun sgra dang / /mang du tshul bzhin lta ba'o/ /tshul bzhin rgyu ni zhi gnas te/ /lhag
31a1(dkon brtsegs): mthong yang ni rkyen yin no/ /sems can gang gis 'grol 'gyur ba/ /de yang 'dren pas rab tu mkhyen/ /tshul khrims la ni rnal 'byor gnas/ /chos rnams stong par rab tu rtog /
31a2(dkon brtsegs): thar pa'i lam ni bsgoms pas na/ /srid pa dog las thar par 'gyur/ /de dag sangs rgyas rab mkhyen nas/ /rnam sbyong skyes pa bud med la/ /stong pa nyid dang mtshan med dang / /rnam par thar
31a3(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu ston/ bsam gtan la ni snyoms zhugs pa/ /rang rgyal dang ni nyan thos rnams/ /de dag rnams kyang dog par bshad/ /de ni 'gran zla yod par gsungs/ /sangs rgyas bsam gtan rnam
31a4(dkon brtsegs): thar la/ /dgra dang bcas med dog pa med/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni stobs bdun pa/ /pha rol rgol bas thul bar dka'/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
31a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs bdun pa ste stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ba nas sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs
31a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ /'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyis bdag dang sems can gzhan rnams
31a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / /gang zag gzhan dag gi sngon gyi gnas rnam par du ma rjes su dran no/ /'di lta ste/ /skye ba gcig gam/ /gnyis sam/ /gsum 'am/ /bzhi 'am/ /lnga 'am/ bcu 'am/ /
31a8(dkon brtsegs): nyi shu 'am/ sum bcu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ skye ba brgya 'am/ skye ba stong ngam/ /skye ba brgya stong nas skye ba bye ba khrag khrig stong gi bar du rjes su dran no/ /'jig pa'i bskal
31b1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'am/ /'chags pa'i bskal pa 'am/ /'jigs pa dang / /'chags pa'i bskal pa 'am/ /'jig pa'i bskal pa du ma 'am/ /'chags pa'i bskal pa du ma 'am/ /'jig pa dang / 'chags
31b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bskal pa du ma zhig na nga sngon che ge mo zhig tu byung ste/ /ming ni 'di zhes bya/ /rus ni 'di zhes bya/ /rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ /zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ /kha dog ni 'di lta bu/ /mtshan ma
31b3(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di lta bu/ /dbyibs ni 'di lta bu/ /tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub/ /yun ni 'di srid cig gnas gnas/ /bde ba dang sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu zhig myong ste/ /bdag de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo
31b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig tu skyes so/ /bdag de nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes so zhes 'di lta bu'i rnam pa dang bcas/ /yul phyogs dang bcas/ /gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon gyi
31b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas du ma rjes su dran no/ /sems can gang gi sngon gyi rgyu ji lta bu dang / /rgyu gang gis sems can du gyur pa'i rgyu de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen te/ /mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston
31b6(dkon brtsegs): to/ /'das pa'i sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i sems can gyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems gang gi 'og tu gang la dmigs pa'i sems skyes pa dang / /dmigs pa gang ma tshang bas
31b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pa de thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu gang sems can gcig gis sems gcig nas gcig tu sems 'di lta bu zhig gi 'og tu sems 'di lta bu zhig
31b8(dkon brtsegs): byung ngo zhes bya ba de ni bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed tu yang tshig gis bshad pas ston mi nus te/ /de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi yang thams cad de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas
32a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to/ /tha ma'i mtha'i bar gyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dag gi sems rnams bshad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes mthar thug par mi
32a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ /mtshungs pa med/ /tshad med/ grangs med/ /
32a3(dkon brtsegs): brjod du med de de'i mtha'i gnas ni bde bar bstan mi nus so/ /sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dag la kye sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang
32a4(dkon brtsegs): de sangs rgyas la bskyed pa 'am/ /nyan thos la bskyed pa 'am/ /rang sangs rgyas la bskyed pa 'am/ /chos la bskyed pa de dag dran par gyis shig ces dran par mdzad do/ /'di lta ste/
32a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus dran par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pas de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba la dmigs pa de las chos 'di lta 'di lta bur ston te/ /ci nas sems can de dag bla na med
32a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pas/ /la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /la
32a7(dkon brtsegs): la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed do/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa shes pa'i stobs ni mtha'
32a8(dkon brtsegs): yas mu med de nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de thos nas/ /mngon par dad/ /yid ches/ /rab tu rtog som nyi med/ /the tshom mi za ba nas/ /nam
32b1(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bar du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/ /bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo / /bdag gi
32b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ni de bzhin gzhan dag gi/ /'jig rten sgron mas sngon gyi dran pa ni/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas pa/ /skyu ru ra lnga lag mthil bzhag pa bzhin/ /ming rus de bzhin kha dog rnam
32b3(dkon brtsegs): par rtog / tshe dang gnas dang 'chi 'pho 'gro ba dang / /gang gi rgyu la sems can brtson ldan pa/ /dus mkhyen pa ni de la chos kyang 'chad/ /'gro ba rnams kyi sems dang sems byung chos/ /
32b4(dkon brtsegs): gang dag 'das pa mtha' yas mu med pa/ /gang gi 'og tu sems gang byung ba kun/ /rgyal ba ye shes chen po mnga' bas mkhyen/ /sems can gcig gi sems rgyu sngon 'das pa/ /bde
32b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen pa ni/ /bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye snyed du/ /bshad kyang de yi mtha' mar phyin mi 'gyur/ /sngon gyi spyod pa ji snyed de dag ni/ /phyi ma'i mtha' yi
32b6(dkon brtsegs): bar du ngas bshad kyang / /mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes mi zad de/ /bcom ldan ye shes rgya mtsho 'di 'dra'o/ /sngon gyi rgyal la sti stang gang byas shing / /sems can gang dag dge
32b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bsam gyur pa/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul stobs kyi shugs la gnas/ /sngon dag dge ba byas pa rnams kyang dran/ /sngon ni bsod nams ci 'dra byas pa rnams/ /de dag rnams
32b8(dkon brtsegs): kyang ston pa'i mthus dran te/ /de dag dran nas gnas ni gsum la 'khod/ /thar pa'i gnas las phyir yang mi ldog 'gyur/ /bde gshegs sngon gyi sbyor ba mtha' yas te/ /
33a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad kyis ni bsam mi nus/ /mtha' yas grags pa'i stobs ni brgyad pa la/ /rgyal sras bdag nyid chen po dad par 'gyur/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin
33a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs brgyad pa ste/ /stobs de dang ldan pas zhes bya ba nas chos dang 'byung bar zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i
33a3(dkon brtsegs): mig rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ /'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i ye shes dang / /mi'i las shin du 'das pa'i lha'i mig rnam
33a4(dkon brtsegs): par dag pas sems can rnams 'chi 'pho ba dang / /skye ba dang / /bzang po dang / /ngan pa dang / /kha dog mdzes pa dang / /kha dog mi sdug pa dang / /bde 'gror 'gro ba dang / /ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams
33a5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs so/ /sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ /ngag gis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ /yid kyis nyes par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ /'phags pa la skur pa 'debs
33a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /log par lta ba dag ste/ /de dag log par lta ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig ste/ /shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye
33a7(dkon brtsegs): 'o/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / /shin rje'i 'jig rten du'ang de bzhin no/ /yang sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ /ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan/ /
33a8(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan te/ /'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba ste/ /de dag yang dag par lta ba yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus lus zhig
33b1(dkon brtsegs): nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lhar skye'o/ /zhes sems can rnams kyi las ji ltar bsags pa rnams rab tu mkhyen to/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mig de ni phyogs bcu'i
33b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i mtha' chos kyi dbyings tshad med pa/ /brjod du med pa/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye ma las kyang shin du 'das pa thams cad na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ji snyed snang bar
33b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de dag thams cad ni 'tshig pa dang / /'jig pa dang / /'chags par gzigs so/ /sems can gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni 'chi 'pho ba dang skye bar
33b4(dkon brtsegs): gzigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni dga' ldan gnas nas 'chi 'pho ba dang / /ma'i rum du 'jug pa dang / btswa ba dang /
33b5(dkon brtsegs): gom pa bdun 'dor ba dang / /btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'jug pa dang / /mngon par 'byung bar gzigs so/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur ba de
33b6(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gzigs so/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / /tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba dang / /yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang
33b7(dkon brtsegs): gzigs so/ /nyan thos gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni shin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gzigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas
33b8(dkon brtsegs): gang dag kha cig snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni rdzu 'phrul ston cing yon sbyong bar gzigs so/ /sems can gang dag snang bar ma gyur pa phyir rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang
34a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam du mi 'gro ba dang / /nyan thos dang / /rang sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ba de dag de bzhin
34a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i lha'i mig gis gzigs so/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pas shing rta'i 'phang lo'i tshad tsam la snang bar ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams gzigs pa de dag ni shin du mang gi/
34a3(dkon brtsegs): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang / /mi rnams ni de lta ma yin te/ /de ltar mi snang bar gyur pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang tshad med do/ /'di ltar shA ri'i bu
34a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni lha'i mig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can gang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bar 'gyur zhes sems can gyi khams la gzigs te/ /sems can ji tsam sangs rgyas
34a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag gi mdun na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing sems can de dag 'dul yang sems can gzhan gyis mi shes so/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
34a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i mig rjes su dran pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs ni mtha' yas mu med de/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo/ /byang chub sems dpa' de thos nas mngon par dad pa
34a7(dkon brtsegs): nas/ /nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar du 'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
34a8(dkon brtsegs): gsungs so/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i lha mig dri med de/ /bskal pa bye bar dge ba'i las kyis sbyangs/ /des ni rgyal bas phyogs bcu sangs rgyas zhing / /rgya chen bsam gyis mi
34b1(dkon brtsegs): khyab rnams kyang gzigs/ /'byung ba dang ni 'jig pa ji snyed pa/ /kha cig me yis 'khor cing sems can gnas/ /kha cig sangs rgyas ldan zhing kha cig stong / thams cad rang byung gi ni
34b2(dkon brtsegs): spyan gyis gzigs/ /sems can khams ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab/ /gzugs can gzugs med gang dag ji snyed dang / /gang dag ngan 'gror ltung dang bder 'gro ba/ /thams cad rang byung gi ni
34b3(dkon brtsegs): spyan gyis gzigs/ /sangs rgyas bye ba mang po gang bzhugs dang / /rang byung 'dren pa mya ngan gang 'das dang / /rang rgyal gang dang nyan thos gang yod pa/ /thams cad rang byung gi ni
34b4(dkon brtsegs): spyan gyis gzigs/ /byang chub sems dpa' srog chags phan 'dod ba/ /gang dag byang chub spyod pa mchog spyod cing / /la la gzhi med gnas ni rtogs gyur pa/ /thams cad rang 'byung 'dren
34b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gis gzigs/ /gang gis srog chags shin du phra mthong ba/ /bde gshegs mig ni 'di 'dra dri ma med/ /mig stobs bsam gyis mi khyab dgu pa ste/ /rgyal sras des pa
34b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni mngon par dang / /shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dgu pa ste/ /stobs de dang ldan pas khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che
34b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog pa nas/ /sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa
34b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs gang zhe na/ /'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis zag pa thams cad
35a1(dkon brtsegs): zad pas bdag skye ba ni zad/ /tshangs par spyod pa la ni bsten/ /bya ba ni byas te/ /'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes zag pa med pa/ /sems can rnam par grol ba/ /rang
35a2(dkon brtsegs): gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs de ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang
35a3(dkon brtsegs): dag par bcom pa'o/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i zag pa zad pa ni tshad tu byas pa'i bag chags yang dag par bcom pa'o/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa zag pa zad pa ni tshad yod pa ste/ /snying
35a4(dkon brtsegs): rje chen po dang bral ba/ /spobs pa dang bral ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad yang dag
35a5(dkon brtsegs): par bcom pa/ /snying rje chen pos kun du bzung ba/ /mi 'jigs pa dang / /spobs pa la lta ba 'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa ste/ /skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'o/ /de
35a6(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la las kyi bag chags med/ /nyon mongs pa'i bag chags med/ /spyod lam 'khrul pa'i bag chags med do/ /'di lta ste/ /shA ri'i bu nam
35a7(dkon brtsegs): m kha' yongs su dag pas rdul dang du ba'i 'khrug pa dang lhan cig tu mi gnas pa de bzhin du shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyang nyon mongs pa'i bag
35a8(dkon brtsegs): chags thams cad dang lhan cig tu mi gnas so/ /de zag pa zad par mkhyen pa de lta bu la rab tu gnas nas zag pa dang bcas pa len pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams la zag pa
35b1(dkon brtsegs): zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /len pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ /kye ma sems can rnams ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa las byung ste/ /zag pa dang / /len pa rnams mi bskyed
35b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khyed kyis rab tu rtogs shig ces/ /de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas dpe dang tshul gyis ci nas kyang zag pa rnams yang dag pa ma yin pa'o zhes yang
35b3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu shes par 'gyur zhing shes nas kyang chos gang yang mi len te/ /len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu chos ston to/ /de ltar shA
35b4(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad kyi zag pa rnams rab tu mkhyen to/ /zag pa kun 'byung ba dang / /zag pa 'gag pa dang / /zag pa 'gag par 'gyur ba'i lam
35b5(dkon brtsegs): yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen te mkhyen nas kyang de bzhin du chos ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa mngon sum du byed pa mkhyen pa'i stobs
35b6(dkon brtsegs): de thos nas mngon par dad/ /yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med cing the tshom mi za ba nas ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do/ /'di la chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ /de la 'di
35b7(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bya'o/ /'dren pa'i zag pa med pa'i ye shes ni/ /rgya chen sgrib med dag pa tshad med de/ /stobs bcu'i stobs ni de dang ldan pas na/ /zhi ba'i byang chub mchog 'di rab tu gsung / /
35b8(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos rnams kyi zag zad ye shes ni/ /bag chags ma bcom tshad dang ldan pa yin/ /mi yi dam pa 'dren pa mchog rab kyi/ /bag chags bcom zhing tshad dang ldan ma yin/ /
36a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rang rgyal byang chub gang reg pa/ /de la snying rje che dang spobs pa med/ /bcom ldan 'das ni zag pa yongs zad pa/ /snying rje che dang spobs pa tshad med do/ /sangs
36a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas zag zad mkhyen la gnas nas ni/ /'gro ba'i zag pa yang dag ma yin zhing / /rigs pa'i gnas kyi tshul 'di ma shes pas/ /chos 'di thams cad log par zhugs mkhyen te/ /
36a3(dkon brtsegs): de la rgyal ba snying rje cher bskyed nas/ /chos 'di mi rtag stong pa bdag med chos/ /dngos med gsog ste mchog tu zhi ba yi/ /sa la rtogs shing ltos shes rab tu ston/ /'di la skyes
36a4(dkon brtsegs): bu srog dang gang zag dang / /shed skyes shed bu byed pa po yang med/ /chos 'di thams cad log par chags pas na/ /ston pa snying rje bskyed nas thar ston kyang / /bde bar gshegs
36a5(dkon brtsegs): la skyo ba yong med de/ /yang dag ye shes nams kyang nyams pa med/ /de'i phyir rgyal ba rtag tu rnal 'byor spyod/ /'gro la phan phyir chos rnams rab tu ston/ /'di ni pha rol smra ba 'jom
36a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i stobs/ /mtha' yas nam mkha' 'dra ba bcu pa ste/ /mgon po stobs bcu de la gnas gyur nas/ /mtshungs med 'khor lo dam pa rab tu skor/ /shA ri bu 'di ni de bzhin
36a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu pa ste/ /stobs de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che zhing 'khor gyi nang du seng
36a8(dkon brtsegs): ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog ste/ /'jig rten 'dir dge spyod bram ze'i bar du sus kyang chos dang 'thun par rab tu ma bskor ba/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu skor to/ /de
36b1(dkon brtsegs): ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par dad/ /yid ches/ /rab tu rtog pa nas
36b2(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar dang / /rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do// // bam po drug pa/ yang shA ri bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam
36b3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ /yid ches/ /rab tu rtog som nyi mi byed/ /the tshom mi za ba nas/ /ngo mtshar dang / /rmad kyi rab du 'du shes skyed ce na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin
36b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi po 'di dag ste/ /mi 'jigs pa de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis
36b5(dkon brtsegs): 'che ste/ /dge sbyong ngam/ /bram ze 'am/ /lha 'am/ /bdud dam/ /sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu skor to/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ /'di la
36b6(dkon brtsegs): s hA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'khor gyi nang dung yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes zhal gyis 'che ba de la lha dang
36b7(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la khyod kyis chos 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes chos dang 'thun par rgol bar byed mi nus so/ /de la ji ltar na de bzhin
36b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya zhe na/ /de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mi mnyam pa med par yang dag par mngon par sangs rgyas te/ /so so'i
37a1(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / /'phags pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa dang / /slob pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / /mi slob pa'i
37a2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams gang yin pa dang / /rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa gang yin pa dang / /'jig rten gyi chos rnams
37a3(dkon brtsegs): gang yin pa dang / /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang yin pa dang / /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / /kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / /zag pa dang bcas pa dang / /zag pa med pa dang
37a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus byas dang / /'dus ma byas de dag thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag
37a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya'o/ /de la mnyam pa nyid gang zhe na/ /lta ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid tu mnyam mo/ /mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis mtshan ma med par mnyam mo/ /
37a6(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis smon pa med par mnyam mo/ /skye ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi skye bar mnyam mo/ /mngon par 'du byed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis mngon par 'du mi byed par mnyam mo/ /
37a7(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi 'byung bar mnyam mo/ /kun gzhi'i ngo bo nyid kyis kun gzhi med par mnyam mo/ /dus gsum gyi ngo bo nyid kyis ji lta ba bzhin du mnyam mo/ /ma rig
37a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /srid pa dang / /sred pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rig pa dang / /rnam par grol bar mnyam mo/ /'khor ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis mya ngan las 'das par mnyam mo/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu
37b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes bya'o/ /de
37b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de yang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi
37b3(dkon brtsegs): sems tshim pa skyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang dad pa skyed pa/ snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid/ de bzhin nyid/ gzhan
37b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do/ /
37b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam
37b6(dkon brtsegs): ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med pa'o/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas 'di lta bu'i chos zab mo phra ba/ shes par dka' ba de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du
37b7(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po la gnas nas bstan pa sna tshogs dang / rnam grangs sna tshogs kyi sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la chos thams cad yang dag par rab tu
37b8(dkon brtsegs): ston te/ de'i chos de yang de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad pa'i phyir 'byung ngo / /gang ston pa ma yin la ston pa'o zhes khas 'che ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
38a1(dkon brtsegs): ma yin la/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes khas 'che ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pas zil gyis non nas de dag rgyags pa chad de phan tshun du
38a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bros so/ /'di ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas mu med de/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
38a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi 'jigs pa yang mtha' yas mu med do/ /shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs
38a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa nas ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed de 'di ni mi 'jigs pa dang po'o/ /
38a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas nga'i zag pa zad do zhal gyis 'che ste/ de la khyod kyi
38a6(dkon brtsegs): zag pa 'di dag ma zad do zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis chos dang 'thun pas rtsod par byed pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zag pa zad pa ni 'di
38a7(dkon brtsegs): dag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas 'dod chags la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom mo/ /srid pa'i zag pa las sems
38a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol bas zhe sdang la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom mo/ /ma rig pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas gti mug la spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom mo
38b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bas nyon mongs pa spyod pa'i bag chags thams cad bcom ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zag pa zad
38b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o zhes bya'o/ /don dam par na 'phags pa'i shes rab dang / ye shes kyi mdun na chos gang yongs su shes pa 'am/ spang ba 'am/ bsgom pa 'am/ mngon du bya bar 'gyur ba'i chos gang
38b3(dkon brtsegs): yang mi 'dug go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zad pa zhes bya ba de ni nam du yang mi zad pa ma yin no/ /de ni shin du zad pa nyid yin gyi/ gnyen po zad pa zhes mi bya ste/ de ni ji lta ba bzhin du
38b4(dkon brtsegs): zad pa'o/ /gang ji lta ba bzhin du zad pa de la zad pa gang yang med do/ /gang la zad pa gang yang med pa de 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de la skye ba med pa/ 'jig pa med pa/ gnas pa med de/
38b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ chos nyid chos kyi dbyings ni gnas pa nyid de/ de bzhin du de la ye shes zhugs so/ /gang la 'jug pa med cing mi 'jug
38b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang med pa yang de ltar zhugs te/ de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul gyi zag pa dang zad pa spong ba mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni snying rje chen po la gnas zag pa spang ba'i phyir chos
38b7(dkon brtsegs): ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de ni 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor
38b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi sems tshim pa skyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyed pa/ snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid/
39a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
39a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/
39a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med do/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ grangs med/ dpag tu med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying
39a4(dkon brtsegs): rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems kyis zag pa spang pa'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs
39a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mtha' yas pa nas/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do zhes bya ba'i bar du ste byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i
39a6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog pa nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar gyi 'du shes skyed do/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin
39a7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa gnyis pa ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan zhes bya ba nas/ 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i
39a8(dkon brtsegs): bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas/ 'khor gyi nang du gshegs nas bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams la bar du gcod do zhes zhal
39b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'che ba de la gong ma bzhin du sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'di ni bar du gcod pa'i chos ma yin no zhes rgol bar byed pa med pa'i bar
39b2(dkon brtsegs): du'o/ /de la bar du gcod pa'i chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bar tu gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos gcig ste/ gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bag med pa'i sems so/ /bar du gcod
39b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba'i chos gnyis te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngo tsha mi shes pa dang / khrel med pa'o/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i/ chos gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di
39b4(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ lus kyis nyes par spyad pa dang / /ngag gis nyes par spyad pa dang / /yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'o/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ /'di lta ste/
39b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba bzhi la 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba'o/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur
39b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos lnga ste/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / chang 'thung
39b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas la ma gus pa dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / bslab pa dang / ting nge
39b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin dang / gding ba la ma gus pa'o/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos bdun ste/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nga rgyal dang / che ba'i nga rgyal dang / nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang /
40a1(dkon brtsegs): nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang / log pa'i nga rgyal dang / mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang / chung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal lo/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/
40a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ log pa'i lta ba dang / log pa'i rtog pa dang / log pa'i ngag dang / log pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / log pa'i 'tsho ba dang / log pa'i rtsol ba dang / log pa'i dran pa dang /
40a3(dkon brtsegs): log pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i chos dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag la gnod pa byas so zhes kun nas mnar sems skyed pa dang / gnod pa byed do
40a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes kun nas mnar sems skyed pa dang / gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes kun nas mnar sems skyed pa dang / bdag gi mdza' bo la gnod pa byas so/ /byed do/ /byed par 'gyur ro
40a5(dkon brtsegs): zhes sems la kun nas mnar sems skyed pa bdag dang mi mdza' ba'i don byas so/ /byed do/ /byed pa 'gyur ro zhes kun nas mnar sems skyed pa'o/ /bar du gcod par 'gyur ba'i
40a6(dkon brtsegs): chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yin te/ 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par
40a7(dkon brtsegs): g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub mo dang / tshig kyal ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu tshul
40a8(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i kun du sbyor ba ji snyed pa'i chos de dag gis ro myang ba la rjes su lta zhing gnas pa dang / phyin ci log pa dang ldan pa dang / 'byung ba la kun
40b1(dkon brtsegs): nas ldang ba dang / sred pa dang / lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i zang zing dang bcas/ phung po dang bcas pa'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las de dag thams cad
40b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas bar du gcod par mkhyen te/ bar du gcod par mkhyen nas kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston to/ /chos bcu po de dag ni bar du gcod par 'gyur ba ste/ de dag
40b3(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar bya ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang / spang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa de yang 'khor thams cad shes par byed pa/ 'khor
40b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa skyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang /
40b5(dkon brtsegs): dad pa skyed pa dang / snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyis mnyam pa/ de kho na nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ mi 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba
40b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa 'thab
40b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad la thogs pa med do/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs
40b8(dkon brtsegs): pa tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ brjod tu med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i sems kyis bar du gcod
41a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos rnams zhi bar bya ba dang / spang bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa mtha' yas mu med pa nas gang de bzhin
41a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam
41a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za ba nas/ ngo mtshar dang rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do/ /shA ri'i bu
41a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa gsum pa ste/ mi 'jigs pa de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du gshegs na zhes bya ba nas/ sus kyang
41a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas sems
41a6(dkon brtsegs): can rnams gang la bsten pas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur ba'i lam rab tu mkhyen te/ de la 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i lam ma yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis chos dang 'thun par rgol bar byed mi nus so/
41a7(dkon brtsegs): /nges par 'byung
41a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam gcig ste gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bgrod pa gcig pu'i lam ste/ gang sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'o/ /nges par 'byung ba'i chos gnyis te gnyis
41b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong ngo / /nges par 'byung ba'i chos gsum ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o/ /nges par
41b2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i chos bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus su gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / tshor bar gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / sems su gtogs pa'i dran pa dang / chos su gtogs pa'i dran pa ste/
41b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i chos bzhi'o/ /nges par 'byung ba'i chos lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin
41b4(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ 'di ni nges par 'byung ba'i chos lnga'o/ /nges par 'byung ba'i chos drug ste/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos
41b5(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa ste/ 'di ni nges par 'byung pa'i chos drug go/ /nges par 'byung
41b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos bdun te/ bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub
41b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin du sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms
41b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ 'di bdun yang gong ma bzhin no/ /nges par 'byung ba'i chos brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o/ /'di
42a1(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /
42a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te 'di brgyad kyang gong ma bzhin no/ /mchog tu dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa'i chos dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mchog tu dga' ba dang /
42a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / shin du sbyangs pa dang / bde ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes mthong ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / rnam par
42a4(dkon brtsegs): grol ba ste/ 'di dgu yang gong ma bzhin no/ /nges par 'byung ba'i chos bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mo/ /'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa spangs pa dang /
42a5(dkon brtsegs): ma byin par len pa spangs pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa dang / brdzun du smra ba spangs pa dang / phra ma spangs pa dang / ngag rtsub po spangs pa dang / tshig kyal ba spangs
42a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / brnab sems med pa dang / gnod sems med pa dang / yang dag par lta ba ste/ 'di yang gong ma bzhin te/ lam 'di ni nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/ /'di ltar shA ri'i bu
42a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi dge ba ji snyed pa tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ldan pa'am/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ shes rab kyi phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ rnam par
42a8(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'i phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang ldan pa 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa de dag kyang nges par 'byung ba'i lam
42b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni yang dag par sgrub pa gang yin pa ste/ gang yang dag par sgrub pa de la ni chos gang yang sogs pa 'am/ 'bri ba'am/ blang ba 'am/
42b2(dkon brtsegs): dor ba 'am/ gzung ba 'am/ spangs pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par sgrub pa la zhugs pa ni gnyis la blo mi 'jug ste/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par yang dag pa ji
42b3(dkon brtsegs): lta ba bzhin du ye shes mthong ba ni nges par 'byung ba'i lam ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs
42b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mi 'jigs pa de yang 'khor thams cad shes par med do 'khor thams cad mgu bar byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa/ 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim pa
42b5(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa/ 'khor thams cad dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa skyed pa/ snying rje chen pos sbyor ba/ de bzhin nyid kyi mnyam pa de kho na nyid/ de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa nyid/ mi
42b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba nyid/ mi 'khrugs pa nyid/ 'byung ba med pa nyid/ 'jig pa med pa nyid/ rtsod pa med pa nyid de de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa la rtsod pa gang yang med do/ /de bzhin
42b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa ni rtsod pa med pa/ 'thab pa med pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid dang mnyam zhing chos kyi dbyings ngos mnyam pa 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad
42b8(dkon brtsegs): la thogs pa med pa'o/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ gzhal du med/ dpag tu med/ brjod tu med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying rje
43a1(dkon brtsegs): chen pos zin pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de so sor rtog pas sems can der 'jug pa rnams de byed
43a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad cing nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa ste/ mi
43a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa de dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag pa sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha
43a4(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ sus kyang 'jig rten 'dir chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu skor to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
43a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'jigs pa bzhi la mtha' yas mu med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bu nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang mtha'
43a6(dkon brtsegs): yas mu med de/ sems can thams cad kyis zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i mtha' 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do/ /
43a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas/ /mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /
43a8(dkon brtsegs): som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ ngo mtshar dang / rmad tu 'du shes skyed do/ /de
43b1(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /chos kun mnyam pa nyid mnyam par/ /rang byung bas ni rjes su rtogs/ /de phyir yang dag mngon sangs rgyas/ /
43b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa mnyam pa gzigs/ /so so'i skye bo'i chos gang yin/ /de dag sangs rgyas chos dang mnyam/ /slob dang mi slob chos rnams dang / /rang rgyal gyi ni chos nyid dang / /gang
43b3(dkon brtsegs): dag 'jig rten chos rnams dang / /gang dag 'jig rten 'das chos dang / /dge dang mi dge mi g.yo rnams/ /mya ngan 'das pa'i lam dang 'dra/ /stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med/ /smon lam
43b4(dkon brtsegs): dag ni rnam par spangs/ /ma skyes mngon par 'du mi byed/ /'di ni mnyam pa nyid tu bstan/ /'di dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs nas/ /thub pa chen po mi 'jigs pa/ /gang gis sems can
43b5(dkon brtsegs): 'grol 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin du yang rab tu ston/ /'jig rten gsum las rnam par grol/ /rnam par thar pa rab tu ston/ /mi dbang gi ni mi 'jigs pa/ /gnyis pa yang dag rab tu
43b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan/ /rgyal bas gang chos rjes su sangs rgyas pa/ /ma bsten par ni rnam par grol mi 'thob/ /bag med pa dang khrel ba med gyur dang / /gang la ngo tsha ci yang med pa dang / /lus
43b7(dkon brtsegs): dang ngag rnams dang ni yid kyis su/ /gang dag sdom pa nam yang yod min dang / /'dun dang zhe sdang gti mug 'jigs pa dang / /srog gcod pa dang gzhan la 'tshe ba dang / /gzhan gyi
43b8(dkon brtsegs): chung ma de bzhin brdzun dang chang / nga rgyal mi gus de ni bdun pa'o/ /gang dag log par smra ba brgyad pa ste/ /thams cad rnam par grol ba'i lam rgyun gcod/ /gang dag mnar sems
44a1(dkon brtsegs): dgu dang nyes mang dang / /mi dge bcu yi las kyi lam rnams dang / /gang dag tshul min zhi ba mi shes pa/ /de dag la ni nam yang thar pa med/ /phyin ci log la zhugs par rig
44a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ /bag med yang dag ma yin smra la chags/ /rgyal ba rnams kyi mi 'jigs gsum pa ste/ /chos nyid 'di dag la ni bsnyen par bya/ /gang dag rnam sbyong sgo ni tshad med la/ /mi gang
44a3(dkon brtsegs): stan pa byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba nyid kyis ma thos thams cad rig /shes nas mi 'chir 'gro ba'i chos 'chad do/ /ji tsam dge ba'i chos ni mang yod pa/ /byang chub phyogs
44a4(dkon brtsegs): dge rgyal bas bsngags pa la/ /sten pa rnam par thar pa mi 'thob pa/ /gnas med par ni stobs bcu rnams kyis bshad/ /tshul bzhin gyis ni nyon mongs mang po zhi/ /yang dag
44a5(dkon brtsegs): chos dge mnyam pa med ldan zhing / /chos dang chos ma yin la de mi chags/ /zhi ba mya ngan med pa rnam grol reg /gsog gsob nam mkha' 'dra zhing ya ma rla/ /sgyu ma'i gzugs 'dra
44a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lta bu dang / /dge chos rnam pa gang gis rab shes pa/ /de ni srid pa'i mtsho las thar par 'gyur/ /thub pa stobs bcu rnams kyi chos 'di ni/ /'gro ba gang mos srid par
44a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba la/ /snying rje snying brtse byas nas thar byed de/ /mi 'jigs bzhi pa nam mkha' 'dra ba'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa
44a8(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon pa dad/ /yid ches/ /rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za ba nas/ nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir/ ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi
44b1(dkon brtsegs): bar du 'du shes skyed do/ /shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ /yid
44b2(dkon brtsegs): ches/ /rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za ba nas/ ngo mtshar dang / rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snying rje chen po ni sems can
44b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rjes su mi gtong zhing rtag tu 'jug pa/ sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba ste/ /mi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po de yang ji ltar ngag
44b4(dkon brtsegs): gi las kyis kyang khong du chud par bya ba bla ba ma yin pa de ltar tshad med/ de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab/ de ltar mtshungs pa med/ de ltar dpag tu med/ de ltar brjod du med/ de ltar mi
44b5(dkon brtsegs): zad cing khong du chud par dka'o de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub thob pa de ltar sems can la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug ste/ byang chub
44b6(dkon brtsegs): ci 'dra ba snying rje chen po yang de 'dra 'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub ji ltar thob ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med pa/ gnas med pa'i byang chub thob bo/ /de la rtsa
44b7(dkon brtsegs): ba gang / gnas gang zhe na/ 'jig tshogs ni rtsa ba'o/ /yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa ni gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir de dag mnyam
44b8(dkon brtsegs): par mkhyen to/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rtsa ba med pa/ gnas med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shes bya ste/ sems can 'di dag ni rtsa ba med
45a1(dkon brtsegs): pa gnas med par mi shes pas de dag shes par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub ni zhi ba dang / nye bar
45a2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'o/ /de ji ltar zhi/ ji ltar nye bar zhi zhe na/ nang zhi ba'o/ /phyi rol nye bar zhi ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ de'i rang bzhin 'di yin
45a3(dkon brtsegs): bas na de'i phyir zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ de'i rang bzhin 'di yin pas na/ de'i phyir zhi ba zhes
45a4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /de'i mig stong par yongs su shes nas/ gzugs la mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/ /yid kyi bar du yang stong par yongs su shes nas chos la
45a5(dkon brtsegs): mi rgyug ste/ de'i phyir nye bar zhi ba zhes bya na/ sems can 'di dag ni zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba 'di mi shes te/ de dag shes par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la
45a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ngas ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /
45a7(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar 'od gsal zhe na/ rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ste/ nam mkha' lta bu'o/ /nam mkha'i rang bzhin no/ /
45a8(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha'i rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa ste/ de ni rang bzhin gyis shin tu 'od gsal ba na rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba 'di
45b1(dkon brtsegs): khong du ma chud pas byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams blo bur gyi nyon mongs pas kun nas nyon mongs te/ /sems can rnams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba 'di mi shes pas de dag rang
45b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ngas ni blang ba med pa dang /
45b3(dkon brtsegs): dor ba med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de la blang ba med pa gang dor ba med pa gang zhe na/ /blang ba med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa'o/ /dor
45b4(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad rab tu 'dzin pa med pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pas blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid mnyam pa nyid tu gzigs te/ ji
45b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar de bzhin gshegs pas tshu rol med pa dang / pha rol med par gzigs pa de ltar chos thams cad tshu rol dang / pha rol dang bral bar de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par
45b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par sangs rgyas te de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o/ /blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong
45b7(dkon brtsegs): du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ngas mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa
45b8(dkon brtsegs): med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de la mtshan ma med pa gang / /dmigs pa med pa gang zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa
46a1(dkon brtsegs): ni mtshan ma med pa'o/ /gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dmigs pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du mi dmigs pa ni mtshan ma med pa'o/ /
46a2(dkon brtsegs): chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni dmigs pa med pa'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul lo/ /'phags pa
46a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi spyod yul gang zhe na/ khams gsum pa ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/ gang 'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod yul ma
46a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub ni 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma
46a5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa'o/ /de la 'khor gsum yongs su chad pa gang zhe na/
46a6(dkon brtsegs): gang 'das pa la sems mi 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa la rnams par shes pa rjes su mi rgyug pa dang / da ltar byung ba la yid la byed pa mi 'jug pa ste/
46a7(dkon brtsegs): de sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pas 'das pa la mi rtog /ma 'ongs pa la rlom sems su mi byed/ da ltar byung ba la
46a8(dkon brtsegs): s pros par mi byed pa 'di ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin na sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes
46b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /shA ri'i bu ngas byang chub ni lus med pa mngon par 'dus ma byas par mngon par rdzogs
46b2(dkon brtsegs): par sangs rgyas te/ de ni mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par shes pa bya ba ma yin pa nas/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar gyis rnam par shes par
46b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ma yin no/ /'dus ma byas shes bya ba ni gang ma skyes pa/ mi 'jigs pa/ mi gnas pa de ni 'khor gsum dang bral ba/ 'dus ma byas shes
46b4(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /'dus ma byas ji lta bar 'dus byas kyang de ltar khong du chud par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de ni dngos
46b5(dkon brtsegs): po med pa'o/ /gang dngos po med pa de la gnyis med de/ lus med pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa de sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas
46b6(dkon brtsegs): de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /shA ri'i bu ngas byang chub ni dbyer med pa dang / gnas
46b7(dkon brtsegs): su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /de la dbyer med pa gang / gnas gang zhe na/ de la de bzhin nyid ni gnas so/ /gnas med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /
46b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings ni gnas so/ /tha dad pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnas so/ /g.yo ba med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /stong pa nyid ni gnas so/ /dmigs su med pa ni dbyer
47a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa ni gnas so/ /rnam par mi rtog pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa ni gnas so/ /'jug pa med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /sems can med pa ni gnas so/ /sems can
47a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i rang bzhin ni dbyer med pa'o/ /nam mkha' ni gnas so/ /mi dmigs pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /mi skye ba ni gnas so/ /mi 'gag pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /'dus ma byas ni gnas so/ /
47a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba med pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /byang chub ni gnas so/ /nye bar zhi ba ni dbyer med pa'o/ /mya ngan las 'das pa ni gnas so/ /mngon par mi 'grub pa ni dbyer med pa'o/ /de ltar
47a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu dbyer med pa'i gnas 'di sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /shA ri'i bu
47a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ni lus kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas te sems kyis kyang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ni bems po g.yo ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rtswa dang /
47a6(dkon brtsegs): rtsig pa dang / shing dang / rdo dang / mig yor lta bu'o/ /sems ni rgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla lta bu ste/ gang gis lus dang / sems de ltar khong
47a7(dkon brtsegs): du chud pa de ni byang chub ces bya'o/ /byang chub ni tha snyad tsam du bzung ba ste/ byang chub ni lus sam/ sems sam/ chos sam/ chos ma yin pa 'am/ yang dag pa 'am/
47a8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ma yin pa 'am/ bden pa 'am/ brdzun pa gang gis kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni chos thams cad kyis brjod par bya ba ma yin
47b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ byang chub la ni gang gis kyang tshig gi tha snyad tu 'gyur ba'i gnas cung zad kyang med do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' gnas med cing tshig med pa de bzhin du byang chub kyang gnas
47b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa/ /brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshol ba na chos thams cad tshig med pa ste/ chos la tshig med/ tshig la yang chos
47b3(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul mi shes shing khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /
47b4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu byang chub ni gzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa'o/ /de la gzung ba med pa gang / kun gzhi med pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ /mig yongs su shes pa ni gzung ba
47b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o/ /gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ni kun gzhi med pa'o/ /yid kyi bar du yongs su shes pa ni gzung ba med pa'o/ /chos mi dmigs pa ni kun
47b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhi med pa ste/ de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas gzung ba med pa/ kun gzhi med par byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par
47b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nas mig mi 'dzin pa dang / /gzugs kun gzhi med pas rnam par shes pa mi gnas so/ /yid kyi bar du mi 'dzin cing chos kun gzhi med pas rnam par
47b8(dkon brtsegs): shes pa mi gnas so/ /de rnam par shes pa mi gnas pas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi gnas shes so/ /ji ltar shes she na/ sems can rnams kyi
48a1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi gnas ni bzhi ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ /gzugs ni sems kyi gnas so/ /tshor ba dang / /'du shes dang / 'du byed ni sems can rnams kyi sems
48a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi gnas te/ /'di bzhi ni sems can rnams kyi sems kyi gnas so/ /gnas de yang gnas med par de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ gnas med pa'i mtha' 'di sems can rnams
48a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid
48a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshig bla dgas so/ /stong pa nyid gang gis byang chub stong pa stong pa nyid des chos thams cad stong ste/ /de dag stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas
48a5(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas mod kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni ma yin pas stong pa nyid dam/ /byang chub
48a6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ba 'di ni tshul gcig pa'i ye shes so/ /de la gnyis po gang gis stong pa nyid dang / byang chub tu gnyis su dbye ba'i gnyis gang yang med do/ /chos de ni gnyis su
48a7(dkon brtsegs): med cing gnyis su dbyer med de ming med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ 'jug pa med pa/ rab tu rgyu ba med pa/ /spyod pa med pa'o/ /gang stong pa zhes bya ba ni mngon par chags
48a8(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /'dzin pa dang bral ba'o/ /don dam par chos gang yang mi dmigs pas stong pa nyid gang yin pa de stong pa zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes
48b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang bya la nam mkha' ni brjod par bya ba 'ang ma yin no/ /de bzhin du stong pa stong pa zhes kyang bya la stong pa nyid brjod par bya ba ma yin no/ /'di lta ste/ ming tsam du tha
48b2(dkon brtsegs): snyad 'dogs pa 'di ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa ste/ ming de yang yul na mi gnas/ phyogs na mi gnas so/ /ji ltar ming yul na mi gnas/ /phyogs na mi gnas
48b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin du chos kyi ming gis tha snyad tu 'dogs pa'i chos de yang yul na mi gnas/ /phyogs na mi gnas te/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mkhyen
48b4(dkon brtsegs): to/ /thog ma nas ma skyes ma byung bar de ltar mkhyen pas de ltar rnam par grol te bcings pa yang med/ /grol ba yang med na de byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud
48b5(dkon brtsegs): pas khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub ni nam mkha' dang mnyam ste/ /nam mkha'
48b6(dkon brtsegs): ni mnyam pa yang ma yin/ mi mnyam pa 'ang ma yin no/ /byang chub kyang mnyam pa 'ang ma yin/ /mi mnyam pa 'ang ma yin te/ /ji ltar chos rnams yang dag par yongs su grub
48b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa de mnyam pa 'am mi mnyam pa zhes brjod pa ma yin no/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa 'ang ma yin/ /mi mnyam par yang
48b8(dkon brtsegs): ma yin par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /ji ltar chos rdul tsam yang mnyam par byas pa yang ma yin/ /mi mnyam par byas pa yang ma yin pa de ltar
49a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /chos ji snyed pa de dag yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis shes so/ /yang dag pa'i ye shes gang zhe na/ /chos ma byung
49a2(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams 'byung ba dang / /byung nas 'jig par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdag po med par 'byung / /bdag po med par 'jig ste/ /rkyen gyis 'byung ba dang / /'jig par
49a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing 'di la 'jug pa 'am/ /ldog pa gang yang med de/ /lam gcad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston to/ /lam gcad pa 'di sems can rnams kyis
49a4(dkon brtsegs): khong du ma chud pas khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub de ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas so/ /
49a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin te de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo / /byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du tshor ba dang / /'du shes dang / /'du byed dang / /rnam par shes pa 'ang
49a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin te/ /de bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo / /byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du sa'i khams dang / /chu'i khams dang / /me'i khams dang / /rlung gi khams kyang de bzhin te/ /de
49a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid kyis mi 'byung ngo / /byang chub ji lta ba bzhin du mig gi khams dang / /gzugs kyi khams dang / /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas/ /yid kyi khams
49a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / /chos kyi khams dang / /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du'o/ /chos rnams kyi btags pa ni 'di tsam du zad de de ni phung po dang / /khams dang / /skye mched
49b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams su btags pa ste/ /de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /phyin ci ma log par mngon par rdzogs par sangs
49b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pas na sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin/ /bar du yang de bzhin te/ /sngon gyi mtha' nas ma skyes/ /phyi ma'i mthar mi 'pho'o/ /bar du yang dben pa ste/ /de ltar de
49b3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas yin no/ /gcig ji lta bar thams cad kyang de bzhin no/ /thams cad ji lta bar gcig kyang de bzhin te/ /ji lta ba bzhin ni gcig gam mang por
49b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro/ /ji lta ba bzhin gyi gnas de sems can rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud par bya'o/ /zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje
49b5(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'jug go/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub ni rnam pa la 'jug pa rnam pa med pa la zhugs pa'o/ /de la rnam pa gang / /rnam pa med pa gang zhe na/ /shA ri'i bu rnam pa zhes
49b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ni dge ba'i chos rnams rtsom pa'o/ /rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o/ /rnam pa zhes bya ba ni mi gnas pa'i sems kyi gnas so/ /
49b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /rnam pa zhes bya ba ni sems gzhal ba dang / /bgrang ba dang / /so sor rtog pa'o/ /
49b8(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba ni gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das pa'o/ /gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das pa gang zhe na/ /gang na rnam par shes pa'i las med pa'o/ /rnam pa
50a1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ni gang na 'dus byas la so sor rtog pa'o/ /rnam pa med pa ni 'dus ma byas mngon sum du byed pa ste/ rnam pa dang rnam pa med pa la 'jug pa 'di byis pa so so'i
50a2(dkon brtsegs): skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas khong du chud par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub ni zag pa med pa/
50a3(dkon brtsegs): len pa med pa'o/ /de la zag pa med pa gang / len pa med pa gang zhe na/ zag pa med pa zhes bya ba ni zag pa bzhi dang bral ba ste/ 'dod pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / srid
50a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / ma rig pa'i zag pa dang bral ba dang / lta ba'i zag pa dang bral ba'o/ /nye bar len pa med pa zhes bya ba ni len pa bzhi dang bral ba ste/ 'dod pa'i
50a5(dkon brtsegs): len pa dang bral ba dang / srid pa'i len pa dang bral ba dang / lta ba'i len pa dang bral ba dang / tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs kyi len pa dang bral ba'o/ /de la
50a6(dkon brtsegs): nye bar len pa bzhi po de dag thams cad ni ma rig pas ldongs par byas pa dang / sred pa'i chus g.yogs pa dang bdag tu mngon par chags pas phung po dang / khams dang /
50a7(dkon brtsegs): skye mched len to/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pas bdag nye bar len pa'i rtsa ba yongs su mkhyen pa'i phyir bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag par mkhyen
50a8(dkon brtsegs): to/ /bdag rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de la yongs su rtog pa gang gis tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed par 'gyur ba'i yongs su rtog pa gang yang med de/ de ni
50b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang ldan pas ma rig pa kun nas mi slong ngo / /ma rig pa kun nas mi slong bas srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kun nas mi ldang ba de ni skye ba med pa'o/ /
