50b2(dkon brtsegs): gang skye ba med pa de ni nges par gyur pa'o/ /gang nges par gyur pa de ni nges pa'i don to/ /gang nges pa'i don de ni don dam pa'o/ /gang don dam pa de gang zag med pa'i don to/ /gang gang zag
50b3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i don de brjod du med pa'i don to/ /gang brjod tu med pa'i don de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don to/ /gang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don de chos kyi don to/ /gang
50b4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi don de de bzhin gshegs pa'i don te de'i phyir sus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo / /sus chos mthong ba des de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/
50b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar de bzhin nyid tu btsal na ci yang mi mthong ba de ltar mthong / /de la ci yang zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'o/ /
50b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis mtshan ma med pa dang / dmigs pa med pa mthong ba des yang dag par mthong ste/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid tu
50b7(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /zag pa med pa dang / len pa med pa 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis khong du ma chud pas de khong du chud
50b8(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub ni dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /de la dag pa gang /
51a1(dkon brtsegs): dri ma med pa gang / nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni dag pa'o/ /mtshan ma med pa ni dri ma med pa'o/ /smon pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa med
51a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /skye ba med pa ni dag pa'o/ /mngon par 'du mi byed pa ni dri ma med pa'o/ /nye bar len pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /rang bzhin ni dag pa'o/ /yongs su
51a3(dkon brtsegs): dag pa ni dri ma med pa'o/ /'od gsal ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /spros pa med pa ni dag pa'o/ /ma spros pa ni dri ma med pa'o/ /spros pa nye bar zhi ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /
51a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid ni dag pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings ni dri ma med pa'o/ /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /go 'byed pa ni dag pa'o/ /nam mkha' ni dri ma med pa'o/ /
51a5(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /nang yongs su shes pa ni dag pa'o/ /phyi rol du mi rgyug pa ni dri ma med pa'o/ /phyi dang nang mi dmigs pa ni nyon mongs pa
51a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'o/ /phung po yongs su shes pa ni dag pa'o/ /khams kyi rang bzhin ni dri ma med pa'o/ /skye mched spong ba ni nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /'das pa la zad
51a7(dkon brtsegs): pa shes pa ni dag pa'o/ /ma 'ongs pa la mi skye ba shes pa ni dri ma med pa'o/ /da ltar byung ba la chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i ye shes ni nyon mongs pa med pa ste/ de ltar dag pa
51a8(dkon brtsegs): dang dri ma med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa gnas gcig tu 'jug par 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ zhi ba'i gnas so/ /gang zhi ba de ni rab tu zhi ba/ de ni nye bar zhi ba ste/ thub pa zhes bya'o/ /
51b1(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas nam mkha' ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no/ /byang chub ji lta bar chos kyang de bzhin no/ /chos ji lta bar sems can yang de bzhin no/ /sems can ji lta bar zhing yang
51b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin no/ /zhing ji lta bar mya ngan las 'das pa yang de bzhin no/ /de bas na chos thams cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ste/ /mthar thug pa'i rnam pas gnyen po med
51b3(dkon brtsegs): do/ /gnyen po med pa'i rnam pas thog ma nas rnam par dag pa'o/ /thog ma nas dri ma med pa'o/ /thog ma nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pas 'di ltar gzugs
51b4(dkon brtsegs): can dang / /gzugs med pa'i chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi khams la rnam par gzigs shing sems can rnams la dag pa dang / /dri
51b5(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa/ /nyon mongs pa med pas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po dag pa dang / /dri ma med pa dang / /
51b6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa med par lhun gyis grub pas rtag tu 'jug ste/ phyis btang bar bya ba med cing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus par thogs pa med do/ /de ltar shA
51b7(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po ni mtha' yas mu med de/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pas snying rje chen po'i mtha' 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do/ /byang chub sems
51b8(dkon brtsegs): dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa de thos nas/ mngon par dad/ /yid ches/ /rab tu rtog som nyi med/ /the tshom mi za ba nas nam mkha' lta bur
52a1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang / /rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
52a2(dkon brtsegs): dag gsungs so/ /rtsa ba med cing gnas med pa/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg /ji ltar rtogs pa de bzhin du/ /srog chags rnams ni kun la sten/ /nang gi mig ni stong pa ste/ /phyi rol
52a3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyang stong pa'o/ /zhi dang nye bar zhi ba yi/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg /zhi dang nye bar zhi ba de/ /sems can khong du ma chud pas/ /tshig don rtogs nas sems can la/ /
52a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag la ni snying rje 'jug /byang chub rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing / /rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba de/ /sems can rnams kyis mi shes pas/ /de dag la yang snying rje 'jug /chos
52a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun la 'dzin pa dang / /rab tu 'dzin pa yod ma yin/ /blang med dor ba med pa yi/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg /sems can 'di dag mi shes pas/ /de dag la ni
52a6(dkon brtsegs): snying rje 'jug / mtshan ma med cing dmigs pa med/ /'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di/ /byis pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ /sangs rgyas kyis ni byang chub reg /gang dag
52a7(dkon brtsegs): mi mkhas bcings pa yi/ /so so'i skye bos mi shes pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la/ /snying rje chen po rab tu 'jug /rang bzhin gyis ni 'dus ma byas/ /skye ba med cing
52a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa med/ /de la gnas pa yod min te/ /mtshan nyid gsum las rnam par grol/ /'dus byas rnams kyi rang bzhin ni/ /byis pas khong du mi chud pas/ /de dag la yang snying
52b1(dkon brtsegs): rje 'jug / tshul 'di gang gis sangs rgyas pa/ /byang chub lus kyis myi rtogs te/ /sems kyis kyang ni 'tshang myi rgya/ /lus ni bems po'i rang bzhin te/ /sems kyang sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /lus dang
52b2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis rang bzhin te/ /byis pas khong du ma chud pas/ /tshul 'di khong du chud gyur nas/ /de dag la ni snying rje 'jug /rang byung ba ni byang chub dam pa rgya chen mchog dge ste/ /shing mchog drung du
52b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs nas sems can khams la rnam par gzigs/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lor zhugs shing 'gro rgyud sna tshogs 'khyam gyur pa/ /de dag gzigs nas sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zad 'jug /
52b4(dkon brtsegs): nga dang rgyags pa dag la chags shing lta ba'i dra bas gzings/ /sdug bsngal bde dang mi rtag rtag dang sdug par 'du shes shing / /bdag dang sems can dang ni srog tu lta bar chags pa rnams/ /
52b5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs nas de dag la ni sangs rgyas snying rje mi zad 'jug /sems can khams ni gti mug ling tog khebs shing bsgribs pa kun/ /nyi ma sprin khebs bzhin du snang med lam mer mi
52b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba/ /de dag gzigs nas ye shes snang ba dri med 'od bya zhes/ /de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zad 'jug /ngan tshogs 'gro bar zhugs shing lam stor rab tu 'khyams pa
52b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams/ /sems can sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro yi dags rgyud lhung ba/ /de dag gzigs nas sngon gyi rgyal bas bsnyen pa'i lam bstan ces/ /de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zad
52b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jug / de bzhin nyid ltar de bzhin nyid du chos rnams thams cad ni/ /nam mkha' mtshungs 'dra de dag ma bcings ma grol rab mkhyen te/ /'gro ba dag cing bzang ba'i
53a1(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams mi shes gzigs nas su/ /de dag la yang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje mi zad 'jug /de ltar shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po
53a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon par dad/ /yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste rangs pa rnyed nas nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
53a3(dkon brtsegs): phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad tu 'du shes skyed do/ / // bam po bdun pa/ yang shA ri'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la mngon par dad/ /yid
53a4(dkon brtsegs): ches/ /rab tu rtog pa nas/ /ngo mtshar dang / /rmad kyi bar du 'du shes skyed ce na/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni bcwa brgyad po 'di dag ste/ /chos de
53a5(dkon brtsegs): dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ /dge sbyong ngam/ /bram ze 'am/ /lha 'am/ /bdud
53a6(dkon brtsegs): dam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu skor to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad gang zhe na/ /'di la shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir
53a7(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi 'khrul pa gang las byas pa 'am/ /mkhas pa chos dang 'thun pas rgol bar byed pa'i lus kyi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /sangs rgyas bcom
53a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams ni lus kyi las 'khrul pa med pa ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam mdzes pas kun du gzigs pa dang / /rnam par gzigs pa dang / /bskum pa dang / snyad
53b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /chos gos snam sbyar dang / /chos gos dang / /lhung bzed bsnams pa dang / /mngon du gshegs pa dang / /slar gshegs pa dang / /byon pa dang / /bzhud pa dang / /bzhengs pa dang bzhugs
53b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /mnal ba dang / /grong dang grong khyer du 'jug pa dang 'byung ba na zhabs kyi mthil sa la mi reg ste/ /'khor lo rtsibs stong pa sa las 'byung zhing dri yid tu 'ong ba'i pad ma mngon par 'byung
53b3(dkon brtsegs): ste/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'jog go/ /de la gang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la reg na de dag zhag bdun du rab tu bde
53b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ /shi 'phos nas kyang bde 'gro'i mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la chos gos sor bzhi tsam gyis mi reg mod kyi/ /rnam par
53b5(dkon brtsegs): 'thor rlung gis kyang bzlog par mi nus so/ /sku'i 'od kyis mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can bde ba'i tshor ba myong bar 'gyur te/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 'khrul pa
53b6(dkon brtsegs): med ces bya'o/ /yang shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir ngag 'khrul pa gang las byis pa 'am/ /mkhas pa chos dang 'thun pas rgol bar byed pa'i ngag gi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la
53b7(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus su smra ba/ /yang dag par smra ba/ /bden pa smra ba/ /tshigs su smra ba/ /ji skad smra ba de bzhin du byed pa'o/ /shin du
53b8(dkon brtsegs): nges pa'i tshig go/ /sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa'i tshig go/ /mi zlos pa'i tshig go/ /don dang yi ges shin du brgyan pa'i tshig go/ /skad cig brjod pas sems can
54a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par byed pa ste/ /de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ngag gi las 'khrul pa med ces bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu sems 'khrul pa gang
54a2(dkon brtsegs): las byis pa 'am/ /mkhas pa chos dang 'thun pas rgol bar byed pa'i sems kyi 'khrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs
54a3(dkon brtsegs): p a ni mnyam par bzhag pa'i dngos po mi 'dor zhing sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad byed kyang sems der mi gtong zhing chos thams cad la de'i chags pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug
54a4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems 'khrul pa med ces bya'o/ /ji ltar de'i sems 'khrul pa med pa de ltar sems can rnams kyi sems 'khrul pa spang ba'i phyir chos
54a5(dkon brtsegs): ston te 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang po'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ca co gang las bdud dam/ /bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu 'am/ /gzhan mu stegs can gyis glags rnyed par
54a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i ca co de bzhin gshegs pa la med do/ /yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co 'am/ rjes su ca co 'byin pa med de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni rjes su chags pa dang / /
54a7(dkon brtsegs): khu+ong khro ba dang bral ba ste/ /de sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti byas kyang thos par mi sems/ /sems can thams cad kyis bkur sti ma byas kyang 'khrug pa med do/ /de gang
54a8(dkon brtsegs): las 'gyod pa 'am/ /rjes su ca co 'byin par 'gyur ba'i bya ba mchog gam/ /mthar phyin pa ci yang de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten dang
54b1(dkon brtsegs): mi rtsod pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa ste/ /nga'i ba med/ /'dzin pa med/ /len pa med/ /mdud pa thams
54b2(dkon brtsegs): cad dang bral ba ste/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la ca co med do/ /ji ltar de la ca co med pa de ltar sems can thams cad kyi ca co thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos ston te 'di ni sangs rgyas
54b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos ma 'dres pa gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu bsnyel ba gang las chos gang la yang rmongs par 'gyur ba'i bsnyel ba de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/ /bsam gtan dang / rnam
54b4(dkon brtsegs): par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa la thogs pa med cing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yo ba la rnam par lta ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la
54b5(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa med do/ /so sor ci rigs par chos ston pa'i phyir kun du nyams pa med do/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i phyir don dang / chos
54b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / /spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la kun du nyams pa med do/ /ji ltar bdag kun du nyams pa med cing 'das pa dang / /ma 'ongs pa dang / /da ltar la thogs
54b7(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba de ltar sems can thams cad brjed nges par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ /'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa gsum pa'o/ /gzhan
54b8(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'chag gam/ bzhengs sam/ bzhugs sam/ mnal tam/
55a1(dkon brtsegs): bshos gsol lam/ gsung ngam/ cang mi gsung par gyur kyang rung ste/ rtag tu mnyam par bzhag cing ting nge 'dzin zab mo dam pa'i mthar phyin pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i bsam
55a2(dkon brtsegs): gtan la bsam gtan byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na sems can gang mnyam par bzhag kyang rung / mnyam par ma bzhag
55a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang rung ste/ su yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems la lta bar nus pa med do/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa de ltar ting nge 'dzin la lta bas sems can
55a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos ston te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bzhi pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de tha dad pa'i 'du shes gang las sems mi mnyam par
55a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur ba'i tha dad pa'i 'du shes de bzhin gshegs pa la med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha' bzhin du zhing mi zad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la zhing tha dad pa'i 'du
55a6(dkon brtsegs): shes med do/ /rang bzhin gyis tha dad pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sems can tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do/ /chos kyi dbyings dbyer med cing / mnyam pa nyid kyi
55a7(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i 'du shes med do/ /'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid kyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la chos tha dad pa'i 'du shes
55a8(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems can la yang rjes su chags pa med/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la yang khong khro ba med/ phan par gyur pa la yang lan du phan
55b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs pa med/ gnod par gyur pa la yang gnod par byed pa med/ 'dul bar 'os pa la yang mnyam pa nyid du ma yin/ log par nges pa'i sems can la yang dmod pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin
55b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni chos thams cad la mnyam par gnas te/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med ces bya'o/ /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa de
55b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar sems can thams cad kyi tha dad pa'i 'du shes spang ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa lnga pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa la
55b4(dkon brtsegs): so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni lam bsgoms pa'i yin te/ lam ma bsgom pa'i ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs
55b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i btang snyoms ni sems bsgoms pa dang / tshul khrims bsgoms pa dang / shes rab bsgoms pa'i yin te/ shes rab ma bsgoms pa'i ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang
55b6(dkon brtsegs): snyoms ni ye shes dang ldan pa'i yin te/ gti mug dang ldan pa'i ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yin gyi 'jig rten pa'i rnam par lhung
55b7(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba yin la 'phags pa ma yin pa nges par mi 'byung ba ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms
55b8(dkon brtsegs): ni tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor ba ste/ sems can la snying rje dang bral ba ni ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms ni rang gi ngang gis grub pa ste/ gnyen po'i rjes su song ba ni ma
56a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no/ /yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i btang snyoms de ni mtho ba yang ma yin/ dma' ba yang ma yin te/ mtho dma' med par gnas pa mi g.yo bar gyur pa/ gnyis
56a2(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba/ rtog pa dang sel ba las shin du 'das pa dus la lta ba dus las ma yol ba/ mi g.yo ba/ rlom sems med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma
56a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa/ brtan du med pa/ yang dag pa/ de kho na/ de bzhin nyid/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i btang snyoms
56a4(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pas sems can thams cad btang snyoms yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa drug pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de
56a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/ /de la 'dun pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'o/ /de yang gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa la 'dun pa
56a6(dkon brtsegs): nyams pa med do/ /snying rje chen po la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/ /chos ston pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/ /sems can 'dul ba la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/ /rab tu dben pa la 'dun
56a7(dkon brtsegs): pa nyams pa med do/ /byang chub sems dpar yang dag par 'dzud pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/ /dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi gcod pa la 'dun pa nyams pa med do/ /de bzhin
56a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni 'dun pas 'gro ba ma yin gyi/ ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dun pa'o/ /sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen par 'dun pa
56b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bdun pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus nyams pa med do/ /de
56b2(dkon brtsegs): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus ni 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i sems can yal bar mi 'dor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / chos nyan pa la brnyas pa med pa'i brtson 'grus so/ /gal
56b3(dkon brtsegs): te de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi snod chos nyan pa gang bskal par nyan kyang skyo bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu brnyes na/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang chos ston cing zhal zas dang bral ba'i rgyud
56b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bskal par yang mi bzhengs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa sems can la lta bas tha na gang na sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gcig gi phyir yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang
56b5(dkon brtsegs): gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'da' zhing bzhud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lus ngal ba 'am/ ngag ngal ba 'am/ sems ngal ba med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni lus dang sems
56b6(dkon brtsegs): shin du sbyangs pa'o/ /brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o/ /brtson 'grus kyi bsngags pa gsung ba ste/ brtson 'grus kyis yang dag par rab tu sbyong ba gang gis sems can 'phags
56b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus de sems can rnams la bsngags par mdzad de/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
56b8(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyad pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad tu dran pa nyams pa med cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni
57a1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyel ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag tu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
57a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / da ltar gyi sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud rnam par bltas kyang de la de bzhin gshegs pa la phyis shin du dran pa bsnyel ba med do/ /sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes kyang de la
57a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes phyis btang bar bya ba med do/ /phung po gsum du rnam par gzhag pa dang / sems can gyi bsam par 'jug pa la sems can gyi spyod pa rnam par lta bas
57a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa la yongs su nyams pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dran pa ni dran par bya ba dang / bsam par bya ba dang / brtag par bya ba med kyang sems can rnams la
57a5(dkon brtsegs): chos ston pa 'bri bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir ce na/ 'di ltar de'i dran pa la nyams pa med do/ /de ji ltar dran pas bdag dran zhing mi brjed pa de bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston te/
57a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dgu pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med do/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
57a7(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin de ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ chos thams cad mi mnyam pa ma yin no/ /chos thams cad ni ji lta ba bzhin pa'o/ /ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin
57a8(dkon brtsegs): las mi nyams she na/ de bzhin nyid gang dang mnyam pa ting nge 'dzin kyang de dang mnyam mo/ /ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa de bzhin nyid kyang de dang mnyam ste/ /mnyam pa nyid de la
57b1(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pas de'i phyir mnyam pa zhes bya'o/ /'dod chags kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dod chags med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/ /zhe sdang gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa zhe sdang
57b2(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/ /gti mug gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa gti mug med pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/ /'dus byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa 'dus ma byas
57b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/ /'khor ba'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' yang de dang mnyam mo/ mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas de'i phyir de
57b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med ces bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam pa nyid mi nyams/ /yongs su mi nyams so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de yang mig
57b5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa ma yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang ldan pa ma yin mod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po ma tshang ba yang ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin sa'i khams la mi
57b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas/ chu dang / me dang / rlung gi khams la mi gnas/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la mi gnas 'jig rten pha rol la mi gnas te/ mi gnas pas na nyams pa
57b7(dkon brtsegs): med do/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med de/ sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnyed par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to/ /shA ri'i bu 'di
57b8(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab gang
58a1(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ gang chos thams rab tu shes pa ste/ gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'i shes pa'o/ /sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la chos go bar byed pa'i shes pa'o/ /so so yang dag
58a2(dkon brtsegs): par rig pa mi zad pa la mkhas pa'i shes pa'o/ /tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba shes pa'o/ /tshig gcig la 'jug pas bskal pa brgya stong du mi chad par ston pa shes pa'o/ /ji ltar ci 'dra zhes dris pa
58a3(dkon brtsegs): ji lta ba bzhin du the tshom bcod pa'i shes pa'o/ /thams cad tu thogs pa med pa'i shes pa'o/ /theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa bstan pa shes pa'o/ /sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong
58a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su shes pa'i shes pa'o/ /chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong ci rigs par yang dag par rab tu ston pa shes pa'o/ /'di ni shes rab mi zad pa bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab mtha'
58a5(dkon brtsegs): yas mu med zad mi shes pa'o/ /gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab nyams pa med pa de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi shes rab kyang mi zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu de ni de bzhin
58a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gcig pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba nyams pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang zhe na/ nyan
58a7(dkon brtsegs): thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni sgra'i rjes su 'gro ba'o/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni rkyen khong du chud pa'o/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par grol ba ni chags pa dang /
58a8(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral bas rnam par grol ba zhes bya ste/ sngon gyi mthar yang ma bcings/ phyi ma'i mthar yang mi 'pho/ da ltar byung ba la yang mi gnas te/ ming dang gzugs la gnyis
58b1(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'o/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro dang / lus dang / reg bya la gnyis su 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba ste/ mi 'dzin/ mngon par mi chags par gnas
58b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnam par grol ba'o/ /sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de bzhin du shes pas de de'i phyir sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
58b3(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shes bya'o/ /ji ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs
58b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gnyis pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /lus kyi las de dang ldan pas de
58b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas gzigs pas kyang sems can 'dul/ gsung bas kyang sems can 'dul cang mi gsungs bas kyang sems can 'dul/ bshos gsol bas kyang sems can 'dul/ spyod lam gyis kyang sems can
58b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dul/ mtshan gyis kyang sems can 'dul/ dpe byad bzang pos kyang sems can 'dul/ gtsug tor bltar mi snang ba dang / bltas pa tsam dang / 'od gtong ba dang / gom pa 'dor ba dang / 'jog pa dang / grong khyer du
58b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / 'byung bas kyang sems can 'dul te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyod lam gang gis kyang sems can 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba med do/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyi las thams cad
58b8(dkon brtsegs): ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu gsum pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag
59a1(dkon brtsegs): gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni 'bras bu yod pa'i chos ston pa'o/ /phyad par lung ston po'o/ /shin du nges pa'i tshig smra
59a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag de yang kun shes par byed pa/ rnam par shes par byed pa/ mi mtho ba/ mi dma' ba/ ma yo ba/ 'dar 'dar po ma yin pa/ gya gyu med pa/ mi brlang ba/ mi rtsub pa/ gzing gzing
59a3(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa/ mnyen pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ ma 'chal pa/ lag log med pa/ mi 'tshe ba/ mi myur ba/ rab tu myur ba ma yin pa/ shin du rnam par phye ba/ shin du nges pa'i tshig /rab tu mnyen pa/ shin du snyan pa/ dbyangs/
59a4(dkon brtsegs): snyan pa/ rab tu gsal ba/ bsgrags pa/ nges pa/ 'jam pa/ phan pa dang bcas pa/ dga' bar 'gyur ba/ mchod par 'gyur ba/ mdzes pa/ rdul med pa rdul dang bral ba/ tha ba med pa/ dri ma med pa/ ma rmongs
59a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gsal ba/ thogs pa med pa/ yang dag par sbyor ba/ 'od gsal ba/ drang ba/ 'jungs pa ma yin pa dum bu ma yin/ dig dig po ma yin pa/ bde ba skyed pa/ lus sim par byed pa/ sems tshim par byed pa/ 'dod
59a6(dkon brtsegs): chags zhi bar byed pa/ zhe sdang zhi bar byed pa/ gti mug sel ba/ bdud 'jom pa/ sdig pa sel ba/ rgol ba 'dul ba/ go bar byed pa/ rnga'i sgra/ mkhas pa/ dga' bar byed pa/ ka la ping ka'i sgra dbyangs
59a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i sgra/ tshangs pa'i sgra/ rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyi sgra/ sprin gyi sgra/ sa'i sgra dbyangs/ khrung khrung gi sgra/ rma bya'i sgra skad/ khu byug gi sgra/ shang shang te'u yi sgra/ ngang pa'i sgra skad/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po'i
59a8(dkon brtsegs): sgra/ khong hu dang / pi bang dang / khar rnga dang / dung dang / sil snyan rab tu bsgrags pa'i sgra/ kun shes par 'gyur ba/ rnam par shes par 'gyur ba/ zur phyin pa/ yid tu 'ong ba/ mnyan par 'os pa/
59b1(dkon brtsegs): zab pa/ lkugs shing dig pa ma yin pa/ bde ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa/ tshig dang yi ge ma nyams pa/ shin du nges par smra ba/ tshig 'bru dang / don gyi tshig dang ldan pa/ chos kyi tshig dang ldan pa/ dus dang ldan
59b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ tshod dang ldan pa/ dus las mi 'da' ba/ dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas bstan pa/ sbyin pas brgyan pa/ tshul khrims kyis sbyangs pa/ bzod pas bsgrubs pa/ brtson 'grus kyi 'bar bar byas
59b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bsam gtan gyis yid du 'ong bar byas pa/ shes rab kyis nges par brtags pa/ byams pas shin tu bsags pa/ snying rje myi skyo ba/ dga' bas 'od gsal ba/ btang snyoms kyis nges par brtags
59b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ theg pa gsum rnam par 'jog pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa/ phung po gsum 'jog pa/ rnam par thar pa gsum spyod pa bden pa yongs su bsgoms pa ye shes yongs su bsgoms pa/ mkhas pas ma smad pa/ 'phags pas
59b5(dkon brtsegs): bstod pa/ nam mkha' tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba/ rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag ni de 'dra ste/ de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngag gi las thams cad
59b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bzhi pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid kyi
59b7(dkon brtsegs): las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems kyis brjod pa ma yin/ yid kyis ma yin/ rnam par shes pas ma yin gyi/ de bzhin
59b8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni ye shes kyis rab tu phye ba ste/ ye shes kyi bar du gyur pa'o/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de yang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su song ba'o/ /sems can thams cad kyi rnam
60a1(dkon brtsegs): par shes pa las rab tu dben pa'o/ /chos thams cad la nges par sems pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'o/ /dmigs pa las shin du 'das pa'o/ /rkyen las skye ba dang bral ba'o/ /
60a2(dkon brtsegs): srid pa gsum gyi 'gro ba sel pa'o/ /nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las shin du 'das pa'o/ /bdud kyi las thams cad las nges par 'gro ba'o/ /sgyu dang g.yo thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin
60a3(dkon brtsegs): pa spangs pa'o/ /ma rig pa dang gti mug gi mun pa dang / ling tog med pa'o/ /lam gyi yan lag shin du bsgoms pa'o/ /nam mkha' dang mtshungs shing rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu
60a4(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i yid kyi las so/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa lnga pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i dus la de bzhin
60a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go/ /ji ltar 'jug ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing byung ba dang / ma byung ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin
60a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas yang dag par mkhyen to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de'i sems can gyi
60a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs sems can tu gtogs pa byung ba de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen to/ /de dag na sems can sna tshogs byung ba ji snyed pa gzugs tha dad pa la sogs pa rgyas par bya ste/ sangs rgyas byung ba ji snyed pa dang / de bzhin
60a8(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa re res chos bstan cing brjod pa yang gong ma bzhin du sbyar ro/ /sems can ji snyed cig nyan thos kyi theg pas btul ba dang / ji snyed cig rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas btul ba yang gong ma bzhin du sbyar
60b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun rnam par phye ba dang / tshe'i tshad rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /chos gnas pa rnam par phye ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba yang
60b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to/ /zas kyi mchog gi longs spyod kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa'i rnam pa dang / shi 'pho dang / skye ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po tha dad pa dang / spyod pa
60b3(dkon brtsegs): tha dad pa dang / bsam pa tha dad pa'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems gang gi 'og tu sems gang 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mngon sum du ye shes dang / rjes su 'gro ba'i ye
60b4(dkon brtsegs): shes kyis rab tu mkhyen te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'das par gtong ba'i sems kyi rgyud kyang mi dmigs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas sems can gyi bsam pa la nyams pa med par chos ston
60b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu drug pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i dus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go/ /
60b6(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba de dag kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /bskal pa mes tshig par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / chus
60b7(dkon brtsegs): sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / rlung gis sdud par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas par 'gyur ba ji snyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas sa'i khams ji snyed pa dang / rdul phra rab ji snyed pa dang / rtswa dang /
60b8(dkon brtsegs): shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam re re na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed
61a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / rang sangs rgyas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang nyan thos ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / zas kyi longs
61a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / spyod lam ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rab 'byam re re las sems can ji snyed nyan thos kyi theg pa
61a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas rnam par thar par 'gyur ba dang / sems can ji snyed theg pa chen pos rnam par thar pa 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /
61a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam re re na sems can skye ba'i gnas ji snyed 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / sems dang sems las byung ba skye ba dang / skye bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang de
61a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen to/ /de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyi rgyud bskal par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs
61a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ma 'ongs pa la gzigs pas sems can rnams la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcu bdun pa'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu da ltar gyi dus
61a7(dkon brtsegs): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug go/ /ji ltar 'jug ce na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
61a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad bgrang ba'i tshul rnam pa gsum gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi chos thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / de bzhin du da ltar gyi
61b1(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi skar ma'i gzugs thams cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams
61b2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi phyogs bcu'i sa'i khams rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyi char brlags pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu'i chu'i khams skra'i rtse mos
61b3(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa'i thigs pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu'i me'i khams kyi 'od 'phro ba/ skyes pa dang / 'gags pa thams cad kyang bgrang ba'i tshul gyis
61b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu'i rlung gi khams thams cad kyang gzugs kyi khams sgrub pa bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad skra'i rtse mo'i
61b5(dkon brtsegs): cha shas kyis bgrang ba'i tshul gyis rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi sems can gyi khams rnam pa gsum yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu
61b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen to/ /de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i skye ba'i
61b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /ldang ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /ldang
61b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi mi'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi lha'i sems can gyi khams kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /
62a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i skye ba'i rgyu yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de dag gi nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa 'ang rab tu mkhyen to/ /nyon
62a2(dkon brtsegs): mongs pa dang bral ba yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /da ltar gyi sems can thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbang po yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /'dul ba ma yin pa'i dbang po yang rab tu mkhyen to/ /de ltar de bzhin
62a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa la gnyis kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa med de/ gnyis su med pa la bzhugs pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams
62a4(dkon brtsegs): la chos ston te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad po de dag
62a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad du 'khor gyi nang du gzi brjid dang / grags pa dang / dpal dang /
62a6(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos nyid kyis 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas/ lam me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas
62a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad mtha' yas mu med do/ /'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu nam mkha' mtha' yas mu med pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
62a8(dkon brtsegs): yang mtha' yas mu med do/ /gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtha' 'dod pa de ni nam mkha'i mtha' 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
62b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag thos nas mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi med/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher
62b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa rnyed cing nam mkha' lta bur bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ngo mtshar dang rmad tu 'du shes skyed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pas don 'di bka'
62b3(dkon brtsegs): stsal nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo / /'dren pa la ni 'khrul pa yong med de/ /lus dang ngag rnams dang ni sems mi g.yo/ /de bzhin srog chags rnams la chos ston te/ /de ni rgyal ba
62b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /khengs par mi 'gyur 'dud par mi 'gyur te/ /khong khro rjes su chags las mngon par 'das/ /nyon mongs med la gnas shing nyon mongs grol/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams
62b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi ma 'dres chos/ /'dren pa la ni dran pa bsnyel ba med/ /rnam par spyod yul chos ni mngon par mkhyen/ /so so yang dag rig pa bsnyel med de/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /mnyam par
62b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhag pas bzhugs shing bshos kyang gsol/ /'chag dang mnal ba na yang mnyam par bzhag /g.yeng ba med cing sems can 'du shes med/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /rgyal ba dang
62b7(dkon brtsegs): ni zhing dang sems can la/ /tha dad 'du shes bde bar gshegs la med/ /bsam pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la gnas/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /de dag la ni ma brtags btang snyoms med/ /shin du nges
62b8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lam ni rab bsgoms pas/ /de la rtog dang rnam par rtog med de/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /dge ba la ni 'dun pa nyams pa med/ /ston pa rtag tu snying rje rab sbyor zhing / /sems can rgya chen dpag tu med pa 'dul/ /
63a1(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ nam yang brtson 'grus la ni nyams pa med/ /'dul ba mtha' dang pha rol med mthong nas/ /lus dang ngag rnams dang ni yid kyis 'dul/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /
63a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub snying por sangs rgyas byang chub par/ /de yis dran pa rnam par chud mi za/ /gang chos rtogs pa de ni rtogs bya min/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog med par/ /rang byung ting nge 'dzin
63a3(dkon brtsegs): la mnyam gnas te/ /chos rnams kun la mi gnas bsam gtan byed/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /'dren pa'i shes rab kyis ni rab ston cing / /sems can kun gyi spyod pa rab mkhyen te/ /de dag la ni bsam bzhin
63a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyang 'chad/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyis ma 'dres chos/ /nyan thos rnams kyi rnam grol sgra phyir 'gro/ /rang rgyal gyi ni rkyen gyi 'du shes te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi btang snyoms bsam mi khyab/ /chags las rab 'das dri
63a5(dkon brtsegs): med nam mkha' bzhin/ /sems kyi rgyud 'di rang bzhin rnam grol te/ /sems ni sngon nas bcings par gyur pa med/ /ji ltar rnam grol de ltar chos ston te/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /gshegs dang bzhugs dang
63a6(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer 'jug pa dang / /spyod lam dag ni mthong na mig kyang 'phrog /sangs rgyas rnams kyi dpe byad bzang po dang / /mtshan dang 'od rnams thams cad 'dul bar zhugs/ /sems can snying po nam zhig 'di gtod tshe/ srog
63a7(dkon brtsegs): chags bye ba mang por bder 'gyur te/ /'od kyis reg pa dag ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /rang byung ba ni gsung gcig brjod pas na/ /sems can bsam pa bzhin du gsung thos te/ /brag cha lta bu
63a8(dkon brtsegs): de'i gsung yang thos/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /ye shes kyis ni 'dren pa'i las byas te/ /bde bar gshegs la sems las cung zad med/ /sems can bsam la ye shes rjes su zhugs/ /de ni rgyal ba
63b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /ting 'dzin bsam gtan dang ni rab ldan te/ /spros pa thams cad kyi yang rgyu ba med/ /nam mkha' lta bur mnyam pa nyid du gnas/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /'das pa'i dus la de yi
63b2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes zhugs/ /'gro ba sna tshogs rnam 'byed shes pa yi/ /chos rnams kun la sgrib pa med par 'jug /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /ma 'ongs dus na gang dag 'jig rten du/ /'byung bar 'gyur dang 'byung bar
63b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur dang / /sems can zhing dang rgyal ba bshad pa dang / /de dag thams cad sangs rgyas ma lus mkhyen/ /ma 'ongs de la rjes su rab lta zhing / /de bzhin sems can rnams kyi chos kyang mkhyen/ /de'i sems ni
63b4(dkon brtsegs): g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te/ /de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /da ltar lam gang 'jug par 'gyur ba dag /thams cad rgyal bas chags med rab tu mkhyen/ /'dren pa'i spyod yul nam mkha' lta bu ste/ /de ni rgyal
63b5(dkon brtsegs): ba rnams kyi ma 'dres chos/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos ni ma 'dres pa/ /bcwa brgyad gsungs pa bsam gyi mi khyab ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' 'dra bar ni/ /dad mkhas byang chub sems dpa' dad
63b6(dkon brtsegs): par byed/ /shA ri'i bu 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor gyi nang du gshegs
63b7(dkon brtsegs): na seng ge'i sgra yang dag par sgrog cing khyu mchog gi gnas su zhal gyis 'che ste/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par ma bskor ba'i tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu
63b8(dkon brtsegs): bskor to/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di bcus de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par dad/ yid ches/ rab tu rtog /som nyi mi byed/ the tshom mi za/ rgya cher dga' mgu ste/ rangs pa snyed cing /
64a1(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar dang / rmad tu 'du shes skyed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u ste/ /bzhi pa'o// // bam po brgyad pa/ gzhan yang shA ri'i bu de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub
64a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi snod tu rig / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod tu rig /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du rig nas/ /de'i drung du gshegs te byang
64a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i lam yang yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de lta bas na shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang / de ltar dad pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis snod
64a4(dkon brtsegs): tu rig / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod tu rig /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod tu rig gnas/ de'i drung du gshegs te/ byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston pa de ltar rig par bya'o/ /
64a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
64a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
64a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ gang 'di lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / bdud tu bcas pa dang / tshangs par bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze bcas pa'i skye dgu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten
64a8(dkon brtsegs): rang gi mngon par shes pa mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas gnas so/ /de chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/
64b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston to/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po'i nyan thos khrag khrig phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis kyi nyan thos kyi
64b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs chen po byung ste/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ sems thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa sha stag go/ /shA ri'i bu de'i dus na rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya
64b3(dkon brtsegs): ba chos can chos kyi rgyal po zhig byung ngo / /yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba'i grong khyer rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ rgyal po'i gnas 'byor pa/ mod pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ dga' ba/ 'gro
64b4(dkon brtsegs): ba mang ba dang / mis gang ba zhig yod de/ yang shA ri'i bu rgyal po tshe rnam par rgyal ba'i khye'u gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod pa zhes bya ba sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas la bya ba byas pa/ sngon gyi sangs
64b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ /gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ yang shA ri'i bu de'i dus na gzhon nu brtson 'grus
64b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu bskyed mos tshal gyis sar byung bar gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen pos e ma'o gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems
64b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi snod do/ /e ma'o gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod do zhes de ltar rig nas bskyed mos tshal gyi sa ga la ba dang / gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod ga la ba der
64b8(dkon brtsegs): song ste phyin nas steng gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod la byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de la byang chub kyi lam gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang / pha rol
65a1(dkon brtsegs): du phyin pa rnams la brtson pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste/ de ni byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o/ /de la sems can thams cad la byams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' ni sems
65a2(dkon brtsegs): can gyi khams ji tsam de tsam du byams pas khyab par byed do/ /sems can gyi khams ji tsam zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa sems can gyi khams kyang de tsam mo/ /gzhon nu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i khams 'dis khyab par ma gyur pa
65a3(dkon brtsegs): gang yang med do/ /gzhon nu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa 'dis sems can gyi ris na gang khyab par ma gyur ba'i sems can de gang yang med do/ /'di lta ste gzhon nu sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa de bzhin du gzhon
65a4(dkon brtsegs): nu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa bsgom pa yang dpag tu med do/ /gzhon nu de ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas pas sems can mtha' yas sems can mtha' yas pas byams pa mtha' yas so/ /gzhon nu yang sems can
65a5(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams ni ches mang gi sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams ni de lta ma yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang gzhon nu sems can gyi khams tshad med pa ji tsam pa de'i don shes par bya ba'i phyir dpe bstan to/ /gzhon
65a6(dkon brtsegs): nu 'di lta ste/ dper na shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / de bzhin du phyogs mtshams dang / phyogs bcu kun du 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag
65a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa'i rgya mtsho chen po gcig tu gyur pa la yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ de la sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs gzhan
65a8(dkon brtsegs): yang sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mo chu'i thigs pa gnyis blangs/ gzhan yang sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'dus nas/ brgyar btsal ba'i skra'i rtse mos chu'i thigs pa gsum blangs nas
65b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ de lta bu'i thabs kyis chu'i phung po chen po de zad par gyur kyang sems can gyi khams ni tshad dang mtha' med de/ gzhon nu sems can gyi khams de ltar dpag tu med cing mtha' yas pa de thams cad la
65b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems pa'i byams pas khyab par byed do/ /gzhon nu de ji snyam du sems/ gang de ltar dpag tu med pa byams pa sgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i tshad bzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa
65b3(dkon brtsegs): de ni ma lags so/ /gzhon nu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa chen po sgom pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni dpag tu med pa yin te/ gzhon nu de'i byams pa ni bdag srung ba yin/ gzhan la phan par gnas pa yin/ mchog tu
65b4(dkon brtsegs): gnod sems med pa khro ba dang / gnod sems kyi tha ba dang bral ba/ nyes pa 'jom pa rjes su chags pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang bral ba/ dad pa kun du ston pa 'khrul pa thams cad la nyes par lta ba/ yongs su gdung ba med pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems bde
65b5(dkon brtsegs): ba skyed pa/ gzhan gyi gnod par bya ba thams cad tu ma lhung ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba 'phags pa'i lam dang 'thun pa gshe ba dang / khros pa la dang ba skyed pa/ g.yul thams cad las sgrol ba/ dbyig pa dang mtshon cha mi thogs pa/ sems
65b6(dkon brtsegs): can rab tu thar par bya ba la dga' ba/ khong khro ba thams cad dang bral ba/ tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / 'drid pa dang / gzhog pa thams cad dang bral ba/ rang gi rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pas nye bar 'tsho ba/ brgya byin dang /
65b7(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pas phyag byas pa/ rang gi gzi brjid kyi brgyan pa/ mkhas pas bstod pa/ byis pa thams cad rjes su srung ba/ tshangs pa'i lam dang 'thun pa/ 'dod pa'i khams dang ma 'dres pa/ thar pa'i lam gyi gtso bor gyur pa/ theg pa thams cad kyis
65b8(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bzung ba/ zang zing med pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang /
66a1(dkon brtsegs): dpe byad bzang pos yang dag par brgyan pa/ dbang po nyams shing ma tshang ba thams cad spangs pa/ bde 'gro dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i lam thams cad tu 'gro ba/ ngan song thams cad dang /
66a2(dkon brtsegs): mi khom pa brgyad las zlog pa/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa/ 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad dang / dbang po dang / rgyal srid la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad la mnyam
66a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis/ sbyin pa rab tu sbyor ba/ tha dad pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad kyi sgo dang lam/ tshul khrims 'chal pa thams cad kyi skyabs/ bzod pa'i stobs kun
66a4(dkon brtsegs): du ston pa/ nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ mi 'khrugs pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa/ yang dag par sbyor ba'i bya ba sgrol ba/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang /
66a5(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa'i rtsa ba/ nyon mongs pa las byung ba/ sems nges par rtog pa/ thos pa 'dzin pa/ shes rab kyi rgyu skyed pa'i byams pa/ bdag gi phyogs dang gzhan gyi phyogs
66a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jom pa/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i phyogs sel ba/ 'grogs na bde ba/ ldang ba dang / slong ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba'i spyod lam srung bar byed pa/ rgod pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad sel
66a7(dkon brtsegs): ba/ dri zhim po'i byug pa khrel yod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pas byugs pa/ mi khom pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad sel ba'i byams pa/ 'gro ba thams cad skyob pa'i byams pa chen po/ /
66a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi bde ba btang ba dang / sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa ste/ gzhon nu nyan thos rnams kyi byams pa ni bdag skyob pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa ni sems can
66b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la skyob pa'o/ /yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi byams pa ni sems can la dmigs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi byams
66b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni chos la dmigs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa rab tu thob pa rnams kyi byams pa ni dmigs pa med pa'o/ /gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byams pa
66b3(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa de la rab tu gnas pas sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do/ /de la gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po gang zhe na/ gzhon
66b4(dkon brtsegs): nu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na gzhon nu skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba ni
66b5(dkon brtsegs): dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa'o/ /gzhon nu de bzhin du theg pa chen po yang dag par sgrub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngon du 'gro ba ni snying rje chen po'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na gzhon nu 'khor los sgyur ba'i
66b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i rin po che thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni 'khor lo rin po che yin no/ /gzhon nu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba ni
66b7(dkon brtsegs): snying rje chen po yin te/ snying rje chen po de yang sems can thams cad rjes su mi gtong ba'o/ /gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po sems can thams cad la ji ltar 'jug ce na/ gzhon nu
66b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings shing lta bar gyur ba rnam pa mang po chags pa'i sems can mthong na/ de dag gi 'jig tshogs la lta bas bcings pa spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /zhes sems can rnams la
67a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /gzhan yang gzhon nu byang chub sems dpas sems can yang dag pa ma yin pa phyin ci log gi gnas la gnas te/ mi rtag
67a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la rtag par 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa dang / bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa mthong na/ de dag gis
67a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyin ci log spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /yan zhag byang chub sems dpa' phyin ci log gi 'dod pa la
67a4(dkon brtsegs): sred pa'i sems can de dag ma la yang g.yem pa dang / sring mo la yang g.yeng ba mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa
67a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni 'phags pa ma yin pa 'dus pa ste/ mu cor smra bas yongs su gang zhing ngo tsha mi shes pas yongs su gang ngo / /'di ltar ma'i rum mngal gyi mal na 'dug 'dug
67a6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de nyid kyi mngal gyi sgo nas byung la de nyid dang yang lhan cig tu 'dod pa sten par byed pa lta ga la srid/ mngal gcig tu 'dug 'dug pa'i sring mo dang 'du zhing 'khrig
67a7(dkon brtsegs): pa byed pa lta ga la srid de/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni brlag go/ /rnam par brlag go/ /rab tu brlag go/ /'dod chags kyis g.yen spyo'o/ /zhe sdang
67a8(dkon brtsegs): kyis g.yen spyo'o/ /gti mug gis g.yen spyo'o/ /mi shes pas g.yen spyo'o/ /chos las nyams shing chos ma yin pa la gnas so/ /mi mthun pa'i chos la rab tu spyod do/ /
67b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba'i spyod yul pa'o/ /dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod yul pa'o/ /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi spyod yul pa'o/ /log pa'i lam la spyod yul pa'o snyom mo/ /gzhon
67b2(dkon brtsegs): nu 'di lta ste dper na wa dur khrod kyi mthar g.yang sa chen po dang nye ba zhig na mtshan mo khyis gtses nas g.yang sa chen po nas lhung ba de bzhin du gzhon nu sems can 'di dag kyang wa dang 'dra'o/ /gzhon
67b3(dkon brtsegs): nu 'di lta ste/ dper na dmus long khyis gtses nas g.yang sa chen po dang nye bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ kye ma'o gzhon nu sems can 'di dag kyang dmus long dang 'dra'o/ /gzhon nu 'di lta
67b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na phag ni mi gtsang ba za zhing mi gtsang ba spyod yul pa ste/ gzhon nu kye ma'o de bzhin du sems can 'di dag kyang phag dang 'dra ste/ de nyid ma yin/ de nyid sring mo yin na/
67b5(dkon brtsegs): de chung mar bya ba lta ga la srid snyam ste/ sems can nyon mongs pas g.yen spyo ba dang / bdud kyi phyogs kyi spyod yul ba dang / bdud kyi zhags pas bcings pa dang / 'dod pa'i
67b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dam du bying ba de dag gi 'dod pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to/ /zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub
67b7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpas sgrib pa lngas sgribs pa'i sems can 'dod pa'i zug rngus zug pa mthong na/ skye mched drug la chags shing zhen pa/ mig gis gzugs mthong na/ mtshan mar 'dzin
67b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur zhing mngon rtags su 'dzin pa dang / rna bas sgra/ snas dri/ lces ro/ lus kyis reg pa la reg na mtshan mar 'dzin cing mngon rtags su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag
68a1(dkon brtsegs): ni khong khro ba mang zhing phan tshun mi mdza' ste/ de dag don rnyed pa'i phyir ni mdza' bor yang mi shes/ gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ni gcig la gcig gsod do/ /kye ma'o sems can
68a2(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni gnyid dang rmugs pa mang ba ste/ zhen cing spong ba mi shes pa'i ling tog gi khebs shing mi dge ba'o/ /kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'gyod pas kun nas bskor ba ste/ blo bur gyi
68a3(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pas sems kun nas nyon mongs pa'o/ /kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni the tshom gyis yongs su dkris pa chos zab mo la nges par ma gyur pa ste/ de dag gi sgrib pa thams cad spang
68a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can nga rgyal gyis non pa/ che ba'i
68a5(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal gyis non pa/ nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal gyis non pa/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gis non pa/ cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/
68a6(dkon brtsegs): log pa'i nga rgyal gyis non pa/ dma' ba bas bdag mtho bar sems pa/ mtshungs pa bas kyang bdag ches lhag par lta ba de dag gzugs la bdag ces khas len pa nas/ rnam par
68a7(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i bar la bdag ces khas len pa/ khong du ma chud par khong du chud snyam du shes pa/ gus par smra bar 'os pa la gus par mi smra ba/ phyag bya bar 'os pa la phyag mi
68a8(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal pa/ rgan pa dang / gzhon pa la mi 'dud pa/ bla ma la rim gro mi byed pa/ mkhas pa la dge ba gang / mi dge ba gang / bsten par bya ba gang / bsten par mi bya ba gang /
68b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba gang / mi bya ba gang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang / kha na ma tho ba med pa gang / lam gang / ting nge 'dzin gang / rnam par grol ba gang zhes mi 'dri ba dang / bdag nyid la bdag ni gtso bo'o/ /bdag ni
68b2(dkon brtsegs): mchog go snyam du rlom sems su byed pa mthong na 'di ltar nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /gzhon nu gzhan
68b3(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpas sred pa'i bcing pas bcings pa/ sred pas 'khol ba/ chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mos zin pa/ gnod pas zin pa/ don med pas zin pa/ 'khor ba'i gtan zin pa/ sems can
68b4(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyis zin pa/ srid pa'i bcing bas zin pa/ rang nyam med pa/ rang dbang med pa'i sems can mthong na/ de dag rang nyam dang /
68b5(dkon brtsegs): rang dbang dang / gang du dga' bar 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /gzhon nu gzhan
68b6(dkon brtsegs): yang byang chub sems dpas dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/ sdig pa'i grogs pos 'khol ba de dag sdig pa'i grogs pos non pas mi dge ba'i las la chags pa 'di lta ste/ srog gcod pa dang /
68b7(dkon brtsegs): ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal ba dang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba'i sems can
68b8(dkon brtsegs): mthong na 'di ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsdu ba dang / mi dge ba'i las las bzlog pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bzung ste/ spyod par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la
69a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas gti mug gis bsgribs pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag gi ling tog gis kun tu bsgribs pa/
69a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed bu dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / ngar 'dzin pa/ nga yir 'dzin
69a3(dkon brtsegs): p a la mngon par chags pa'i sems can mthong na de dag 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyangs zhing lta bar gyur pa thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la byang chub
69a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas 'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can mthong na de dag phung po lnga'i gshed ma las rab tu
69a5(dkon brtsegs): thar par bya ba dang / 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rab tu bzla ba dang / khams gsum thams cad las gdon pa'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la
69a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /gzhon nu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas sems can 'khrugs par gyur pa/ rtswa mun dza dang / bal ba dza
69a7(dkon brtsegs): lta bu mi drang ba drang ba ltar 'chos pa/ 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du/ 'jig rten pha rol nas 'jig rten 'dir kun du rgyug cing 'khor ba/ 'gro ba lngar
69a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba la phyogs pa/ mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba la phyir bltas pa mthong na de dag gi mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo dbye ba'i phyir chos bstan to zhes sems can rnams la
69b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /gzhon nu de ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi khams mthong na rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gis snying rje chen po 'jug go/ /
69b2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang g.yo ba med par 'jug go/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa las shin du byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang mnyam par 'jug
69b3(dkon brtsegs): go/ /lam las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang drang po bcos ma ma yin par 'jug go/ /sems gya gyu med pa'i sems las shin du gnas pa las byung
69b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang gya gyu med par 'jug go/ /'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la 'dud pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba las shin du byung ba'i phyir
69b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i snying rje chen po de yang bdag gi bde ba gtong bar 'jug go/ /'di lta ste/ bdag gi sems yongs su dag pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang
69b6(dkon brtsegs): pha rol rjes su srung bar 'jug go/ /'di lta ste/ g.yo zhing 'gul ba'i sems dang bral ba rab tu gnas pa'i sems las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje
69b7(dkon brtsegs): chen po de yang shes rab brtan par 'jug go/ /'di lta ste/ pha rol la bde ba sbyin pa las rab tu byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang bdag gi bde ba gtong
69b8(dkon brtsegs): bar 'jug go/ /brtson 'grus brtan pa las byung ba'i phyir de'i snying rje chen po de yang sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer bar 'jug go/ /gzhon nu
70a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po ni rnam pa 'di dag dang gzhan yang rnam pa bcus 'jug go/ /gzhon nu 'di ltar gang la la theg pa chen pos
70a2(dkon brtsegs): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang snying rje chen pos 'byung ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/ /sbyin pa byed pa dang / tshul khrims byed pa dang /
70a3(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa byed pa dang / brtson 'grus byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed pa dang / shes rab byed pa ni snying rje chen po zhes bya ste/ de'i phyir snying rje chen po
70a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa byed pa dang / yang dag par spong bar byed pas snying rje chen po'o/ /dbang po dang / stobs dang / /byang chub kyi yan
70a5(dkon brtsegs): lag dang / lam dang / mchog tu dga' ba'i rtsa ba'i las dang / mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / tshig de dag
70a6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang rgyas par bya'o/ /snying rje chen po ni rang byung gi ye shes sgrub par byed pas na de'i phyir snying rje chen po zhes bya'o/ /rang gi bya ba dang / legs par byed pa'i bya ba dang / mi
70a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba'i bya ba dang / sems can thams cad la bya ba ci yod snyam pa ste/ de'i snying rje chen po de yang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pas
70a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i snying rje chen po zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje de dang ldan pas sems can 'di 'dra ba'i gnas
70b1(dkon brtsegs): thob pa mthong na de dag la snying brtse ba dang snying rje'i sems bskyed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang dge ba'i chos rnams dran pa dang / rjes su dran pa dang /
70b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dge ba'i chos la mi zhum pa dang / mi 'god pa dang / yongs su mi skyo ba dang / mi dga' ba thams cad spong ba dang / chos
70b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la dga' bar gnas pa dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / lus rab tu sim pa dang / blo rab tu dga' ba dang / yid rab tu mgu ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
70b4(dkon brtsegs): sku la mngon par dga' zhing mos pa dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan kun du tshol ba la dga' ba dang / chos nyan pas yongs su mi skyo zhing dga' ba dang / chos kyi phyir 'brang
70b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nan tan la rab tu dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i chos la mgu ba dang / sems can rnams la khong khro ba med pa dang / byang chub la dga' ba dang / chos rgya chen
70b6(dkon brtsegs): po la mos pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i theg pa sel bar sems bskyed pa dang / ser sna tshar gcod pa dang / slong ba la dga' ba dang / gtong ba la rab tu dga' ba dang /
70b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'chal ba dag sdud cing byams pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa la rtag tu dad pa dang / bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ngan 'gro dang /
70b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu 'da' bar dbugs 'byin pa la rab tu dga' ba dang / pha rol ngan du zer ba dang / ngan par brjod pa'i tshig gi lam bzod cing rab tu dga' ba dang /
71a1(dkon brtsegs): lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang mgo bcad kyang bzod par nus te/ sems mi nyams shing rab tu dga' ba dang / rgan rabs la 'dud cing zhe sa byed pa la dga' ba dang / rtag tu bzhin
71a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa la dga' ba dang / khro gnyer med cing gsong por smra ba la dga' ba dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / gzhog slongs med pa la rab tu dga' ba dang / snying po dang ldan pa'i chos
71a3(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug par rab tu dga' ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' la ston pa bzhin du phangs pa dang / chos la bdag bzhin du phangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la srog bzhin du phangs pa dang
71a4(dkon brtsegs): bla ma la pha ma bzhi du phangs pa dang / sems can thams cad la bu bzhin du phangs pa dang / slob dpon la mig bzhin du phangs pa dang / nan tan la yan lag gi dam pa mgo bzhin du
71a5(dkon brtsegs): phangs pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa la lag pa dang / rkang pa bzhin du phangs pa dang / chos smra ba la rin po che thams cad bzhin du phangs pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba la
71a6(dkon brtsegs): sman bzhin du phangs pa dang / skul zhing dran par byed pa la sman pa bzhin du phangs par sems pa'o/ gzhon nu 'di ni dga' ba zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
71a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po dga' ba de la rab tu gnas nas rtag tu chos tshol ba la dga' bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa la mi skyo 'o/ de la byang chub
71a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms gang zhe na/ btang snyoms rnam pa gsum ste/ rnam pa gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyon mongs pa la btang snyoms pa dang /
71b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang gzhan rjes su bsrung ba'i btang snyoms pa dang / dus dang dus ma yin par btang snyoms pa'o/ /de la nyon mongs pa'i btang snyoms pa gang zhe na/ gang
71b2(dkon brtsegs): bkur sti byas kyang mthor mi sems pa dang / bkur sti ma byas kyang dma' bar mi sems pa dang / rnyed pas snyems pa med pa dang / ma rnyed pas yi mi 'chad pa dang /
71b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa la blo mnyam pa dang / grags pa la dga' ba med pa dang / ma grags pa la zhum pa med pa dang / smad pa la yid mi gsod pa dang / bstod pa la
71b4(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid du shin tu gnas pa dang / sdug bsngal so sor rtog pa'i stobs dang / bde ba la mi rtag par rtog pa'i stobs dang / rjes su chags pa 'dor ba dang / khong
71b5(dkon brtsegs): khro ba spong ba dang / mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba la sems mnyam pa dang / legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa la gnyis su mi 'byed pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa
71b6(dkon brtsegs): la mi lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la dga' ba bya ba med pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / mi snyan par smra ba la rjes su chags pa dang /
71b7(dkon brtsegs): khong khro ba med pa dang / kun myang ba'i nyes pa la mtshungs par yongs su 'jal ba dang / bdag dang sems can gzhan la bsam pa mnyam pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta
71b8(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / sems can rab 'bring tha ma la 'od zer mnyam pa dang / bsngags pa dang ma bsngags pa la chos nyid mnyam pa dang / bden pa dang / mi bden pa la bdag gi bden
72a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yongs su dag pa ste/ gzhon nu 'di ltar gang bdag la gnod par byed pa de la byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms pa yin no/ /de la bdag dang gzhan rjes su
72a2(dkon brtsegs): srung ba'i btang snyoms gang zhe na/ gang yan lag dang nying lag gi sha bcad kyang btang snyoms pa yin no/ /yan lag dang nying lag gi sha bcad kyang / 'dod pa
72a3(dkon brtsegs): med cing tshol ba med de btang snyoms pa yin no/ /lus kyang mi 'gyur/ ngag kyang mi 'gyur te/ gnyis ga bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o/ /mig gi
72a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pas ma yin/ gzugs kyi rnam pas ma yin te/ gnyis gas kyang rma mi phyin pa nas/ yid kyi rnam pa dang / chos kyi rnam pa'i bar gyis rma mi phyin pas de'i phyir
72a5(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms shes bya'o/ /rma mi phyin cing snang ba med pas de'i phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o/ /rma phyung ba la rma mi 'byin pas de'i 'byin pas de'i phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o/ /
72a6(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang pha rol gnyis ga las bzod pas de'i phyir btang snyoms shes bya'o/ /phan par byed pa dang / phan par mi byed pa la mnyam par sbyor bas de'i phyir btang snyoms
72a7(dkon brtsegs): shes bya'o/ /btang snyoms ni rtsod pa med pa lhur byed pa'o/ /btang snyoms ni rang gi sems nges par rtog pa'o/ /btang snyoms ni bdag la so sor rtog pa'o/ /
72a8(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms ni gzhan la gnod pa med pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi btang snyoms ni mnyam par bzhag pa'i dngos po ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
72b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la btang snyoms pa gnang bar mi mdzad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpas rtag tu 'bad par bya'o/ /rtag par rgyun mi
72b2(dkon brtsegs): 'chad par dge ba yongs su btsal ba la brtson par bya ste/ dus dus su btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/ /de la dus dus su btang snyoms bsgom pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
72b3(dkon brtsegs): snod ma yin pa'i sems can la btang snyoms pa dang / bsnyen bkur mi byed pa la btang snyoms pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / smad pa dang / ma grags pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la
72b4(dkon brtsegs): btang snyoms pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg par nges par 'gyur ba la zhugs pa rnams la btang snyoms dang / sbyin pa'i dus na tshul khrims nye bar btang snyoms pa dang / tshul
72b5(dkon brtsegs): khrims kyi dus na sbyin pa nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / bzod pa'i dus na sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / brtson 'grus nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
72b6(dkon brtsegs): dus na tshul khrims kyi rjes su 'jug pa btang snyoms pa dang / bsam gtan gyi dus na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa dang / shes rab kyi dus na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la
72b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa nye bar sgrub pa btang snyoms pa ste/ 'di ni dus dus su btang snyoms pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar gang mi bya ba'i chos mi byed pa 'di ni btang snyoms shes bya ste/ de la
72b8(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mi dge ba'i phyogs thams cad la btang snyoms su byed do/ /gzhon nu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems can
73a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms shes bya'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen po des bzhon nu brtson
73a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus spyod la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / /btang snyoms mdor bstan pa dang bcas/ /rgyas par bstan pa dang bcas te/ rgya tshar yang dag par bstan to/ /
73a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu brtson 'grus spyod des de thos nas pha rol du phyin pa la brtson 'grus brtsams par gyur to/ /byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi le'u ste/
73a4(dkon brtsegs): lnga pa'o// // de la shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la brtson pa gang zhe na/ /shA ri'i bu pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid yin te/ /gang
73a5(dkon brtsegs): pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di dag la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do/ /drug gang zhe na/ /'di lta ste/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol du
73a6(dkon brtsegs): phyin pa dang / /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / /bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / /bsam gtan
73a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / /shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ste/ /de dag ni pha rol du phyin pa drug rnams so/ /de la sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa gang zhe na/
73a8(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni dge sbyong dang / /bram ze dang / phongs pa rnams kyi sbyin bdag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ /zas kyis phongs pa la zas/ /skom gyis phongs pa la skom
73b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhon pa dang / /gos dang / /spos dang / phreng ba dang / /byug pa dang / /gnas dang / /yo byad dang / /na ba'i gsos sman dang / /mar me dang / /sil snyan dang / bran pho
73b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / /bran mo dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / /mu tig dang / /bai dUr+ya dang / /dung dang / /man shel dang / byi ru dang / /rin po che thams cad dang / /rta dang /
73b3(dkon brtsegs): glang po che dang / /shing rta dang / /bskyed mos tshal dang / /dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / /chung ma dang / /nor dang / /'bru dang / mdzod dang / /bang ba
73b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / /gling bzhi'i rgyal po'i longs spyod kyi bde ba thams cad dang / /rtse ba dang / /dga' ba thams cad dang / /lag pa dang / /rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / mig dang /
73b5(dkon brtsegs): mgo dang / /sha dang / khrag dang / /rkang dang / /rus pa dang / /'jig rten gyi yo byad gang yang slong ba la yongs su mi gtong ba med do/ /sbyin pa de rnam pa bcus yongs su dag
73b6(dkon brtsegs): par sbyin par byed de/ /bcu gang zhe na/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi mthun pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol zhing sbyin pa med/ /byang chub sems dpa'
73b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la sems can la gnod pa'i sbyin pa med/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jigs shing skrag nas sbyin pa med/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
73b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma btang ba la 'gron du gnyer ba'i sbyin pa med/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdong du lta zhing sbyin pa med/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can
74a1(dkon brtsegs): la tha dad par sbyin pa med/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mdza' bas sbyin pa med/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sdang bas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la zhing
74a2(dkon brtsegs): tshol zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sems can thams cad la sbyin gnas ma yin zhes brnyas shing sbyin pa med de/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus
74a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin pa byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ /
74a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dod cing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bsam pa log par sbyin pa med/ byang chub
74a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams la yongs su skyo ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nye bar bstan nas sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
74a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su mi dga' ba'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'gyod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshul khrims dang ldan
74a7(dkon brtsegs): pa la bkur sti sbyin pa med/ tshul khrims 'chal ba la brnyas te sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rnam par smin pa re ba'i sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu
74a8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus
