74b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par sbyin pa byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smad nas sbyin pa med/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzhan du phyogs nas sbyin pa med/
74b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nyon mongs shing sbyin pa med/ khro ba dang / phrag dog dang / gnod sems ston cing sbyin pa med/ ri mor mi byed par sbyin pa med/ rang
74b3(dkon brtsegs): gi lag nas ma yin pa med/ ci tsam dpags pa las dbri zhing sbyin pa med/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la skye ba 'dod cing sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub
74b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed do/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag
74b5(dkon brtsegs): par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mi brtan par sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la tshod 'dzin cing sbyin pa med/ yongs su
74b6(dkon brtsegs): chad par sbyin pa med/ gzhan gyi dring 'jog ste sbyin pa med/ nyung zhes cung zad tsam sbyin pa med/ gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / dbang phyug la mngon par dga' ba'i sbyin pa
74b7(dkon brtsegs): med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / lhar skye ba thams cad 'dod pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
74b8(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bsngo zhing sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mkhas pas smad pa'i sbyin pa med/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thams cad mkhyen par ma sngos
75a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sbyin pa med de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa de rnam pa de bcus yongs su dag par sbyin pa byed do/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin
75a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de gzhan rnam pa bcus yongs su dag par sbyin par byed de/ bcu gang zhe na/ ji tsam 'dus byas las nges par 'byung ba dang / 'dus ma byas thob par bya ba'i phyir de ltar
75a3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa byin na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ bza' ba byin pas tshe dang / spobs pa dang / bde ba dang /
75a4(dkon brtsegs): stobs dang / kha dog phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /btung ba byin pas nyon mongs pa dang / sred pa thams cad bsal ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /gzhon
75a5(dkon brtsegs): pa byin pas bde ba thams cad kyi dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /bgo ba byin pas khrel yod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / gser ltar kha dog yongs su dag
75a6(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /spos dang phreng ba byin pas tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dri dang / byug pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu
75a7(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bo/ /dri rab tu zhim pa'i spos dang / phye ma dang / byug pa byin pas lus kyi nan tan gyi dri zhim po phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /ro byin pas ro bro
75a8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i nang na mchog gi ro bro ba'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /gnas byin pas sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang / rten dang /
75b1(dkon brtsegs): gling dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /nad pa la sman byin pas mi rga mi 'chi shi ba med pa'i bde ba yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa
75b2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'thob bo/ /yo byad sna tshogs byin pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi yo byad yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
75b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i de ltar sbyin pa byin na sbyin pa'i phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phan yon gzhan bcu rab tu
75b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thob bo/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mar me byin pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan lnga yongs su dag pa phun tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /sil snyan byin pas lha'i
75b5(dkon brtsegs): rna ba yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / rin po che
75b6(dkon brtsegs): thams cad byin pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /rin po che tha dad pa sna tshogs dang / me tog sna
75b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs byin pas dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /rta dang / glang po che dang / shing rta byin pas rgyas pa dang / yangs pa dang /
75b8(dkon brtsegs): che ba phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /bskyed mos tshal dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal byin pas bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
76a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba byin pas chos rin po che thams cad kyi mdzod yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa
76a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'thob bo/ /bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa'i mi byin pas rang nyam dang / rang dbang dang / /rang byung gi ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /bu pho dang / bu mo byin pa sa mdza' ba dang /
76a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug pa dang / 'dod pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /gling bzhi'i rgyal po'i longs spyod thams cad byin pas byang chub sems dpa'
76a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /shA ri'i bu phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
76a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na phan yon gzhan yang bcu 'thob bo/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga byin pas tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba
76a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /dga' ba'i rtsad mo thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pas dam pa'i chos kyi dga' ba dang / rtse ba
76a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /rkang pa byin pas chos kyi don gyi rkang pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /lag pa byin pas sems can thams cad la
76a8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi lag par rab tu sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /rna ba dang / sna byin pas dbang po ma tshang ba med cing yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /yan lag dang nying
76b1(dkon brtsegs): lag byin pas kha na ma tho ba med cing mdzes pa'i yan lag sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /mig byin pas sems can thams cad la chos kyi mig mi sgrib pa yongs su dag pa
76b2(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /sha dang khrag byin pas sems can thams cad kyi lus dang srog snying po med pa las snying po len pas nye bar 'tsho ba la mkhas pa phun sum tshogs par rab tu 'thob bo/ /rkang byin pas
76b3(dkon brtsegs): rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa'i lus 'thob pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /yan lag gi dam pa mgo byin pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog bla na med cing ltag na med
76b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'thob ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub 'dod pas de ltar sbyin pa byin na 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
76b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa'i phan yon de dag yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa zab pa shes rab kyi snang ba ni 'jig rten gyi zang zing gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
76b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub 'dod/ bdud rtsi 'dod/ snying po 'dod/ byang chub 'dod de/ yang shA ri'i bu mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te/
76b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa na 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba gang yang med do/ /'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu khyim bdag chun pa zhing skam sa la gnas nas ba lang dang /
76b8(dkon brtsegs): gnam sdong ma yin pa'i zhing gi rmo brko rdzogs par byas te/ sa bon btab nas rnam grangs 'dis gshol gyis 'tsho bas gser dang / dngul yang 'grub bo/ /dngos po sna tshogs gzhan yang
77a1(dkon brtsegs): 'grub bo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'bru dang mtshungs pa'i nor med do/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi zang
77a2(dkon brtsegs): zing la gnas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dus dang tshod yod do/ /'di lta ste/ shA ri'i bu bas
77a3(dkon brtsegs): rtswa skam po dang / gsher ba zos pa dang / chu grang mo dang / dron mo 'thungs pa de las 'o ma 'grub ste/ zho dang / mar sar pa dang / mar gyi snying po yang 'grub bo/ /
77a4(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas te/ 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pa na/ de
77a5(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dod kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang yongs su 'grub bo/ /brgya byin dang / tshangs pa yang 'grub bo/ /gnas de gsum yongs su grub nas byang chub sems
77a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sa bcu yongs su 'grub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi yang yongs su 'grub bo/ /las stong gis grub pa'i sangs rgyas
77a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad rnams kyang yongs su 'grub bo/ /las stong gis 'grub pa'i rnam pa drug bcu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs
77a8(dkon brtsegs): su 'grub bo/ /las brgyas 'grub pa'i skyes bu chen po'am mtshan gcig yongs su 'grub bo/ /las nyis brgyas 'grub pa'i gtsug tor spyi bor 'grub bo/ /rnam
77b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang yon tan brgyas yongs su rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dung chen po yang 'grub bo/ /rnam pa bye ba dang / yon tan brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa'i tshegs kyi phreng
77b2(dkon brtsegs): ba thags bzang ba/ phrag med pa snyoms shing dkar ba yang yongs su 'grub ste/ da ltar shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i las gyi 'bras
77b3(dkon brtsegs): bu rnam par smin pas mngon par 'grub bo/ /yang shA ri'i bu gang byams pa'i sems skyed ni slong ba la sbyin pa byin pa de ni gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed tu sems bskyed pas sangs rgyas
77b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi ting nge 'dzin rgyun mi 'chad pa gcig 'grub ste/ ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ba spu'i
77b5(dkon brtsegs): bu ga re re nas ting nge 'dzin brgya gang gA'i rgyun ltar mngon par sprul pa mdzad de/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba thams cad la dbang thob pa'o/ /
77b6(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu gang 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'jig rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pas yongs
77b7(dkon brtsegs): su bzung ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mi 'chi ba 'dod pa dang / byang chub 'dod pa dang / /mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod
77b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ni 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas nas bla na med
78a1(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rig par gyis shig / shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs
78a2(dkon brtsegs): med pa shin du grangs med pa/ tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
78a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos mos zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha
78a4(dkon brtsegs): dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo / /yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos kyi tshe'i tshad ni
78a5(dkon brtsegs): lo stong phrag bcur gyur to/ /yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos de'i dge slong stong phrag brgya ni dgra bcom pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas/ sems
78a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa'i bar du ste/ dgra bcom pa sha stag gi 'dus pa chen po byung ngo / /shA ri'i bu de'i tshe tha ga pa zhes bya ba thags 'thag pa/ gzugs bzang
78a7(dkon brtsegs): ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog bzang zhing rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos gang na bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs de nas ha cang yang
78a8(dkon brtsegs): mi ring ba'i sa phyogs zhig na rang gi las byed do/ /de nyin par las byas nas nub kar khyim du 'gro ba'i tshe rtag tu dus thams cad tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos mos
78b1(dkon brtsegs): de'i drung du 'ongs nas ras kyi kha tshar gcig 'bul cing 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bsdu ba'i gnas kyis bdag bcom ldan 'das la ras kyi kha tshar phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
78b2(dkon brtsegs): d es bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bsdu ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces des rim gyis ras kyi kha tshar stong lnga brgya phul
78b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ des bskal pa bye ba phrag bcwa lngar ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma song ngo / /dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bye ba phrag stong myong ngo / /de dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis brgya byin gyis
78b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag po bye ba phrag stong myong ngo / /dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jam pa yid du 'ong ba dang po pa'i las de nyid kyis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes par byas te/ des thams cad la me tog dang / bdug pa dang /
78b5(dkon brtsegs): spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos dang / zhal zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis sti stang
78b6(dkon brtsegs): byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas nas mchod do/ /de phyis bskal pa grangs med pa zhig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs
78b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de lo bye ba phrag nyi shu'i bar du gnas so/ /de'i dgra bcom pa
78b8(dkon brtsegs): bye ba khrag khrig phrag nyi shu zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas/ sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa'i bar gyi nyan thos 'dus pa chen po byung ngo / /
79a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag lnga yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do/ /des chos bstan te sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa'i don byas nas yongs su mya ngan las
79a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das so/ /der bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ lo stong gi bar du dam pa'i chos gnas so/ /de'i sku gdung yang rgyas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na shA ri'i bu nga da yongs su
79a3(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bu ras kyi kha tshar phul ba dang / sems bskyed pas kyang mthar gyis sangs rgyas kyis chos yongs su rdzogs pa la ltos/ shA ri'i bu sems
79a4(dkon brtsegs): ni rgya che'i sbyin pa ni ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu gal te sbyin pa rgya che la sems kyis ma yin na ni sbyin bdag rtsub mo zhes bya ba ltar 'gyur te/ des sbyin pa de snyed byin yang sems yongs su ma sbyangs so/ /
79a5(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi zang zing la gnas te/ thams cad yongs su thob par gyur pa la ltos/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni sbyin pa nyung ngu yang mang por byed do/
79a6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis stobs kyis lhag par byed do/ /shes rab kyi stobs kyis rgyas par byed do/ /bsngo ba'i stobs kyis dpag tu med par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi don de nyid
79a7(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gzugs 'dod phyir ni sbyin pa sbyin mi byed/ longs spyod mtho ris 'dod phyir ma yin gyi/ bla na med
79a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas mchog 'dod phyir/ de phyir sbyin pa chung yang du mar 'gyur/ grags dang brjod pa dag dang sgra dag dang / g.yog dang bde ba nam yang mi 'dod cing / 'chi 'pho
79b1(dkon brtsegs): skye ba kun kyang mi 'dod de/ de phyir sbyin nyung 'bras bu chen por 'gyur/ zas dang skom dang chos gos gang sbyin pa/ srid pa'i 'gro ba 'dod phyir ma yin te/ sbyin pas 'chi bar med pa'i sgo btsal phyir/ de ni skra rtse
79b2(dkon brtsegs): tsam yang sbyin pa sbyin/ 'phyar ba med cing khengs pa med par 'gyur/ g.yo dang ser sna dag ni thams cad spong / de dag le lo nam yang yod min te/ de ltar de dag 'jig rten phan phyir spro/ rgyal po'i srid dang
79b3(dkon brtsegs): nor dang 'bru srog gtong / de dag sems ni gzhan du mi 'gyur te/ byin nas dga' ba chen po rnyed par 'gyur/ sbyin zhing gtong la byang chub rnyed mi dka'/ pha dang ma dang bu ni sdug par ltar/ slong dang 'jig rten
79b4(dkon brtsegs): kun la de bzhin te/ gang gis byang chub spyod mchog spyad pa rnams/ sbyin tshe rtag tu phrag dog med par 'gyur/ de dag mthong na mi khro ste/ ji ltar sngon gyi bzhin du smra/ mi mdza' dag dang rtag mdza'
79b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing / skrag pa rnams la 'jigs med sbyin/ de la dngos po gang yod pa/ slong ba la ni sri ba med/ chos 'dod par ni rtag 'gyur te/ rgyal srid 'dod par mi 'gyur ro/ /'byung bar rtag tu smra byed cing / chos
79b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi sbyin pa 'ang sbyin par byed/ 'dod la rkam pa ma gtogs par/ su zhig rgyal srid 'dod par 'gyur/ 'dod pa'i rgyal srid mi 'dod cing / mtho ris bde ba 'dod ma yin/ sangs rgyas byang chub yongs
79b7(dkon brtsegs): tshol zhing / grags pa chen po sbyin pa sbyin/ bdag dang nor rdzas gzhan dag kyang / mang po myur du gtong ba ni/ de dag byang chub dam pa'i mchog /nam yang gtong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mkhas pa gzugs ni mi
79b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod do/ /longs spyod dag kyang 'dod ma yin/ mtho ris dag kyang de mi 'dod/ mya ngan 'da' ba 'ang 'dod ma yin/ lam shes lam la mkhas pa dag /gang dag bshes par gyur pa la/ brten pa dag tu
80a1(dkon brtsegs): mi byed de/ srid pa med pa 'dod par 'gyur/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub kyi
80a2(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa spyod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste/ drug pa'o// // bam po dgu pa/ /de la gang la brtson pas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
80a3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di gsum ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi legs par spyod pa ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang / ngag gis legs par
80a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa'o/ /de la lus kyis legs par spyod pa gang zhe na/ 'di la shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni/ srog gcod pa spangs pa yin/ ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin/ 'dod pa la
80a5(dkon brtsegs): log par g.yem pa spangs pa yin te/ 'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni/ brdzun du sma ba spangs pa yin/ phra ma dang ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa spangs
80a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ 'di ni ngag gis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni/ brnab sems med/ gnod sems med cing / yang dag par lta ba yin te/ 'di ni yid kyis legs
80a7(dkon brtsegs): par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa gang / ngag gis legs par spyod pa gang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa gang / gang yin snyam mo/ /de yang 'di snyam du sems
80a8(dkon brtsegs): te/ lus kyi las gang / srog gcod pa dang / ma byin pa len pa dang / 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa ma byas pa de ni/ lus kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de la ngag gis legs par spyod pa
80b1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ ngag gis las gang brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang tshigs kyal pa ma smras pa de ni/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /snyam mo de la yid kyis
80b2(dkon brtsegs): legs par spyod pa gang zhe na/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ yid kyis las gang / brnab sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba ma byas pa de ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa zhes bya'o/ /snyam mo/ /de 'di ltar
80b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin du so sor rtog ste/ las gang lus kyis ma byas pa dang / las gang ngag dang / yid kyis ma byas pa de ci gdags par nus sam/ de 'di ltar tshul bzhin gyis/ rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/
80b4(dkon brtsegs): las gang lus kyis ma byas pa dang / las gang ngag dang yid kyis ma byas pa de sngon po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ leb rgan nam/ shel gyi kha dog tu gdags par mi nus te/ mig gis
80b5(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya ba ma yin/ rna bas shes par bya ba ma yin/ snas shes par bya ba ma yin/ lces shes par bya ba ma yin/ lus kyis shes par bya ba ma yin/ yid kyis shes par bya ba ma yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
80b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar de ni skyes pa ma yin/ bskyed pa ma yin/ byung ba ma yin/ zin pa ma yin te/ de ni las gang gis kyang shes par bya ba ma yin no/ /de 'di snyam du sems te/ tshul khrims de ni/ gang mngon par 'dus ma byas
80b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o/ /gang mngon par 'dus mi byed pa de la gdags pa yang med do/ /gang gdags pa med pa/ de la bdag mngon par chags par mi bya'o/ /snyam nas/ de 'di ltar legs par spyad pa'i tshul khrims kyang yang dag
80b8(dkon brtsegs): par rjes su mi mthong / gang gi tshul khrims de dang / tshul khrims de gang du bsngo ba/ de yang yang dag par rdzes su mi mthong ngo / /de de ltar mthong bas/ 'jigs tshogs la lta ba gang gis/ tshul khrims sam/
81a1(dkon brtsegs): 'chal pa'i tshul khrims la/ so sor rtog par 'gyur ba'i 'jigs tshogs la lta ba mi slong ngo / de de ltar mthong bas sdoms pa dang / cho ga dang / spyod pa dang / spyod yul shes bzhin du spyod par 'gyur te/ shes
81a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du spyod pas tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/ /de bdag tu dmigs shing mi spyod/ pha rol tu dmigs shing mi spyod de/ de tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin pa yin no/ /bdag tu
81a3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs na tshul khrims su dmigs par 'gyur gyi/ gang bdag tu mi dmigs pa de ni tshul khrims su mi dmigs so/ /gang tshul khrims su mi dmigs pa de ni bslab pa nyams par mi byed do/ /gang slab pa nyams
81a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi byed pa de tshul khrims nyams par mi byed de/ tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin to/ /ci'i phyir mchog tu mi 'dzin ce na/ des gzhan las chos thams cad shes so/ /gzhan gang yin pa de la bdag med do/ /gang bdag
81a5(dkon brtsegs): med pa de la ci zhig yongs su gzung bar bya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /lus kyis dag cing ngag gis dag pa dang / yid kyis dag cing rtag tu spyod pa dag /dag pa'i
81a6(dkon brtsegs): brtul zhugs la ni rtag gnas pa/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims ldan/ shin du bzang po'i las lam bcu po 'di/ gang dag srung ba byang chub sems dpa' mkhas/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gang ma byas/
81a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni mkhas pa tshul khrims ldan zhes bya/ gang dag ma byas ma skyed mi len pa/ de la kha dog med cing dbyibs kyang med/ gang la kha dog med cing dbyibs med pa/ de la gdags pa nam yang mi dmigs so/ /rtag tu tshul
81a8(dkon brtsegs): khrims ma byas 'dus ma byas/ de ni mig gis blta bar mi nus te/ rna ba sna dang lce yid shes ma yin/ lus dang yid kyis shes par bya ma yin/ gang de dbang pos shes par mi nus pa/ de la snying rje 'jug pa nus ma
81b1(dkon brtsegs): yin/ de ltar tshul khrims yongs dag mthong ba de/ nam yang tshul khrims dmigs par mi gnas so/ /tshul khrims ldan zhes yid kyis mi snyems shing / bdag tu 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims mi srung ste/ tshul khrims srung yang
81b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims 'du shes med/ de ni khrims ldan byang chub spyad spyod pa/ 'jig tshogs la ni lta ba gang sel ba/ de ni lta bar nam du 'ang mi 'gyur ro/ /gang la lta med de la gnas med de/ tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul
81b3(dkon brtsegs): khrims de mi snyems/ chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa kun srung ba/ de yi cho ga bsam du med par 'gyur/ rab tu 'byung zhing rab tu bsrungs pa ni/ tshul khrims ldan te gzhan la rtsod mi byed/ bdag med 'du shes tshul
81b4(dkon brtsegs): khrims mi dmigs te/ bdag med de la tshul khrims dmigs pa 'ang med/ bdag dang de bzhin tshul khrims gang snyems pa/ rtag tu 'jig pa'i mtha' zhes ngas bshad do/ /bdag med smra ba tshul khrims mi sems te/
81b5(dkon brtsegs): bdag med smra ba tshul khrims gnas ma yin/ bdag med smra ba tshul khrims mi sems te/ bdag med smra ba tshul khrims rtog ma yin/ tshul khrims ma nyams tshul khrims skyon med pa/ bdag ni
81b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ldan zhes mi slad do/ bdag la bdag med med tshul khrims 'du shes med/ shes rab zab mo byang chub spyad pa spyod/ 'jigs med gang dag tshul khrims 'di 'dra ba/ nam yang tshul
81b7(dkon brtsegs): khrims 'chal bar de mi 'gyur/ thams cad chos ni gang dag mi dmigs pa/ de yi tshul khrims de ni 'phags pas bsngags/ byis pa gang dag bdag tu lta gnas te/ bdag ni tshul
81b8(dkon brtsegs): khrims ldan zhes khrims srung zhing / bsrungs nas tshul khrims 'bras bu myong ba de/ ngan 'gro gsum po kun las mi thar to/ /gang dag bdag tu lta ba kun spangs pa/ de ni nga dang nga zhes
82a1(dkon brtsegs): bya mi 'byung / tshul khrims ldan pa de la lta med de/ de ni phyir yang log ltung mi 'jigs so/ /'di 'dra ba yi tshul khrims gang shes pa/ de la 'chal pa'i tshul khrims
82a2(dkon brtsegs): blta mi nus/ srid pa gsum na de bdag mi mthong na/ khrims dang tshul 'chal mthong 'gyur smos ci dgos/ shA ri'i bu de ltar tshul khrims spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i
82a3(dkon brtsegs): chos bcu 'dus par 'gyur ro/ /bcu gang zhe na/ dad pa'i bsam pa 'dus par 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi bsam pa 'dus par 'gyur ba dang / rab tu 'dun pa dang / las kyi rnam
82a4(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa rgya chen po la dad pa dang / 'phags pa la ldang ba byed pa dang / bla ma la rim gro byed pa dang / slob dpon la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos tshol ba la 'jug
82a5(dkon brtsegs): par byed pa dang / byang chub yongs su tshul zhing lus dang srog la mi lta bar byed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar tshul khrims spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa chos bcu po de dag 'dus par
82a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /de chos bcu po de dag la rab tu gnas nas dge ba'i chos rnams yang dag par sgrub bo/ /dge ba'i chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ legs par spyod pa gsum po 'di dag nyid de
82a7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang ngag dang yid kyis legs par spyod pa'o/ /legs par spyod pa gsum po de dag la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni de'i byang chub gang dang 'brel
82a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol lo/ /'di la de'i chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /sangs rgyas dag gis
82b1(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa yi/ dge ba'i las rnams lus kyis byed/ gang las thos pa rnyed 'gyur ba'i/ slob dpon la yang rim gro byed/ sems can thams cad don gyi phyir/
82b2(dkon brtsegs): byams pa'i sems ldan phrag dog med/ chos las brtsams te gang zag la/ ri mo dag ni rab tu byed/ ngag ni shin du sdom gyur te/ de ni mi snyan tshig mi smra/
82b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni 'dun dang ldan pa'i mtshan/ nam du'ang ngag rtsub mi smra'o/ /yid ni dge ba'i yid du 'gyur/ nam du'ang sdig pa mi 'dod do/ /byams sems gus
82b4(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas pa yi/ bsam pa nyid kyis rtag tu lta/ rgyal bas bstan pa thos gyur nas/ chos 'di la ni gus dang bcas/ chos la gus par byas pas na/
82b5(dkon brtsegs): myur du byang chub rnam 'tshang rgya/ chos bcu po de dag la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro
82b6(dkon brtsegs): dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa bcu bskyed de/ bcu gang
82b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ kye ma'o lus 'di ni na ba ste/ khams ni sbrul gdug pa bzhin du rtag par phan tshun mi 'phrod pa'o/ /sdug bsngal mang pa'o// nyes pa mang ba'o/ /

83a1(dkon brtsegs): smyo ba dang / 'bras dang / phol mig dang / me dpa la dang / g.yan pa dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis gang ste/ nad dang 'dra/ phol mig dang 'dra/ zug rngu dang 'dra/ chu bo dang 'dra/ gnod pa dang 'dra/ g.yo ba/
83a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa/ snying po med pa/ nyam chung ba/ shig shig po/ yun thung ba/ skad cig pa/ dur khrod du 'jig pa ste/ snying po med pas lus las snying po blang ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa dang po de bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
83a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu phor gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /bcol ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka'
83a4(dkon brtsegs): stsal nas ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo / /khams ni sbrul gdug ma rung ba/ /bzhi po gcig la gcig brten te/ /re re yang ni 'khrugs pa las/ /nad po che ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mig nad dang ni rna nad dang / /sna nad
83a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ni de bzhin du/ /so nad dang ni mchu nad rnams/ /gzhan yang lus las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /smyo dang 'bras dang phol mig dang / /me dbal g.yan pa rnams dang ni/ /nad gzhan rnam pa mang po dag /lus las su ni
83a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur/ /lus 'di nad dang mtshungs pa ste/ //lus ni 'brum bu 'dra ba'o/ /lus 'di gnod pa 'dra ba ste/ /yun thung skad cig 'dus pa'o/ /dur khrod du ni 'gro zhing 'jig /mi rtag mi brtan g.yo ba ste/ rab tu 'jig
83a7(dkon brtsegs): cing na ba dang / /lus 'di rnag gis gang ba ste/ /shig shig po dang yun thung ba/ /rnag gis gang ba'i lus 'di yis/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sku yi phyir/ /dge ba'i las rnams bsgrub par bya/ /thams cad tu ni rab zag pa/ /
83a8(dkon brtsegs): rnag gis gang ba'i lus 'di yis/ /chos sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sku 'grub bo/ /gang na gzhan gyis thob med pa/ de 'dra'i lus ni thob par bya/ /tsha ba dag kyang gang sgrib dang / /bsil ba dag kyang rab
83b1(dkon brtsegs): srung ba/ /lus 'di yang ni dga' ba dang / /'chi ba dag gis gzhom par 'gyur/ /gang dag grang dang tsha bzod pa/ /lus kyis su ni thams cad tu/ /skyes bu'i bya ba byed pa yi/ /mchog gi lus ni thob par 'gyur/ /'jig
83b2(dkon brtsegs): rten grags pa'i bla ma la/ /rim gro dag ni rab bya ste/ /snying po med pa'i lus las su/ /snying po dag ni blangs bar 'gyur/ /shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa dang po 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
83b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po
83b4(dkon brtsegs): med pa ste/ rtag tu dril ba dang / bkru ba dang / mnye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / 'gyes pa dang / 'bral ba'i chos can no/ /shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na ji tsam du rdza mkhan gyis bum chung tshad dang / che tshad byas pa thams cad kyang mthar
83b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig go/ /de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di yang snying po med pa so ma btang ba'i snod bzhin te/ mthar 'jig pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na shing gi yal ga'i 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang
83b6(dkon brtsegs): mthar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med de/ 'bras bu smin pa bzhin du ltung ba'i chos can no/ /shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rtswa'i rtse mo'i zil ba'i thigs pa ji snyed pa de thams cad kyang nyi
83b7(dkon brtsegs): mas phog na ring por mi gnas so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ zil pa'i thig pa bzhin du ring por mi gnas pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab
83b8(dkon brtsegs): chu'i rgyun la dbu ba rdos pa yod pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang snying po med de rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/ dbu ba rdos pa ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung
84a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na char bab pa'i chu'i chu bur gzhan skye zhing gzhan 'gag go/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kye ma'o lus ni snying po med pa ste/ chu'i chu bur lhar rang bzhin gyi nyam chung ba'o/ /de ltar
84a2(dkon brtsegs): s nying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa gnyis pa de bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen
84a3(dkon brtsegs): bkur byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ de tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /ji ltar rdza ma'i mkhan po yis/ /sa la snod rnams byas pa dag /
84a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad mthar 'jig ste/ /sems can srog kyang de dang 'dra/ /ji ltar shing gi yal ga yi/ /lo ma me tog 'bras bu rnams/ /thams cad ltung ba'i chos can te/ /mi yi srog kyang de bzhin no/ /rtswa
84a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog dag gi zil pa'i thigs/ /nyi mas yongs su bab pa na/ /yid tsam gyis ni med 'gyur te/ /mi yi srog kyang de bzhin no/ /ji ltar 'bab chu'i rgyun rnams kyi/ /dbu ba rdos pa nyam chung ltar/ /de ltar lus
84a6(dkon brtsegs): ni nyam chung ste/ /snying po med pa dbu ba 'dra/ /ji ltar char pa bab pa yi/ /chu'i chu bur skyes pa yang / /skad cig gi ni de 'jig 'gyur/ /de bzhin lus kyang snying po med/ /snying po ma yin snying por shes/ /snying po
84a7(dkon brtsegs): snying po ma yin 'dzin/ /de dag log rtog spyod yul te/ /snying po khong du chud ma yin/ /snying po med la snying med pa/ /snying po snying por shes pa ni/ /de dag yang dag rtog pa'i yul/ /snying po khong du chud pa yin/ /
84a8(dkon brtsegs): snying po 'du shes byas gyur te/ rdza gang tsam gyi chu 'bul ba/ /snying po med pa'i lus las ni/ snying po dag ni len par 'gyur/ /shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa gnyis pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'
84b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol ba'i slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu phor gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar
84b2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed de/ /bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du song ste/ le lo can/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyom las can/ blun pa/ log par lta ba ste/
84b3(dkon brtsegs): mchod sbyin yang med/ sbyin sreg kyang med/ legs byas dang / nyes byas kyi las rnams byas pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa bsags pa yang med par lta ba dang / 'dod pa'i zil gyis non te/ bdag gis mi
84b4(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des 'di lta ste/ yi dags kyis yul du sbyin gnas thams cad gso ba ma yin pa 'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob ste/ 'di lta bu'i
84b5(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas de ni bdag yi dags su gyur te/ lo mang po/ lo stong phrag mang po/ lo brgya stong phrag mang por me mur za zhing chu'i sgra yang mi thos na/ lus kyis
84b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ga la zhig reg ste/ bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par byas pas bdag dge ba'i lus thob kyis sbyin gnas thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar bya zhing / /lus dang srog la mi lta
84b7(dkon brtsegs): bar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su btsal ba'i phyir slob dpon la rim gro bya'o snyam du sems bskyed pa gsum pa 'di bskyed nas/ byang chub
84b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang / /tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /
85a1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar grogs po bstan pa dang / /ji ltar nye bar bsten pa ltar/ /de dag yang dang yang bsnyen pas/ /de yang de dang 'dra bar 'gyur/ /sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang song nas/ /
85a2(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnam par spangs/ /le lo che zhing brtson 'grus nyams/ /g.yo dang phrag dog ser sna can/ /byin pa yod par gang lta ba/ /thams cad tu ni rnam spangs pas/ /bdag ni yi dags skye gnas su/ /'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob bo/ /yun ring
85a3(dkon brtsegs): dus su 'khor ba yi/ /mun nag phung po 'jigs pas na/ /bkres pa dang ni skom pas gzir/ /sdug bsngal mang po rjes su myong / /sbyin gnas rnams ni ma mthong zhing / /bdag gis 'di 'dra dal ma thob/ /lo ni mang po stong rnams su/ /chu yi sgra yang yongs ma thos/ /da
85a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar bdag gis 'jig rten na/ /shin du dkon pa rab rnyed de/ /bdag gis slob dpon mnyes byas pas/ /dal ba 'byor pa bdag gis thob/ /sdig pa'i grogs po rnam spangs pas/ /bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed/ /byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ /
85a5(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la mi blta'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ /slob dpon bla ma mchod gnas la/ /rnam par dang ba'i sems kyis su/ /sti stang gus par rab tu bya/ /shA ri'i bu sems skyed pa gsum pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems
85a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang / /bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu phor gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems
85a7(dkon brtsegs): skyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas le lo can/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyom las can/ blun pas sems can la khu tshur dang / thal mos brdegs shing gtses nas
85a8(dkon brtsegs): bsdus shing cho nge bton te/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa yang med/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa 'byung ba yang med do/ /zhes de ltar lta ba dang / de ltar mos shing zhe sdang gi zil gyis non pas mi dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas te/
85b1(dkon brtsegs): mi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des 'di lta ste dud 'gro'i skye gnas su/ sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa/ 'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob ste/ 'di ltar sbyin gnas mgu bar ma byas pas/ des na bdag rnga mo dang / ba
85b2(dkon brtsegs): lang dang / bong bur gyur te/ rtswa za zhing dbyig pas bsdigs/ 'jigs pas bsdigs nas/ mi 'dod bzhin du khal bkal to/ /bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par byas te/ dge ba'i lus thob kyis lus dang srog la mi blta bar slob dpon
85b3(dkon brtsegs): la ni rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes/ shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bzhi pa de bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /'di la chos nyid ni
85b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /yun ring por ni 'phags pa'i lam/ /ma rig par ni gnas pas na/ /rnga mo dag dang bong bur gyur/ /sdug bsngal mang po rjes su myong / /mir gyur pa yang bdag gis rnyed/ /gang gis byang
85b5(dkon brtsegs): chub reg 'gyur ba'i/ /bzang po yi ni las bya ste/ /de ni mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid do/ /sangs rgyas chos la rab gnas shing / /gus pa dang ni ldan par bya/ /byang chub phyir ni slob dpon la/ /rim gro dang ni sti stang bya/ /'das pa'i
85b6(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi bskal pa bsam med nas/ /'khor ba'i 'khor lor yongs su 'khyam pa na/ /skye mched dag ni don med 'das gyur te/ /sbyin gnas dag ni nye bar 'tsho ba min/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spangs gyur nas/ /
85b7(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu sdig pa'i grogs po rab bsten te/ /de dag gi ni bstan pa'i rjes 'jug cing / /rgyun mi 'chad par ngan song sa la gnas/ /gtse ba dang ni bcing zhing brdeg pa rnams/ /byed tu bcug cing gzhan la spyos
85b8(dkon brtsegs): byas nas/ /de yi 'bras bu ngan song skye gnas 'gro/ /sdig pa'i las kyis sdug bsngal rjes su myong / /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni ma bsten pas/ /rnga mo ba lang de bzhin bong bu yi/ /ngan pa'i mtshams kyi skye mched bzung gyur nas/ /
86a1(dkon brtsegs): dbyug pa dag gis brdegs shing khal kyang bkal/ /mir 'gyur ba ni shin du rnyed dka' dang / /'thun pa'i yul dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed/ /shin du yun ring dal ba rnyed gyur te/ /dka' ba'i
86a2(dkon brtsegs): las kyi bu gar chud pa bzhin/ /lus dang ngag ni shin du bsdams gyur nas/ /zhan pa med pa'i sems kyis brtson 'grus brtsam/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la g.yo med pas/ /bdag gi lus ni nye bar
86a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho bar bya/ /bdag gi slob dpon bla ma gang dag dang / /gang dag bdag gi byang chub sems bskyed pa/ /byang chub dam pa mchog gi lam ston pa/ /ston pa bzhin du dga' bas bsnyen bkur bya/ /
86a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs dag gi byug pa dang / dri dang phye ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /gos dang me tog dag gi chun po yis/ /rkang gnyis dam pa la ni mchod par bya/ /phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang bzhugs
86a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /sems can don la brtson zhing don dam gzigs/ /gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od mdzes pa/ /kha dog mtha' yas pa la mchod par bya/ /sangs rgyas mi yi kha lo sgyur rnams la/ /'jig
86a6(dkon brtsegs): rten spyod dang mchod pa cher byas pas/ /gang gis byang chub snying por bdag 'gro ba'i/ /byang chub lam ni shin du sbyangs par 'gyur/ /shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bzhi pa 'di bskyed nas/ /byang chub sems
86a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
86a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas/ le lo can brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyom las can/ blun pas/ 'di lta bu'i
86b1(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang / 'di lta bu'i 'dod pas sems can thams cad dang / srog chags thams cad kyi sha gcig tu spungs shing sha gcig tu bcer te/ bsod nams ma yin pa'i las byed kyang / de'i gzhi las sdig
86b2(dkon brtsegs): pa med/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa'i rnam pa med do/ /rgya mtsho'i tshu rol gyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sbyin pas tshim par byas kyang / de'i gzhi las bsod nams med/ de'i gzhi las bsod
86b3(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi rnam pa med do/ /rgya mtsho'i pha rol gyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bsad cing gtub kyang de'i gzhi las sdig pa med/ de'i gzhi las sdig pa'i rnam pa med do/ /snyam pas de ltar byas
86b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang bsod nams dang sdig pa yongs su shes par ma nus te sdig pa'i lta ba bsnyen pa dang / gti mug gi zil gyis non pas bdag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge
86b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal bar dman pa 'jigs su rung ba'i lus thob ste/ de la 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas de na bdag ni sems can dmyal
86b6(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur pas lcag kyi thu lum bsregs pa za zhing gcig tu sdug bsngal ba rtsub pa/ mi bzad pa 'tshogs pa/ 'chi ba'i mthar khrid pa myong zhing lo stong phrag mang po'i bar du bde ba'i sgra yang mi thos na/
86b7(dkon brtsegs): lus kyis lta ga la zhig reg ste/ bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes par byas pas/ dge ba'i lus thob kyis/ sbyin gnas rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar bya zhing lus dang srog la mi lta bar slob dpon la rim gro dang
86b8(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes/ shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa lnga pa de bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang /
87a1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sdig pa'i grogs po bsnyen pa dang / /sdig pa'i sems
87a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis bslus pas na/ /sdig par lta la bsten gyur te/ /bdag gis sdig pa'i las byas so/ /rgya mtsho yi ni tshu rol na/ /sems can gnas pa ji snyed pa/ /zas dang skom gyis tshim byas kyang / /bsod
87a3(dkon brtsegs): nams dag gi 'byung gnas med/ /rgya mtsho yi ni pha rol na/ /sems can gnas pa ji snyed pa/ /thams cad bsad cing bcom gyur kyang / /sdig pa'i 'byung gnas med do zhes/ /sdig par lta ba 'di lta bu/ /
87a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dang yang du bsten pas na/ /gcig tu mi bzad ma rungs pa'i/ /sems can dmyal bar ring du dengs/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi/ /yongs su 'dren pa ma mthong bas/ /bdag gi lus ni stong rnams
87a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang / ngan 'gro dag ni gsum du dengs/ /'di ni 'jig rten dge ba ste/ /de yi sgra ni thos gyur nas/ /bdag gis mi yi dngos thob kyis/ /bzang po yi ni las bya'o/ /mir 'gyur ba ni dka' ba ste/ /mi srog
87a6(dkon brtsegs): thob pa 'ang dka' ba yin/ dam pa'i chos thos dka' ba ste/ /sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'ang dka' ba yin/ /bdag gis mir skye dka' ba yi/ /tshe thob pa ni g.yo zhing 'gyur/ /bdag gis sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang / /
87a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba kun mkhyen bstan pa rnyed/ /lus kyi las dang ngag gi las/ yid kyi las kyang sdig pa can/ /mi 'dod mi zad 'bras bur 'gyur/ /phyin cad spyad par mi bya'o/ /bsam pa rnam par dag pa yi/ /lus dang ngag
87a8(dkon brtsegs): dang yid rnams kyis/ /'jig rten rab tu dka' spyod pa/ /bzang po dag gi las bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ /bdag gi bla mar gang grags pa'i/ /bka' las 'da' bar mi bya ste/ /bsnyen bkur
87b1(dkon brtsegs): dag ni rab tu bya/ /lam ni drang po zhes bya ba/ /g.yo med pas ni rab bstan te/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ /sgyu mar 'gyur bar mi bya'o/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa/ /
87b2(dkon brtsegs): de lta bur ni sems bskyed nas/ /snod gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul/ /shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa lnga pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su tshol
87b3(dkon brtsegs): bas slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral
87b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pas 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / gus par smra ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyar ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa med do/ /zhes de ltar mos pa'i bar gyis
87b5(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal gyi zil gyis non pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon 'dus byas te/ mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang du sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa smad
87b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lus thob ste/ 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas na der bdag mir gyur pa na/ mi bkren pa dang / mi dbul po dang / bran du gyur pa dang / gzhan gyi dbang du song ba dang / 'dod pa la zhen pa'i sems
87b7(dkon brtsegs): can rnams dang / 'dod pa la chags pa rnams dang / mi rigs pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa rnams dang / log par lta ba rnams dang / tshul khrims log par zhugs pa rnams dang / lta ba log par zhugs pa rnams
87b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum la rab tu gnas pa rnams dang / 'gro bar bya ba ma yin pa'i 'gro ba bzhi la 'gro bar zhugs pa rnams dang / sgrib pa lngas bsgribs pa rnams dang / bla ma drug la gus
88a1(dkon brtsegs): par mi gnas pa rnams dang / dam pa'i chos ma yin pa bdun la 'jug pa rnams dang / log pa brgyad la log par nges pa rnams dang / gnod pa dgu'i dngos pos gnod par gyur pa rnams dang / mi dge ba
88a2(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i las kyi lam la lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams dang / sems can dmyal ba'i lam la mngon par phyogs pa rnams dang / mtho ris kyi lam la ma phyogs pa rnams dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
88a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba rnams dang / bdud kyi dbang du song ba rnams dang / dge ba'i chos yongs su spangs pa rnams dang / mi dge ba'i chos la spyod pa
88a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi dbyug pas bsdigs/ 'jigs pas bsdigs nas mi 'dod bzhin du byed cing rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed par gyur te/ bdag gis ni da ltar de dag mnyes par byas pas dge
88a5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lus thob kyis sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya'o/ /lus dang srog la mi blta bar slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o zhes/ shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa drug pa de bskyed nas byang
88a6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher rab tu rtog tu gzhug pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe tshigs su
88a7(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sdig pa'i grogs ni nga rgyal rgyags 'phel ba/ /bskal pa mang po rgya mtshor bstan pas na/ /mi yi nang du skyes kyang bran du 'gyur/ /'khor ba'i rgyun du yun ring
88a8(dkon brtsegs): dus su 'khor/ /mi lus rab tu rnyed par dka' ba yang / /de ni bdag gis dka' bas thob gyur te/ /gnas pa'i yul ni 'thun pa bzang po dang / /sangs rgyas 'byung dang dal 'byor de bzhin no/ /
88b1(dkon brtsegs): grogs po gang dag mchog tu rab bzang ba/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod dang lam ston cing / /byang chub sems ni rin chen 'phel byed pa/ /de dag bskal pa bye ba mang pos rnyed/ /lus ni nyams chung mi rtag mi
88b2(dkon brtsegs): brten te/ /dbu ba rdo' dang chu yi chu bur 'dra/ /gyu ma lta bu gar la lta dang mtshungs/ /rmi lam mthong dang 'drid par smra ba bzhin/ /srog ni yun thung tshe yang zad par 'gyur/ /ji ltar sprin dang glog ni mi gnas
88b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar/ /skad cig tu ni de bzhin srog kyang 'gyur/ /snying po med las snying po len par byed/ /gang gis 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa yang / /rgya mtsho brgya phrag bsam yas bslus gyur pa/ /nga rgyal ri bo man
88b4(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhom pa yi/ /dus dang tshod dang man ni nyer gnas kyis/ /lus la sdug pa thams cad rab spangs nas/ /srog la chags pa med pa'i yid kyis ni/ /nga dang rgyags dang dregs pa spangs gyur nas/ /yon tan ldan
88b5(dkon brtsegs): la gus bcas rim gro bya/ /nga dang rgyags dang dregs pa spangs gyur nas/ /pha dang ma dang bu pho rnams dang ni/ /'jig rten bla ma mchog tu gang grags pa/ /gus dang bcas shing mchog gi rim gro bya/ /byang chub
88b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' byang chub mchog zhugs pa/ /gang dag bdag dang byang chub 'thun spyod la/ /dga' dang gus pa brtan pa bskyed bya ste/ /rim gro bya ba'i phyir ni brtson par bya/ /skye dgu nga rgyal ldan pa nga rgyal
88b7(dkon brtsegs): spangs/ /mi mkhas nga rgyal gcad cing gdul ba'i phyir/ ye shes rdo rje dag gis bcom byas nas/ /rgyags dang nga rgyal ri ni bsnyil bar bya/ /byang chub spyod pa yongs su rdzogs byas te/ /byang chub snying po
88b8(dkon brtsegs): mchog la gnas gyur nas/ /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rtsod pa rnams btul te/ /chu bo bzhi las srog chags bsgral bar bya/ /phyogs bcu dag na mi gang na ba rnams/ rang gi mi gtsang bar ltung
89a1(dkon brtsegs): smad pa la/ /byams pa dang ni snying rje'i yid kyis su/ /mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur bar bya/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i dus la bab/ /sangs rgyas yon tan bslab pa bslab nus
89a2(dkon brtsegs): shes/ /bzod pa bsgom par bya ba phun sum tshogs/ /mdud pa med pa'i brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ /bsam gtan pha rol phyin thob phun sum tshogs/ /sems gdul ba yi dus ni nye bar gnas/ /
89a3(dkon brtsegs): thabs dang shes rab mkhas la gnas gyur te/ /bla ma thams cad la ni bskor ba bya/ /de ltar bsod nams stobs dang gzi brjid spel/ /shes rab ye shes mkhas pa bsam mi khyab/ /rang dbang dam
89a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gis mngon 'phags te/ byur bur yongs su bkang ba'i snod byin no/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa drug pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde
89a5(dkon brtsegs): snod yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag
89a6(dkon brtsegs): yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs po dang phrad pas le lo can/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyom las can/ blun pa/ lkug par gyur te/ las nag po dang / nag po'i
89a7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par smin pa'ang med/ las dkar po dang / dkar po'i rnam par smin pa 'ang med/ las dkar gnag dang / dkar gnag gi rnam par smin pa 'ang med/ mi gnag cing dkar ba'i las dang / mi
89a8(dkon brtsegs): gnag cing dkar ba'i rnam par smin pa yang med do/ /zhes de ltar lta/ de ltar bzod/ de ltar mos pas/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze la/ btsun pa dag dge ba gang / mi dge ba gang / kha na ma tho ba dang
89b1(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa gang / kha na ma tho ba med pa gang / bsten par bya ba gang / bsten par mi bya ba gang / bya ba'i rigs pa gang / bya ba'i mi rigs pa gang / ci byas na yun ring por gnod pa dang / mi phan pa dang /
89b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bar 'gyur/ ci byas na don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur/ zhes mi 'dri ba dang / nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas te/ mi dge
89b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste/ sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba'i mir gyur nas 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas pas/ bdag mir
89b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa na yang long ba/ lkug pa/ blun pa/ rku ba/ dig pa/ rmongs pa/ 'on par gyur te/ legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i don shes par mi nus so/ /bdag gis ni da ltar mnyes
89b5(dkon brtsegs): par byas pas 'di lta ste/ dbang po tshang ba dge ba'i lus thob kyis/ sbyin gnas thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar bya/ lus dang srog la mi blta bar bya/ legs par bshad pa dang / nyes par bshad pa'i
89b6(dkon brtsegs): don kun shes pa'i mthu yod par bya/ slob dpon la btsun pa dge ba gang / mi dge ba gang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang / kha na ma tho ba med pa gang / bsten pa gang / mi bsten pa gang / bya ba gang /
89b7(dkon brtsegs): mi bya ba gang / ci byas na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon du 'gyur/ ci byas na byang chub sems dpa'i chos mngon du 'gyur zhes 'dri zhing byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod
89b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi don gyi phyir slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ 'di ltar snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang ngo snyam nas/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
90a1(dkon brtsegs): gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas/ ston pa yang 'di skad gsung ngo / /phan pa 'dod phyir bskal pa brgya mang por/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spangs gyur nas/ /
90a2(dkon brtsegs): dge dang mi dge kha na ma tho dang / /kha na ma tho med byas 'bras mi 'dri/ /lhag pa'i nga rgyal dbang du song ba ni/ /sems dmyal dud 'gro gshin rje'i dbang du song / /sdig sems grogs po bsten par byas
90a3(dkon brtsegs): pas na/ /bskal pa brgya mang gis ni ngan 'gror 'phos/ /mi yi 'jig rten dbang po ma tshang gyur/ /bskal pa stong phrag mang por 'khyams pa'i lus/ /dge dang mi dge kha na ma tho dang / /kha na ma tho med
90a4(dkon brtsegs): byas 'bras mi shes/ /ru sbal mgrin pa shing mig chud 'dra bar/ /mi yi lus ni shin du dka' bar thob/ /dbang po dag ni tshang zhing skye mched dge/ /mi dal yongs su spangs nas dal ba rnyed/ /'jig rten
90a5(dkon brtsegs): sgron ma mdzad pa mnyes byas nas/ /rgyal bas bstan chos 'dod chags bral ba thob/ /dge dang mi dge bya ba'i 'bras bu dag /'jig rten gtso la bdag dri dus la bab/ /'gro bar ser sna'i mir 'gyur
90a6(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bu/ /ji ltar sbyin bdag ser sna med par 'gyur/ /ji ltar g.yo ngan brkam pa tshul khrims 'chal/ /tshul khrims nor kun srung ba ji lta bu/ /mi ni khro dang 'khrug par ji ltar 'gyur/ /khro med bzod pa'i
90a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs su ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar le lo can dang g.yeng yid 'gyur/ /brtson 'phags bsam gtan dga' ba ji lta bu/ /ji ltar 'chal ba'i shes rab blun lkug 'gyur/ /ji ltar shes rab ldan zhing bden
90a8(dkon brtsegs): gtam dga'/ /ji ltar byang chub spyod pa gcig sems pas/ /spyod pa bzang po thams cad tshol bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'gro ba kun la byams pa bgyid/ /ji ltar ngan song song ba'i sems can 'dren/ /
90b1(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar chos kyi dga' bas mi ngoms yid/ /byang chub spyod pa sde snod yongs su tshol/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rab 'byam zhing rnams na/ /'jig rten bla ma bzhugs par ji ltar 'gro/ /phyag 'tshal
90b2(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams byed pa ji lta bu/ /kun du bzang po spyod pa ci 'dra 'dri/ /slob dpon bla ma dag la bdag 'dri ba/ /de yi dus ni di ring nyer gnas te/ /bla ma'i gnas su gnas las nyan dga' ste/ /slob dpon yid
90b3(dkon brtsegs): mgu byed pa ji lta bu/ /sangs rgyas sras kyi sems ni bskyed gyur nas/ /stobs dang bsod nams yangs pa'i blo gros can/ /nges par mchog gi ye shes stobs ldan pas/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis
90b4(dkon brtsegs): snod gang chu yang 'bul/ /shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bdun pa 'di bskyed nas/ /byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi don gyi phyir slob dpon la ni rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/
90b5(dkon brtsegs): tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bdag yun ring por dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral zhig sdig pa'i grogs pos zin
90b6(dkon brtsegs): pas le lo can/ brtson 'grus nyams pa/ snyoms las can/ lkug pas gang tshig dang / yi ge dang / don dang / tshig tu ldan pa dang / chos dang tshig tu ldan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa dang / 'dod
90b7(dkon brtsegs): chags dang bral ba ldan pa dang / 'gog pa dang / zhi ba dang / rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa dang / thams cad la bya ste/ de dag spangs nas don dang tshig tu
90b8(dkon brtsegs): mi ldan pa dang / chos kyi tshig dang mi ldan pa nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mi ldan pa'i bar gyis tshig dang / yi ge de dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa ni 'di lta ste/ stobs med/
91a1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus med/ skyes bu'i stobs med/ skyes bu'i mthu med/ skyes bu'i brtul ba med/ spyod pa med/ rtul ba med/ spyod pa la mthu med/ rgyu med/ rkyen med de/ sems can kun
91a2(dkon brtsegs): nas nyon mongs pa yang rgyu med rkyen med par sems can kun nas nyon mongs par gyur te/ rgyu med do/ /rkyen med do/ /sems can rnams rnam par dag pa yang rgyu med/ rkyen med par sems can rnam par dag go/ /
91a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes 'di ltar rgyu med par lta ba la gnas nas/ bdag gis mi dge ba'i las mang po mngon par 'dus byas te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang du sbyin gnas thams cad nye bar 'tsho
91a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin pa/ dbang po ma tshang ba'i mi'i lus thob ste/ de na bdag glen pa/ g.yeng ba/ dig pa/ lkug pa/ rmongs pa/ blun pa/ long ba/ 'on par gyur pas/ gang tshig dang / yi ge dang / don du ldan
91a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nas/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bar du de dag 'dzin pa dang / len pa dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa'i mthu med pas 'di lta bu'i sbyin gnas mnyes par ma byas so/ /bdag gis ni
91a6(dkon brtsegs): da ltar sbyin gnas mnyes par byas kyis/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba'i bar du byas te/ gang tshig dang / yi ge dang / don du ldan pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bar du 'di lta ste/
91a7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid gzung ba nas/ kun chub par bya ba'i bar du nus kyis/ 'on bdag gis brtson 'grus brtsams te/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
91a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid blang ba'i phyir lus kyi slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton dang / bsnyen bkur byas
91b1(dkon brtsegs): te/ snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs par 'gyur/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi stobs kyis nye bar brten par byas par 'gyur te/ bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi stobs des nye bar brtan pas
91b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'di dang nye bar 'gyur ro snyam nas ched du bsams te/ slob dpon la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /'di la de'i chos nyid
91b3(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o/ /chos gang don dang ldan pa dang / lam gyi yan lag lam sgom dang / 'gog pa mngon du byed pa dang / mya ngan 'das lam snying po can/ /chos de dag ni yongs spangs
91b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ /gang chos phan pa med pa dang / /don dang tshig tu mi ldan pa/ /chos de dag ni bdag gis bsnyen/ /brtson 'grus dang ni stobs med de/ /skyes bu yi ni mthu yang med/ /shin du rtul ba mchog rnams dang /
91b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas dang ni chos kyang med/ /pha ma med pa de bzhin du/ /dkar po dang ni nag po'i las/ /rnam par smin pa kun med ces/ /'di 'dra'i sdig par lta ba dag /yang
91b6(dkon brtsegs): dang yang du bsten pas na/ /gcig tu mi bzad ma rungs pa/ /sems can dmyal bar yun ring gnas/ /de bzhin dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / /gshin rje'i 'jig rten sdig can te/ /nam tshe 'ang mir ni
91b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes gyur kyang / /blun zhing lce ni med par 'gyur/ /g.yeng ba dang ni 'on par 'gyur/ /dig pa lkug pa rmongs par 'gyur/ /yun ring sems dmyal ma rungs par/ /mi shis pas ni rab tu ltung / /dbang
91b8(dkon brtsegs): po thams cad phun tshogs shing / /bdag gi lus 'di rab mdzes pa/ /yun ring dus na bdag gis thob/ /'di ni bdag gis brtson bya'i/ /chos gang don dang ldan pa dang / /mya ngan 'da' ba'i grogs byed pa/ /
92a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub lam dang byang chub la/ /bdag ni 'bad par bya ba'i dus/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni/ /zab mo'i don dang ldan pa ste/ /bskal pa stong phrag bye bar yang / /de ni shin du thos par
92a2(dkon brtsegs): dka'/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ /sangs rgyas chos mang 'di dang ni/ /gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab la/ /rab tu 'jug cing gzung bar bya/ /slob dpon la ni gus bcas shing / /bsnyen
92a3(dkon brtsegs): bkur dag ni byas pa na/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /thos pa de ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa/ /thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yi/ /'di lta bur ni
92a4(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed nas/ /rdza gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul/ /shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa brgyad pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi phyir slob dpon la rim gro dang /
92a5(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni don med pas yongs su bskor
92a6(dkon brtsegs): ba/ lus dang srog la lta ba'o/ /don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni lus dang srog la mi lta'o/ /don med pas yongs su bskor ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la lta'i/ byang chub kyi
92a7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi chos rnams la mi lta zhing nga yir 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro bas bdag sba ba dang / dril ba dang / mnye ba dang / bkru ba dang / brdzi bas yongs su bskor ba de ni don med pas yongs su bskor
92a8(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang don med pas yongs su bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la lta zhing nga yir 'dzin pa sngon du 'gro bas chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo dang / mdza' bo dang / nye du dang /
92b1(dkon brtsegs): snag gi gnyen mtshams sbed pa dang / dril ba nas yo byad dang / longs spyod thams cad kyi bar gyis yongs su bskor ba de ni don med pas yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang nga yir 'dzin pa sngon du
92b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba nas/ bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa'i mi sbed pa dang / mngag pa dang / kun du srung ba de ni don med pas yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/ /de la don gyis yongs su bskor ba gang zhe na/ 'di
92b3(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ lus dang srog la mi lta yi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las yongs su bskor ba de ni don gyis yongs
92b4(dkon brtsegs): su bskor ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la mi lta yi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol
92b5(dkon brtsegs): du phyin pa bsgrubs pa nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsgrub pa'i bar gyis yongs su bskor ba de ni don gyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni lus dang srog la mi lta
92b6(dkon brtsegs): yi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i sbyin pa dang / snyan par smra ba dang / don bya ba dang / don 'thun pas sems can thams cad sdud pas sems su bskor ba de ni
92b7(dkon brtsegs): don gyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la mi lta yi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i
92b8(dkon brtsegs): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam bsgom pas yongs su bskor ba de ni don gyis yongs
93a1(dkon brtsegs): su bskor ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la mi lta'i/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la lta zhing / byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i
93a2(dkon brtsegs): pha ma dang / slob dpon la rim gro byed cing bla ma'i gnas la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / gus par smra ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / ldang ba dang / thal mo sbyor
93a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las kyis yongs su bskor ba de ni don gyis yongs su bskor ba zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang don gyis yongs su bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ lus dang srog la mi lta yi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
93a4(dkon brtsegs): chos la lta zhing byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba'i dkon mchog gyi zhal ta byas pas yongs su bskor ba'o/ /de ltar kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni don med pas yongs su bskor ba/
93a5(dkon brtsegs): lus dang srog la lta ba'o/ /kye ma'o bdag ni don gyis yongs su bskor bas yongs su bskor gyi bdag gang brtson 'grus brtsams la slob dpon la lus kyi rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur
93a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ de ltar na snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs pa dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis nye bar brtan par byas par 'gyur te/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
93a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs des nye bar brtan pas byang chub kyi snying po dang nye bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam pa de ni shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa dgu pa 'di bskyed nas slob dpon la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu rdza gang
93a8(dkon brtsegs): yang 'bul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungaso/ /byis pa so so'i skye bo kun/ /lus dang srog la lta ldan zhing / /byang chub phyogs la mi lta ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs las
93b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang byed/ /so so'i skye bo de dag ni/ /bdag gi don dang chung ma'i don/ /bu pho dang ni bu mo'i phyir/ /don med pa la chags par 'gyur/ /bran dang las byed mngag pa bdag /mi mkhas pas ni kun du mngags/ /rkang bzhi pa dag gos byed de/ de dag don med chags
93b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ /nor dang 'bru rnams rab sogs shing / /sbyin pa mi byed mi spyod de/ /don med chags pa de dag ni/ /gdeng gyi srungs mar brjod pa yin/ /'di ni don med chags pa ste/ /so so'i skye bo de la chags/ /byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan ni/ /
93b3(dkon brtsegs): don la chags shing brtson par byed/ /lus dang srog la mi lta yi/ /byang chub phyogs la lta byed cing / /rnam pa sna tshogs las byed pa/ /don la yongs su chags shes bya/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims brtson 'grus bzod/ /bsam gtan shes rab
93b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du/ /thabs dang rab tu ldan pa ni/ /don la yongs su chags shes bya/ /pha dang ma la bsnyen bkur byed/ /bla ma rgan rabs rjes su bskyangs/ /dkon mchog gsum gyi zhal ta byed/ /don la yongs su chags shes bya/ /chos kun yang dag bsdus
93b5(dkon brtsegs): pa yi/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'di/ /klog cing rab tu ston pa ni/ /don la yongs su chags shes bya/ /don la chags pa de dag ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa ste/ /de la brtson dang ldan pa ni/ /rgyal sras 'jigs pa med pa'o/ /de lta bu yi
93b6(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed nas/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis ni/ /bla ma rnams la bsnyen bkur byed/ /snod gang tsam gyi chu yang 'bul/ /shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa dgu pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi phyir slob dpon la rim gro
93b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / bsnyen bkur byed de/ tha na chu bum pa gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /gzhan yang sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni bka' blo mi bde ba ste/ slob dpon gyi rjes su bstan pa dang mi mthun par 'dzin pas de dag khong du mi chud do
93b8(dkon brtsegs): ci khong du mi chud ce na 'di lta ste/ slob dpon gyi nor khong du mi chud do/ /slob dpon gyi nor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i nor dang / tshul khrims kyi nor dang / thos pa'i nor dang / khrel yod pa'i nor dang / gtong ba'i nor dang /
94a1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab kyi nor te/ de dag ni slob dpon nor zhes bya ste/ de dag khong du ma chud pas na rab tu dbul ba zhes bya'o/ /bdag ni bka' blo bde zhing slob dpon gyi rjes su bstan pa dang mthun par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
94a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ni shin du bka' blo bde ba ste/ slob dpon gyi rjes su bstan pa dang 'thun par 'dzin cing khong du chud par byed do/ /ci khong du chud ce na/ 'di lta ste/ slob dpon gyi nor ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'i slob dpon gyi nor gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
94a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs so/ /slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa thams cad tu bka' blo bde bar rig nas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher ston to/ /rab tu ston to/ /rab tu 'chad do/ /rab tu gzhog go/ /rnam
94a4(dkon brtsegs): par 'grel to/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal por go bar byed do/ /yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dbul ba yongs su chad pa khong du chud par 'gyur te/ 'di
94a5(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo/ /de de ltar sems bskyed de bka' blo bde zhing slob dpon gyi bstan pa dang 'thun par 'dzin pa ni snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs par 'gyur ro snyam nas slob dpon
94a6(dkon brtsegs): la rim gro dang / bsnyen bkur byed de tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bcu pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la bsnyen bkur
94a7(dkon brtsegs): dang rim gro byed de/ tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad bka' stsal nas ston pa yang 'di skad gsung / bka' blo mi bde sems can gang / /
94a8(dkon brtsegs): mi drang sgyu dang g.yo ngan cing / /bla ma rnams dang mi mthun pa/ /tshig bzhin du ni byed mi 'gyur/ /bstan pa dang ni mi mthun zhing / /bka' blo mi bde shes gyur nas/ /drang srong nor ni gang yin pa/ /de ni de la mi ston to/ /dad pa'i nor
94b1(dkon brtsegs): dang tshul khrims nor/ /khrel yod ngo tsha shes pa'i nor/ /thos pa'i nor dang gtong nor dang / /shes rab nyid ni nor bdun pa/ /nor gyi rnam pa 'di dag ni/ /mi zad pa yi gter bdun te/ /snod ma yin par rig nas ni/ /de ni de la
94b2(dkon brtsegs): mi ston to/ /sems can gang dag rnam pa kun/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi snod gyur cing / /g.yo med tshig 'jam sgyu med la/ /bka' blo bde zhing rab 'thun pa/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ /lus dang srog
94b3(dkon brtsegs): la mi lta bar/ /gus dang bcas pa'i chos 'dod cing / /brtson 'grus rtsom pa rab tu sems/ /tshul 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba yi/ /snod tu rung bar rig gyur nas/ /chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer med pa/ /'dren pas
94b4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag rab tu ston/ /gang la byang chub gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi snying po'i nor/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ni/ /rgyas par rab tu ston par byed/ /chos rnams thams cad bdag med de/ /mtshan med stong
94b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /srog kyang med cing 'gyur ba med/ /spros pa med de kun gzhi med/ /chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis/ /ma skyes shing ni mtshan nyid med/ /byung ba med cing grub pa med/ /mtshan
94b6(dkon brtsegs): ma med pas phye ba ste/ /mi gang bka' blo bde zhing mi 'gal ba/ /bstan pa la ni rjes su 'thun 'dzin pa/ /de dag la yang rgyal ba rang 'byung rnams/ /thar sgo slebs shes rang gi spyod yul ston/ /dad nor tshul khrims nor dang
94b7(dkon brtsegs): khrel yod dang / /ngo tsha shes dang thos gtong shes rab dang / /de la nor 'di rnams ni kun 'ged cing / /bdun po mi zad chos kyi mdzod kyang 'bying / mi 'ga' bka' blo bde zhing rjes su 'thun/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen snyam du rtag bsams nas/ /
94b8(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol ba'i phyir/ bla ma dag la bdag gis rim gro bya/ de lta bu yi sems ni bskyed byas la/ snying rje dga' ba rgya cher rab bskyed de/ kham snod dang ba'i chu yis bkang ba yang / /skom pa dag la nye bar sbyin par bya/ /shA ri'i bu sems bskyed pa bcu
95a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod yongs su tshol bas slob dpon la lus kyis bsnyen bkur dang rim 'gro byed de/ tha na chu rdza gang tsam yang 'bul lo/ /de dge ba'i rtsa ba des chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ myur du dge ba'i chos la 'jug
95a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / slob dpon gyi bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ba dang / nan tan gyis sgrub kyi log pa'i nan tan gyis ma yin pa dang / chos kyi phyir sdug bsngal gyi gzhan du phyogs bar mi 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' mi gyur ba na chos bzhi po de dag thob par
95a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang chos bzhi thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ skye bo mang po'i rjes su bslabs nas dkar po'i chos la gnas pa dang / sbas shing bzhag pa'i gnas skye bo mang po mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bar byed pa myur du 'thob pa dang / sems dga' bzhin
95a4(dkon brtsegs): du nyin mtshan zad par 'gyur ba dang / kun nas ldang ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde 'gro mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar gyur ba na chos bzhi po thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi
95a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ lha'i 'khor gyi stan mchog rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i 'khor thams cad de'i gdong du lta zhing ci bshad pa de dag thos nas shes par bya'o snyam du sems par 'gyur ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang de bzhin du lha'i bu gzhan
95a6(dkon brtsegs): yang de'i drung du 'ong gis/ de lha'i bu gzhan gyi drung du the tshom yongs su 'dri zhing gcad pa'i phyir 'gro ba ma yin pa dang / de'i longs spyod kyi phyir gzhal med khang chen por 'byung ba ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi
95a7(dkon brtsegs): po de dag thob par 'gyur te/ lhar gyur pa dang / mir gyur pa na chos kyi sgo brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /de yi stan ni mthon
95a8(dkon brtsegs): por 'gyur/ /lha yis mngon par phyag byas nas/ /gang dag chos 'di 'chad pa la/ /lha rnams de la lta bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pa ser sna bral ba la/ /kun gyi sti stang byas par 'gyur/ /brgya byin de gan 'dir 'ong zhing / /
95b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhal med khang yang yid 'ong bzang / /lha'i 'jig rten gnas 'phos te/ /mi yi srid par 'ongs gyur nas/ /'khor los bsgyur ba ser sna med/ /rgyal po rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur/ /mi yi 'jig rten 'phos nas kyang / /
95b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i nang du yang 'gro ste/ /bla ma dag la gus byas pas/ /nam yang sdug bsngal mi 'gyur ro/ /zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis su/ /bla ma dag la gus byas pas/ /gnas bzhi po ni de dag rnams/ /rgya cher rtag tu
95b3(dkon brtsegs): rnyed par 'gyur/ /dga' ba dang ni gus pa yis/ /snod gang tsam gyi chu byin na/ /lha dang mi dang klu rnams kyis/ /mchod pa dag tu 'os pa yin// // bam po bcu pa/ de ltar gyur na gzhan yang chos bzhi 'thob
95b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ chos bzhi gang zhe na/ sngon gyi las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis skyes pa rab tu shes pa dang / de na dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'dri ba yang rab tu shes pa dang / de nas shi 'phos
95b5(dkon brtsegs): nas gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de yang rab tu shes pa dang / lha'i 'khor la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas lha'i 'jig
95b6(dkon brtsegs): rten nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi 'thob par
95b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ de lha'i gnas nas/ shi 'phos nas mi rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye ba dang / de mir gyur na btsun par byed pa lnga 'thob par 'gyur
95b8(dkon brtsegs): ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de rig btsun par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gzugs btsun par 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims btsun par 'gyur ba dang / de'i 'khor btsun par 'gyur ba dang / de'i sems
96a1(dkon brtsegs): can btsun pa rnams la byams pa sgom par 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu btsun par byed pa'i chos lnga po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang mi phyed par byed
96a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i mdza' bo mi phyed pa dang / lus myur du 'jig par mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i longs spyod yongs su
96a3(dkon brtsegs): nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang 'bral bar mi nus pa dang / chos kyi mu ge 'byung ba na de la chos kyi lo legs par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu
96a4(dkon brtsegs): mi phyed par byed pa'i chos lnga po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gang snod
96a5(dkon brtsegs): stong pa gsog bzhag par gyur pa rnams su de'i lag pa gang du bcug pa de dag thams cad rin po ches yongs su gang bar 'gyur te/ ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa dang po 'di
96a6(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de sgom par gyur na yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rdzing bu 'byung ste/ ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa gnyis pa 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang
96a7(dkon brtsegs): de'i lus la gzhan gyis gnod par bya bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dug dang / mtshon dang / me dang / chu dang / mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin gyis gtse ba med pa ste/ ngo mtshar yongs
96a8(dkon brtsegs): su rdzogs pa gsum pa 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/ nad kyi bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/ mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/
96b1(dkon brtsegs): me'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/ chu'i bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/ rlung gis bskal pa bar ma byung ba 'am/ skom pa'i bskal pa bar ma 'am/ kun du gdung ba'i bskal pa bar
96b2(dkon brtsegs): ma 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bskal pa bar ma byung ba na 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar mi 'gyur gyi/ de bde ba dang / mthu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang / mthu mang bar 'gyur te/
96b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa bzhi po 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid gyis mi dal bar mi skye/ ngan 'gror mi skye/
96b4(dkon brtsegs): sems la 'gyod pas kun du dkri bar mi nus shing nges par 'byung ba myur du mthong bar 'gyur te/ ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa lnga pa 'di 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu byang
96b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar yongs su rdzogs pa lnga po 'di dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis chos bzhi dang mi
96b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bral bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdug bsngal ba'i sems can rnams mthong ma thag tu snying rje chen po 'thob pa dang / de la de'i bu dang bu mo gus
96b7(dkon brtsegs): pa dang bcas shing zhe sa byed par 'gyur ba dang / rga bas bcom yang brnyas par mi 'gyur ba dang / de las kyi mtha' gang byed pa de dag kyang nyis 'gyur sum 'gyur du 'thob par
96b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas chos gsum gyis
97a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'phrogs te/ gsum gang zhe na/ chags pas mi 'phrogs pa dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis mi 'phrog pa ste/ chos gsum po de dag gis mi 'phrogs so/ /
97a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas nad med par byed pa'i chos bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nad rgyun ring po med pa dang / yan
97a3(dkon brtsegs): lag skam par mi 'gyur ba dang / longs spyod nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / rgyal po 'am/ rkun po 'am/ de ma yin pa'i sems can 'tshe bar byed pa gzhan gyis sdug bsngal ba dang
97a4(dkon brtsegs): gnod par bya bar mi 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nad med par byed pa'i chos bzhi po de dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i
97a5(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba de nyid dang ldan pas bla ma'i gnas bzhi 'thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal zhing chos can chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna
97a6(dkon brtsegs): bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin che sna bdun ni 'di rnams yin no/ /'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud
