148a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag sems can gcig gi sems gcig tu zhugs par gyur la/ de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems de snyed tu tshad med cing mang bar gyur te/ gang sems can thams
148a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gang ba'i sems de dag sems can gcig gi sems gcig la 'jug par gyur la/ rnam
148a5(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'dis sems can thams cad de snyed kyi nyon mongs pa mang po tshad med par gyur kyang / de la bdag gi de 'dra ba'i shes rab dang / /ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su btsal
148a6(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ /'bad par bya/ brtson 'grus brtsams par bya ste/ ji ltar brtson 'grus brtsams pas sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi kun du gdung ba dang zhe sdang gi kun du gdung
148a7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gti mug gi kun du gdung ba de thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya/ dug med par bya/ gzhom par bya/ dgrol bar bya/ thal bar bya/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la rab tu
148a8(dkon brtsegs): dgod par bya'o snyam du gang de la rtul ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtul
148b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ma nyams pa ni gang lus kyi las dge ba la gnas pa dang / /ngag gi las dge ba la gnas pa dang / /yid kyi las dge ba la gnas pa dang / /brtson 'grus gang ji snyed yod pa
148b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang ldan pa'o/ /lus dang / dag gi brtson 'grus pas sems kyi brtson 'grus nyid mchog ces bshad do/ /de la sems kyis
148b3(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus gang zhe na/ /gang sems kyi 'jug pa dang gnas pa'o/ /de la sems kyi 'jug pa gang zhe na/ /byang chub la rtsol ba'o/ /de la sems kyi gnas pa gang zhe na/ gang
148b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyi sems nye bar ma zhi ba'o/ /de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/ /gang sems can thams cad la snying rje che ba'o/ /de la gnas pa gang zhe na/ /gang bdag med pa la bzod pa'o/ /
148b5(dkon brtsegs): de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/ /gang sems can thams cad sdud pa'o/ /de la gnas pa gang zhe na/ /gang sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'o/ /'jug pa ni 'khor
148b6(dkon brtsegs): bas yongs su mi skyo'o/ /gnas pa ni khams gsum mi dmig pa'o/ /'jug pa ni nor thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o/ /gnas pa ni sbyin pa mi snyems pa'o/ /'jug pa ni tshul
148b7(dkon brtsegs): khrims yang dag par 'dzin pa'o/ /gnas pa ni tshul khrims mi snyems pa'o/ /'jug pa ni bzod pas sdug bsngal bzod pa'o/ gnas pa ni sems mi 'khrug pa'o/ /'jug
148b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad rtsom pa'o/ /gnas pa ni sems rab tu dben pa'o/ /'jug pa ni bsam gtan sgrub pa'o/ /gnas pa ni sems nges par rtog pa'o/ 'jug
149a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni thos pas mi ngoms pa'o/ /gnas pa ni tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba'o/ /'jug pa ni thos pa ston pa'o/ /gnas pa ni brjod tu med pa'i chos nyid do/ /'jug
149a2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba'o/ /gnas pa ni spros pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'o/ 'jug pa ni tshangs pa'i gnas sogs pa'o/ gnas pa ni yang dag
149a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes kyi btang snyoms so/ /'jug pa ni mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /gnas pa ni zag pa zad pa yongs su 'dris par byed pa'o/ /'jug pa ni dran pa
149a4(dkon brtsegs): nye bar gzhag pa sgom pa'o/ /gnas pa ni dran pa med pa'o/ /yid la byed pa med pa'o/ /'jug pa ni yang dag par spong ba la rab tu sbyor ba'o/ /gnas pa ni dge ba dang mi dge
149a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dang bral ba'o/ /'jug pa ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mngon par sgrub pa'o/ /gnas pa ni lhun gyis 'grub pas bya ba 'jug pa'o/ /'jug pa ni dbang po la mkhas pa'o/ /gnas
149a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni dbang po'i chos la so sor rtog pa'o/ /'jug pa ni stobs sgrub pa'o/ /gnas pa ni mi rdzi ba'i gnas so/ /'jug pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag yang dag par 'byung ba'o/ /
149a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ni chos la rab tu shes pa'i ye shes so/ /'jug pa ni lam gyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba'o/ /gnas pa ni gang du yang mi 'gro ba'o/ /'jug pa ni zhi gnas yongs su
149a8(dkon brtsegs): tshol ba'o/ /gnas pa ni zhi gnas kyi sems so/ /'jug pa ni lhag mthong gi tshogs so/ /gnas pa ni chos nyid rig pa'o/ /'jug pa ni rgyu khong du chud pa'o/ /gnas
149b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni rgyu yongs su shes pa'o/ /'jug pa ni gzhan gyi sgra thos pa'o/ /gnas pa ni chos la nan tan byed pa'o/ /'jug pa ni chos kyi sku'i rgyan to/ /gnas pa ni chos kyi sku nyid do/ /
149b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa ni ngag gi rgyan to/ /gnas pa ni 'phags pa'i mi smra ba'o/ /'jug pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la mos pa'o/ /gnas pa ni mi byed pa'o/ /'jug pa ni bdud
149b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi rnam par spong ba'o/ /gnas pa ni bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa 'dor ba'o/ /'jug pa ni thabs mkhas pa'o/ /gnas pa ni shes rab kyis blta'o/ /'jug pa ni mi dmigs
149b4(dkon brtsegs): par blta'o/ /gnas pa ni sgrol bar blta'o/ /'jug pa ni brdar blta'o/ /gnas pa ni don du blta'o/ /'di ni sems kyi brtson 'grus shes bya ste/ /gang brtson 'grus la
149b5(dkon brtsegs): rtsom pa dang / /'bad pa dang / rtul ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa zhes bya'o/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu brtson 'grus rtul ba ma nyams pa'i byang chub
149b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni chos lngas mngon par 'phags pa yin te/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /chos lnga po gang
149b7(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par 'phags pa yin zhe na/ /sangs rgyas byung ba mnyes par byed pas mngon par 'phags pa yin/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pas mngon par 'phags pa yin/
149b8(dkon brtsegs): dal ba phun sum tshogs pa thob pas mngon par 'phags pa yin/ ji ltar dge ba'i chos bsgrubs pa chud mi za bas mngon par 'phags pa yin/ /sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub

150a3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'phags pa mi 'gyur ba de lta bu mchis sam/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /shA ri'i bu yod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ji lta bu lags/ /bde bar gshegs

155a1(dkon brtsegs): lhas kun nas bskor ba'i brgya byin lta bu/ yid rab tu zhi ba'i tshangs pa lta bu'i bcom 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

155a7(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ byang chub kyi ni lam gyi phyir/ zas dang skom ni mi bza'o/ /sdom pa 'di ni rgyal ba ste/ bdag ni khyim 'dir dga' ba med/ sems can kun gyi mchog 'di ni/ skar

155b3(dkon brtsegs): mchog sangs rgyas 'gyur ro zhes/ bzang po'i sgra ni bdag gis bsgrag /bdag nor shes par mi 'gyur ba/ ser sna can gyi rtags yin no/ /bdag ni mi smra mi bya ste/
155b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gtong nor lta ga la zhig /khyim 'di dag ni khyod kyi'o/ /nga ni byang chub lam phyir 'gro/ /khyim dang nor ni khyod kyi ste/ bdag ni sangs rgyas dga' ba'o/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis
155b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog gi mtshan/ 'di 'dra ba dag mthong gyur na/ lta ba nyams pa ma gtogs par/ byang chub mchog ni su mi tshol/ khyim dag dang ni nor rnams dang / pha dang ma dang gnyen
155b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / bdag gis de dag kun spangs te/ sangs rgyas drung du 'gro bar bya/ 'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa'i/ 'jig rten snang mdzad rab tu dkon/ bskal pa bye ba
155b7(dkon brtsegs): stong du yang / de ni thos par shin du dkon/ nam mkha' dag pa'i zla ba ni/ sa la lam mer 'dug pa ltar/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhugs nas/ dge slong dge 'dun
155b8(dkon brtsegs): mdun du byas/ 'od zer stong pa'i nyi ma ni/ bar snang gnas na lhang nge ba/ de bzhin sangs rgyas sras dbus na/ kun nas rab tu mdzes par snang / ri yi rgyal po
156a1(dkon brtsegs): ri rab ni/ rin chen bdag nyid mdzes par snang / de bzhin sangs rgyas mdzes pa yang / /dge slong dge 'dun mdun du byas/ /sku yi gzi brjid 'bar
156a2(dkon brtsegs): ba ni/ /'gro ba 'di dag rnams la snang / /gzi brjid phung po'i gzugs can te/ /rkang gnyis dam pa de mdzes so/ /lha dang klu dang mi rnams ni/ /rdzu 'phrul dag
156a3(dkon brtsegs): gis rab sdud cing / /rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor zhugs nas/ /cho 'phrul dag ni rnam par ston/ /sum bcu rtsa gnyis bsod nams dam mchog mtshan/ /chos kyi bdag
156a4(dkon brtsegs): po 'di 'dra mthong nas ni/ /byis pa ma bslabs pa dag ma gtogs par/ /theg pa dman la su zhig 'jug par 'gyur/ /shin du dkon pa rab tu mdzes byung ba/
156a5(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog 'di ni bdag gis mthong bas na/ /byang chub phyir ni mngon par zhugs gyur nas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i drung du nye bar 'gro/ /shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom
156a6(dkon brtsegs): pas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /bdag ni le lo'i lam dag nas/ /sangs rgyas drung du mi 'gro ste/ /khang thog 'di nas phyi rol du/
156a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis lus ni mchod par bya/ /bdag tu 'du shes bsal gyur nas/ /srog la blta bar mi bya ste/ /ye shes mchog ni yongs btsal zhing / /sangs rgyas drung du 'gro
156a8(dkon brtsegs): bar bya/ /pha la chags dang ma la chags/ /khyim la chags pa mi bzad pa/ /de dag thams cad rnam spangs nas/ /sangs rgyas drang du 'gro bar bya/ /'di 'drar
156b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar gang 'dod pa/ /de ni sangs rgyas dga' ba yin/ /rin po che ni kun spangs nas/ /khyim med par ni rab tu 'byung / /de ltar shA ri'i bu khye'u sdom pa la gnas
156b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ni khyim gyi skas las babs te/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags ga la ba der song
156b3(dkon brtsegs): ngo / /yang shA ri'i bu khye'u sdom pa ni khang thog de nas mchongs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags ga la ba der shin du myur du song ngo / /khye'u
156b4(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa la gnas pa ni phyi nas song ngo / /shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pas bcom ldan 'das de la na bza' srang bye ba ri ba phul te/ /de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
156b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol to/ /bdag ni gzugs rnams tshol ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas na bza' 'bul ma lags/ /mi mchog dag ni ci 'dra ba/ /de 'dra bar ni 'gyur bar bgyi/ /ye shes
156b6(dkon brtsegs): phung po ldan pa dang / /brtson 'grus stobs la rab gnas shing / /sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba/ /rkang gnyis dam par gyur par shog //stobs bcu rnams dang
156b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyur cing / /mi 'jigs pa la rab gnas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ci 'dra bar/ /de 'dra bar ni gyur par shog //khyod kyis chos gang mkhyen pa dang / /gang la
156b8(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs par lhang nge bar/ /byang chub dam pa sangs rgyas nas/ /bdag ni chos de ston par shog //bdag ni gzugs rnams mngon par tshol ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas
157a1(dkon brtsegs): na bza' mchog 'bul ma lags kyi/ /lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub mchog gi zhi ba mngon par tshol/ /gnyis su med pa'i
157a2(dkon brtsegs): chos mchog der gnas shing / /pha rol rgol ba kun gyis mi g.yos pa/ /chos de nyid ni mngon par 'tshal ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas la ni na bza' mchog 'bul lo/ /lhar
157a3(dkon brtsegs): bcas 'jig rten dag la sman pa'i phyir/ /gang na skye rga na 'chi ma mchis shing / /mya ngan dang ni smre sngags ma mchis pa/ /zhi ba'i chos de bdag ni ston par shog /gang na 'dod
157a4(dkon brtsegs): chags zhe sdang ma mchis shing / /gti mug ma mchis sred pa ma mchis pa/ /bsil dngos bdud rtsi 'dus ma bgyis pa de/ /bdag ni byang chub sangs rgyas ston par shog /
157a5(dkon brtsegs): gang la khyod bzhugs sems can lha klu dang / /de bzhin mi dang sems med dngos po dang / /de ltar sems dang ldan pa rab 'dud pa/ /bdag ni zhi ba'i chos de ston par shog //gar
157a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas sangs rgyas zhing du snang ba dang / /phyogs bzhi dag na kun du snang ba dang / /mun pa chen por 'od zer phung lta bu'i/ /bsil dngos bdud rtsi de la reg par shog //'dod pa'i
157a7(dkon brtsegs): khams dang gzugs kyi khams dag dang / /de bzhin gzugs med khams la rtag mi gnas/ /dga' dang mi dga' thams cad rab dben ba'i/ /chos kyi dam pa de ni bdag
157a8(dkon brtsegs): ston shog / /shA ri'i bu de nas khye'u sdom pa la gnas pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par
157b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa de la shing lham sar pa zung cig phul lo/ /phul nas kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /sems can rnams kyi gnas rten dang / /dpung
157b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyen mgon du gyur par shog / /ngan pa'i lam du mi mchi zhing / /rtag tu lam rnams ston par shog //byis pa rnams kyi spyod yul 'di/ /'dod pa nam yang sten ma
157b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ 'dus byas dag kyang rnam spangs nas/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas 'byung rnyed gyur/ 'jig rten snang mdzad mthong nas kyang / /rkang gnyis dam pa mchod par gyur/ /
157b4(dkon brtsegs): srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /byang chub dam pa yongs su btsal/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /me tog phreng ba spos rnams dang / /rgyal mtshan dag dang
157b5(dkon brtsegs): gdugs rnams kyis/ /glang po chen po bkur sti bgyi/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /chos gos dag dang bsod snyoms dang / /mal stan rnams dang gding ba
157b6(dkon brtsegs): yis/ sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par bgyi/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /rnga dang dung dang rnga chen dang / /sil snyan dag dang pi bang gis/ /'jig rten snang
157b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad mchod par shog / /bza' ba dang ni bca' ba dang / /dus kyis ma phye bza' ba rnams/ /de dag gis ni 'jig rten mgon/ /skyob pa bdag gis mchod pa bgyi/ /
157b8(dkon brtsegs): srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /mchod pa rgya chen bgyis gyur nas/ /de nyid du ni rab byung ste/ /tshangs par spyod pa bdag gis spyad/ /srog chags kun gyi mgon du
158a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gyur cig / /bdag ni lam gol nam yang 'gro ma gyur/ /yan lag brgyad ldan lam mchog rab gnas nas/ /bdag gis srog chags bye ba de nyid
158a2(dkon brtsegs): dgrol/ /dman la 'phags min mchog tu smad pa yi/ /'dod la bdag ni nam yang sten ma 'gyur/ /bag med thams cad yongs su spangs gyur nas/ /bdag ni rtag
158a3(dkon brtsegs): tu bag yod gyur par shog / /mi khom brgyad lam nam yang skye ma 'gyur/ /rtag tu dad pa'i rigs su skyes gyur cing / /skyes par gyur nas mi mchog rnams mthong la/ mthong
158a4(dkon brtsegs): nas de la bdag ni dad par shog / /'di 'dra'i ye shes de ni btsal ba'i phyir/ /dad pa'i sems kyis me tog phreng ba dang / /byug pa dag dang rdza rnga rnga chen dang / /rnga dang gling bu
158a5(dkon brtsegs): dag gis ri mor bgyi/ /bskal pa bye mang rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ /mchod pa chen po dag ni bgyis gyur nas/ /myur du 'dod pa spangs te rab byung la/ /tshangs par spyod
158a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bdag ni spyod par shog / /de dag sa phyogs gang du 'dug ste/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par
158a7(dkon brtsegs): ' phags pa'i rgyal po de la tshigs su bcad pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa'i sa phyogs der tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug lag khang rgyar
158a8(dkon brtsegs): dpag tshad bzhi/ /'phang du dpag tshad phyed pa byas te/ /de dag gis gtsug lag khang de byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/ /phul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
158b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /gnas pa gang la khyod ni bzhugs gyur pas/ /sngon gyi rgyal bas bzhi po gang
158b2(dkon brtsegs): bsngags pa/ /gnas pa de ni btsal bar bgyi ba'i phyir/ /gtsug lag khang 'di bde bar gshegs la 'bul/ /gnas pa dag ni gang la rtag bzhugs na/ /'das
158b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung ba yi/ /sems ni srog chags bye bas mi 'tshal ba'i/ /spyod pa de ni bdag gis btsal bar bgyi/ /spyod pa gang dag pha rol son pa ni/ /yang
158b4(dkon brtsegs): dag spong dang de bzhin rdzu 'phrul rkang / /mchog bzhi rnams kyi so sor yang dag rig //spyod pa de dag bdag gis btsal bar bgyi/ /de dag gis gtsug lag khang de nyid
158b5(dkon brtsegs): du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de dang / /dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la zla ba phyed kyi bar du sti stang du byed/ /bla mar
158b6(dkon brtsegs): byed/ /ri mor byed/ /mchod par byed de/ de dag gis gtsug lag khang der de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la sti stang byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor
158b7(dkon brtsegs): byas/ /mchod par byas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi drung du skra dang kha spu brags nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
158b8(dkon brtsegs): nas dge ba'i chos tshol ba la brtson par gyur te/ /dge ba'i chos tshol ba la yid brtson par gyur to/ /de nas gcig gis smras pa/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od byed par/ /
159a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni dang por sngar gyur cig //gcig shos kyis smras pa/ /ded dpon mi yi gtso bor yang / /bdag ni dang por sngar gyur cig //de na shA ri'i bu gang
159a2(dkon brtsegs): s dom pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de'i spyan sngar 'dug nas
159a3(dkon brtsegs): yid dam bcas pa/ /stan dag la yang mi 'dug cing / /bdag ni mal du mi nyal lo/ /srog chags rnams kyi don 'tshal phyir/ /bdag gis byang chub lam btsal lo// /
159a4(dkon brtsegs): bdag nyid kyi yang lus dang ni/ /srog kyang yongs su spangs bgyis te/ /le lo dag ni kun spangs nas/ /byang chub dam pa btsal bar bgyi/ /sha rnams dang ni de bzhin khrag
159a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / /lpags pa dang ni rgyus skams srog bor te/ /le lo thams cad yongs su spangs bgyis nas/ /byang chub mchog phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi/ /shA
159a6(dkon brtsegs): r i'i bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdom pa la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdom pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras
159a7(dkon brtsegs): so/ /bdag cag gnyis ni 'dus gyur nas/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ byang chub spyod pa rnams spyad cing / /brtson 'grus dam pa brtsam bar bya/ /lus rnams
159a8(dkon brtsegs): dang ni de bzhin srog bor te/ /sha dang khrag ni rtag tu skams gyur kyang / /srid pa stong du khyod kyi rjes slob cing / /byang chub mchog phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/ /gang du
159b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi bdag po bzhugs mdzes pa/ /ye shes dam pa yongs su btsal bya zhing / /dgon pa'i gnas kyi ri dang chu drung du/ /the tshom med par brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/
159b2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa dang / /sdom pa la gnas pa lo stong du len 'ga' yang tha na se gol gtogs pa srid du yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis
159b3(dkon brtsegs): non par ma gyur to/ /lo stong du lan 'ga' yang nyal lo snyam du nyal ba'i sems ma bskyed do/ /lo stong du lan 'ga' yang 'dug go snyam du stan 'dod par ma gyur to/ /
159b4(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis bshang ba dang / /gci ba'i tshe ma gtogs par lo stong du tha na lan 'ga' yang tsog tsog por ma 'dug go/ /nam kha zas za ba na yang 'greng bzhin du kham gsum
159b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum tsam za zhing chu phor gang tsam 'thung ngo / /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang kha zas 'dod pa 'am/ /bkres na myur du kha zas rnyed par dga' ba ma bskyed do/ /
159b6(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang kha zas de las lhag par ma zos so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du kha zas za ba na lan 'ga' yang kha zas la mngar ba dang / skyur
159b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / bro ba dang / tsha ba dang / kha ba dang / bska bar tha na sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang 'du shes ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du bsod snyoms sgrub pa la deng la
159b8(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms sbyin pa 'di bud med dam/ /skyes pa 'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ su zhig ces lan 'ga' yang gdong du ma bltas so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du shing
160a1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi drung na gnas pa shing de la gyen du lan 'ga' yang ma bltas so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang chos gos gnyis su ma brjes so/ /
160a2(dkon brtsegs): de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma brtags/ /gnod sems kyi rnam par rtogs pa ma brtags/ 'tshe
160a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma brtags so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang zla ba la song ba 'am/ /nyi ma song ba 'am/ pha la song
160a4(dkon brtsegs): ba 'am/ ma la song ba 'am/ spun la song ba 'am/ sring mo la song ba 'am/ nye du la song pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma skyed do/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong 'das kyi bar du lan
160a5(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang khyim la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa ma brtags so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang zla ba 'am/ nyi ma 'am/
160a6(dkon brtsegs): skar ma'i gzugs sam/ bar snang la gyen du ma bltas so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang brtsig pa 'am/ /shing la ma bsnyes so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong
160a7(dkon brtsegs): du lan 'ga' yang mar ram/ /'bru mar gyis lus ma bskus so/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mar dang ldan pa'i sems
160a8(dkon brtsegs): ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis kyis lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed pa gcig kyang lus la skyo ba ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du lan 'ga' yang tha na sems bskyed
160b1(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig kyang bdag cag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus shes lus ngal ba ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis lo
160b2(dkon brtsegs): stong du lan 'ga' yang lus na pa 'am/ /sems na par ma gyur to/ /de dag gis lo stong 'das kyi bar du nam yang skra breg par sems ma bskyed do/ /gzhan du na rgyal
160b3(dkon brtsegs): po chen po bzhi 'ongs nas mgo la byugs te skra khyer nas phyir 'dong ngo / /de dag skra khyer nas mchod rten btsugs so/ /de dag gis lo stong gi bar du rgyal po chen po
160b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'ongs pa dang / /song pa la nam yang 'ong ba dang / /'gro ba'i sems ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du grib ma bab pa na nyi ma dang / /nyi mas phog
160b5(dkon brtsegs): na grib ma'i sems ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis kyis lo stong du grang ba'i dus na yang lan 'ga' yang lus la g.yog pa'i 'du shes ma bskyed do/ /de gnyis kyis lo
160b6(dkon brtsegs): stong du lan 'ga' yang 'jig rten gyi tshig ma smras so/ /yang shA ri'i bu de'i dus na dran pa rmongs byed ces bya ba'i bdud gcig byung ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na da ltar gyi nga'i
160b7(dkon brtsegs): bdud sdig can bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bu bdud dran pa rmongs byed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa'i 'chag sar ral gri'i so gtams pa byas par gyur pa dang / /des ral
160b8(dkon brtsegs): gri'i so de la ral gri'i sor 'du shes bskyed nas des bdag ni bag med pa la gnas so/ /bdag ni bag med pa la gnas so zhes sgra phyung ba dang / /sgra des stong gsum
161a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur to/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar
161a2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa dang / /de nas steng gi bar snang las bdud kyi ris kyi lha bye ba brgya phrag stong gis kye ma'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' shi 'phos su ma gyur to/ /shi 'phos su ma gyur to/ /
161a3(dkon brtsegs): zhes sgra phyung ngo / /shA ri'i bu de nas byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa de ltar 'chag pas sems bskyed pa de'i rjes su zhugs te/ /yang shA ri'i bu lha dang bcas pa'i sgra gnyis
161a4(dkon brtsegs): pa phyung ba de byang chub sems dpa' sdom pas ma thos so/ /gang lha'i sgra dang / /gang sdom pa'i sgra de gnyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas pas ma thos te shA ri'i
161a5(dkon brtsegs): bu skyes bu dam pa de gnyis spyod lam de lta bu dang / /spyod pa de lta bu dang / /nan tan de lta bu dang / /snying rje chen po de lta bu dang / rtul ba de lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ /de gnyis kyis
161a6(dkon brtsegs): lo stong du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgoms so/ /gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / /
161a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas lha zhig 'ongs nas rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes sbran te/ /de gnyis kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes
161a8(dkon brtsegs): thos nas bcom ldan 'das de'i khri gang na yod pa der song ste/ /'greng bzhin du thal mo sbyar nas nyi ma bdun gyi bar du mig mi 'dzums par lta ste/ /byams pa dang ldan
161b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'gran zla med pas gus pas rjes su dran par byas te/ /de dag gis brtson 'grus ma btang pas 'greng bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /de dag de nas shi 'phos
161b2(dkon brtsegs): nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so/ /de gnyis tshangs par gyur nas slar log ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i
161b3(dkon brtsegs): mchod rten byas nas lo bzhi khri'i bar du mchod rten gyi yo byad kyi las byas so/ /de gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi gdugs btsugs zin par shes
161b4(dkon brtsegs): nas lo bdun khri'i bar du 'greng bzhin du thal mo sbyar te gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de la phyag byed do/ /de dag tshe'i mthar phyin te shi 'phos nas yang 'dzam
161b5(dkon brtsegs): bu gling nyid du skyes te/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su ma'i mngal du mtshe mar skyes so/ /de gnyis skyes ma thag tu gcig gis gcig dran nas bdag cag bag yod pa
161b6(dkon brtsegs): la gnas par bya'o/ /bdag cag bag yod pa'i mchog bsgom par bya'o zhes smras nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /'byor dang rgyas shing rtag tu lo
161b7(dkon brtsegs): legs pa'i/ /yid 'ong rgyal po'i rigs su bdag cag skyes/ /bag med rgyags pa rab tu spang bya ste/ /byang chub dam pa rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /'dod dang longs spyod
161b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rgyal po'i srid/ /yid brtan mi rung ring por mi thogs te/ /byang chub dam pa yongs su tshol ba na/ /mkhas pa de la 'dod pa mi skyed do/ /srog chags phan
162a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir byang chub gang zhugs pa/ /'dod dang longs spyod la ni 'dod mi skyed/ /myur du 'dod pa spangs shing rab byung nas/ /tshangs par spyod pa dam pa mchog
162a2(dkon brtsegs): spyad do/ /sngon 'das dus ni shin du rgyas pa nas/ /lha rdzas dag dang mi yi bzang po dang / /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag bsten gyur kyang / /de la nam yang ngoms pa ma rnyed do/ /
162a3(dkon brtsegs): de phyir rgyal srid rgyas dang gnyen tshogs dang / /'dod pa'i yon tan 'di dag spang bya ste/ /lus skyes nas ni myur du rab byung la/ /byang chub phyir ni brtson 'grus brtsam
162a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya/ /de gnyis skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang 'dra bar gyur nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung
162a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ /lo nyi khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /de nas shi 'phos nas slar yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos nas slar
162a6(dkon brtsegs): yang 'dzam bu gling du skyes so/ /yang shA ri'i bu de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri mchog ces bya ba rig pa dang
162a7(dkon brtsegs): zhabs su ldan pa/ /bde bar gshegs pa/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa/ /skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ /lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ /sangs rgyas bcom
162a8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de de gnyis kyis mnyes par byas te/ /de gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos
162b1(dkon brtsegs): ngur smrig bgos te/ /dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /de gnyis rab tu byung nas lo bye ba tshang bar tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /shA ri'i bu rnam grangs
162b2(dkon brtsegs): des sangs rgyas khri mnyes par byas te/ /byang chub sems dpa' sdom pas thams cad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas
162b3(dkon brtsegs): pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad do/ /de la shA ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa zhes bya ba de sngar bla na med pa yang dag par
162b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus 'bar ba zhes bya
162b5(dkon brtsegs): ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom
162b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ /de lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du gnas so/ /de'i nyan thos kyang bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu'i nyan thos kyi 'dus pa chen po byung ngo / /
162b7(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de la gang byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas shes bya ba de ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus 'bar ba byang chub thob pa de'i 'khor los sgyur
162b8(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyal por gyur te/ /des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang / /dge slong gi dge 'dun du bcas pa la zla ba gsum gyi bar du na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / na pa'i
163a1(dkon brtsegs): gsos sman dang / /yo byad nams kyis sti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas so/ /de nas shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
163a2(dkon brtsegs): g shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus 'bar ba des rgyal po de 'ongs par mkhyen nas rgyal po la bskul ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su
163a3(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams thob pa la/ /brtson 'grus dam pa mchog yin te/ /'dod la brkam pa'i sems can rnams/ /sems can
163a4(dkon brtsegs): don byed shin du dkon/ /'dod la brkam pa'i don rnams gang / /de ni mkhas pa'i don ma yin/ /khyod ni don med gnas pa ste/ /mchog gi don ni tshol ma yin/ /nga nyid dang
163a5(dkon brtsegs): ni khyod nyid du/ /sngon ni spun du gyur ba ste/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas myur grub ces/ /de na bdag cag dam bcas so/ /ngas ni byang chub thob gyur te/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor
163a6(dkon brtsegs): lo bskor ba ltos/ /khyod ni khyim dang chung ma dag //rtag tu srung zhing gnas pa yin/ /mkhas pa rnams ni 'di la yid mi rton/ /'dod pa 'di dag ngan ces rgyal bas
163a7(dkon brtsegs): gsungs/ /skye bo dag ni bag med don spyod de/ /de phyir don min rtag tu rnam par spongs/ /blo gros ngan pa don med khur khyer te/ /khyod ni don med pa la rab tu gnas/ /
163a8(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dag gis 'byung ba rab tu bsngags/ /'dod yon sdug bsngal 'thob byed mi shes so/ /bcom ldan 'das des tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis de bskul ba dang /
163b1(dkon brtsegs): de bu la ma bltas/ chung ma la yang ma bltas/ /tshong dpon dang / blon po dang / pha dang ma dang / mkhar gyi rgyal po dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / rgyal srid thams cad la
163b2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma bltas/ nor gyi phung po thams cad la yang ma chags par stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar 'dug nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
163b3(dkon brtsegs): dag smras so/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub phyir/ bdag gi sha yang skams par bgyi/ /khyim kun kyang ni spang bar bgyi/ /dgon par mchis nas 'gum par bgyi/ /
163b4(dkon brtsegs): srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /khyim med par ni rab byung nas/ /dgon pa rab dgon sten bgyid cing / /phyir yang brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi/ /byis pa smra ba
163b5(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa yi/ /'dod pa'i phyir yang mi sten te/ /de la gnas par gyur pas na/ bdag ni rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur/ /'dod dang longs spyod rgyal srid dang / /thams cad
163b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par spangs gyur te/ /'jig rten mgon gyi bstan pa la/ /deng nyid bdag ni rab tu byung / /byang chub phyir ni spyad pa spyod byed na/ /mkhas pas su zhig 'dus byas
163b7(dkon brtsegs): yid rton byed/ /gang du bdag ni 'dod la zhugs gyur pas/ /brtson 'grus brtsams kyang byang chub reg ma gyur/ /de bas 'dod pa'i yon tan bdag spangs te/ longs
163b8(dkon brtsegs): spyod bde dang rgyal srid bde spangs nas/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la ched du rab byung la/ /byang chub mchog phyir brtson 'grus brtsam par bgyi/ des tshigs su bcad pa de dag
164a1(dkon brtsegs): smras nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi drung du skra dang kha spu bregs te/ /gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /rgyal po mngon par
164a2(dkon brtsegs): byung zhing rab tu byung bar shes nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcu dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo / /des bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya
164a3(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel la mchod pa byas nas de nas shi 'phos ma thag tu dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i rgyal por skyes so/ /de dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi
164a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phos nas bskal pa de nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
164a5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas legs spyod ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ /rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de lo
164a6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba tshang bar gnas so/ /de'i nyan thos kyang bye ba khrag khrig tshang ba'i nyan thos chen po 'dus par gyur te/ /thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ /zag pa zad pa nas
164a7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa sha stag gi bar du'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgya phrag stong yang bla na med pa yang dag par
164a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i bar du bkod do/ /chos bstan nas sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don byas te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de yongs su mya
164b1(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos ni bskal pa las lhag par gnas par gyur to/ /de'i ring bsrel yang rgyas par gyur te/ /'di lta ste dper na nga da yongs su
164b2(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das nas ring srel rgyas par 'gyur ba bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa la gnas
164b3(dkon brtsegs): p a'i rjes su byang chub sems dpa' bslab cing brtson 'grus ma nyams par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa spyad par bya ba'i sems can keng rus la gnas pa
164b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / /ser sna la gnas pa dag gi rjes su bslab par mi bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la la byang chub 'dod la gzhan gyi khyim la ser sna skyed na/ /
164b5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de la 'jigs pa gsum 'byung bar shes par bya'o/ /gsum gang zhe na/ gzhan gyi khyim dag tu kha zas kyi phyir smra/ /kun du smra ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i dge slong
164b6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan mthong na/ /phrag dog dang / ser sna skyed cing / khong khro ba'i sems gcig tsam gyis kyang mi mthun par byed na des sems can dmyal ba'i lam yongs su gzung bar
164b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ /dmus long gi sa bon btab par 'gyur/ /mtha' 'khob du skye ba'i gnas yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gang la las 'phags pa'i dge slong mthong
164b8(dkon brtsegs): na khro ba'i zil gyis non te/ /khro ba'i sems kyis mi smra zhing ser sna skyed de/ /khong khro ba'i sems gcig tsam gyis kyang mi mthun par byed na/ /des sems can dmyal
165a1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i lam yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ /dmus long gis sa bon btab par 'gyur/ /mir skyes na yang mtha' 'khob kyi mi'i yul phyogs su skye ba'i gnas
165a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ /khong khro ba mang bar 'gyur/ dmus long du 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi dring 'jog cing skur pa mang bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
165a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' gzhan gyi khyim la phrag dog dang / ser sna skye ba de'i tshe de dag 'jigs pa 'di gsum yid la bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das la/
165a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la de ltar rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/ /de bzhin
165a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas khyim gyi ser sna las byung ba 'di lta bu bshad pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag nyan thos rnams la yang khyim gyi ser sna las 'byung ba legs
165a6(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu bshad du gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sems can dmyal ba las thar bar 'tshal ba lags kyi bdag cag dmus long 'tshal ba ma lags so/ /
165a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag gtsug ma mchis pa'i 'khon mi 'tshal te/ /bdag cag kyang skur pa 'debs par 'tshal ba ma lags so/ /bdag cag mtha' 'khob kyi gnas 'tshal ba
165a8(dkon brtsegs): ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni yul gyi dbus kyi phyogs 'tshal te/ /bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / /chos mnyan pa yongs su ma btang
165b1(dkon brtsegs): ngo / /de skad ces gsol nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu khyod 'di ltar gnas zhing drang bar gyur te/ /
165b2(dkon brtsegs): gang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so/ /legs so/ /ngo mtshar to/ /de bas na shA ri'i bu gang 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa la
165b3(dkon brtsegs): slob par 'dod pa de dag gi phyir bshad par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa slob par 'dod pa de dag gi mdun du bshad par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir
165b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ /shA ri'i bu ma bslabs na 'thab pa'i rtsa ba rtsod par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni dad pa dang dang ba mang zhing sems can rnams kyi skyabs
165b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi phyir yun ring por lta ba dang / dus ring por lta bar 'gyur zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du song nas yongs su dri bar byed de des 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas
165b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang / /dad pa dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po thob par 'gyur te/ nan tan gyis kyang sgrub mod kyi/ /shA ri'i bu gang lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su
165b7(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod pa'i sems can de dag ni nyung bar 'gyur te/ /phal cher dngos po gsum la gnas so/ /gsum gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang /
165b8(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa tshol ba dang / /mdza' bo'i khyim dang / slong ba'i khyim tshol ba dang / /gnas yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyug pa tshol te/ /dngos po gsum po 'di dag
166a1(dkon brtsegs): la gnas so/ /de bas na gang dngos po 'di gsum la gnas pa de dag ni ngan song gsum las yongs su mi thar to/ /de dag sems can dmyal
166a2(dkon brtsegs): ba las thar pa dang / /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / /gshin rje'i 'jig rten las thar par bya ba la spro ba chung zhing de dag mtho ris zad par 'gyur ba dang / gleng ba dang /
166a3(dkon brtsegs): 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'breg pa dang / 'gyed pa la brtson zhing lta bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag ma dad par gyur pas mdza' ba mang por yongs su zin nas dgon par
166a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa spong ba rjes su 'thob par 'gyur te/ de dag la khyim pa dag tshe dang ldan pa khyod nged kyi gnas dang nye bar gnas par gyis shig dang / /nged kyis chos gos dang /
166a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms dang / mal stan dang / na pa'i gsos sman dang / yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa dgon pa la gnas na nged kyis kyang khyod mi mthong / khyod kyis
166a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang nged mi mthong zhes de skad zer zhing de dag phan tshun smra ba mang bas gnas la chags nas mngon par dgal ba skyed de/ de dag gnas la sred pa skyed par 'gyur/ ring du
166a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas par 'gyur/ /mdza' bo'i khyim dang / /slong ba'i sbyin pa'i khyim mang bar 'gyur te/ /de dag phyi phyir zhing mthong na gcig la gcig sred par 'gyur te/ de la gang dge
166a8(dkon brtsegs): slong thor bur 'ongs pa de dag la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur te/ /mang du thos pa ma yin no/ /rgyun du zhugs pa ma yin no zhes smra bar byed/ /lan cig phyir 'ong
166b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ma yin no zhes smra bar byed/ /dgra bcom pa ma yin no zhes smra bar byed de/ /gzhan la bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par bya ba la spro bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bu de la khyim pa de
166b2(dkon brtsegs): dag gang dge slong thur bur 'ongs pa de dag ni bdag cag gi drung na yung ring du gnas pa ma yin gyi/ /gang dge slong 'khod pa dag ni bdag cag gcig gi gcig don gyi pho nya yin
166b3(dkon brtsegs): no zhes de snyam du sems te/ /de dag gcig la gcig ser sna byed par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu de la kha cig ni chos 'di lta bur khong du chud par ma gyur/ khong du ma chud/ khong du chud par mi 'gyur te/
166b4(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad mdo sde 'di lta bu dag spong bar gyur/ /spong bar byed/ spong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu'i tshig dang 'bru'i
166b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs thos nas thos ma thag tu mos par mi byed kyi sems can gang ngan song du 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag ni smod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu de la byang chub
166b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa ni ser sna dang / /phrag dog gi gzhi 'di lta bu ngan song du 'gro ba'i las thos nas khyim gyi ser sna ma byas pa yang mi byed/ khyim gyi ser
166b7(dkon brtsegs): sna byas pa yang 'chags par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /gzhan yang
166b8(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu brtson 'grus ma nyams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na sems can thams cad la nad par 'du shes bskyed de/ /sems
167a1(dkon brtsegs): can de dag thams cad ni gdung ba'i nad 'di gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs so/ /gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang /
167a2(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi gdung ba'o/ /sman dang rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba gang gis sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / /zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / gti
167a3(dkon brtsegs): mug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang / rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba bdag gis bsdu bar bya'o zhes de ltar sems shing de chos kyi sman dang / rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba
167a4(dkon brtsegs): gang gis sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / /zhe sdang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / /gti mug rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang /

167a6(dkon brtsegs): bu sems can thams cad ni gdung ba'i nad gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs nas na pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba'o/ /
167a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang sems can dmyal bar skye ba de dag kyang gdung ba 'di gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs te/ 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi
167a8(dkon brtsegs): gdung ba'o/ /gang dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gang gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa dang / gang mi'i 'jig rten pa dang / gang lhar skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang 'dod chags
167b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gis gdung ba 'di gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs te/ gang sems can de dag gi sman pa gso bar byed pa de dag
167b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba'i gdung ba 'di gsum gyis rtag tu gdungs te/ /de la sman pa gzhan dang / sman gzhan
167b3(dkon brtsegs): bsku ba'i sbyor bas sems can de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya mi nus kyi/ gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs
167b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sku thob pas bdag nyid sman du gyur par byin gyis brlabs nas sems can
167b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed nus so/ /de bas na shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar rig par bya
167b6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ gang sman pa phal dang / sman gyis bsku ba'i sbyor ba phal gyis sems can de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu
167b7(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar nus par sla ba ma yin gyi/ gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi
167b8(dkon brtsegs): sku thob pas sems can de dag gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar nus par rig par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu de ji snyam
168a1(dkon brtsegs): du sems/ sems can kyi khams rab tu mang ngam gsol pa/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don gis 'tshal te/ sems can gyi khams
168a2(dkon brtsegs): ni rab tu mang gi/ /sa'i khams ni de lta ma lags so/ /chu'i khams ni de lta ma lags / /me'i khams ni de lta ma lags/ /rlung gi khams ni de lta ma lags so//
168a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ shA ri'i bu sems can gyi khams ni rab tu mang gi/ sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin/ chu'i khams ni de lta ma yin/
168a4(dkon brtsegs): me'i khams ni de lta ma yin/ rlung gi khams ni de lta ma yin no/ /yang shA ri'i bu sems can skal pa mnyam par gyur ba 'di las phyi rol gyi drang song gi lha'i mig la snang bar
168a5(dkon brtsegs): ma gyur pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lha'i mig la snang bar ma gyur pa yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gang shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam gyi khyon la de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i spyan la
168a6(dkon brtsegs): snang bar gyur pa de ni rab tu mang ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu ni de lta ma yin te/ de ltar sems can gyi khams
168a7(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med do/ /shA ri'i bu ji tsam du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can sgong nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal nas skye ba 'am/ drod gsher
168a8(dkon brtsegs): las skye ba 'am/ rdzus te skye ba 'am/ gzugs can nam/ gzugs med pa 'am/ 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min nam
168b1(dkon brtsegs): snang ba 'am/ mi snang ba 'am/ ji tsam sems can kyi khams su btags pa de dag thams cad yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la snga phyi
168b2(dkon brtsegs): med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ /de dag thams cad mir gyur nas kyang sman par gyur te/ tshe'i tshad kyang bskal par gnas par gyur nas yongs su brtag pa bzung ste/ slob
168b3(dkon brtsegs): dpon khams gso ba la mkhas pa 'di lta ste/ /shA ri'i bu da ltar gyi sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed lta bu de dag thams cad 'dus nas sems can gcig gi 'dod chags kyi gdung
168b4(dkon brtsegs): ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad cing sman pa re res kyang bsil ba'i yan lag gi sman ri rab tsam gyi phung po
168b5(dkon brtsegs): bsdus nas de dag thams cad sems can gcig gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsil ba'i yan lag gi phung po btags te/ bskus par gyur kyang shA ri'i
168b6(dkon brtsegs): bu sman pa tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas pa thams cad skyo bar gyur la/ bsil ba'i yan lag gi sman gyi phung po de dag thams cad yongs su 'gribs shing zad par gyur kyang sems
168b7(dkon brtsegs): can gcig gi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba dang / zhe sdang gi gdung ba dang / gti mug gi gdung ba de rab tu zhi bar mi nus kyi/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas mi sdug pa'i chos kyi
168b8(dkon brtsegs): sman dang / rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor bas ni sems can du ma sems can brgya phrag du ma/ sems can stong phrag du ma/ sems can brgya stong phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig
169a1(dkon brtsegs): brgya phrag stong du ma/ sems can khrag khrig dkrigs phrag du ma/ sems can gtams phrag du ma nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams
169a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba mi sdug pa'i sman dang / rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor bas rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /byams pa'i chos kyi sman dang / rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor bas sems can du ma'i zhe sdang
169a3(dkon brtsegs): gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi zhe sdang gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i sman dang /
169a4(dkon brtsegs): rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor bas sems can du ma'i gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed de/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi gti mug gi gdung ba rab
169a5(dkon brtsegs): tu zhi bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sku thob pas kyang bdag nyid chos kyi sman du gyur par byin gyis brlabs nas sems can du ma'i 'dod chags
169a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi gdung ba rab du zhi bar byed/ zhe sdang gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed/ gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi 'dod
169a7(dkon brtsegs): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /de bas na shA ri'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
169a8(dkon brtsegs): c hen po gang chos kyi sku la gnas nas bdag nyid chos kyi sman du gyur par byin gyis brlabs nas sems can du ma nas sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar
169b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'dod chags kyi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed/ zhe sdang gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed/ gti mug gi gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bu ngas mngon par shes pa
169b2(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa grangs med pa de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol na/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes
169b3(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i bar du'o/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad des/ /nga la gzhon nu khyod ma
169b4(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ /
169b5(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan ma thag tu ngas chos kyi sku thob par
169b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ nga chos kyi sku dang ldan par gyur nas/ mar me mdzad kyi 'og tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin mig mdzes shes bya ba sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi bdag po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu
169b7(dkon brtsegs): che ba/ dbang che bar grags par gyur to/ /yang de'i tshe 'dzam bu gling 'dir grong khyer chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong phrag bzhi byung ngo / /grong dang tshong 'dus dang / ri khrod stong phrag mang
169b8(dkon brtsegs): po byung ste/ grong khyer chen po dang / tshong 'dus dang / ri khrod stong phrag mang po de dag thams cad kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong mang pos gang bar gyur to/ /
170a1(dkon brtsegs): yang de'i tshe nad chen po'i bskal pa bar ma byung ste/ sems can phal cher lus rma can du gyur te/ lus rul ba dang / lba ba dang / 'bras dang / me dbal dang / g.yan pa dang /
170a2(dkon brtsegs): rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis rgyas par gyur to/ /de na sman pa brgya stong phrag mang po sems can de dag gi nad rab du zhi bar bya ba la brtson par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu de nas sems
170a3(dkon brtsegs): can de dag gso ba ma rnyed de/ /mgon med skyabs med nas sgra chen po phyung ba/ /lha dag dang ni klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin dri za srin po dang / /mi dang mi ma yin pa dag /bdag cag nad
170a4(dkon brtsegs): las thar byed gang / bdag cag sdug bsngal thar byed la/ nor rnams thams cad sbyin par bya/ de yi bka' yi rjes su 'jug /byas pa dag kyang gzo bar bya// // bam po bcwa lnga pa/
170a5(dkon brtsegs): yang shA ri'i bu ngas mi'i las 'das pa'i lha'i mig rnam par dag pas sems can de dag nad kyis gzir te/ /de dag phal cher lus rma can du gyur te/ lus rul ba dang / lba ba dang / 'bras dang / me dbal
170a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / g.yan pa dang / rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bad kan gyis rgyas pa mthong / mi'i las 'das pa lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pas sems can de dag gis sgra cher phyung ba thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas
170a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag la snying rje chen po skyes te/ de dag la ngas 'di snyam du bsams so/ /de sems can 'di dag gi gnas su gyur cig /sems can skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su
170a8(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig / sems can rten med pa rnams kyi rten du gyur cig /sems can gso ba med pa rnams kyi gso ba sbyar bar bya'o/ /snyam ste/ shA ri'i bu ngas brgya byin gyi lus chen po
170b1(dkon brtsegs): mi snang bar byas nas grong khyer chen po ku ru nas shin du mi ring ba zhig tu nges pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags zhig tu brdzus te skyes nas steng gi bar snang la 'dug ste/ 'dzam bu'i
170b2(dkon brtsegs): gling gi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bskul to/ /grong khyer ku ru nas mi ring na/ /des pa zhes bya'i srog chags rnam pa yod/ gang dag de yi
170b3(dkon brtsegs): sha la yongs za ba/ /de kun nad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ /'jigs shing skrag pa dag tu ma byed par/ /de yi sha ni ji ltar 'dod dgar long / /de ni gnod par mi sems khro
170b4(dkon brtsegs): gshe med/ /de ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtsi yin no/ /de ltar shA ri'i bu grong khyer chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong phrag bzhi po de dag dang / grong dang / /grong khyer dang / tshong 'dus dang / ri khrod
170b5(dkon brtsegs): stong po de dag na sems can na pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis sgra de thos nas grong khyer chen po ku ru zhes bya ba ga la ba dang / srog chags kyi rnam pa des pa gang na
170b6(dkon brtsegs): yod pa der song ste/ /phyin nas srog chags des pa zhes bya ba'i lus las sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus las sha yongs su zad par ma gyur te/ /de'i tshe tshigs
170b7(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di byung ngo / /gang phyir bden pas byang chub reg 'gyur zhing / ye shes phung po de zad mi 'gyur te/ /nga yi tshig de bden par 'gyur zhe na/ /lus la sha ni nam yang
170b8(dkon brtsegs): zad ma gyur/ de ltar shA ri'i bu 'dzam bu'i gling kun gyi skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags kyi sha bcad cing bcad cing khyer yang de'i lus bri ba
171a1(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ /gang bar yang mi mngon te/ sha yang yang bcad kyang slar de bzhin du skye'o/ /yang shA ri'i bu gang sems can na pa rnams kyis des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags
171a2(dkon brtsegs): kyi sha zos na de dag gi nad thams cad byang ste/ /nad med cing bde ba las mi 'gyur bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du mthar gyis 'dzam bu'i gling na na pa thams cad kyi nad sna tshogs
171a3(dkon brtsegs): byang ste/ /nad med par byas nas bde zhing gyur pa med do/ /de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / mi thams cad 'di snyam du sems
171a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ /des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags des bdag cag nad las yongs su thar te bde zhing gyur pa med par byas na/ bdag cag gis de la mchod pa dang / bkur sti ci zhig bya
171a5(dkon brtsegs): snyam ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu 'dus so/ /'dus nas des pa zhes bya ba'i srog chags ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas srog chags des pa la khor yug tu bskor te slar tshigs
171a6(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa 'di smras so/ /khyod ni gnas dang skyabs lags te/ /khyod ni sman pa khyod nyid sman/ /khyod la mchod pa ci bgyi ba/ /bdag cag la ni bka' stsol cig /shA ri'i bu
171a7(dkon brtsegs): e ma'o skye bo'i tshogs rnams 'dun par gyur to snyam du ngas shes nas lus chen po de mi snang bar byas te/ /rang gi brgya byin gyi cha byad du 'dug nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag la smras
171a8(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /kye grogs po dag nga la grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor mi dgos so/ /grogs po dag nga la zhing gi dngos po dang / khyim gyi dngos po dang /
171b1(dkon brtsegs): tshong 'dus kyi dngos po dang / mgron bu dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru rnams mi dgos so/ /grogs po dag nga la glang po che dang / rta dang /
171b2(dkon brtsegs): rnga mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / lug dang / khyim bya dang / phag rnams mi dgos so/ /skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas
171b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyang mi dgos so/ /bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha dang / na pa'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bskyed mos tshal dang / dka' thub kyi nags tshal gyi longs spyod rnams
171b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi dgos so/ /kye grogs po dag khyed kyis srog gcod pa spongs la srog gcod pa las slar ldog par gyis shig /ma byin par len pa spongs la/ ma byin pa len pa las slar ldog
171b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyis shig / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spongs la/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las slar ldog par gyis shig /rdzun du smra ba spongs la/ /rdzun du smra ba las slar ldog par gyis
171b6(dkon brtsegs): shig / phra ma spongs la/ phra ma las slar ldog par gyis shig /de bzhin du sbyar te ngag rtsub po dang / tshig kyal pa dang / brnabs sems dang / /gnod sems dang / log par lta
171b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bar du spongs la/ log par lta ba las slar ldog par gyis shig /de'i tshe skye bo'i tshogs chen po la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/ /nga la mgron bu bye ba mi dgos te/
171b8(dkon brtsegs): gser phung ri rab tsam yang dgos pa med/ bud med lha mo 'dra ba mi dgos te/ /bza' dang gtung dang kha zas zas mi dgos/ des pa'i srog chags la ni mchod 'dod na/ las kyi
172a1(dkon brtsegs): lam ni rab dag bcu po 'di/ /thams cad 'dus nas de dag bsrung bar gyis/ /phan tshun du yang byams pa'i yid kyis ltos/ /las lam bcu po rdzogs pa 'di
172a2(dkon brtsegs): dag rnams/ /thams cad gcig tu 'dus te srungs shig dang / /de tshe nga la mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' nor dang 'bru mi tshol/ /nga la nor rnams dgos pa ma
172a3(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ /bza' btung dag dang dbyig nor 'bru mi dgos/ /rta dang glang chen shing rta mi dgos te/ /bud med mchog dang rin chen gos mi dgos/ /phan tshun du ni byams sems dag
172a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / /phan pa'i dngos po dag gi sems skyed la/ /thams cad kun kyang gcig tu 'dus gyur la/ /dge bcu'i las lam dag rdzogs bsrung bar gyis/ dbang pos mi rnams de dag
172a5(dkon brtsegs): rab bskul ba/ /tshig de dag ni thos par gyur pa dang / /dge ba bcu yi las lam rnam dag pa/ /dge ba rnams ni yang dag rab tu len/ /shA ri'i bu ngas skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag
172a6(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyi gtam kun bstan/ /yang dag par 'dzin du btsud/ /yang dag par gzeng stod/ /yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur pa de ni nga yin no/ /shA ri'i
172a7(dkon brtsegs): bu ngas mngon par shes te 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes pa dang / /bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / mi de snyed thams cad kyis srog chags des pa zhes bya ba'i sha zos pa las tha na sems
172a8(dkon brtsegs): can gcig kyang de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas te/ /shi 'phos nas log par ltung bar song bar ma gyur te/ de dag thams cad de nas shi 'phos 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sum bcu rtsa gsum
172b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ /shA ri'i bu ngas de dag la chos kyi gtam kun bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng stod/ yang dag par rab tu
172b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byas nas de dag thams cad nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / /theg pa gsum la nges par gyur
172b3(dkon brtsegs): te/ /de la la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das/ /la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu ngas de ltar lus gcig yongs su btang bas sems can de snyed theg
172b4(dkon brtsegs): pa gsum dag la yongs su sman par byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sku la gnas pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po ci 'dra ba dang / /mthu chen po ci 'dra ba dang /
172b5(dkon brtsegs): dbang che bar grags pa ci 'dra ba ltos/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
172b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i chos kyi sku de ci 'dra/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi sku ni brtan pa/ sra ba/ mi shigs pa/ rdo rje'i sku/ 'chi 'pho med pa/ mi
172b7(dkon brtsegs): skye ba ste/ de ni sku tha dad pas 'dul ba sems can rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dbang gis tha dad du 'gyur yang mes mi 'tshig /mtshon gyis mi tshugs te/ rdo rje lta bur brtan pa/ mi shigs
172b8(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sku la gnas pa/ brtson 'grus ma nyams pa/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la lhun gyis grub par spyod cing lus kyis
173a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang sems pa med/ yongs su rtog pa med de/ lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid tu rab tu shes so/ /lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis kyang chos
173a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid rjes su shes la/ lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid la gnyis su yang mi byed de/ mtshan nyid gang lus dben pa'i
173a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid yin pa'i mtshan nyid de ni chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid de dben pa'i mtshan nyid gcig gis rjes su 'jug go/ /nang gi chos mi dmigs pa'i phyir rang gi lus dben pa'i
173a4(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid kyis kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid du mnyam par byed do/ /des sems can thams cad kyi lus dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i mtshan
173a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis rjes su shes/ chos kyi dbyings dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyang chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rjes su slob ste/ de rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sems can gyi lus
173a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /de sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis chos thams cad
173a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin
173a8(dkon brtsegs): nyid rjes su shes so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar
173b1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis rang gi lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes te/ /'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis
173b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang 'das pa'i
173b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar
173b4(dkon brtsegs): mi byed/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang ma 'ongs ba'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ ma 'ongs
173b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis kyang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed/ 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid
173b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis kyang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid 'gal bar mi byed de/ yang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid phung po dang / khams
173b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid do/ /phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid do/ /kun nas
173b8(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'khor ba'i de bzhin nyid do/ /'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin
174a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de nyid mngon par 'du byed pa'i de bzhin nyid do/ /mngon par 'du byed pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'du byed thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang de bzhin nyid yin te/ yang
174a2(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ces bya ba ni de kho na'o/ /de bzhin nyid do/ /gzhan ma yin pa nyid do/ /bral ba med pa'o/ /lus med pa'o/ /de bzhin nyid la ni lus gang yang med de/ lus med pa'i
174a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid do/ /de bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus zhes bya'o/ /de'i phyir 'di ni de bzhin nyid kyi lus te/ /de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus zhes bya'o/ /lus de lta bu ni lus
174a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad de/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' lus thams cad kyang ston la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyang mi byed de/ lus med pa rtsod pa med pas gzugs kyi lus
174a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang ston la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lus kyang 'khrugs par mi byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la so sor rtog ste/ de bzhin
174a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku mnyam pa nyid kyis kyang rang gi lus mnyam pa nyid so sor rtog go/ /rang gi lus mnyam pa nyid kyis lus dang / lus med pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtog go/ /
174a7(dkon brtsegs): lus dang lus med pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis shin du lus med pa'i lus su mthong ngo / /lus thams cad rten cing 'brel te byung bar yang shes so/ /shes nas kyang chos kyi sku
174a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bsgrub bo/ /de chos kyi sku mngon par bsgrubs nas/ chos kyi sku nyid yin gyi/ phung po dang khams dang / skye mched lus ni ma yin no/ /de chos kyi skus rab tu phye bas mthong bas
174b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang sems can rnams 'dul lo/ /thos pas kyang sems can rnams 'dul lo/ /reg pas kyang sems can rnams 'dul lo/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed do/ /shA ri'i bu 'di
174b2(dkon brtsegs): lta ste dper na sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed kyis rtsi thams cad bsdus nas rtsi'i shing mang po sbyar ba las bu mo gzugs bzang pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po
174b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa'i mchog dang ldan pa/ shin du rdzogs par zin pa/ phyi bdar byas pa zhig byas nas der 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal bar byed kyang mi rtog /
174b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog mod kyi bya ba de dag kyang ston to/ /de na rgyal po 'am/ /rgyal bu 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po chen po 'am/ tshong dpon nam/ khyim bdag gam/ mkhar gyi rgyal po 'di
174b5(dkon brtsegs): rung ste/ /gang na pa chen po che ba de dag 'ongs na de dag la sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed kyis/ /sman gyi bu mo de dang sprad pa dang / phrad ma thag tu nad thams cad thub par 'gyur/ mi na
174b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur te/ /gyur pa med cing bde bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed 'jig rten gyi nad gso ba shes pa de ltar sman pa gzhan dag la med do/ /shA ri'i
174b7(dkon brtsegs): bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi skus phye ba yang 'di lta ste/ /byang chub sems dpa'i lus la skyes pa dang / /bud med dang / khye'u dang / /bu mo sems can ji snyed
174b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis gdungs pa rnams kyis reg na de dag reg ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de'i sngon gyi smon lam shin du yongs su dag pas nad thams
175a1(dkon brtsegs): cad byang zhing gdung ba yang med par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi lus can gyi lus ni zas dang skom gyis gso ba ma yin/ /zas kham gyis za bas lus gso ba ma yin gyi
175a2(dkon brtsegs): de kha zas thams cad yongs su shes pas sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir zas za'o/ /de zas za yang gtong bar mi byed do/ /zas za yang lus kyi nang du gtong bar mi byed do/ /chos kyis sku'i
175a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs las kyang mi nyams/ yongs su mi nyams so/ /shA ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi lus can la tshe dang 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang med la/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'chi
175a4(dkon brtsegs): 'pho dang skye ba yang ston to/ /de 'chi 'pho yang chos thams cad 'chi 'pho med pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /skye yang chos thams cad 'pho ba med par rab tu shes so/ /
175a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung yang chos thams cad skye ba med par rab tu shes so/ /de chos kyi lus dang / chos kyi zas dang / chos kyi stobs dang / chos la ston pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir
175a6(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi smon lam lhun gyis grub pas brtson 'grus ma nyams par brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe
175a7(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /de dag lus ni rdo rje lta bur mi shigs pa/ 'dul ba'i dus shes nas ni tha dad ston par 'gyur/ mtshon gyis mi tshugs mes ni tshig pa
175a8(dkon brtsegs): ma yin yang / 'dul ba'i sems can mthong nas tshugs shing mes tshig 'gyur/ sems can na pa mthong nas sman rnams su yang 'gyur// // //
175b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin bkres pa rnams la zas dang skom du 'gyur/ 'on kyang chos kyi dbyings la rnam rtog ci yang med/ /chos kyi sku dang lus mang tshul gcig rab tu 'jug /shed las skyes dang gso
175b2(dkon brtsegs): dang shed can yod min te/ chos so cog ni rten cing 'brel te byung bar shes/ gang de'i rkyen yod pa na sdug bsngal lam 'byung ste/ rkyen med pa na sdug bsngal lam ni 'chad par 'gyur/ gzugs 'di dbu
175b3(dkon brtsegs): ba rdos pa 'dra ste snying po med/ tshor ba chu yi chu bur mtshungs shing 'dra bar sems/ 'du shes dpyid dus kyi smig rgyu rgyu ba 'dra/ 'du byed rnams ni chu skyes shing dang 'dra bar lta/ ji ltar gar la lta bar sgyu ma
175b4(dkon brtsegs): bslabs pa rnams/ skad cig gis ni gzugs rnams sna tshogs ston byed pa/ mi bden byed pa de ltar rnam shes shes gyur nas/ mkhas pa de dag thams cad du yang smon pa med/ longs spyod rnams ni ri gzar
175b5(dkon brtsegs): chu dang mtshungs shing 'dra/ glog dang mkha' sprin phung po lta bur byung nas med/ longs spyod 'gyur ba gzhu drag 'phangs pa'i mda' ltar shes/ mkhas pa rnams ni kun du longs spyod smon pa med/ lha yi
175b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten lha rdzas bde ba ma myong ba/ 'jig rten gsum po dag na sems can gang yang med/ slar yang sems dmyal sdug bsngal myong ba mthong gyur nas/ bde gshegs sras pos de mthong mtho ris 'gro mi byed/
175b7(dkon brtsegs): yid ni nam mkha' 'dra ba de dag gnas med de/ gnas dang bral ba rnams la 'byung ba srid ma yin/ 'byung ba med rnams skye dang 'chi 'pho med par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' che ba mi rga mi 'chi 'thob/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
175b8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'di ltar slob ste/ kye ma'o 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni gang 'dod chags nad chen por rab tu mi shes zhe sdang nad chen por rab tu mi shes/ gti mug nad chen por rab tu mi shes te
176a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum po 'di dag nad chen por rab tu mi shes pa'i sman pa mi mkhas pa sha stag gis yongs su gang / sman pa mi shes pa sha stag gis yongs su gang nas nad chen po gsum po de dag gi sman gsum mi shes
176a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ 'dod chags kyi nad chen po'i sman chen po mi gtsang ba yin par rab tu mi shes/ zhe sdang gi nad chen po'i sman chen po byams pa yin par rab tu mi shes/ gti mug gi nad chen po'i sman chen po rten cing 'brel
176a3(dkon brtsegs): te 'byung ba yin par rab tu mi shes te/ kye ma'o sman pa de dag ni nad gzhan dang / gzhan dag gso nus kyi/ nad thams cad ni gso bar mi nus so/ /kye ma'o sman pa de dag gi sman de ni re shig gso nus
176a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin gyi/ gtan du gso bar byed pa ma yin no/ /de bas na bdag cag gis ni sman pa de dag gi rjes su bslab par mi bya'i bdag cag gis ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ chos thams cad la mkhas
176a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bla na med pa/ sman pa'i rgyal po chen po/ nad thams cad gso bar byed pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/ /bdag cag gis ni nad thams cad gso bar bya'i nad gzhan dang gzhan dag gso bar
176a6(dkon brtsegs): mi bya/ bdag cag gis re shig gso bar mi bya ste/ bdag cag gis gtan du gso bar byed par bya'o/ /gang gi sgra thos par 'dod chags kyi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / zhe sdang gi
176a7(dkon brtsegs): nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / gti mug gi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi sman dang / rtsi byug pa'i sbyor ba bsdu bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
176a8(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa na de bzhin gshegs pa sman pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa chos thams cad la mkhas pa ma gtogs par gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med pa de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba sdud par byed de/
176b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi sman dang / rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba des chos kyi dung chen po la bskus nas yongs su sgrog ste/ de'i
176b2(dkon brtsegs): sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di mngon par go bar byed do/ /de nas sems can du ma/ sems can brgya phrag du ma/ sems can stong phrag du ma/ sems can brgya stong phrag du ma/ sems
176b3(dkon brtsegs): can bye ba phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba brgya phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba stong phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma/ sems can dkrigs phrag du ma
176b4(dkon brtsegs): nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na gangs kyi
176b5(dkon brtsegs): ri'i rgyal po la sman gyi rgyal po chen po 'bral bar byed pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de'i dris dug gi drag shul thams cad las rab tu thar par 'gyur te/ dpag tshad brgya tsam na 'khod pa dag kyang dug med par 'gyur
176b6(dkon brtsegs): ro/ /shA ri'i bu gal te dung ngam rnga la sman gyi rgyal po chen po 'bral bar byed pas bskus te bus sam/ brdungs na sems can dug 'thungs pa 'am/ zos pa 'am/ bskus pas zug par gyur pa ji snyed pa
176b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag thams cad de'i sgra thos nas ni dug med par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gang sman gyi rgyal po 'bral bar byed pa/ de lta bu de ni sman pa'i rgyal po gso byed ma gtogs par sman pa thams cad kyi mi shes
176b8(dkon brtsegs): so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mkhas pa sman pa'i rgyal po chen po sems can thams cad kyi nad thams
177a1(dkon brtsegs): cad bsal pa ma gtogs par gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med pa de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sman dang / /rtsis bsku ba'i sbyor ba sdud par byed de/ chos kyi sman dang rtsi bsku ba'i
177a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyor ba des chos kyi dung chen po la bskus nas yongs su sgrog ste/ de'i sgras stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di mngon par go bar byed do/ /de na sems can du mas de thos nas
177a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags kyi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems can du ma/ sems can brgya phrag du ma/ sems can stong phrag du ma/ sems
177a4(dkon brtsegs): can brgya stong phrag du ma/ /sems can bye ba phrag du ma/ /sems can bye ba brgya phrag du ma/ /sems can bye ba stong phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig
177a5(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong phrag du ma/ sems can dkrigs phrag du ma nas de bzhin du sbyar te/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi sgra de thos nas 'dod chags kyi nad chen po
177a6(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nad chen po rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /de gang nas sdud par byed ce na/ gang du byang chub sems dpa' de'i nor bzhag pa nas so/ /byang chub
177a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de'i nor gang du bzhag ce na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs las gud na ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
177a8(dkon brtsegs): 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa spyod pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu nyan to/ /'dzin to/ /'chang ngo / klog go/ /kun chub par byed do//
177b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la yang 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /shA ri'i bu de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod
177b2(dkon brtsegs): pa na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin du nyan par byed/ 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ gzhan la yang 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag
177b3(dkon brtsegs): par rab du ston te/ /shA ri'i bu de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus ma nyams pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
177b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs nyan par byed/ 'dzin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ klog par byed/ kun chub par byed/ gzhan la yang 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab
177b5(dkon brtsegs): tu ston par byed do/ /yang shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal ba grangs med pa pas kyang ches grangs med pa/ yangs pa/ dpag tu med pa'i pha rol gyi yang shin du pha rol du gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus
177b6(dkon brtsegs): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i bla ma zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar du'o/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin
177b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i bla ma de 'di lta ste/ nyan thos bye ba phrag brgyad bcu'i nyan thos 'dus pa chen po gcig byung ste/ thams cad kyang dgra
177b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa nas sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa sha stag go/ /shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
178a1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa pad ma'i bla ma de'i tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri thub par gyur to/ /shA ri'i bu pad ma'i bla ma yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos lo lnga brgya'i bar du gnas so/ /lo brgya'i bar du
178a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad ma'i bla ma yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring srel yang rgyas par
178a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ de 'di lta ste dper na nga da yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i ring bsrel rgyas par 'gyur ba bzhin no/ /shA ri'i bu de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i bla ma de yongs su mya ngan las
178a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na byang chub sems dpa' gcig cig 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan zhig nas shi 'phos te/ /de'i gsung rab la rgyal rigs su skyes par gyur te/ de btsas ma thag tu bdag ni
178a5(dkon brtsegs): chos med pa'i rigs su skyes kyis bdag gis chos spyad par bya'o zhes tshig de skad smras te/ de'i ming chos spyod ces btags so/ /shA ri'i bu de nas rgyal bu chos spyod dbang po yongs su smin pa'i rgyus
178a6(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas lo nyi shu lon pa dang 'dra ba de dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ dgon pa nags tshal na gnas bas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas so/ /de gcig tu dben par song ste/ nang du
178a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'jog pa na lha zhig 'ongs nas/ dge slong khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur gyis byang chub sems dpa'i
178a8(dkon brtsegs): sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs la brtson par gyis shig / ma thob par brtson 'grus nyams par ma byed cig ces don de bstan pa dang / des lha de las tshig de thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu
178b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ste dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / ljongs nas ljongs su byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam
178b2(dkon brtsegs): grangs kun du tshol zhing rjes su spyod de/ de gang dang gang du dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra bar dge slong pha dang / dge slong ma mthong ba dang / de dag gi gan du song nas 'phags pa byang chub sems dpas gang la
178b3(dkon brtsegs): bslabs na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyis 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs gang lags shes dris pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ dge slong bdag cag gis
178b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de ci 'dra bar mi shes te/ dge slong bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ming deng gdong rna bas thos
178b5(dkon brtsegs): su zad do zhes smras pa dang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ lha ni brdzun mi zer gyis ji srid du byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs ma thos pa de srid du brtson 'grus ma nyams par bya'o snyam
178b6(dkon brtsegs): nas/ des tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i bla ma de gang du zhugs la bzhen ces dris pa dang / de dag gis dge slong sa phyogs 'dir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
178b7(dkon brtsegs): pa pad ma'i bla ma de zhugs la bzhen to/ /zhes phyogs de bstan nas de sa phyogs de ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / sa phyogs der bskor ba byas nas sa phyogs de nyid du phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das
178b8(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i bla ma de mngon du byas nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji srid du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad ma'i bla ma de las byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
179a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon du ma thos pa de srid du bdag sa phyogs 'di nas mi ldang zhing skyil mo dkrung mi gzhig go snyam mo/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar rgyal po drang srong brtson 'grus ma nyams pas de lta bur dam bcas pa brtan par
