249a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul 'di mthong nas dga' mgu yi rangs te dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas thams cad thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad gcig
249a6(dkon brtsegs): khor yug tu yang sil snyan stong phrag du mas yongs su ma bzung ba dag gis khyab par gyur te/ dper na sbrang rtsi'i tshang bzhin du steng gi bar snang la rnga dang rol mo sil snyan gyi sgra byung ngo / /de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin
249a7(dkon brtsegs): g.yog dang bcas pa dang / rol mo mkhan lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang / srog chags khri bo de dag dang / chos nyan du sngar lhags pa las srog chags drug stong tsam zhig dang / dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag
249a8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gis bar snang la khang pa brtsegs pa lnga lnga byung ngo / /rol mo mkhan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa bzhis
249b1(dkon brtsegs): mdun gyis bltas pa'i rol mo mkhan gyi khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad na chos ston to/ /bar snang la gnas pa'i lha stong phrag bye ba du ma dag gis kyang lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag gtor to/ /me tog de dag kyang sangs rgyas
249b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad bcur gyur to/ /de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen po steng gi bar snang la gnas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu chen po 'di mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba dang / dad pa dang /
249b3(dkon brtsegs): gus pa dang / zhe sa cher byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dad pa mkhyen/ tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'dzum
249b4(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad de/ dbu'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du rgyas par sbyar ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
249b5(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag ni rgyu ma mchis/ rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa
249b6(dkon brtsegs): mi mdzad na 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo tshong dpon gyi bu
249b7(dkon brtsegs): mis byin 'dis chung ma bdun dang / khye'u bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / bran pho bdun dang / bran mo bdun gyis nga la mchod pa byas te/ bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du log par ltung bar mi 'gro ste/ lha dang mi rnams
249b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgya 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ded dpon zhes bya ba mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/ /
250a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par byas nas sti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ rim gror byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu bskal pa nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /kun
250a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo de la tshong dpon gyi bu mis byin gyi chung ma bdun dang / bu mo bdun dang / bran mo bdun gang yin pa dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus las bsgyur te/ skyes pa'i lus thob nas byang chub sems
250a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' mis byin dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/ /de dag bskal pa gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ kun
250a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mis byin ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems snyoms shes bya bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' mis byin gyi
250a5(dkon brtsegs): zhabs 'bring ba gang yin pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa ming tha dad par 'gyur ro/ /rol mo mkhan lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni bskal pa grangs med par log par ltung bar mi 'gro ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i
250a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bye ba phrag stong byed par bgrang bas smra ste/ bar skabs der sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu mnyes par byas nas sti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /
250a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang bskal pa gcig la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbyangs 'jam zhes
250a8(dkon brtsegs): bya bar thams cad ming 'thun par 'gyur ro/ /srog chags khri bo de dag las srog chags bzhi brgya ni de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa mnyes pa byas nas de'i tshe yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro/ /lhag ma rnams ni
250b1(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du log par ltung bar mi 'gro ste/ tshul 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong mnyes par byas nas sti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod pa byed par
250b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ngo mtshar zhes
250b3(dkon brtsegs): bya bar thams cad kyang ming 'thun par 'gyur ro/ /srog chags drug stong po de dag las srog chags stong ni nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/ dam pa'i chos nub nas mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma ni 'das de bzhin
250b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa byams pa ni ma byung pa'i dus na der sems can rnams kyi tshe 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i dus de na rang sangs rgyas brgyad khri 'byung bar 'gyur te/ srog chags stong po de dag gis rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad mnyes par
250b5(dkon brtsegs): byas nas sti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed pa 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /gang zag gi mchog byams pa de yang mnyes par byas nas sti stang du byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par
250b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur/ mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de'i 'og tu bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag nyi shur log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas lus kyi tha ma bdag gi lus kyi tha ma thob nas
250b7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis bskul te/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ /srog chags khri po las srog chags mthong ba skyes pa stong gis bla na
250b8(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /lha'i bu khri phrag drug bcu ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par skyes so/ /kun dga' bo byis pa rnams ma gtogs par
251a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la su zhig dga' ba dang dad pa dang gus pa dang zhe sa skyed par mi byed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus 'di lta bu'i che ba nyid thob cing mya ngan las 'das
251a2(dkon brtsegs): ba la yang reg go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas la ni gus byas nas/ 'di 'dra ba yi dpa' 'thob ste/ /de phyir gang la byin na ni/ 'bras bu che ba'i ston la
251a3(dkon brtsegs): mchod/ /gang yang bzhugs la mchod pa dang / /gang yang mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod pa/ /de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bar mthong / /gang yang bzhugs la mchod pa dang / /gang
251a4(dkon brtsegs): yang mya ngan 'das pa yi/ /ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam mchod pa/ /sems kyang mnyam la 'bras bu mnyam/ /mnyam pa'i sems su byas nas ni/ /gang zag mchog la mchod byed pa/ /de yi rnam par smin pa mnyam/ /
251a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs par byang chub 'tshang yang rgya/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i lam bzung ste/ /ngan par 'gro ba'i lam yang bcad/ /mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i lam/ /de yang de la mi dkon no/ /sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa dang /
251a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin mchog gis/ /de phyir mchog la dad byas nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /mchod par dam pa byas nas ni/ /myur du mchog tu 'gyur ba yin/ /chos kyi dam pa ston mdzad pa/ /
251a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog tu 'gyur/ /mi gang mkhas pa sangs rgyas kyi/ /chos la sten par 'dod pa de/ /'dun pa drag po bskyed par bya/ /mang du thos nas tshul bzhin no/ /'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
251a8(dkon brtsegs): dang / /tshangs pa dbang byed gyur nas na/ /yon tan mang po'i 'byung gnas dang / /mya ngan 'das par nges par 'gyur/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa shA ri'i bu de bas na rigs
251b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi
251b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'dun pa drag po bskyed de shin du mnyan par bya/ blang bar bya/ gzung bar bya/ bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya gzhan dag la brjod par bya gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par
251b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu mnyan tam/ blangs sam/ bzung ngam/ kun chub par byas sam/ gzhan dag la brjod dam/ gzhan dag la
251b4(dkon brtsegs): rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi bcad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no/ /tshad med pa bzhi dang mi 'bral ba yin no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson pa yin no/ /
251b5(dkon brtsegs): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can rnams sdud par brtson pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu gang 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byang chub kyi lam yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
251b6(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs dang 'brel to/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nor ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi
251b7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs kyi nang du bcug go/ /shA ri'i bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bslabs nas yang dag par chad pa rjes su thob bo/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol
251b8(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa yang rjes su thob po/ /pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu son pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad
252a1(dkon brtsegs): la des par byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mdzad pa rgyun ma bcad pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyis tshad med pa rjes su thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas dpag tu med pa rjes su thob pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa
252a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rjes su thob pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la shin du gnas pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /las kyi las dang rnam smin gyis/ rnam par
252a3(dkon brtsegs): smin pa shes par bya/ /las smin rnam smin ma yin gang / /de bde de ni mya ngan 'das/ /gang las shes pa med pa yi/ /'dus byas thams cad sdug bsngal te/ /de phyir shes pa bskyed pas ni/ 'dus byas kun las
252a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par grol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom
252a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi le'u zhes bya ba ste/
252a6(dkon brtsegs): bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po a tsAr+ya su ren dra dang / shI len dra dang / a tsar+ya d+harma tA shI las bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyi kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //'phags pa dkon mchog
252a7(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las le'u bcu gsum pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la mngal na gnas pa bstan pa/ bam po dang po/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya nan+daM gar+b+h+'a ba krAn+ti nir
252a8(dkon brtsegs): de sha / bod skad du/ 'phags pa dga' bo la mngal na gnas pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
252b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ser skya na shing n+ya gro d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun tshad med pa rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba de'i
252b2(dkon brtsegs): lus gser gyi kha dog can mtshan sum bcu dang ldan zhing tshad bcom ldan 'das las sor bzhis thung pa zhig yod de de'i chung ma sun da ri ka zhes bya ba bzang mo blta na sdug pa/ byad bzhin mdzes shing 'jig rten na dkon pa
252b3(dkon brtsegs): kha dog khyad par du 'phags shing mang po kun kyis blta bar 'dod pa zhig yod pas dga' bo de la chags shing zhen par gyur pas skad cig tsam du yang mi 'bral zhing 'dod pa'i sems kyis shin du chags par gyur te/ srog
252b4(dkon brtsegs): gis 'jal bar byed pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i dus la bab par mkhyen pas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe na bza' banabs te/ lhung bzed bsnams nas zhabs 'bring ba tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang grong khyer du
252b5(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms la gshegs te/ mthar gyis dga' bo'i khyim gang na ba der gshegs nas de'i sgor gshegs te bzhugs so/ /de nas thugs rje chen po'i mthus 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu btang bas dga' bo'i khyim
252b6(dkon brtsegs): nang kun tu gser btso ma lta bu'i kha dog tu gyur ba dang / de'i tshe dga' bo 'di snyam du 'od zer kun du snang bar gyur bas gdon mi za bar 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa yin no/ /snyam du bsams nas mi zhig mngags te/ kye song
252b7(dkon brtsegs): la su yin bltos shig ces bsgo ba dang / des kyang bcom ldan 'das mthong nas myur zhing rings pas slar log nas dga' bo la bcom ldan 'das sgo na bzhugs so zhes smras so/ /des de skad smras pa thos nas myur du
252b8(dkon brtsegs): phyir byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das bsu ste/ phyag bya bar byas pa las de'i tshe sun da ri ka 'di snyam du bdag gis/ gal te 'di btang bar gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyis gdon mi za bar rab tu byung bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsams
253a1(dkon brtsegs): nas gos kyi mtha' nas bzung ste ma btang ba dang / dga' bos smras pa/ deng re shig thong shig dang / bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas bdag slar 'ong ngo / /sun da ri kas smras pa/ bdag cag
253a2(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas nas gdod de bzhin gtang ngo / /zhes de'i 'phral ba la thig le gsher ba'i mtshan ma btab nas 'di skad du thig le 'di ma skams par slar gshegs su gsol/ /gal te thogs par gyur na gser gyi kAr shA pa Na lnga brgyas
253a3(dkon brtsegs): chad pas gcad do zhes smras pa dang / dga' bos kyang de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes sgor byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed blangs nas slar khyim du zhugs
253a4(dkon brtsegs): te/ bza' ba dang bca' ba bsod pa dag gis lhung bzed bkang nas slar sgor byung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das slar gshegs pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed ma len cig
253a5(dkon brtsegs): par mtshan ma bstan to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen po shin tu gzi byin che bas bzhes su gsol zhes gsol ba'i thugs kyang ma thub nas yang dga' bo la byin pa dang / kun dga' bos smras pa/ khyod
253a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis lhung bzed 'di su las blangs smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das las blangs so/ kun dga' bos smras pa/ 'o na bcom ldan 'das la phul cig /des smras pa bdag ston pa chen po la gsol pa'i thugs mi thub
253a7(dkon brtsegs): po zhes cang mi smra bar zhabs 'bring du song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das slar gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas phyag bcabs/ zhabs bsil te gdan la bzhugs pa dang / dga' bos lhung bzed thogs pa de bcom ldan 'das
253a8(dkon brtsegs): la phul lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis zas kyi bya ba mdzad nas dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod nga'i lhung bzed kyi lhag ma za 'am/ bdag 'tshal lo zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de la byin no/ /
253b1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bos zos zin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci khyod rab tu 'byung ngam/ des kyang rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gsol te/ de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yab yum
253b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas gzhan rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa dag dang nam yang 'gal bar ma mdzad pa'i phyir da ltar gang yang bka' las 'gal bar mi byed pa brnyes par gyur ba yin no/ /de nas
253b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi dga' bo'i skra dang kha spu bregs shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes 'breg mkhan btsal nas/ de'i skra bregs par
253b4(dkon brtsegs): brtsams pa dang / dga' bos 'breg mkhan de la bsgo ba/ kwa'i khyod mi shes sam/ nga ni ring por mi thog par stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur bas khyod kyis gal te nga'i skra dang kha spu bregs
253b5(dkon brtsegs): par gyur na ngas khyod kyi lag pa gnyis 'khrig ma man chad gcad do zhes bsdigs pas shin du skrag par gyur nas spu gri bsdus te/ phyir 'gro bar brtsams pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
253b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das la de gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid dga' bo ga la ba der gshegs te/ dga' bo la ci khyod rab tu mi 'byung ngam/ des kyang rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis
253b7(dkon brtsegs): ril ba bsnams te/ de'i mgo bo la chu blugs nas 'breg mkhan gyis skra dang kha spu bregs pa dang / de 'di snyam du deng bdag re shig bcom ldan 'das la sri zhu byas te rab tu 'byung mod kyi/ 'on kyang rgongs kar slar
253b8(dkon brtsegs): khyim du 'gro'o snyam mo/ /des rgongs kar lam du zhugs te song ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i 'gro ba'i lam du g.yang sa chen po zhig sprul pa des mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sun da ri ka dang dus byas
254a1(dkon brtsegs): pa ni thag ring du gyur pas 'gro ba'i rkyen dang ldan par ma gyur te/ deng bdag gis de bsams pa nyid kyis gal te 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur yang srid na/ gal te shi bar ma gyur na nam nangs te 'gro'o zhes
254a2(dkon brtsegs): sun da ri ka dran pa'i mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal gyis mtshan mo 'das par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga'
254a3(dkon brtsegs): bo khyod song la dga' bo de la khang skyong byos shig par bsgo shig / des kyang de bzhin du de'i thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khang skyong byos shig par bka' stsal to/ /zhes bsgo ba dang / des kyang khang skyong
254a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba ji lta bu/ des bya ba ni ci zhig byed ces dris so/ /des smras pa gtsug lag khang du dge 'dun gyi bya ba dag zhal ta bya dgos so/ /smras pa/ tshul ji lta bur bya ba'i rigs smras pa/ khang skyong zhes bya
254a5(dkon brtsegs): ba ni gal te dge slong rnams bsod snyoms la dong na gtsug lag khang gi nang gi sa rnams phyag nas chag chag gdab par bya'o/ /ba lang gi lci ba sar pa blangs nas go rim bzhin du 'jam por bsku bar bya'o/ /
254a6(dkon brtsegs): legs par yid la byas te bsrung zhing stor brlag med par bya'o/ /gros su bya ba yod na dge 'dun la gsol par bya'o/ /dri dang me tog yod na dge 'dun la brim par bya'o/ /mtshan mo sgo bcad cing nam
254a7(dkon brtsegs): nangs nas dbye bar bya'o/ /rnam phyi sa dang / chab khung sa rtag tu bkru zhing byi dor bya dgos so/ /gal te gtsug lag khang zhig cing ral pa yod na bcos legs bya'o zhes de skad bstan pa thos pa dang / btsun
254a8(dkon brtsegs): pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du thams cad bdag gis de bzhin bgyi'o zhes blangs so/ /de nas dge slong rnams snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs bgos/ chos gos
254b1(dkon brtsegs): dang lhung bzed thogs te/ grong khyer ser skya'i gnas su bsod snyoms la bzhud pa dang / dga' bos gtsug lag khang na su yang med par mthong nas bdag gis phyag dar byas zin pa dang / slar khyim du 'gro'o zhes phyag
254b2(dkon brtsegs): dar byed pa la zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de gzigs shing mkhyen pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis phyags zin ba'i sa gtsang ma rnams slar phyag dar gyis gang bar byin gyis brlabs pa dang / des kyang
254b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du bdag gis phyag dar bor te slar khyim du 'gro'o snyam du bsams nas des phyags ma bzhag ste/ phyag dar dbo bar brtsams pa dang / zad par ma gyur nas des bsams pa/ gnas khang rnams kyi sgo bcad
254b4(dkon brtsegs): la 'gro'o snyam nas des gnas khang rnams kyi sgo bcad par brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo gcig bcad zin nas sgo gzhan bcad tsam na sgo gzhan yang bye bar byin gyis brlabs pas de nyon mongs pa skyes
254b5(dkon brtsegs): nas gzhan yang 'di snyam du gal te rkun pos gtsug lag khang 'di nyams par byas kyang 'di la gnod pa ci yod de/ bdag rgyal por gyur ba na 'di bas ches lhag pa'i gtsug lag khang bzang po brgya stong brtsig par zad
254b6(dkon brtsegs): pas bdag ni slar khyim du 'gro'o/ /yang bsams pa/ gal te lam po cher zhugs te 'gro na ni bcom ldan 'das dang phrad du dogs pas/ gseb lam du zhugs te 'gro snyam du bsams so/ /bcom ldan
254b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas gseb lam de nyid du zhugs te gshegs so/ /des rgyang nas bcom ldan 'das mthong nas mi phrad par bya ba'i phyir lam gyi 'gram na ljon shing yal ga dang
254b8(dkon brtsegs): grim mar ldan pa thur du gzhol ba zhig gi drung du gab ste 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ljon shing de'i yal ga gyen du brdzes nas de lus mngon du snang bar byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas bcom
255a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo khyod gar 'gro/ nga'i phyi bzhin du shog shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de yang skyengs te ngo tsha ba'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring du 'brangs
255a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du 'di chung ma la shin du chags shing zhen par gyur pas 'di de dang 'bral zhing phan gdags pa'i phyir grong khyer ser skya nas byung ste/ grong khyer mnyan yod du gshegs so snyam
255a3(dkon brtsegs): du dgongs nas der byon pa dang / ri dgas dgra'i ma sa ga'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di snyam du dga' bo blun po 'di ni rtag tu chung ma la chags shing zhen nas gtong bar mi byed
255a4(dkon brtsegs): pas 'di la thabs shig sbyar te sems nye bar zhi bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis sngon chad spos kyi ngad ldang zhes bya ba'i ri mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ ma mthong
255a5(dkon brtsegs): lags so/ /gal te de lta na nga'i chos gos kyi grwa nas zung shig /des kyang na bza'i grwa nas bzung ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du nam mkha' la ldings te spos kyi ngad ldang du gshegs
255a6(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang thabs gcig tu g.yas g.yon du gzigs pa las shing drung zhig na spra mo mig ya gcig zhar ba zhig gdong bteg nas mi g.yo bar rtse gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la bltas pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/
255a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis spra mo zhar ba 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
255a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod ji snyam du sems/ spra mo zhar ma 'di sun da ri ka dang bsgrun na gang bzang zhing khyad par du 'phags/ gsol pa/ sun da ri ka de ni shAkya'i rigs lags te/ lha'i bu mo dang 'dra bar byad bzhin
255b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu gyur cing 'jig rten na zla ma mchis pa lags pas spra mo 'di dang bsgrun par gyur na/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi mchi/ stong gi cha dang / khri'i cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang /
255b2(dkon brtsegs): bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyi lha'i gzhal med khang mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ ma mthong lags so/ /'o na/
255b3(dkon brtsegs): yang chos gos kyi grwa nas zung shig /des kyang na bza' la bzung ba dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i gnas su gshegs te/ tshe
255b4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dga' bo la khyod song la lha'i gzhal med khang khyad par du 'phags pa'i gnas rnams la ltos shig / ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang dga' tshal dang /
255b5(dkon brtsegs): shing rta sna tshogs kyi tshal dang / rtsub 'gyur gyi tshal dang / 'dres pa'i tshal dang / yongs 'du'i tshal dang / chos bzang khang la sogs pa lha'i tshogs rnams kyis kun dga' ra ba dang /
255b6(dkon brtsegs): me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / rdzing dang / rdzing bu dang / rtsed mo rtse zhing dga' mgu'i gnas rnams su song ste/ kun du khyab par bltas nas mthar gyis grong khyer blta na sdug tu zhugs pa
255b7(dkon brtsegs): las gnas gzhan du yang rnga dang / pi bang dang / rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs las sgra snyan pa la sogs pa 'byin pa dang / gnas de dang de dag tu lha'i bu mo dang / bu pho shin tu mdzes
255b8(dkon brtsegs): pa dag lhan cig rtse zhing 'khod pa dag mthong ngo / /dga' bos kun du brtags pa las gnas gzhan zhig gi gzhal med khang na lha'i bu mo 'ba' zhig yod kyi/ lha'i bu
256a1(dkon brtsegs): pho med par mthong nas lha'i bu mo de dag la ci'i rgyus gnas gzhan ni lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i bu pho 'dres par gnas nas bde ba rnams myong bar byed la khyed ni gang gi phyir
256a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mo 'ba' zhig lhan cig gnas shing lha'i bu mi snang bar gyur zhes dris pa dang / lha'i bu mo de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung dga' bo zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das las rab
256a3(dkon brtsegs): tu byung nas rtse gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyod pa zhig yod de/ de dus de las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'dir skye bar 'gyur bas bdag cag ni 'dir de la sdod pa yin no zhes
256a4(dkon brtsegs): smras so/ /dga' bos de skad thos nas dga' mgu rangs pas myur zhing rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis
256a5(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams kyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i dngos po dag mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis dngos po ci zhig mthong zhes bka'
256a6(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa dang / des kyang ji ltar mthong ba rnams rgyas par bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo khyod kyis lha'i bu mo rnams
256a7(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ mthong lags so/ /lha'i bu mo de dag sun da ri ka dang / bsgrun na gang gzugs bzang zhing khyad par du 'phags/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
256a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das sun da ri ka lha'i bu mo de dag dang / bsgrun na ji ltar ri spos kyi ngad ldang gi spra mo zhar ma sun da ri ka dang bsgrun pa bzhin du brgya'i char yang nye bar mi mchi ste/
256b1(dkon brtsegs): stong gi cha dang / khri'i cha dang / 'bum gyi cha nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad na de lta bu'i phan yon khyad par du 'phags pa
256b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur pas/ deng khyod kyis tshangs par spyod pa brtan par spyod cig dang / lhar skyes nas de lta bu'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /des kyang de skad du thos nas dga' mgu rangs te cang mi zer bar 'dug go/ de nas
256b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang / thabs gcig tu lha'i gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ mnyan yod du rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra bar gshegs so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang
256b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dga' bo yang lha'i gzhal med khang la bsams bzhin du tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par spyad par gyur ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa
256b5(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod song la dge slong rnams la 'di skad du khyed su yang dga' bo dang lhan cig stan gcig la ma 'dug cig /'chag sa gcig tu ma

256b7(dkon brtsegs): byed cig / kha ton 'don par/ ma byed cig ces bsgo cig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa de bzhin du dge slong rnams la bsgo ba dang / dge slong
256b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis kyang 'phags pa'i bka' bzhin du 'tshal lo zhes smras so/ /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo yang mang po rnams kyis spangs par yang mthong bas
257a1(dkon brtsegs): shin du ngo tsha zhing gnong bar gyur to/ /de nas dus gzhan zhig na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dge slong mang po rnams dang lhan cig tu rim gro'i gnas na chos gos 'drub pa'i las byed pa de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos mthong
257a2(dkon brtsegs): nas 'di snyam du dge slong mang po 'di dag ni bdag yongs su spangs pas lhan cig tu mi gnas na/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di ni bdag gi phu nu bo yin pas cis kyang smad par mi byed do/ /snyam du bsams nas de'i thad du song ste/
257a3(dkon brtsegs): lhan cig 'dug pa dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yang myur du langs te song ngo / /des smras pa/ kun dga' bo dge slong gzhan rnams ni bdag spong ba'i rigs na/ khyod kho bo'i phu nu bo yin na ci'i phyir bdag spong bar byed
257a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos smras pa/ yang dag par de lta bu'i don dang ldan mod kyi 'on kyang khyod ni lam gzhan du 'gro la bdag kyang lam gzhan du 'gro bas de'i phyir phan tshun byol pa yin no/ /smras pa gang ni kho bo'i lam yin/ gang
257a5(dkon brtsegs): ni khyod kyi lam yin/ smras pa/ khyod ni lhar skye bar mos nas tshangs par spyod pa spyod do/ /bdag ni mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir 'dod pa kun nas nyon mongs pa rab tu bsal ba yin no/ /zhes de skad smras pa thos pa dang /
257a6(dkon brtsegs): shin tu mi dga' zhing mya ngan gyis non par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems kyi bsam pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis sngon chad sems can dmyal ba mthong ngam/

257a8(dkon brtsegs): gnas su gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyogs gcig tu bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ khyod song la sems can dmyal ba rnams ltos shig /tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos kyang de bzhin du
257b1(dkon brtsegs): song ba las sngar ni chu bo 'be ha ra ni mthong ngo / /de nas mthar gyis ral gri'i lo ma'i nags dang / bshang gci'i 'dam dang / me ma mur gyis gnas su phyin te/ de dag tu zhugs te rnam par bltas pa las sems can mang po sdug bsngal
257b2(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs myong ba dag mthong ste/ kha cig ni skam pas lce dang / so dang mig phyung ba dang / kha cig ni sog les lus 'dra ba dang / kha cig ni sta ris rkang lag gtub pa dang / kha cig ni mtshon cha shag ti dang dgra sta so gnyis pa dang be rgas bsnun pa dang / kha cig ni lcags
257b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis tho bas 'tshog par byas pa dang / kha cig ni lcags kyi thu lum khar bcug pa dang / kha cig ni ri ral gri lo ma can dang / ljon shing ral gri'i lo ma can la 'dzeg pa dang / gtun gyis rdung ba dang / rang thag gis 'thag pa dang / zangs
257b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi ka ba sa 'ju ba dang / lcags kyi khri la 'dug nas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rnams myong bar mthong ngo / /kha cig ni lcags zangs me lce rab tu 'bar zhing khol ba rab tu tsha ba'i 'od byung ba dag tu sems can de dag
257b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshod pas de lta bu'i sdug bsngal gyi dngos po myong ba dag mthong ngo / /gzhan yang lcags zangs stong par khol zhing me lce rab tu 'bar zhing tsha ba sems can med pa zhig mthong ba dang / shin du skrag nas dmyal ba'i srungs ma la kye
257b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir lcags zangs gzhan rnams na ni sems can dag 'tshod par byed la/ lcags zangs 'di 'ba' zhig ni stong par khol zhes dris pa dang / des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gcung dga' bo zhes

257b8(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur bas de'i phyir deng bdag cag lcags zangs me spar nas sdod pa yin no/ /zhes smras pa dga' bos thos nas shin du 'jigs skrag pa skyes nas ba spu langs te/ lus las rngul byung nas 'di
258a1(dkon brtsegs): snyam du 'dis gal te bdag dga' bo yin pa shes par gyur na ni/ gson po kho nar zangs kyi nang du bor bar 'gyur ro/ /snyam du bsams nas myur zhing rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de
258a2(dkon brtsegs): logs su bros te song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis sems can dmyal pa mthong ngam/ des kyang snying rje ba'i tshul du mchi ma blags te/ ngus nas lce lkugs pa bzhin du
