297a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ste/ rlung de'i stobs kyis de rab tu sgyur bar byed do/ /gzhan yang kha mthur du lta ba zhes bya ba'i rlung 'byung ste/ de'i mgo mthur du lta zhing lag pa gnyis brkyang ste/ mthar gyis 'byung bar 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /
297a7(dkon brtsegs): mngal na gnas pa de gal te tshe rabs snga ma la mngal du 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i las bsags pa zhig yin na ni de'i lag pa dang rkang pa snol mar gyur nas sgyur mi nus pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi rkyen gyis ma'i mngal
297a8(dkon brtsegs): nyid du 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ de'i ma yang de'i tshe sdug bsngal chen po myong ba 'am/ yang na 'chi ba'i 'dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /gal te tshe rabs snga ma la dge ba'i las rnams mngon par 'dus byas shing
297b1(dkon brtsegs): tshe ring por 'gyur ba'i rgyu bsags pa zhig yin na ni btsas su nye ba'i tshe ma dang / bu gnyis ka rab tu bde zhing sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal gong ma lta bu med do/ /zhag bdun phrag sum bcu rtsa brgyad 'das nas
297b2(dkon brtsegs): mngal nas 'byung bar 'dod pa'i tshe/ sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong nas gdod 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i phyir lus 'di lta bu len pa 'di ni yang dag par sdug bsngal chen po yin par rig par bya'o/ /dang po mngal nas
297b3(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i tshe khye'u 'am/ bu mo yang rung ste/ sa la lhung ma thag tu lag pas bzung ngam/ gos kyi blangs sam/ khri la bzhag gam/ khang pa'i nang du bzhag gam/ sa la bzhag gam/ bla gab med par bzhag gam/
297b4(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma la bzhag gam/ dgun nam/ dbyar gyi dus su grang ba dang / tsha ba'i rlung gis btsas ma thag pa'i lus de la reg par gyur na yang sdug bsngal chen po myong bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na pa lang
297b5(dkon brtsegs): gson por bshus pa brtsig pa la reg gam/ bla gab med pa'i thang la lhung bar gyur na srog chags dag gis za bar 'gyur ba 'am/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig la sbrang bu mchu rings rnams kyis za
297b6(dkon brtsegs): ba la yang lcags gis gzhus pa de bzhin du dang po mngal nas byung ba'i tshe chu dron po dag gis lus bkrus pas reg pa'i sdug bsngal myong ba yang de dang 'dra'o/ /btsas nas mthar gyis cher 'gyur ba dang /
297b7(dkon brtsegs): ma'i lus las khrag dang 'dres pa'i nu zho byung nas gso bar byed de/ ngas sngar mdo sde gzhan dag las rgya cher bstan pa yin no/ /de lta bas na lus 'di ni mi gtsang ba dang / sdug bsngal mang po las mngon par grub pa
297b8(dkon brtsegs): yin pas mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba na 'di 'dra ba'i lus la rjes su chags par byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo dang po mngal nas byung nas zhag bdun lon pa dang / srog chags srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad bcu lus
298a1(dkon brtsegs): las skyes nas de las za bar byed do/ /skra la za ba zhes bya ba'i srin bu'i rigs gnyis yod de skra la gnas nas skra la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs gnyis ni mig la gnas nas mig la za bar byed do/ /
298a2(dkon brtsegs): srin bu'i rigs pa han dang / rkan ldan dang / nad slong dang / yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod yod de klad pa la gnas nas klad pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs sA lu nag po'i lo ma zhes bya ba gcig
298a3(dkon brtsegs): yod de rna ba la gnas nas rna ba la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mdzod sgo zhes bya ba gcig yod de sna la gnas nas sna la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs 'phen pa dang / kun du 'phen pa zhes bya ba gnyis yod de
298a4(dkon brtsegs): mchu la gnas nas mchu la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs khab mchu zhes bya ba gcig yod de lce la gnas nas lce la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs kha rno zhes bya ba gcig yod de lce'i drung na gnas nas lce'i
298a5(dkon brtsegs): drung la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs lag rdzogs zhes bya ba gcig yod de rkan la gnas nas rkan la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs lag pa dra ba can dang / phyed sgyur zhes bya ba gnyis yod de lag mthil la
298a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas lag mthil la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs dpung pa dang / nye ba'i dpung ba zhes bya ba gnyis yod de dpung pa la gnas nas dpung pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs lcags can dang nye ba'i lcags
298a7(dkon brtsegs): can zhes bya ba gnyis yod de mid pa la gnas nas mid pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs rdo rje dang / rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de snying la gnas nas snying la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs dman pa dang / dman pa'i kha zhes
298a8(dkon brtsegs): bya ba gnyis yod de sha la gnas nas sha la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs kha dog ldan dang / grags ldan zhes bya ba gnyis yod de khrag la gnas nas khrag la 'thung bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang /
298b1(dkon brtsegs): dri gtong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de chu ba la gnas nas chu ba la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mi mthong dang / khas sbub ces bya ba gnyis yod de rgyab kyi rgal tshigs la gnas nas rgyab kyi tshigs la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i
298b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs tshil gyi kha dog ces bya ba gcig yod de tshil la gnas nas tshil la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mkhris pa'i kha dog ces bya ba gcig yod de mkhris pa la gnas nas mkhris pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i
298b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs mu tig ces bya ba gcig yod de mchin pa la gnas nas mchin pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs 'dam bu zhes bya ba gcig yod de mtsher pa la gnas nas mtsher ba la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs lnga brgya
298b4(dkon brtsegs): yod de rigs brgya ni zla ba zhes bya'o/ /rigs brgya ni zla ba'i kha zhes bya'o/ /rigs brgya ni bsil byed ces bya'o/ /rigs brgya ni bsil byed gtong zhes bya'o/ /rigs brgya ni yangs pa zhes bya ste/ rtsib logs g.yon pa la gnas
298b5(dkon brtsegs): nas rtsib logs g.yon pa la za bar byed do/ /gzhan yang srin bu'i rigs lnga brgya yod pa yang ming gong ma dang 'thun te/ rtsib logs g.yas pa la gnas nas rtsib logs g.yas pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs cung zad 'bigs pa dang / cher
298b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bigs pa dang / rus pa 'bigs pa dang / rus pa'i gdong zhes bya ba bzhi yod de rus pa la gnas nas rus pa la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs cher dkar ba dang / cung zad dkar ba dang / snum pa'i stobs dang / stag lam
298b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba bzhi yod de rtsa brgyus la gnas nas rtsa rgyus la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mos pa'i yid dang / seng ge'i stobs dang / ri bong lto dang / 'dod pa la mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ba bzhi yod de ma zhu ba'i gnas
298b8(dkon brtsegs): la gnas nas ma zhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs dpa' bo dang / dpa' bo'i bdag po zhes bya ba gnyis yod de zhu ba'i gnas la gnas nas zhu ba'i gnas la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mu kha dang
299a1(dkon brtsegs): dra ba kha dang / phung po'i kha dang / byi'u kha zhes bya ba bzhi yod de gci ba'i lam la gnas nas gci ba'i lam la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs byed pa dang / byed pa chen po dang / phye ma dang / po ta ka
299a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba bzhi yod de bshad pa'i lam la gnas nas bshad pa'i lam la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs gdong gnag dang / 'jigs su rung ba'i gdong zhes bya ba gnyis yod de brla la gnas nas brla la za bar
299a3(dkon brtsegs): byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mdze can dang / mdze can chung ngu zhes bya ba gnyis yod de pus mo la gnas nas pus mo la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs myos pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba gcig yod de byin pa la gnas nas byin la
299a4(dkon brtsegs): la za bar byed do/ /srin bu'i rigs mgo nag ces bya ba gcig yod de rkang pa la gnas nas rkang pa la za bar byed do/ /dga' bo ngas deng khyod la srin bu'i rigs stong phrag brgyad bcu lus 'di la gnas nas nyin
299a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan du za bar byed pas nyams stobs chung zhing mdog ngan par byed pa dang / nad kyi sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs lus 'di la 'dus nas gzhan yang de'i sems gdung ba dang / rab tu gdung ba dang / yongs su
299a6(dkon brtsegs): gdung bar byed pas sman pa mkhas pa yod kyang / de la rmongs nas sman gang gis nad 'di dag gso bar nus pa shes par mi 'gyur ba mdor bstan pa yin te/ mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'di
299a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba'i lus la rjes su chags par byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo dang po btsas nas cher skye bar 'gyur ba'i bar du gos dang zas kyis gsos nas/ lus 'di mngon par grub par gyur kyang / de'i tshe'i tshad lo
299a8(dkon brtsegs): brgya thub pa yang yod de de bas thung ba yang yod do/ /lo brgya po de yang dus sum brgyar 'gyur ro/ /'di lta ste/ dpyid dang / dbyar dang / dgun gyi dus gang yin pa'o/ /de las dpyid gang yin pa de ni tsha
299b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dus so/ /dbyar gang yin pa de ni char 'bab pa'i dus so/ /dgun gang yin pa de ni grang ba'i dus so/ /dus gsum po de dag re re la yang zla ba bzhi bzhi yod pas lo gcig la ni zla ba bcu gnyis yod par 'gyur la lo
299b2(dkon brtsegs): brgya la ni zla ba stong nyis brgya yod par 'gyur bas zla ba yar gyi ngo dkar po dang / zla ba mar gyi ngo nag pos phye na ni nyis stong bzhi brgyar 'gyur te/ de la nyin mtshan ni stong phrag sum bcu rtsa drug yod do/ /nyin gcig la lan
299b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su za bas zas ni lan stong phrag bdun bcu rtsa gnyis za bar 'gyur te/ res 'ga' mi za ba yang grangs der 'dus so/ /de ni 'di lta ste/ na pa dang / ra ro ba dang / ched du zas bcad pa dang / gnyid log pa dang /

299b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur bas mkhas pa su zhig 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir de la rjes su chags par byed/ gzhan yang dga' bo lus 'di yang dag pa blangs pa la sdug bsngal rnam pa gnyis yod de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ nad
299b6(dkon brtsegs): mang po rnams lus la 'dus pa gang yin pa de ni nang gi sdug bsngal zhes bya'o/ /mi dang mi ma yin pas rnam par 'tshe ba gang yin pa de ni phyi rol gyi sdug bsngal zhes bya'o/ /de la nad mang po lus la 'dus
299b7(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lkog ma dang / so dang / brang dang / lto ba dang / lag pa dang / rked pa rnams na par gyur ba dang / gzhan yang rlung
299b8(dkon brtsegs): na pa dang / mchil snabs dang / smyos pa dang / khong rde dang / dbugs mi bde ba dang / glo ba na pa dang / gci ba'i lam rtsub pa dang / g.yan pa dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / thor bu dang / shu ba dang /

300a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sdug bsngal lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni shin tu brjod par dka'o/ /de lta bas na 'di dag thams cad kyang 'das pa'i dus su sdig pa mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gis 'di lta bu'i rnam
300a8(dkon brtsegs): par smin pa myong bar rig par bya'o/ /gang gis mtshon cha dag gis gnod pa byas pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/ grong khyer brtsigs te 'obs kyis bskor nas lus 'di yongs su bsrungs kyang /

301a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur la gang la la zhig gos dang / mal cha dang / na pa'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis de la rim gro byed pa de dag kyang rnam par smin pa chen po'i mthu dang /

302a1(dkon brtsegs): nas yongs su skyo ba skyed par byed na rnam par grol zhing mthar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thob par gyur te/ de ltar yang dag par bslabs nas chos 'di mngon du gyur pa'i tshe skye ba'i

303b7(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dpag med bsam yas gang btang ba/ /kun mkhyen de ni rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs/ /lag pa rkang pa mig dang rna ba dang / /sna dang yan lag dam pa mgo btang ste/ kun btang yon tan ldan pa
303b8(dkon brtsegs): gtong phod pa/ /des ni kun mkhyen ye shes mchog brnyes so/ /sbyin dang dul dang sdom la gang bslabs shing / /skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims ma nyams pa/ /bzod pa'i bdag nyid yon tan mchog ldan pa/ /
304a1(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba'i thugs de grong du deng gshegs so/ /sdug bsngal bying ba'i 'jig rten rab gzigs nas/ /brtson mchog bskal pa bye bar gang spyod cing / /bsam gtan mtha' yas mnyam pa
304a2(dkon brtsegs): med dang ldan/ /tshangs dbyangs de ni de ring grong khyer gshegs/ /drang srong chen po de yi shes rab ni/ /mtshungs med nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag tu med/ /bde gshegs de yi yon tan gzhan dag

304a5(dkon brtsegs): phyir ni de yi thad du song / /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spang ba dang / /de bzhin nyon mongs gzhan las rgyal 'dod pa/ /de ni ston pa'i thad du nyer song la/ /mchod pa rnams mang mtha' yas myur
304a6(dkon brtsegs): du gyis/ /tshangs pa dang ni lha yi dbang phyug dang / /brgya byin nyid ni thob par su 'dod cing / /lha yi bde bas rtag tu rtsen dga' ba/ /de ni thub pa mchod phyir nye bar song / /gling bzhi'i bdag po
304a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal por 'gyur bya zhing / /rin chen mchog bdun rang gis 'thob pa dang / /bu mchog stong rnams kyang ni gang 'dod pa/ /sems can mchog la des myur mchod pa gyis/ khyim bdag tshong dpon khams kyi
304a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po dang / /mdzes pa'i gzugs dang g.yog 'khor dam pa dang / /longs spyod 'phel ba'i mchog rnams gang 'dod pa/ /de ni deng song thub la mchod pa gyis/ /gang su rnam par grol dang grol ba kun/ /
304b1(dkon brtsegs): thub pa rnams kyi chos mchog thos nas te/ /'dren pa rnams kyi sgra yang 'dir dkon gyis/ /de phyir chos nyid du ni der myur deng / /de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya
304b2(dkon brtsegs): stong mang po dag tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis bskul nas skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams me tog dang / bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i phur ma thogs/ gser dang /
304b3(dkon brtsegs): dngul gyi me tog gi phur ma thogs/ /gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs/ rnga bo che dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang / sgra snyan pa dang / gling bu dang / 'khar
304b4(dkon brtsegs): dkrol dang / kim pa la dang / na gu la dang / pi bang thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing de bzhin gshegs pa la sems te/ sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas dga' ba dang / mchog tu
304b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba thob cing 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs g.yas pa sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu de nas grong
304b6(dkon brtsegs): khyer thams cad rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ lha dang mi'i sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dkrol bar sgra 'byung / lha'i me tog gi char yang rab tu bab ste/ sems can long ba rnams ni mig gis
304b7(dkon brtsegs): gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa rnams ni rna bas sgra thos/ sems can smyon pa rnams ni dran pa thob/ sems can yid brel ba rnams ni rtse gcig pa thob/ sems can gcer bu
304b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni gos rnyed/ sems can bkres pa rnams ni zas rnyed/ sems can dbul po rnams ni nor rnyed do/ /de'i tshe na sems can gang yang 'dod chags kyis gzir ba med de/ zhe sdang gis ma
305a1(dkon brtsegs): yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ phrag dog gis ma yin ser snas ma yin/ khro bas ma yin/ nga rgyal gyis ma yin no/ /de'i tshe na sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang
305a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur to/ /de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas skyes bu'i seng ge che/ /stobs bcu grong khyer nam gshegs tshe/ /de yi mod la skye bo rnams/ /bde ba rgya chen dri med thob/ /long ba'i
305a3(dkon brtsegs): mig rnams mthong bar gyur/ /'on pa thos pa'i mthu yang skyes/ /smyos pa dag ni dran pa rnyed/ /yid brel rtse gcig de bzhin no/ /gcer bu dag ni gos rnyed de/ /bkres pa bdag gis zas thob bo/ /skyes bu gang su
305a4(dkon brtsegs): dbul po yang / /dga' bar nor rnams rnyed par gyur/ /lha rnams bye ba mang po yang / /mkha' la gnas shing stobs rab mchod/ /smra ba'i seng ge mchod pa'i phyir/ /me tog char yang rab tu 'bebs/ /
305a5(dkon brtsegs): rnga dang rdza rnga sil snyan dung / /nyams dga' 'byed pa dpag med pa/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni bsod nams kyis/ /grong khyer 'jug tshe sgra yang 'byung / /grong khyer kun du rab g.yos te/ /de tshe nyams dga'
305a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par gnas/ /skye bos ngo mtshar 'di mthong nas/ /dga' ba shin du rgya chen thob/ /'dod chags kyi ni mig zer zhing / /de tshe khro blun ser sna med/ /nga rgyal la sogs nyes pas kyang /
305a7(dkon brtsegs): gzir ba de tshe ma lus med/ /dga' bas khyab cing dang ba ste/ /mi rnams pha mar 'du shes gyur/ /gang tshe sangs rgyas stobs bcu po/ /skye bo bde phyir grong gshegs tshe/ /mi yi ma yin sil snyan rnams/ /
305a8(dkon brtsegs): ma dkrol bar ni sgra yang 'byung / /'jig rten lha min lha mir bcas/ /bde gshegs 'od kyis rgyas par gang / /de ltar gang tshe sangs rgyas ni/ /'gro la phan phyir grong gshegs pa/ /de tshe ngo mtshar
305b1(dkon brtsegs): rmad 'byung ba/ /rnam pa mang po rab tu gda'/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por gshegs pa dang / tshong dpon shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu sdig bcom zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'
305b2(dkon brtsegs): khyim par gyur pa grong bar zhig na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom/ bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dga' bar 'gyur ba/ dbang po zhi ba/ thugs zhi ba/ dul ba dang zhi gnas mchog gi
305b3(dkon brtsegs): pha rol du byon pa/ bsdams pa/ glang po ltar dbang po thul ba/ mtsho ltar dang ste rnyog pa med cig gsal pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus
305b4(dkon brtsegs): sku legs par brgyan pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan brgyad ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems shin du dad par gyur to/ /de sems shin du
305b5(dkon brtsegs): dad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /
305b6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
305b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su spyod/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
305b8(dkon brtsegs): gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta ba 'tshal ba de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen po 'dul ba'i dbang
306a1(dkon brtsegs): gi phyir grong khyer gyi phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /phyogs gcig tu bzhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mthong nas srog chags brgya stong mang po dag kyang lhags par gyur to/ /bar snang las
306a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems/
306a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po sdig bcom la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs
306a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
306a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po sems can thams cad la snying rje zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o/ /de la lhag pa'i bsam pa khong du chud par bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
306a6(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ni gang byang chub kyi phyir sems bskyed nas mi dge ba'i las gang yang mi spyod pa'o/ /ci mi spyod ce na/ 'dod chags mi spyod/ zhe sdang mi spyod/ gti mug mi spyod/ khyim pa'i rtags
306a7(dkon brtsegs): la sred pa mi spyod de/ rab tu byung nas kyang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa mi 'dod cing gang rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa de la gnas pa yin no/ /de la rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa gang zhe na/
306a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa'o/ /chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ces bya ba'i phung po dang / khams dang /
306b1(dkon brtsegs): skye mched dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams so/ /phung po lnga rab tu rtogs pa ji ltar rab tu rtogs she na phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa
306b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / ma 'gags par rab tu rtogs pa ste/ ji ltar rab tu rtogs pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar rab tu rtogs pa'o/ /gang gi tshe yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi shes blom sems su mi byed mi rtog rnam par
306b3(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa de'i tshe rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba ni phung po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o/ /gang phung po rab tu rtogs pa de chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa zhes bya'o/ /
306b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ji ltar bdag gis chos de dag yongs su shes par gyur pa de ltar sems
306b5(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad la ston kyang sems can dang / chos kyang mi dmigs te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig po 'di dang ldan na myur du bla na med pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
306b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
306b7(dkon brtsegs): y ongs su bsgrub pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba des shing ta la bdun srid tsam du bar snang la
306b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'phags so/ /'khor de'i nang na srog chags nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i srog chags khri bzhi stong
307a1(dkon brtsegs): ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad
307a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal kyi sgo nas kha dog du ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi
307a3(dkon brtsegs): kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das
307a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs nas bla gros phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs
307a5(dkon brtsegs): su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /chos rnams kun la mnga' dbang pha rol phyin/ /'dren pa khyod ni rgyal po'i stobs la mnga'/ /khyod ni thams cad mkhyen
307a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'jig rten grags/ /ci yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs/ /thub pa chen po 'das pa ma lus mkhyen/ /de bzhin ma 'ongs ma lus rnams kyang mkhyen/ /da ltar dag kyang mkhyen pa ma smad pa/ /ci slad
307a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'dzum pa 'di mdzad gsungs/ /rab 'bring tha ma'i sems dang ldan pa yi/ /sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod pa mkhyen/ /chags grol srid pa'i 'du shes pha rol phyin/ /mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lung
307a8(dkon brtsegs): bstan gsol/ /lha rnams bye ba khrag khrig kun lhags te/ /skyon ma mchis la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal zhing / /skye bo chos spyod 'di dag kun sdod kyis/ /thub pa chen po mtshungs med gsung dbyung gsol/ /
307b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni ye shes pha rol phyin/ /khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'/ /spyod pa'i bye brag kun mkhyen pa/ /ci zhig slad du 'dzum pa bstan/ /bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong lha 'di dag /chos rnams 'tshal ba'i slad du 'dir lhags te/ /
307b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin dge slong tshogs kyang mang po dag /dam pa'i chos rnams nyan par 'tshal ba mchis/ /khyod la mchod pa'i phyir ni sil snyan rnams/ /rab tu bzang zhing mang ba brdung bar bgyid/ /skye bo mang po the tsom 'tshal ba
307b3(dkon brtsegs): kun/ /thub pa deng 'dir the tshom myur bcad gsol/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'
307b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di shing ta la bdun srid tsam du steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa mthong ngam/ /kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/ /bde bar gshegs pa
307b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag drug bcu rtsa gnyis na bla
307b6(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa rims nad med pa la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa
307b7(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug ces bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ kun dga' bo dper na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
307b8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' ba nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
308a1(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yang de las mi lhag mi thub bar 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das
308a2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs de nas gshegs te/ mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim ga la ba der gshegs nas byon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyang stan ci 'os pa
308a3(dkon brtsegs): dag la 'khod do/ /de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas bdag nyid lag bdar te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba bzang pos de bzhin
308a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bstabs te tshim par byas so/ /bstabs te tshim par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa gshos gsol ba dang / lhung bzed bzhag cing phyag bcabs par rig nas
308a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la ras bcos bu'i zung rin thang med pa sku la gsol to/ /sku la gsol nas kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal te/ stan ran pa zhig blangs te phyogs
308a6(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / 'chab pa gang
308a7(dkon brtsegs): nas 'byung ba lags/ /mi shes pa ci las skye ba lags/ mi shes pa ji ltar 'gag pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /
308a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po ngar 'dzin pa dang / /nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa las gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / 'chab par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pas yon tan dang / nyes pa
308b1(dkon brtsegs): mi shes te/ de bas na mi shes pa zhes bya'o/ /gang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa de la ni shes pa 'am mi shes pa zhes gnas par mi nus so/ /de bas na rgyal po chen po
308b2(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis 'du byed thams cad la gar yang 'gro ba dang / gang nas 'ong bar mi gdags pa de ltar bslab par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po gang gar yang mi 'gro/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong ba de la chos gang yang 'gro ba
308b3(dkon brtsegs): 'am 'ong ba med do/ /gang la 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med pa de la skye ba med/ 'gag pa med do/ /gang mi skye mi 'gags pa de shes pa med do/ /shes pa de ji lta bar mi shes pa yang de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nges par
308b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba 'am/ nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mi shes pa'i phyir ro/ /gang gi tshe nges par 'byung ba 'am/ nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos gang yang mi shes pa de'i tshe ye shes can zhes bya'o/ /de nas
308b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par gsungs pa ngo
308b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag bar skabs 'di kho nar 'gum pa'i dus bgyis par gyur na ni bdag nyid mtshams sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po ma
308b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes dgra la chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug /yang dag par gzeng stod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe
308b8(dkon brtsegs): yang chos kyi sbyin pa la 'du bar 'gyur ba mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das zas phyis len pa spangs te/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos bzhag nas zhabs bkrus te/ nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang
309a1(dkon brtsegs): du gshegs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ chos yang dag par
309a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa la bzhugs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / nyan thos chen po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas ri'i rgyal po
309a3(dkon brtsegs): bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /'jam dpal
309a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa yang nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te/ lha'i bu bzhi khri nyis stong thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu
309a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang byang
309a6(dkon brtsegs): c hub sems dpa' stong tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu
309a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra yang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu
309a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhis yongs su bskor
309b1(dkon brtsegs): cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
309b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
309b3(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
309b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i grong bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
309b5(dkon brtsegs): po sdig bcom gyis gang 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa la brtsams te/ yongs su zhus pa de'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo tsam zhig
309b6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal na/ bcom ldan 'das nga yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'grub pa de las brtsams te/ ji ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems
309b7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi sde rnams pham par bgyid pa dang / gzhan mu stegs
309b8(dkon brtsegs): can rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pas zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs
310a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang / pha rol

310a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i don bgyid par 'gyur ba de ltar chos legs par rab tu bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer ba 'dus shing mchis pa rnams

310a6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas phyogs bcu kun du phyogs re rer yang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bkye la/ 'od zer re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po
310a7(dkon brtsegs): snang bas khyab par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od kyang mi snang zhing de dag 'od zer de dag gis zil gyis mnan nas phyir mig gis dbang po la snang bar mi 'gyur ba dang /

314b8(dkon brtsegs): btab cing sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
315a1(dkon brtsegs): c hen po lag na rin po ches rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa de lta bu 'di bstan nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga
315a2(dkon brtsegs): la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad ma de dag la 'khor dang
315a3(dkon brtsegs): bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /yang de'i tshe nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig
315a4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs
315a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de ni bai dUr+ya bzang po 'ba' shig las mngon par grub pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems
315a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'ba' shig gis yongs su gang ngo / /yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams 'gro yang rung / 'ong yang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / ldang yang rung / 'chag kyang
315a7(dkon brtsegs): rung ste/ de dag gis bai dUr+ya'i sa chen po de las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs rgyal po de mthong ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na shin tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi
315a8(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor snang ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bai dUr+ya'i sa chen po de las de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ngo / /mthong nas chos kun 'dri ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de yang de dag la lung ston to/ /
315b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang chos thos nas bzod pa thob bo/ /'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bcom ldan 'das de'i smin mtshams kyi spu'i dbus su yang nor bu rin po che chen po mngon par grub ste/ nor bu
315b2(dkon brtsegs): rin po che de'i 'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad snang bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na me tog kha zum pa dang / me tog kha bye ba las nyin mtshan bgrang ba ma gtogs par nyi ma dang zla bar mngon pa yang
315b3(dkon brtsegs): med/ nyin mtshan du mngon pa yang med do/ /yang de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros zhes bya ba
315b4(dkon brtsegs): zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis snang ba chen po de yang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas bcom ldan
315b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs rgyal po de ga ba la der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang
315b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen
315b7(dkon brtsegs): po 'di 'jig rten du byung zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po yang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
315b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
316a1(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig
316a2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig tshad med grangs med pa dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste chos bsgrag pa'i phyir spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung
316a3(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo / /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig
316a4(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /
316a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de yang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de yang nyan du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig /de nas
316a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig
316a7(dkon brtsegs): gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der gnas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis
316a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro bar bya snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems
316b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
316b2(dkon brtsegs): du skyes par gyur ba'i sems can de dag thams cad mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i me yang rab tu zhi bar gyur pa dang / sems
316b3(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag bkres pa dang / skom pas nyen pa yi dags dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad bkres pa dang / skom pa dang bral zhing
316b4(dkon brtsegs): bde ba mchog dang ldan par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba bzhin te/ skad cig de nyid la sems can de dag bde ba rnam pa 'di lta bu skyes nas skad
316b5(dkon brtsegs): cig de nyid la sems can gang yang 'dod chags sam/ zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug gam/ khro ba 'am/ nga rgyal lam/ 'chab pa 'am/ 'tshig pa 'am/ phrag dog gam/ /
316b6(dkon brtsegs): ser sna 'am/ g.yo ba 'am/ tha ba 'am/ gnod sems kyis gzer ba med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de nyid la byams pa'i sems
316b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa de lta bu'i/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas te/ de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /
316b8(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/

317a4(dkon brtsegs): ' jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba da
317a5(dkon brtsegs): ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na khyim pa gos dkar po gyon pa med de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smig
317a6(dkon brtsegs): 'chang ba sha stag go/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang med cing mngal gyi gnas kyang mi shes so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smig gyon cing skyil mo dkrung

317a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed de/ de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ byang chub
317b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug pa/ gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i gnas/ sems mi g.yeng ba/ gtong ba/ rjes su gtong ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ mtshan ma med pa la yang
317b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par sgrub pa/ smon pa med pa tshol pa/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rab tu rtogs pa/ 'dun pa'i bya ba rgyun chags pa/ sangs rgyas
317b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi ye shes 'dod pa/ de la mngon par dad pa/ chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/ de dag la yongs su rtogs pa med pa/ rtog pa yang dag par chad pa de yang mi mthong ba 'di ni sangs rgyas

318b1(dkon brtsegs): pa bzod cing dang du len par bgyid pa mchis sam/ 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel tam/ de bzhin du zhe sdang gi sems dang / gti mug gi sems sel pa mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/
318b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can de dag las gang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa ni nyung ngo / rigs kyi bu sems can de dag las phal cher ni gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang
318b3(dkon brtsegs): mang ste 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis kun du dkris so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i mi 'di thog du ma bab bo/ /gal te sems can de dag
318b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod par gyur na ni de yang rung na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi bzod pas na de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mi mjed bgyi ba'i mi 'di thog tu ma bab po/ /bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi

319a1(dkon brtsegs): mu cor smra ba/ khro ba/ gtum pa/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gzhol ba/ ngan 'gro'i spyod yul ba/ sangs rgyas dang /

319a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dud par mi byed de/ de spyos shing brgyad kyang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog /gnod par mi 'gyur/ mi 'phrogs/ mi chags/ mi skyo ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams

319a8(dkon brtsegs): na 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya

319b3(dkon brtsegs): rten gyi khams mi mjed du tha na se gol gtogs pa srid tsam du sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyed na de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed na/ gang nyin mtshan du
319b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la byang chub sems dpa' sems

320a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi
320a5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis

320a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu
320a8(dkon brtsegs): 'khod do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag tu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis snang ba chen po de yang
320b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong / /gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
320b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod
320b3(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / rgyal po chen po 'jig rten skyong ba dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba/ gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis
320b4(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po de yang mthong gsung bsal ba'i sgra de yang thos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la
320b5(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs
320b6(dkon brtsegs): m ed pa ji snyed pa de dag nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dang ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med cing
320b7(dkon brtsegs): khyad ma zhugs par mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog dang / chu zheng ci 'dra bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku'i yongs su grub pa de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis
320b8(dkon brtsegs): so so nas mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / nyan thos chen po phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / longs spyod dang / kun spyod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'dir yang byang
321a1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' dag gis so so nas shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug pa snyam du sems pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub
321a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya chen po de mthong nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
321a3(dkon brtsegs): de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /phyogs bcu rnams su grags pa mtha' yas blo/ /'jig rten lhar bcas 'dir ni lam me ste/ /thub pa'i thugs ni sems can thams
321a4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis/ /tshad gzung mi nus de phyir khyod bsam yas/ /phyogs bcu dag nas rgyal sras dpag med pa/ chos tshol slad du de ring 'dir lhags nas/ /bcom ldan 'das la kun kyang gus bcas gnas/ /smra ba'i mchog gis
321a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams rab tu gsungs/ /phyogs rnams ma lus par ni brjod grags pa/ /tshul khrims brtson 'grus ting 'dzin blo rnams kyis/ /seng ge ltar ni 'jigs med khyod mdzes pa/ /nam mkha' dag la nyi ma bzhin du gsal/
321a6(dkon brtsegs): lha dang klu dang lha min gsang ba pa/ /dge bsnyen pho mo dge slong dge slong ma/ /thams cad gus bcas thal mo sbyar gnas kyis/ /bcom ldan phan bzhed chos ni bshad du gsol/ khyod ni 'das mkhyen de bzhin ma 'ongs dang /
321a7(dkon brtsegs): da ltar yang ni shin du nges par mkhyen/ /lus can mos pa ji bzhin khyod gzigs la/ /the tshom chen po sel ba'i chos bshad gsol/ /thub pa rgyal sras ji ltar spyad pas na/ /zhing rnams dag pa rdul med thob par 'gyur/ /ji
321a8(dkon brtsegs): ltar smon lam 'grub pa 'thob 'gyur pa/ /de ni 'dren pas bdag la myur bshad gsol/ /ji ltar ser sna'i dri mas mi gos shing / /ji ltar tshul khrims ma nyams 'gyur ba dang / /bsdigs pa dang ni de bzhin skur pa dang / /brnyas
321b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dag kyang thub pa ji ltar bzod/ /sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir ba yi/ /'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal bzlog slad du/ /bskal pa bye ba mang por rgyal sras rnams/ /ji ltar brtson 'grus rtsom zhing spyod par 'gyur/ /rtag tu sems ni rtse gcig
321b2(dkon brtsegs): mnyam bzhag cing / /bsam gtan gnas pa spyod yul rnam dag ste/ /pad ma chu yi dri mas mi gos ltar/ /ji ltar 'dod pa dag gis gos mi 'gyur/ /thub pa ji ltar zab mo'i chos smra zhing / /mkhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i blo ldan 'gyur/ /
321b3(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa ji ltar bdud sde bcas bcom nas/ /byang chub rdul bral bla med reg par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /byams pa khyod kyis
321b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par 'jug pa'i tshul la mkhas pa bsgrub pa dang por bsam zhing nan tan bya ba
321b5(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na bdag gdan 'ding du bcug ste/ gnas brtan kun dga' bo dang /
321b6(dkon brtsegs): maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' ma stsal/ de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gdan 'ding du bcug pa las na gtam 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gi phyir brtsams nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
321b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi theg pa yongs su spangs pa'i gtam zhig 'byung ba ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin pa lta zhig snyam mo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de'i tshe
321b8(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi 'bum pa rin po che du mas spras pa/ /lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong du ma bting ba/ shing bal ltar 'jam
322a1(dkon brtsegs): zhing reg na bde ba bshams nas khri de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bar byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das khri snga ma las bzhengs te seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs so/ /bcom
322a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu
322a3(dkon brtsegs): chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub kyi bsam pas yang dag par zhugs pa dang / sems can la snying rje ba dang / brtson
322a4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus rtsom pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gcig
322a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro/ /chos gcig po gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems
322a6(dkon brtsegs): dpas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob cing 'dod pa dang 'dun pa bskyed pa ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur ba na tshig 'di skad
322a7(dkon brtsegs): ces/ gal te bdag skye ba thams cad tu rab tu ma byung na sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur cig ces smras te/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
322a8(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni skye ba thams cad tu rab tu 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / gdon mi za bar khyim gyi gnas nas
322b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnyed pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir/ shA ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon
322b2(dkon brtsegs): tan bcu yongs su 'dzin to/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa la chags par mi 'gyur ba dang / dgon pa'i gnas la dga' ba rnyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul yang 'thob pa dang / de chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo la sred par mi 'gyur ba dang / ngan
322b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gror 'gro ba'i chos rnam par spong ba dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba'i chos la sten pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang / de la lha rnams dga' ba dang / de la mi ma yin pa rnams
322b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par
322b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad dgrol bar 'dod pas rgyun du rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba la shin du dga' bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu chos gcig po de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams
322b6(dkon brtsegs): shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod
322b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi theg pa mi 'dod/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam la mi dga'/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang mi sten/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa
322b8(dkon brtsegs): la mi slob/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos mi ston/ /gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug cing rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang de bzhin pa dang / gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir
323a1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de la gzhan dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu yongs su 'dzin
323a2(dkon brtsegs): to/ /bcu gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' shig gi dge 'dun rab tu rnyed pa dang / de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas
323a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams de'i tshul yongs su sgrogs shing chos ston pa dang / 'di lta ste/ de brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid kyi phyir sems dang sems las byung ba rgya chen po skyed pa dang / mir gyur na yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang /
323a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / g.yog 'khor mi phyed par 'gyur ba dang / gsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe
323a5(dkon brtsegs): na/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa bas
323a6(dkon brtsegs): gang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gcig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ /shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas skyes pas ni
323a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba yod na sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs
323a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas su gdags pa yang yod par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems la rab tu 'god pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems
323b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi
323b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa dang / zang zin med par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
323b3(dkon brtsegs): sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di mi 'jigs par grong du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par 'khor la
323b4(dkon brtsegs): chos ston pa dang / mi 'jigs par kha zas za ba dang / mi 'jigs par gtsug lag khang du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par dge 'dun gyi nang du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par lung 'bog pa dang / mi 'jigs par slob dpon dang mkhan po'i
323b5(dkon brtsegs): drung du 'gro ba dang / mi 'jigs par byams pa dang ldan pas 'khor la rjes su ston pa dang / mi 'jigs par gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad la spyod pa dang / des smras pa gzung bar 'gyur ste/ shA
323b6(dkon brtsegs): ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu po de dag 'thob bo/ /shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu
323b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su 'dzin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di de sdig pa mi 'dod pa yin/ de shes kyi khe mi 'dod pa yin de grags pa mi 'dod pa yin/ de khyim yongs su mi 'dzin pa yin/ /de khyim la ser sna med pa yin/ de gos dang / zas dang /
323b8(dkon brtsegs): mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa yin/ des smras pa gzung bar 'os pa yin/ lha dag kyang de'i drung du 'gro ba yin/ de tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa yin/
324a1(dkon brtsegs): de sangs rgyas kyi sems la sems bskyed pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu dgon
324a2(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi phan yon bcu yongs su 'dzin to/ /bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di 'du 'dzi rnam par spong ba dang / rab tu dben pa la sten pa dang / de bsam gtan la sems dmigs
324a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba dang / bya ba mang por mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams 'dod pa dang / de'i lus bde ba dang / mi 'bral ba dang / de'i tshangs par spyod pa bar chad du mi 'gyur ba dang / tshegs chung ngus ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang /
324a4(dkon brtsegs): des tshig dang yi ger bstan pa rnams chud mi za ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag yongs
324a5(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan
324a6(dkon brtsegs): yang chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba
324a7(dkon brtsegs): yin/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed cing nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ nga rgyal tshar bcad pa'i phyir zhugs shing phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa yin/ pha rol 'byor ba la yang yid dga' ba yin no/ /shA ri'i
324a8(dkon brtsegs): bu bzhi po 'di dag ni bden par smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i kha nas ud pa la'i dri'i ngad 'byung ba dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs
324b1(dkon brtsegs): su dag par 'gyur ba dang / lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad mar gyur cing / tshig 'khrul pa med pa 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub
324b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bden par smra ba'i phan yon no/ /shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gang 'di ngan 'gror skye ba rnam par spong ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnga
324b3(dkon brtsegs): mo dang / ba lang dang / bong bu dang / rta'i skye gnas dang / de bzhin du gzhan smad par skye ba rnam par spong ba dang / mi smad par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi phyir rgol ba dang / mi 'dza' ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par
324b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba dang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/ /shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni phrag dog dang / ser
324b5(dkon brtsegs): sna yongs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de gtong ba'i sems la mi rmongs pa dang / mu ge byung ba'i dus na sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba dang / de tshul
324b6(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang ldan pa 'ongs na khyim gyi sgo gcod par mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i gtong ba dang / len pa la su yang phrag dog mi byed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni phrag dog dang ser sna
324b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/ /shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta
324b8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag bzung ste/ bdag 'di dag gi ched du go cha bgos nas 'di dag la bde ba sbyar bar bya ba yin na sems can 'di dag rang gi mthus bsgrubs pa'i longs spyod kyis bde bar
325a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tsho 'o zhes dga' ba rnyed pa dang / de'i longs spyod rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / me dang chu la sogs pa dang / bgo skal la spyod pa mi 'dza' ba rnams kyis mi phrogs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe phun sum tshogs pa
325a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe de la rgyal po yang dga' bar 'gyur na sems can gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de longs spyod dang / kun du spyod pa rgya chen
325a3(dkon brtsegs): po la sems 'jug pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/ /shA ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing
325a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA r-i'i bu gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
325a5(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs su sbyong ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnams la phun sum tshogs pa yongs su
325a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir tshol kun du 'tshol zhing de gang la chos nyan pa de la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar yon tan 'di dag yongs su bsgrubs pa de kun 'dri zhing des chos de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o/ /shA r-i'i bu gzhan
325a7(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar smon cing de tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba ste/ de tshul khrims yongs su dag pas gang dang gang du smon pa de dang der skyes ste/ de der
325a8(dkon brtsegs): skyes nas de sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la sems shing rtog ste/ nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa 'am/ longs spyod dang kun du spyod pa phun sum
325b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin te/ des de dag mtshan mar bzung nas gus pa dang bcas/ rje sa dang bcas shing thal mo sbyar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ji ltar spyad
325b2(dkon brtsegs): na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin ces kun du zhus nas de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen te/ gang rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan/
325b3(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag ston cing / yang dag par rab tu 'chad de/ des de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan zhing bya
325b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de mi shes pa yongs su spong zhing bya ba ma yin pa yongs su spong ngo / /de la ye shes ni gang / bya ba ni gang zhe na/ ye shes zhes byang ba ni gang dmigs pa la dmigs pa ni ye shes te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs
325b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi ye shes dang bral ba'o/ /bya ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'o/ /shA r-i'i bu gzhan yang 'di byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ de la rgyu ni gang / 'byung ba ni gang zhe
325b6(dkon brtsegs): na/ rgyu zhes bya ba ni gang / 'di tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste/ gang las phyin ci log bzhi la sems can rnams gnas par 'gyur ba'o/ /de ni tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin te/ de la tshul bzhin sbyor
325b7(dkon brtsegs): ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste/ 'byung ba yang de nyid yin no/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes/ zhing gi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes so/ /de la
325b8(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang / zhing gi ngo bo nyid ni gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/ /zhing gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de yang ming tsam mo/ /gang ming tsam de dben par shes shing ji ltar chos gang yang mi dmigs pa
326a1(dkon brtsegs): de ltar shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi g.yo zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs su
326a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod do/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
326a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongs su 'dzin te drug gang zhe na shA r-i'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa po sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba ste/ de dngos po gang phangs pa yid du 'ong ba/ mngon par 'dod par 'gyur ba de dag yongs su gtong yang zhum
326a4(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'gyur zhing yid dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes nas 'di ltar gang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par smon pas bdag gis sbyin pa chen po dang / theg pa chen po dang /
326a5(dkon brtsegs): bya ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /kun du 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par mi nus so snyam du rtog go/ /des de ltar brtags nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba 'gyur te/
326a6(dkon brtsegs): des rang gi lus dang srog yongs su btang yang yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur na gzhan nor gyi rnam pa dang / chung ma dang / bu pho dang / bu mo lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shA r-i'i bu 'di la ji snyam du sems gang thams cad mkhyen pa zhes
326a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'i tshig 'd-i'i bstan pa ji lta bu zhe na/ shA r-i'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin te/ de'i phyir de byang chub thob
326a8(dkon brtsegs): pas na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur ba yang rung / rab tu byung ba yang rung ste/ tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la rab tu gnas pa yin te/ de srog
326b1(dkon brtsegs): gi phyir yang bslab pa las mi 'da'o/ /gang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par bzung ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ bdag ni tshul khrims
326b2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'o/ /zhes dga' ba rnyed cing mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ mngon par dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod de de tshangs par spyod cing bde bar nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do/ /de bde bar chos mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /chos kyi
326b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul dang ldan par yang dag par so sor rtog par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par so sor rtog pa la gnas pa ni zab mo la bzod pa skye'o/ /zab mo la bzod pa skyes pa ni lta ba drang por 'gyur ro/ /lta ba drang ba ni yang dag par nan tan
326b4(dkon brtsegs): byed par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas pa ni khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/ /de khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bas skrag par 'gyur ro/ /skrag pas 'byung ba chol lo/ /'byung ba mthong
326b5(dkon brtsegs): nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bdag sdug bsngal ba ltar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi khur khyer la nye bar zhi ba ma gtogs par 'di dag gi bde ba'i rgyu gzhan
326b6(dkon brtsegs): med do snyam mo/ /de de ltar so sor rtog pa ni snying rje chen po 'thob po/ /de cher snying rje bas thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob kyi bar du mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson 'grus mi 'dor ro/ /shA r-i'i bu gzhan yang 'di
326b7(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' de bzod pa'i go cha gyon cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin gyi/ nga rgyal gyi stobs dang ldan pa ma yin no/ /de spyos brgyad brdegs bsdigs kyang bzod pa sgrub ste/ pha rol la mi 'khrug gnod par
326b8(dkon brtsegs): mi sems so/ /de 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ gal te bdag la sems can de dag gis ri rab tsam gyi tho bas brdegs shing bskal pa bye ba'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad par gshe yang bdag gis gnod sems dang tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi
327a1(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems cad de dag ni ma bslabs pa bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la slob par 'dod pa'o snyam nas de ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyis spyos pa
327a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / brgyad pa dang / brdegs pa de lta de lta bur snying rje chen po rnyed de/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag bskyab par bya'o/ /bdag sems can 'di dag gi don du go cha bgos nas bdag gis sems can 'di dag gzung ba yin te/ bdag
327a3(dkon brtsegs): gis 'di dag 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bya'o/ /bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems dang tha ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par mi bya'o snyam mo/ /de de ltar bzod pa'i go cha bgos pas phun sum tshogs pa bcu 'thob ste
327a4(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di rigs phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes
327a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyen phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos nyan pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos la nan tan byed pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / shi 'phos nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa dang / mthong nas
327a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang dad pa thob pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzod pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni phun sum tshogs pa bcu po de dag 'thob bo/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i chos yongs su bsgrub
327a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams shing yid dam la brtan pa yin no/ /de 'di ltar brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ gal te bdag gis sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar yang 'khor bar bya'o zhes tshul 'di dang /
327a8(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus rtsom pa 'di dang / spyod pa 'di dang / sems zhi ba dang / yid dam 'di dang / dge ba'i bsam pa 'di dang / snying rje'i sems 'dis sems can thams cad kyi ched du bskal pa de snyed du 'khor bar bya ste/ de ltar bdag gis sems
327b1(dkon brtsegs): can 'di dag yongs su mi gtang ngo snyam nas brtson 'grus rtsom mo/ /yang shA r-i'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas te/ sems
327b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa/ sems bskyed pa tsam la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin te/ tshul 'di dang / stobs bskyed pa 'dis phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar sbyin pa byin pas byang chub sems
327b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i gang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa snying rje chen po la gnas pas 'di lta bu'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha'i sems bskyed na de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ /shA r-i'i bu brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
327b4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi chos bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ des byis pa'i spyod pa spangs pa yin/ des sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs su bzung ba yin/ des 'khor ba la nyes par 'du shes bskyed pa yin/ des snying rje chen po yongs su bzung ba
327b5(dkon brtsegs): yin/ sngon dam bcas pa las mi 'gyur ba yin/ nad nyung ba yin/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bka' bzhin byas pa yin/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug chung ba yin/ ji
327b6(dkon brtsegs): ltar bstan pa'i tshig dang / yi ge rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa yin/ nan tan gyis yang dag par sgrub pa yin te/ shA r-i'i bu brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag 'thob bo/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan
327b7(dkon brtsegs): yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni thugs rtse gcig pa/ rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/ bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang ldan ba'o/
327b8(dkon brtsegs): snyam nas de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa'i rjes su 'gro bar bya na sems g.yengs pa dang / brjed ngas pas ni gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi gnas te/ gnas 'di thob par mi nus so snyam nas de chags pa
328a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad dang / 'thob pa dang / bkur sti thams cad dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal la chags pa thams cad dang / grogs po dang / gla mi dang / khyim la sred pa thams cad yongs su
328a2(dkon brtsegs): btang ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sems can thams cad ni bdag gis yongs su mi btang ngo / /snyam nas dgon pa rab tu dgon pa la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ bse ru ltar gcig pu spyod cing de dgon pa rab
328a3(dkon brtsegs): tu dgon pa dag tu gnas nas phyog gcig tu sems can rnams la byams pas khyab par byed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la byams
328a4(dkon brtsegs): pas khyab par byed do/ /byams pa la gnas nas bsam gtan la bsam gtan par 'gyur ro/ /yang shA r-i'i bu byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang gis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge
328a5(dkon brtsegs): ' dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bde ba thams cad kyis sti stang du byas pa bas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba na rab tu dben par 'dod cing dgon pa logs su
328a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs te/ gom pa bdun bor na 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ /ches myur du byang chub 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA r-i'i bu bcu po 'di dag ni dben pa na gnas shing bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems
328a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i phan yon te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ blo gros dang ldan pa yin/ rtogs pa dang ldan pa yin/ mos pa dang ldan pa yin/ myur du spobs pa rab tu thob pa yin/ gzungs sgrub pa yin/ skye ba dang / 'jig
328a8(dkon brtsegs): pa la mkhas pa thob pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi phung po las mi nyams pa yin/ lha rnams kyang de la rim gror byed pa yin/ gzhan gyi 'byor pa la mi 'dod pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu bcu po de dag ni dben pa la gnas shing bsam gtan la
328b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no/ /shA r-i'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rgyu mthun pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de 'di ltar shes rab gang nas byung snyam du nye bar rtog cing 'di snyam du
328b2(dkon brtsegs): sems te/ shes rab ni tshul khrims kyi sdom pa'i gnas las byung ste/ shes rab byung ba las chos dkar po thams cad rnam par 'phel lo snyam nas de shes rab la slob ste/ gang 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas
328b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / sngags kyi gnas dang / sman gyi gnas dang / gang bya dka' ba dang / bsgrub pa dka' ba'i las de dag thams cad la slob bo/ /bslabs nas kyang de 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ gang 'jig rten pa'i shes rab 'di ni yid 'byung bar ma yin/
328b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang bral bar ma yin/ /'gog par ma yin/ zhi bar ma yin/ mngon par shes par ma yin/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par ma yin/ dge sbyong du ma yin/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyis/ 'di ltar bdag gis
328b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab gang gis shin du zhi bar 'gyur ba'i bzo rnam pa de lta bu dang / sngags rnam pa de lta bu dang / sman rnam pa de lta bu dang / shes rab rnam pa de lta bu yongs su btsal lo snyam nas de chos thams cad kyi thog ma yongs su tshol lo/ /de
328b6(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad kyi thog ma yongs su tshol ba na chos gang yang chos gang la yang nye bar 'jog pa'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas rab tu zhi ba la gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rab tu zhi
328b7(dkon brtsegs): bar spyod pa la gnas nas yongs su yi mi 'chad do/ /yongs su yi mi 'chad pas de sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du srid pa 'dzin te/ shA r-i'i
328b8(dkon brtsegs): bu chos drug po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing smon lam las mi nyams la/ 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i
