329a2(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyod do/ /bdun gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa de yang mi dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyang skyon med la/ tshul khrims de la rlom sems kyang med pa dang /
329a3(dkon brtsegs): bzod cing des la/ sems can de yang mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems de yang mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan yang yongs su sgrub la/ de yang mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan
329a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / shes rab kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed la/ de rtog pa yang med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyang rjes su dran la de mtshan ma yang sel ba ste/ shA r-i'i bu chos bdun po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams
329a5(dkon brtsegs): shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yang yongs su 'dzin to/ /shA ri'i bu chos brgyad dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/
329a6(dkon brtsegs): phrag dog med pa dang / rgyan sbyin pa dang / sems rgya che ba dang / chos smra ba la sti stang byed pa dang gus pa dang bcas pa dang / 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa dang / kun bged pa'i ngang tshul can dang / bdag la mi stod cing gzhan la mi smod pa ste/ shA ri'i
329a7(dkon brtsegs): bu chos brgyad po de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su spyod do/ / // bam po gsum pa/ shA ri'i bu chos dgu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams
329a8(dkon brtsegs): shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed de/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus sdom pa dang / ngag sdom pa dang / yid sdom pa dang / 'dod chags bsal ba dang / zhe sdang bsal ba dang / gti mug bsal ba dang / slu ba med pa dang / mdza' ba brtan pa
329b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brnyas pa med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos dgu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu chos bcu dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon
329b2(dkon brtsegs): lam las mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje
329b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / gshen rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / lha rgud pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / mi rgud pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / dbul ba dang / mu ge dang / rkun po dang rang rta dang dmag gis gnod pa
329b4(dkon brtsegs): thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba ste/ de 'di snyam du ci nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dags kyi yul med cing bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / bgo ba phun sum tshogs pa
329b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / sems can rnams kyang tshe dpag tu med par gyur te/ nga'i ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yongs su dag par ma byas kyi bar du brtson 'grus
329b6(dkon brtsegs): mi btang ngo snyam du sems skyed pa ste/ shA r-i'i bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las kyang mi nyams shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
329b7(dkon brtsegs): me tog khyer zhing de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du song nas 'di snyam du sems skyed de/ me tog 'di ltar dri zhim la kha dog bzang zhing blta na sdug ste/ yid du 'ong ba dang / mdzes pa de bzhin du
329b8(dkon brtsegs): bdag byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ljon pas rab tu brgyan par gyur cig ces bya bar sems bskyed do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ phye ma dang /
330a1(dkon brtsegs): bdug spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru'i
330a2(dkon brtsegs): bar du gang ci 'bul yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bsgrub pa'i don du yongs su bsngo zhing tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la
330a3(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa de'i sems kyi smon pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni su la yang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig mi brjod cing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig sha stag brjod de/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na

330a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi lam dang ldan zhing 'byung ba'i shes rab can du 'gyur ro/ /shA r-i'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yul gang na 'dug kyang rung ste/ yul der skyes pa 'am/ bud med dam/ /khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/ sems can gang ji snyed cig
330a8(dkon brtsegs): des mthong ba de thams cad byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing su la yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi rjod cing / gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam sha stag brjod de/ de byang chub thob
330b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas med cing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis
330b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su gang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thob par 'gyur ro/ /shA r-i'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi rnyed pa mi 'phrog cing gzhan gyis thob na dga' bar 'dzin te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
330b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de thams cad mi 'phrogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos kyi 'thob pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am su

330b7(dkon brtsegs): nan tan byed par 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnga bo che dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / pi bang rgyud gcig pa dang / sgra snyan dang / 'khar dkrol dang / gling bu dang / pi bang dang / ba la la ki dang /

334a6(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de dag ni chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa yang ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la gang las 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya bar brjod pa'i gnas mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi bu byang chub

334a8(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsams shing de skad du ston/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang 'jigs par gyur pa de dag ni rnam par rtog par 'gyur te/ gang rnam par rtog pa de dag ni
334b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du bdag cag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam nas de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa ji snyed du bskyed par gyur ba de snyed du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang dag de lta
334b2(dkon brtsegs): bu'i sems mi skyed pa de dag ni byang chub tu dmigs pa med cing sems kyis rlom sems su mi byed de byang chub kyi sems su dmigs pa med pas rnam par rtog pa med do/ /gang gi tshe rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe/ ci yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
334b3(dkon brtsegs): rgya ba med do/ /ci'i phyir ci yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med ce na/ byang chub de mi dmigs pas de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
334b4(dkon brtsegs): rgya 'am/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par bstan mod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no/ /'jam dpal
334b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na nam mkha' ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/ byang chub ji lta bar nam mkha' yang de bzhin te/ nam mkha' dang byang chub de ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/ /
334b6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis de lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid shes pa de ni cung zad kyang shes pa med la des ma shes pa yang gang yang med do/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe dge slong khri nyis stong nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams
334b7(dkon brtsegs): las sems rnam par grol lo/ /lha dang mi khri bzhi stong chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag go/ /srog chags dgu khri drug stong gis sngon ma bskyed pa las bla na med pa yang dag
334b8(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' lnga khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos seng ge'i rtsal
335a1(dkon brtsegs): gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed/ 'jam dpal
335a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kha rog chos rnams ma skyes pa la bdag rnam par rtog tu ma gzhug / rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyad par bya'o/ /zhes zer na de nyid de'i
335a3(dkon brtsegs): log par lta ba chen po 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis ni sems gang byang chub tu bskyed par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ de ltar bdag gis sems de yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas byang chub tu yang sems ma bskyed do/ /smras pa/
335a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal rjes su mthong zhes bya ba'i tshig de'i don gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu yang dag par rjes su mthong zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid bstan pa'o/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir mnyam pa nyid ces bya/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu mnyam
335a5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid ces bya ba ni gang la tha dad pa med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid des chos thams cad 'di lta ste/ dben pa'i tshul du tshul gcig du bstan pas ro gcig tu brjod cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag
335a6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa dang / mi skye ba dang / mi 'gag pa dang / nga'i ba med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i phyir chos ston cing mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos de lta bu mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i ye shes
335a7(dkon brtsegs): ni mnyam pa nyid ces bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos nyid khong du chud pa de ni khams las tha dad par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gcig tu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
335a8(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di ni mnyam pa nyid do/ /mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de ni mi mnyam pa med pa'o/ /mi mnyam pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzod ma nas dag pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
335b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni 'di srid cig nas ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
335b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do zhes bgyi bar mi ston te/ 'khor 'di dag ni nyan par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan ste/ de yang ji tsam du
335b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ sems kyang mi dmigs pa de rtsam du zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan te/ des byang chub kyi sems mi dmigs pas ngas 'di srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes bya bar mi ston na/ rigs kyi
335b4(dkon brtsegs): bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yun ring po ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bstan par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med
335b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag bdun 'das pa de pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i
335b6(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
335b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po
335b8(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya bar gyur te/ de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba de chos ston to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos 'dus pa ni bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcu
336a1(dkon brtsegs): rtsa bzhir gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa ni de'i nyis 'gyur du gyur te/ de'i tshe rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i rin po che bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/ rigs kyi bu rgyal
336a2(dkon brtsegs): po nam mkha' zhes bya ba de bu dang chung ma dang / gnyen mang ba dang / 'khor du bcas pas las gzhan med cing skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /
336a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun du bcas pa de la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong du zhal zas kyi rnam pa kha na ma tho ba med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / na bza' sar pa sar pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / pho brang khang pa brtsegs
336a4(dkon brtsegs): pa sar pa sar pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / rim gro pa kha na ma tho ba med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis rim gror byas par gyur to/ /de ltar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu de gcig pu
336a5(dkon brtsegs): dben pa na gnyis su med par 'dug 'dug pa'i yid la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sems skyes par gyur te/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po mngon par 'dus byas kyang de dag nges pa med pa'i sems kyis 'dus byas na da ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
336a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/ /snyam nas de 'di snyam du sems te dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du bsngo 'am/ 'khor los sgyur bar bsngo 'am/ nyan thos su bsngo 'am/ rang sangs rgyas su bsngo 'am/ gang du bsngo snyam pa
336a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / rigs kyi bu rgyal po de'i sems de ltar bskyed ma thag tu steng gi bar snang las lha mang pos sgra bsgrags pa/ rgyal po chen po de ltar dma' ba'i sems ma skyed cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyis bsod nams kyi
336a8(dkon brtsegs): phung po yangs pa byas kyis rgyal po chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig ces byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu de'i tshe rgyal po chen po nam mkha' de dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes par
336b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ des 'di snyam du bsams so/ /bdag ni byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha rnams kyis bdag gi sems yongs su shes te sgra bsgrags so snyam mo/ /rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po nam mkha' de srog
336b2(dkon brtsegs): chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad bcus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
336b3(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi
336b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ khyod kyi spyan sngar dam chos zhu/ skyes bu dam pa mchog skye bar/ rnam pa gang gis 'gyur ba de/ rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsungs/
336b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam 'dren khyod la mngon sum du/ mchod pa yangs pa bgyid bgyid kyang / ma nges sems kyis bgyis gyur gyis/ /gar yang yongs su bsngo ma bgyis/ bdag ni gcig pu dben gnas tshe/ 'di 'dra'i sems shig skyes par gyur/ bdag gis
336b6(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams che bas gsan/ ji ltar yongs su de bsngo snyam/ tshangs par bsngo 'am brgya byin nam/ /gling gzhi'i dbang phyug thob par ram/ 'on te nyan thos dngos por ram/ /rang rgyal 'thob pa'i phyir bsngo snyam/ de ltar sems bskyed de ma thag /
336b7(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams sgra 'byin brjod pa ni/ dman pa'i sems kyis bsod nams 'di/ rnam par chud gzon ma byed cig /sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/ smon lam rlabs chen gdab par gyis/ byang chub sems rab bskyed byas shing / /'jig rten rnams
336b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi don kyang gyis/ /de bas chos kyi dbang phyug gtso/ rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag zhu ste/ thub pa ji ltar sems bskyed na/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub skye bar 'gyur/ ye shes de ni gang gis 'thob/ de don bdag la bstan du gsol/ /byang chub
337a1(dkon brtsegs): sems ni bskyed bgyis shing / /thub pa khyod 'drar bdag kyang smon/ /de yi tshig de gsan gyur nas/ /de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/ /
337a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po shes par gyis/ /rim gyis khyod la bstan par bya/ /chos rnams thams cad rkyen bzhin te/ /'dun pa'i rtsa la rab tu gnas/ /gang gis smon
337a3(dkon brtsegs): lam ci btab pa/ /de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /rgyal po ngas kyang sngon chad ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed gyur/ /sems can
337a4(dkon brtsegs): kun la phan don du/ /ngas ni smon lam dam pa btab/ /smon lam ji ltar btab tshul du/ /ngas ni 'bras bu thob par gyur/ /byang chub dam pa ngas
337a5(dkon brtsegs): thob pas/ /nga yi bsam pa rdzogs par gyur/ /rgyal po chen po brtan gyis la/ mi 'gyur sems ni bskyed par gyis/ /gal te spyod pa spyad byas nas/ /
337a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /thub pa'i gsung de thos gyur nas/ /rgyal po de ni dga' bar gyur/ /'jig rten kun gyi mngon sum du/ /seng
337a7(dkon brtsegs): ge'i nga ror tshig 'di brjod/ /'khor ba'i tha ma med pa yi/ /sngon gyi tha ma ji srid pa/ /de srid sems can phan don du/ /spyod pa dpag yas spyad par bya/ /
337a8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga 'dir/ /byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do/ /'gro ba thams cad 'gron gnyer te/ /dbul zhing phongs las dgrol bar bya/ /
337b1(dkon brtsegs): de ring phan chad gal te yang / /bdag gis 'dod chags sems bskyed na/ /phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur/ /
337b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub nam zhig thob bar du/ /tha ba'i sems dang gnod sems dang / /phrag dog dang ni ser sna yang / /de ring phan chad mi bya'o/ /tshangs pa'i spyod pa bdag gis spyad/ /
337b3(dkon brtsegs): sdis pa'i 'dod pa yongs su gtang / /tshul khrims sdom dang nges pa la/ /sangs rgyas rjes su bslab par bya/ /bdag ni byang chub rings tshul du/ /'tshang rgyar mos shing spro ba med/ /phyi
337b4(dkon brtsegs): mthar thug gi bar du yang / /sems can gcig phyir spyad par bya/ /tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni spyad par bya/ /phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad du/ /bdag gi ming ni thos par
337b5(dkon brtsegs): bya/ /bdag gis bdag la lung bstan te/ /sangs rgyas 'gyur bar dogs pa med/ bdag gi lhag bsam rnam par dag / /bdag dbang 'di na 'dren pa rnams/ /lus dang ngag gi las rnams kyang /
337b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa kun du bdag gis spyad/ yid kyi las kyang spyad par bya/ /mi dge'i las ni spyad mi bya/ /ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas te/ /'jig rten mgon du 'gyur zhe na/ /bden pa des ni sa 'di yang /
337b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur cig /bdag gis bden tshig gang brjod pa/ /ma nor yang dag smras shes na/ /bden pa des ni mkha' dbyings la/ /sil snyan dag gi sgra grag shog /bdag la gal
337b8(dkon brtsegs): te g.yo med cing / /de bzhin tha ba med ces na/ /man dA ra ba'i me tog bzang / /bden pa des ni char du phob/ /yang dag don du nges pa yi/ /tshig bden de skad brjod pa dang / phyogs bcu
338a1(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas thams cad kyi/ /bye ba'i zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/ /de yi mdo las mkha' dbyings nas/ /sil snyan bye ba'i sgra yang byung / /me tog man dA ra ba dag / /mi 'greng
338a2(dkon brtsegs): bdun srid bab par gyur/ /rgyal po de yi rjes bslabs te/ /srog chags bye ba nyi shu yi/ /'dren par bdag cag 'gyur smon ces/ /yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang bsgrags/ /de ltar srog chags
338a3(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag / /nyi shu po rnams thams cad kyang / /rgyal po mchog gi rjes slob cing / /byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur/ /rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
338a4(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor
338a5(dkon brtsegs): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya bar gyur pa ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis/ byang chub tu sems bskyed phyin chad bskal pa gang gA'i klung grangs med pa brgya stong phrag
338a6(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das par gyur to/ /mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas kyang / bskal pa gang gA'i klung drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das par gyur te/ de nas nye bar bzung nas
338a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs so/ /'di byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu thams cad yongs su rdzogs so/ /'di sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su
338a8(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs so/ /'di sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs te/ bar 'ga' yang des bdag byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram/ mi 'gyur
338b1(dkon brtsegs): snyam pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed par ma gyur to/ /rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar rgyal po de dag lhan cig tu/ /byang chub tu sems
338b2(dkon brtsegs): bskyed pa'i srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu po de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ /
338b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de dag thams cad kyang 'jam dpal
338b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur ba 'dis sbyin pa la/ yang dag par btsud do/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la yang dag par btsud de/
338b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la yang bsnyen bkur dang / yongs su spyad par byas so/ /thams cad kyis dam pa'i chos bzungs do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ma gtogs pa ni sangs rgyas
338b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing 'di nas 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bzhi khri bzhi stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
338b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa sa'i lha zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun tshad med pa dang / sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par bzhugs pa ste/ de da ltar yang bzhugs shing 'tsho'o gzhes
338b8(dkon brtsegs): so/ /sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya stong phrag bdun bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub
339a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal
339a2(dkon brtsegs): gal te de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yang yongs su rdzogs/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yang yongs su rdzogs/ sangs rgyas
339a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi sa yang yongs su rdzogs/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs na/ ci'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
339a4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ /byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags
339a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyis bu sangs rgyas kyis chos yongs su rdzogs na yang dang yang du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar med do/ /
339a6(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /des byang chub thob par gyur pas thob zin pa ni gzod thob par mi bya'o/ /smras pa/ /'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs shes
339a7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /nam mkha'
339a8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /de ltar na nam mkha' dang / /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / /
339b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do/ /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin zhe na/ de skad zer ba la
339b2(dkon brtsegs): gang gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
339b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /smras pa/ /'jam dpal gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs
339b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ni ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gzugs kyi rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma mthong ngo / /'jam dpal gyis
339b5(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos gang rtag pa yang ma yin/ mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa de la yongs su rdzogs pa 'am 'grib par 'gyur ba yod dam/ smras pa/ /'jam dpal de ni med do/ /'jam dpal
339b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar chos gang yongs su rdzogs pa yang med/ /'grib pa med pa de ni yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/ /smras pa/ /des chos cis yongs su rdzogs shes bya/
339b7(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ des chos ji ltar shes pa de ltar ye shes 'jug par 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe ye shes 'jug par 'gyur ba de'i tshe mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog go/ /gang gi tshe mi rtog /rnam par mi
339b8(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa de'i tshe yongs su rdzogs pa 'am 'grib par byed pa med de/ /gang yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ /'grib pa med pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do/ /rigs kyi bu de lta bas na gzugs kyi mnyam pa
340a1(dkon brtsegs): nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par

340a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can gzhan dag byang chub la yang dag par gzud par bya/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni sems can gang yang byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud do//
340a5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa dang / sems can dben pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gang gis sems can dmigs pa des ni byang chub kyang dmigs/ gang gis byang chub dmigs pa

340a8(dkon brtsegs): pas de ltar mnyam pa nyid la smon pa med do/ /ldog pa med do/ /de'i phyir na 'du byed rnams la gang nas kyang 'ong ba dang / gang du yang 'gro ba med de/ de ni mnyam pa nyid do/ /rigs kyi bu mnyam
340b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig ste stong pa nyid la smon pa gang yang med do/ /rigs kyi bu gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du de ltar yun ring po nas bzod pa thob na/ ci'i phyir bdag gis

340b5(dkon brtsegs): bya snyam du sems bskyed pa med do zhes smras pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems de ni ma skyes pa ste/ ma skyes pa la skye ba med do/ /gang la skye ba med pa de la thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par

344b5(dkon brtsegs): pa bsags pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams de phyogs gang logs shig tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de ni
344b6(dkon brtsegs): lho phyogs logs su 'byung ste 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid kyang de'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan
344b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das bdag gis ni smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rin po che bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gang zhing nor bu rin po che kun du bstan pa dang 'dra la rin po che de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i
344b8(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten na dkon la sngan chad ma mthong zhing mi srid pa sha stag ste/ de dag gi ming brjod na yang lo bye ba brgya stong thogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nor bu rin po che dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su gang bar 'gyur te/
345a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de la byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di gser las grub par mthong bar dga'o snyam na yang des gser las grub par mthong ba dang / dngul las grub par mthong bar dga'o snyam
345a2(dkon brtsegs): na yang dngul las grub par mthong la/ gzhan gyis gser las grub par mthong ba ma mchis par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du bai dUr+ya las grub pa dang / shel las grub pa dang / mu tig dmar po las grub pa dang / rdo'i snying po las
345a3(dkon brtsegs): grub pa dang / sbu ga las grub pa 'am/ de bzhin du rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las grub pa 'am/ tsan dan las grub pa 'am/ a ka ru las grub pa 'am/ ta ka ra las grub pa 'am/ ta ma la'i lo ma las grub pa 'am/ tsan dan sbrul gyi
345a4(dkon brtsegs): snying po las grub pa 'am/ tsan dan dmar po las grub pa 'am/ su rnam pa ji lta bur 'dod pa de dag gis de bzhin du mthong ste/ phan tshun nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par mthong ba yang ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
345a5(dkon brtsegs): de na byang chub kyi shing de las 'od byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rang rang las 'od byung bas snang zhing gsal ba ma gtogs par nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi mngon/ skar ma dang / rin po che dang / zhugs dang / glog gam/ sems can
345a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gang gi 'od kyang mi mngon pa dang / gang dag ji tsam du 'od kyis khyab par dga' ba tha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum de snyed du de dag gi 'od kyis gsal bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa'
345a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par gyis me tog kha bye ba dang / kha zum par 'gyur ba dang / gang dus dang / tshod rnam pa ji lta bur yongs su spyad par 'tshal ba de bzhin du de'i grub pa ma gtogs par nyin mtshan gyi ming yang ma
345a8(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na grang ba dang tsha ba yang ma mchis/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba yang ma mchis te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de 'jig rten
345b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams gzhan du mchis shing dga' ldan gyi gnas su tshe bas par bgyis nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i steng gi bar snang las sil snyan bltar mi gda' ba bye ba
345b2(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig phrag 'bum rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sgra 'byin pa dang / sil snyan de dag las kyang 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sgra mi 'byung gi gzhan du na pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi
345b3(dkon brtsegs): sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs kyi sgra 'byin par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji lta bur mos pa'i sgra de lta bu thos par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs
345b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de blta bar 'tshal lam/ 'chag gam/ 'gro 'am/ 'ong ngam/ sdod dam/ mchis kyang rung ste/ gang dag der sangs rgyas blta ba'i yid la bgyi ba skyes ma thag tu de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
345b5(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa de de nyid na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur cing mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de mthong ma thag tu de dag gi the tshom 'am/ nem nur ram/
345b6(dkon brtsegs): yid gnyis sam/ chos kyi som nyid gang ci mchis pa yongs su chad par gyur te/ bstan mi 'tshal bar chos kyi tshig de'i don yongs su 'tshal bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam btab bo/ /de nas 'khor de'i byang
345b7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du mas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ gang 'di kun du gzigs pa zhes bya ba mtshan de ni tshul dang 'dra ba ste/ sems can gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
345b8(dkon brtsegs): pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur ba lta ci smos te/ gang dag gis lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / gang dag
346a1(dkon brtsegs): gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i ming thos pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong bar blta'o/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
346a2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ /rigs kyi bu dag gang gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag
346a3(dkon brtsegs): 'bum gyis mtshan brjod pa bas ni gang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i ming brjod na 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed na/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
346a4(dkon brtsegs): pa kun du gzigs pa de'i mtshan brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas bskal pa re re zhing sems can gyi don ji snyed du byas pa'i sems
346a5(dkon brtsegs): can gyi don de ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis kyang ma mdzad do/ /de nas 'khor de'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am
346a6(dkon brtsegs): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpa' gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
346a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de skad ces brjod pa dang / /de'i mod la srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par

346b1(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi

347a1(dkon brtsegs): kun du 'jug go/ /de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas rang gi sangs rgyas kyi

348b2(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ba ste/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi ri bo ltar mdzes shing lam me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong tsam du gyur ba sha stag gis bskor cing mdun gyis byas te/

348b8(dkon brtsegs): dngul gyi kha dog lta bu mang po mthon par gyur te/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byed nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
349a1(dkon brtsegs): gtsug tu nub par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags
349a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod

349a6(dkon brtsegs): dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med par 'gyur ro/ /byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lhag pa'i
349a7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa gces spras byed pa la ltos/ tshig tu brjod par 'dra yang gang gis lhag pa'i bsam pas bsam pa thag pa nas tshig tu brjod pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag gi ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
349a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bzhin du gyur to/ /gang gi dman pa'i sems dang / dad pa tsam gyi tshig tu brjod pa de dag kyang las dma' ba des bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug bcur 'khor ba phyir
349b1(dkon brtsegs): bsnyil te/ pha rol du phyin pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po 'od kyi tog dang / ye shes bla ma dang / zhi ba'i dbang po dang / smon lam blo gros dag kyang / phyogs bzhi nas khang pa brtsegs pa bai dUr+ya'i
349b2(dkon brtsegs): mdog tu 'dug pa mtshungs pa med par bzang ba dag gi nang du zhugs te/ lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed/ me tog gi char chen po ni rab tu
349b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bebs/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum ni sgra 'byin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyis 'ong bar snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/
349b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'jig rten du dog sa cher g.yos par gyur ba dang / phyogs bzhi nas khang pa brtsegs pa bzhi mchi bar gda' bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag
349b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas bskul nas de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ong bar gyur to/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas ring po ma lon par de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag lhags te/ lhags nas kyang khang pa brtsegs
349b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag nas babs nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /
349b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phyogs bzhi nas snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes
349b8(dkon brtsegs): bu dam pa 'ongs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go gyon pa/ 'jug pa chen pos yang dag par zhugs pa yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu dag khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa 'di dag la rim gro skyed la chos dris shig /rigs kyi bu
350a1(dkon brtsegs): dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi smon lam nyon cig rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi smon lam ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa gang su dag gis bdag
350a2(dkon brtsegs): cag mthong bar gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shur 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar gyur cig /pha rol du phyin pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
350a3(dkon brtsegs): bud med gang gis bdag cag gi ming thos na yang myur du bud med kyi lus las 'gyur bar shog shig ces bya ba de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pa dag go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bstan te/ rdzu 'phrul de dag phyir brtul ba mdzad
350a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma
350a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhan ni sgyu ma sprul pa yang bgyid/ sgyu ma mchis par yang bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang skye ba yang skye/ 'gag kyang 'gag ste/ gang la skye ba dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das
350a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba
350a7(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal byang chub ji lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang sus kyang ma thob ma bshig cing gang la yod pa 'am med par chags pa dmigs su med pa'o/ /byang chub
350a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ye shes bla mas smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub de ji tsam du yod pas kyang mi 'thob/ med pas kyang mi 'thob bam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa ste/
350b1(dkon brtsegs): yod par ma gyur mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir 'thob par 'gyur ba med do/ /smras pa/ 'jam dpal tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pas de skad du ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba
350b2(dkon brtsegs): gang yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang phung po rnams kyang mi mthong / khams dang skye mched rnams kyang mi mthong la dmus long yang ma yin/ sha'i mig can yang ma yin zhing chos gang la yang mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog pa dang /
350b3(dkon brtsegs): chos gang la yang 'phel ba dang / 'grib par mi mthong ba 'di ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid dang mi 'gal zhing
350b4(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed de 'di dag ni so so'i skye bo'i chos so/ /'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so/ /'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya bar tha dad du mi 'byed cing gang 'di dben pa'i tshul
350b5(dkon brtsegs): du tshul gcig pa la 'jug pa 'di ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas smras pa/ gang de bzhin nyid la yang zhugs la de bzhin nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing 'di ni zab bo zhes bya bar mi rtog
350b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mi zad pas smras pa/ chos thams cad mi zad pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu zad pa ste/ gang chos thams cad mi zad par
350b7(dkon brtsegs): chos bstan pa de ni chos nyid las 'gal bar mi byed pa ste/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa legs par sems pas smras pa/ gang bsam pas bsam du med pa
350b8(dkon brtsegs): la yang 'jug la bsam du med pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral bas smras pa/ gang 'dod chags
351a1(dkon brtsegs): dang shin du bral ba de ni mtshan ma thams cad la 'dod chags pa yang med/ 'dod chags dang bral ba yang med/ rjes su chags pa yang med/ khong khro ba yang med/ rmongs pa yang med/ gcig tu byed pa yang med/
351a2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su byed pa yang med/ byed pa yang med/ mi byed pa yang med/ len pa yang med/ 'dor ba yang med de de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos smras pa/
351a3(dkon brtsegs): gang rgya mtsho lta bur zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos la zhugs pa de chos la yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du chos ston cing / bdag dang gzhan du rlom sems su mi byed pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin
351a4(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /zla ba'i bla ma gzhon nur gyur bas smras pa/ gang sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis zla ba lta bur gyur kyang sems can de dag la yang rlom sems med pa de ltar bstan
351a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad rnam par sel bas smras pa/ gang mya ngan thams cad rgyun chad pa de ni mya ngan med cing zhum par 'gyur ba med do/ /
351a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa'o/ /de la mya ngan gyi rtsa ba gang zhe na/ gang 'di ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa ste/ gang ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing chos ston pa de ni
351a7(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med pas smras pa/ gang 'dod pa pa'i khams la yang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / nyan thos
351a8(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la'ang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun du lta bas smras pa/ gang chos ston na gang 'di stong
351b1(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid ston la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed/ mnyam pa nyid kyis kyang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu
351b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas smras pa/ gang chos ston pa'i tshe 'khor gsum dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'khor gsum gang zhe na/ bdag mi dmigs pa dang / chos
351b3(dkon brtsegs): nyan pa mi dmigs pa dang / chos la yang mngon par zhen pa med pa'o/ /'di ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /byang chub
351b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'gro ba grub pas smras pa/ gang chos thams cad 'du ba med par yang shes shing ji ltar shes pa de bzhin du yang ston pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i phyir yi ge gcig kyang mi brjod pa de ltar
351b5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' zab mor spyod pas smras pa/ gang chos thams cad kyi zab pa nyid kyang shes la chos de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gang ston
351b6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gang la ston pa dang / gang bstan pa de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o/ /de bzhin du sbyar ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
351b7(dkon brtsegs): po bzi brjid chen po bzi brjid chen po dag gis so so nas rang rang gi spobs pa ston par gyur to/ /tshul gcig tu bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bdun bcus mi skye ba'i
351b8(dkon brtsegs): chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /dge slong bdun stong ni nye bar len pa med
352a1(dkon brtsegs): par zag pa rnams las rnam par grol lo/ /lha dang mi'i skye dgu las khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa drug ni chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med pa rnam par dag par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
352a2(dkon brtsegs): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge
352a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dun ni ji snyed cig tu 'gyur/ de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba ni ji srid cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ bcom ldan
352a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba 'di nyid la dris shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'jam dpal
352a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe nam
352a6(dkon brtsegs): mkha'i khams gzugs can du gyur ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par
352a7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang gi tshe dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /gang gi tshe rmi lam gyi
352a8(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dang / /brag cha dang / /mig yor dang / /chu zla dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /
352b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyis mtshan mor gyur la zla ba'i 'od kyis nyin mor gyur ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rigs kyis bu de lta yin gyis/ /su byang
352b2(dkon brtsegs): chub du smon pa de la dris shig / smras pa/ /'jam dpal khyod byang chub tu mi smon tam/ /smras pa/ /rigs kyis bu de ni ma yin te/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /'jam dpal nyid
352b3(dkon brtsegs): kyang byang chub la byang chub nyid kyang 'jam dpal lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ /rigs kyi bu gang 'di byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ /'jam dpal zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam mo/ /ming gang yin pa
352b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni dben zhing byed pa med pa ste stong ba'o/ /stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon
352b5(dkon brtsegs): par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / /
352b6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos 'dus pa mthong ngam/ /thos sam/ /gsol pa/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong ngo / /thos so/ /bka' stsal pa/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gsol
352b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ /bcom ldan 'das de ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /bde bar gshegs pa de ni bgrang du ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyis bu 'di lta ste/ /dper
352b8(dkon brtsegs): na yul ma gang+gA'i til gyi dong nas til gyis 'bru gcig cig blangs na rigs kyi bu til gyi 'bru gcig po de ji lta ba de bzhin du ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa dang / nyan thos 'dus par blta'o/
353a1(dkon brtsegs): /phyi na til gyi ltag ma lus pa ltar ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs
353a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dus par blta'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ /dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thal bar brlags te/ /rdul phra rab tsam du byas pa la rigs kyi
353a3(dkon brtsegs): bu rdul phra rab ji snyed cig yod pa de snyed kyi bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs pa de bzhugs par byas kyang brgya'i char yang smos par mi 'gyur ro/ /stong gi cha dang /
353a4(dkon brtsegs): bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / /bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / /grangs dang cha dang / /bgrang ba dang / /rgyur yang smos par mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu rnam grangs

353a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ /dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab tu brlags te/ /thal bar
353a7(dkon brtsegs): byas pa de las skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig khyer te/ /rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas
353a8(dkon brtsegs): der rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig bzhag ste/ /skyes bu des tshul de bzhin du shar phyogs logs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad zad zad tu bkod par gyur la// //
353b1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du skyes bu gnyis pa zhig skyes te/ /des kyang lho phyogs logs su de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re nas/ /tshul de bzhin du bor te/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcur skyes bu de lta bu
353b2(dkon brtsegs): re res tshul de dang 'dra bar de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul zad zad du re re nas bor na rig kyi bu ji snyam du sems/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag brgya phrag ni 'di

353b6(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa de ni mi nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rigs kyi bu skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
353b7(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed cig 'das pa dang gang dag tu phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag bor ba dang / /gang dag las 'das te/ rdul phra rab ma bor ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag /
353b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad btags te rdul phra rab tu brlags na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyams du sems/ rdul phra rab de dag rtsis shes pa 'am/
354a1(dkon brtsegs): rtsis la mkhas pas brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /'bum phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /bye ba stong

354a7(dkon brtsegs): cig yod do/ /mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do/ /zhes bya ba de bas kyang lhag par gong du de bzhin gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
354a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te ye shes chen po de lta bu'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi ma'i mtha'i mur
354b1(dkon brtsegs): thug par sems can dmyal ba chen por bsregs kyang bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bzod par bgyi'o/ /de lta bu'i ye shes chen po ni yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o/ /
354b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de de bzhin no/ /ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ sems can mos pa chung ngu dang / le lo che ba dang / brtson 'grus chung ba ma gtogs par su zhig de lta bu'i ye shes chen po
354b3(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod pa mi bskyed/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di bstan pa'i tshe srog chags khri byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags
354b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu de ltar phyogs bcur skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag
354b5(dkon brtsegs): du phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor ba dang / gang dag las 'das te ma bor ba de thams cad rdul phra rab tu brlags pa de dag pas kyang mang ba'i bskal par da dung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod
354b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i smon lam ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ yang dag par 'jug pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas de byang chub thob pa'i tshe tshad kyang bsam gyis
354b7(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
354b8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed du yang skyo ba mi skyed pa'i 'jug pa chen po de ngo mtshar lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das spyod pa chen po ngo mtshar lags so/ /'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du
355a1(dkon brtsegs): sems nam mkha'i khams 'di snyam du zhag dang / nyi ma dang zla ba phyed dang / dus dang / lo dang / bskal pa dang / bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa bye ba dang / bskal pa khrag khrig dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
355a2(dkon brtsegs): 'bum phrag dang / gtams dang / dkrigs dang / mi 'khrugs pa zhig 'das so snyam du sems sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /smras pa rigs kyi bu de
355a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bur khong du chud de ci nas kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar khong du chud pa de ni 'di snyam du zhag gcig 'das par gyur to/ /
355a4(dkon brtsegs): nyi ma gcig 'das par gyur to zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du lo 'di snyed cig 'das par gyur to zhes rnam par mi rtog go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang la yang de'i 'du shes gang yang 'jug pa med do/ /rigs
355a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i khams ni bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pas lhag pa zhig 'das par gyur kyang skyo zhing yongs su yi 'chad pa med de/ nam mkha'i khams la skye ba 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/
355a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshig pa 'am/ 'gyes par 'gyur ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams la dngos po med pa'i phyir ro/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad dngos po med par shes pa de ni skyo ba dang
355a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su yid 'chad pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /rigs kyi bu gang la nam mkha'i khams shes bya ba de ni 'tshig pa med/ skyo ba med/ yi 'chad pa med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ rga ba med/ 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/
355a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba med do/ /rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang la 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i ming 'di la yang 'tshig pa med/ skyo ba med/ yi 'chad pa med/ g.yo ba med/ skye ba med/ rga ba med/ 'chi ba med/ 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/
355b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ming de ni shin du dben pa'i phyir ro/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu gzhan yang dbang che ba/ dbang che bar grags
355b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smas sos/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed lags na/ gang gis thos nas 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa
355b3(dkon brtsegs): dang gzhan la yang rgya cher bstan pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag 'di skad du bdag cag gis gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya'o/ /
355b4(dkon brtsegs): bcang bar bya'o/ /bklag par bya'o/ /kun chub par bya'o/ /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya'o zhes tshig tu brjod pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang
355b5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam 'chang ngam/ klog gam/
355b6(dkon brtsegs): kun chub par bgyid dam/ 'jug par bgyid dam/ gzhan la yang rgya cher bstan pa dang / gang 'jam dpa' gzhon nur gyur ba'i rjes su bslab po zhes sems bskyed pa de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
355b7(dkon brtsegs): p a dang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la las phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig gzigs pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis
355b8(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul pa dang / rnam grangs de bzhin du sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thams cad yang dag par blangs pa la gnas te/
356a1(dkon brtsegs): phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug gi bar du sbyin pa byin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ 'jug par byed
356a2(dkon brtsegs): dam/ gzhan la yang rgya cher ston par byed dam/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i rjes su bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du sems skyed cing gom pa bdun 'dor na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snga
356a3(dkon brtsegs): mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar 'gro'o/ /bye ba brgya stong gi
356a4(dkon brtsegs): char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas de'i tshe byang chub
356a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun nas snang ba sgyu ma lta bur 'byung ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu 'khor der byang chub
356a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur ba de dag gi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
356a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyan snga na 'jam dpa' gzhon nur gyur ba 'dug cing rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ston par mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te 'jam dpa' gzhon nur gyur ba 'di de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams bye
356a8(dkon brtsegs): ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por gcig car du snang bar gyur ba ni smon lam dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyi khyad par ngo mtshar che'o snyam du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
356b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de'i phyir
356b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'd-i'i ming sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar zung shig / smon lam bsam gyi mi khyab pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang
356b3(dkon brtsegs): zung shig / byang chub kyi sems yang dag par dga' bar byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig /de nas de'i tshe 'khor der phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin
356b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char chen po phab nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing 'di skad du kye ma sangs rgyas
356b5(dkon brtsegs): kye ma sangs rgyas de da ni bdag cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i seng ge'i sgra dang / bkod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos so zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe na
356b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/ /sems can tshad med pa yang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su grub par gyur to/ /bcom ldan
356b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i
356b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //
357a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ le'u bcwa lnga pa rdzogs so// //
357a2(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// //
